Name: tyrion lannister
Sentence: ['Mmh. It is true what they say about the Northern girls.', 'I did hear something about that.', 'And the other brother?', "There's the pretty one. And there's the clever one.", 'I hear he hates that nickname.', 'Clever girl.', 'Have you?', 'The gods gave me one blessing.', 'Should I explain to you the meaning of a closed door in a whorehouse, brother?', 'She has odd cravings, our sister.', "I'm sorry, I've begun the feast a bit early. And this is the first of many courses.", 'Close the door!', "Your uncle's in the Night's Watch.", "Preparing for a night with your family. I've always wanted to see the Wall.", "My greatest accomplishment. You – you're Ned Stark's bastard, aren't you?", 'Did I offend you? Sorry. You are the bastard, though.', 'And Lady Stark is not your mother. Making you a bastard. Let me give you some advice, bastard. Never forget what you are. The rest of the world will not. Wear it like armor. Then it can never be used to hurt you.', "All dwarves are bastards in their fathers' eyes.", 'If I get through this without squirting from one end or the other, it will be a miracle.', 'The greatest in the land. My spear never misses.', 'Before you go, you will call on Lord and Lady Stark and offer your sympathies.', 'None. But it is expected of you. Your absence has already been noted.', "One word and I'll hit you again.", 'Go! Tell her. But first you will get to Lord and Lady Stark and you will fall on your knees in front of them and tell them how very sorry you are, that you are at their service, and that all your prayers are with them. Do you understand?', 'Do you understand?', 'I hope so. If he forgets, be a good dog and remind him. Time for breakfast...', 'Bread. And two of those little fish. And a mug of dark beer to wash it down. And bacon, burnt black.', 'Beloved siblings.', 'Apparently not.', 'The Maester says the boy may live.', 'Only the gods know for certain. All the rest of us can do is pray. The charms of the north seem entirely lost on you.', "Where's your sense of wonder? The greatest structure ever built, the intrepid men of the Night's Watch, the wintry abode of the White Walkers.", 'And go celibate? The whores would go begging from Dorne to Casterly Rock. I just want to stand on top of the Wall and piss off the edge of the world.', "Speaking for the grotesques, I'd have to disagree. Death is so final, whereas life... Life is full of possibilities. I hope the boy does wake. I'd be very interested to hear what he has to say.", 'My dear brother, you wound me. You know how much I love my family.', 'Rapers. They were given a choice no doubt... Castration or the Wall. Most choose the knife. Not impressed by your new brothers? Lovely thing about the Watch... You discard your old family and get a whole new one.', 'Look at me and tell me what you see.', "What you see is a dwarf. If I'd been born a peasant they might've left me out in the woods to die. Alas, I was born a Lannister of Casterly Rock. Things are expected of me. My father was the Hand of the King for 20 years.", "Yes, until my brother killed him. Life is full of these little ironies. My sister married the new King and my repulsive nephew will be King after him. I must do my part for the honor of my house, wouldn't you agree? But how? Well, my brother has his sword and I have my mind. And a mind needs books like a sword needs a whetstone. That's why I read so much. And you? What's your story, bastard?", "A bastard boy with nothing to inherit, off to join the ancient order of the Night's Watch, alongside his valiant brothers-in-arms.", "Yes yes, against grumpkins and snarks and all the other monsters your wet nurse warned you about. You're a smart boy. You don't believe that nonsense... Everything's better with some wine in the belly.", 'A charming man.', "And how's that going, Commander Mormont?", 'Good news or bad?', "I'm looking at you. You've got an interesting face. Very distinctive faces. All of you.", "It's just I think they would look marvelous decorating spikes in King's Landing. Perhaps I'll write my sister, the Queen, about it.", "Grenn's father left him too... Outside a farmhouse when he was three. Pyp was caught stealing a wheel of cheese. His little sister hadn't eaten in three days. He was given a choice", "It's a lucky thing none of them were trained by a master-at-arms like your Ser Rodrik. I don't imagine any of them have ever held a real sword before they came here. Your brother Bran. He's woken up.", "You're joking?", "And how do a bear's balls taste?", 'Do Dornish girls count? So you roam the Seven Kingdoms, collaring pickpockets and horse thieves and bringing them here as eager recruits?', 'They have a better chance finding feed than glory.', "You don't have enough men to be an army and aside from Yoren here, none of you are particularly funny.", "Do you think I'm plump? Listen, Benjen... May I call you Benjen?", "I'm not sure what I've done to offend you. I have great admiration for the Night's Watch. I've great admiration for you as First Ranger.", "But... I don't believe that giants and ghouls and White Walkers are lurking beyond the Wall. I believe that the only difference between us and the wildlings is that when the Wall went up, our ancestors happened to live on the right side of it.", 'I think he\'s starting to like me. "Going below"?', "So you're heading down to King's Landing too.", "Let's share the road. I could use some decent company.", "Not this time. We'll be staying at the finest castles and inns. No one turns away a Lannister.", 'Eight... no, nine.', 'They say the winter of my birth was three years long, Maester Aemon.', 'Yes, and the fishermen of Lannisport say they see mermaids.', "It's either me or this cold. And it doesn't appear to be going anywhere.", "I expect I will. Gods know there aren't many feather beds between here and King's Landing.", 'Of course.', "If you're going to be a cripple, it's better to be a rich cripple. Take care, Snow.", 'I must say I received a slightly warmer welcome on my last visit.', "Any man of the Night's Watch, but not I, eh, boy?", 'Then you might learn a lordo s courtesy.', "So it's true. Hello Bran. Do you remember anything about what happened?", 'Curious.', 'Would your charming companion be so kind as to kneel? My neck is beginning to hurt.', 'Do you like to ride, Bran?', 'What of it? With the right horse and saddle, even a cripple can ride.', "Then I'm not a dwarf. My father will rejoice to hear it. I have a gift for you. Give that to your saddler. He'll provide the rest. You must shape the horse to the rider. Start with a yearling and teach it to respond to the reins and to the boy's voice.", 'You will. On horseback you will be as tall as any of them.', 'I have a tender spot in my heart for cripples, bastards and broken things.', "Spare me your false courtesies, Lord Stark. There's a brothel outside your walls. There I'll find a bed and both of us can sleep easier.", "Come to see me off, Greyjoy? Kind of you. Your master doesn't seem to like Lannisters.", "No, of course not. What happened here? Where is lady Stark? Why didn't she receive me?", "She's not in Winterfell, is she? Where did she go?", "My lady? Your loyalty to your captors is touching. Tell me, how do you think Balon Greyjoy would feel if he could see his only surviving son has turned lackey? I still remember seeing my father's fleet burn in Lannisport. I believe your uncles were responsible?", 'Nothing prettier than watching sailors burn alive. Yes, a great victory for your people. Shame how it all turned out.', "A stupid rebellion then. I suppose your father realized that when your brothers died in battle. Now here you are, your enemy's squire.", "I've offended you. Forgive me, it's been a rough morning. Anyway, don't despair. I'm a constant disappointment to my own father and I've learned to live with it. Your next tumble with Ros is on me. I'll try not to wear her out.", "My men can sleep in the stable. As for myself, I don't require a large room.", 'Is there nothing I can do... to remedy this?', "There's a clever man. You can manage food, I trust? Yoren, dine with me.", 'Nothing would more likely ruin my supper. Lady Stark! What an unexpected pleasure. I was sorry to have missed you at Winterfell.', "I envy your father all his fine friends, but I don't quite see the purpose of this.", "This isn't the Kingsroad. You said we were riding for Winterfell.", "Very wise. They'll be out in droves, looking for me in the wrong place. Wordo s probably gotten to my father by now. He'll be offering a handsome reward. Everyone knows a Lannister always pays his debts. Would you be so good as to untie me?", 'Why not? Am I going to run? The hill tribes would kill me for my boots. Unless a Shadowcat ate me first.', "Ah... the Eastern Road. We're going to The Vale. You're taking me to your sister's to answer for my imagined crimes. Tell me, Lady Stark. When was the last time you saw your sister?", "She's changed. She was always a bit touched, but now... you might as well kill me here.", "Neither am I! I had nothing to do with the attempt on your son's life!", 'What sort of imbecile arms an assassin with his own blade?', 'Why? Am I starting to make sense?', "Untie me. If I die, what's the point?", "Well, I'm willing if she is.", "The Eyrie. They say it's impregnable.", 'I like you.', "Oh? Did I kill him too? I've been a very busy man.", 'If any harm comes to me, my brother, Jaime, will see that they do.', 'Mord! Turnkey! Mord! Mord!', 'How would you like to be rich?', "My family is rich. We have gold, lots of gold. I'm prepared to give you lots of gold.", "Well, I don't have it here.", 'Mord! Mord! Mord! Mord! Mord!', 'About the gold -', 'Listen to me! Listen to me! Sometimes possession… is an abstract concept. When they captured me they took my purse, but the gold is still mine.', "Where? I don't know where, but when they free me -", "Have you ever heard the phrase “Rich as a Lannister”? Of course you have. You're a smart man. You know who the Lannisters are. I am a Lannister. Tyrion, son of Tywin! And of course, you have also heard the phrase, “a Lannister always pays his debts.” If you deliver a message from me to Lady Arryn, I will be in your debt. I will owe you gold. If you deliver the message and I live, which I very much intend to do.", 'Tell her I wish to confess my crimes.', 'Yes, my lady. I do, my lady.', "Where do I begin, my lords and ladies? I'm a vile man, I confess it. My crimes and sins are beyond counting. I have lied and cheated, gambled and whored. I'm not particularly good at violence, but I'm good at convincing others to do violence for me. You want specifics, I suppose. When I was seven, I saw a servant girl bathing in the river. I stole her robe. She was forced to return to the castle, naked and in tears. I close my eyes, I can still see her tits bouncing. When I was ten, I stuffed my uncle's boots with goatshit. When confronted with my crime, I blamed a squire. Poor boy was flogged and… I escaped justice. When I was twelve, I milked my eel into a pot of turtle stew. I flogged the one-eyed snake. I skinned my sausage. I made the bald man cry into the turtle stew, which I do believe my sister ate. At least I hope she did. I once brought a jackass and a honeycomb into a brothel -", 'Confessing my crimes.', "Oh, I'm very sorry. I don't know anything about all that.", "Is this how justice is done in the Vale? you accuse me of crimes, I deny them, so you throw me in a cell to freeze and starve? Where is the King's Justice? I'm accused and demand a trial.", 'I understand the law.', 'No need to bother Lord Robin. I demand a trial by combat.', 'Agreed.', 'Now I demand a champion. I have that right, same as you.', "I wouldn't be too glad, ser. I name my brother, Jaime Lannister.", "Send a raven for him, I'm happy to wait.", 'Do I have a volunteer?', 'Anyone?... Anyone?', 'Not this little man. This little man is going home. I believe you have something of mine.', 'A Lannister always pays his debts.', 'From here it might be best if Bronn and I continue alone.', 'And feed it to the goats, yes.', 'Uncle. Father.', 'Sorry to disappoint you.', 'May I present My Lord Father, Tywin son of Tytos of House Lannister.', 'We have our differences, Jaime and I.', 'And the Starks? Lord Eddard?', 'How did my sweet sister persuade the King to imprison his dear friend Ned?', 'My sister rules, you mean.', 'Maybe. Though the boy does have a certain belligerence.', "Oh, do continue. Didn't mean to interrupt.", 'Shagga likes axes.', 'The vanguard? Me and the tribesmen on the front lines?', "Ferocious? Last night a Moon Brother stabbed a Stone Crow over a sausage. Three Stone Crows seized the Moon Brother and opened his throat. Bronn managed to keep Shagga from chopping off the dead man's cock, which was fortunate, but even still, Ulf is demanding blood money, which Shagga and Gunthor refuse to pay.", 'Surely there are ways to have me killed that would be less detrimental to the war effort.', "lt appears l'm not hungry after all. Excuse me, my lords.", 'Where did you find one so pretty at this hour?', 'Took her? From whom?', "And he didn't have anything to say about it?", "Well, the odds of me living long enough for him to retaliate have just dropped drastically. We'll be at the vanguard tomorrow.", 'Who are you?', 'What did your mother call you?', 'My mother died giving birth to me.', 'What sort of accent is that?', 'For-', "What do l want from you? l want you to share my tent. l want you to pour my wine, laugh at my jokes, rub my legs when they're sore after a day's ride. l want you to take no other man to bed for as long as we're together. And l want you to fuck me like it's my last night in this world. Which it may well be.", "One - safety. No one will hurt you for as long as you're mine. Two - the pleasure of my company, which l have heard is spectacular.", 'And three - more gold than you can spend if you lived a thousand years. Do you accept my proposal?', 'No.', 'Ah! Damn you, woman. Are you immune to pain?', "Let's play a new game.", 'Does it involve the potential for losing fingers?', "No! No fire games, no knife games. Let's do something l'm good at.", 'l happen to be a great judge of character.', "lt's not. Here's how it works - l make a statement about your past. lf l'm right, you drink. lf l'm wrong, l drink. And no lying. l'll know if you're lying.", 'Fine. Bronn first. Your father beat you.', 'You killed your first man before you were 12.', "You've been north of the Wall.", "And you once loved a woman many years ago, but it turned out badly so you've never let yourself love again. Oh, wait, that's me. Your turn, my mysterious foreign beauty.", "lt's fun! Look at the fun we're having. Your mother was a whore.", 'All right. Your father left the family when you were very young, never to return.', "And we've established the rules about lying?", 'You wanted a different life. You came from somewhere and you wanted to be elsewhere.', "So, specifics… You wanted to be elsewhere, but how would you get there? l don't believe the life of the Silent Sisters is for you. So, what's a lowborn girl to do?", 'Are you sure –', 'My dear lady, if l have offended you, l apologize.', 'Fine, fine. Ask away. Try to penetrate the enigma that is me.', "That's not how the game works.", 'How did you hear that?', 'Another night, perhaps.', "lt's not a pleasant story.", "So l was 16. My brother Jaime and l were riding, when we heard a scream. She ran out onto the road, clothes half torn off, with two men on her heels. Jaime scared away the men easily enough, while l wrapped her in my cloak. She was too scared to send off on her own, so while Jaime hunted down the rapers l took her to the nearest inn and fed her. Her name was Tysha. She was a wheelwright's orphan. And she was hungry. Together we finished off three chickens and a flagon of wine. lmpossible as it seems, there was a time when l was unaccustomed to wine. l forgot how afraid l was around girls. how l was always waiting for them to laugh at me or look away embarrassed, or ask me about my tall, handsome brother. l forgot about everything but Tysha. And somehow l found myself in her bed.", "lt didn't last long. l didn't know what the hell l was doing. But she was good to me. She kissed me afterwards and sang me a song. And by morning l was deep enough in love to ask for her hand. A few lies, a few gold coins, one drunken septon and there you have it - man and wife. For a fortnight anyway, until the septon sobered up and told my father.", 'Not quite. First, my father had Jaime tell me the truth. The girl was a whore, you see. Jaime had arranged the whole thing - the road, the rapers, all of it. He thought it was time l had a woman. After my brother confessed, my father brought in my wife and gave her to his guards. He paid her well - a silver for each man. How many whores command that kind of price? He brought me into the barracks and made me watch. By the end, she had so much silver that the coins were slipping through her fingers and rolling on to the floor.', 'Really? l was 16, drunk and in love.', 'As l said, l was young and stupid.', 'What is it? What do you want?', 'What?', 'Get my squire!', 'lf l die, weep for me.', "l'll know.", 'Stay low?', 'l was born lucky. Tribesmen of the Vale, gather round! Stone Crows! Black Ears! Burned Men! Moon Brothers! And Painted Dogs! Your dominion over the Vale begins now! Onward, to claim what is yours!', 'To battle!', "l'm alive?", 'Did we win?', 'How did our tribesmen do?', "lt's nice to see them getting along.", 'Good of you to notice. l hear we won.', 'Did we get the Stark boy, at least?', 'Where was he?', 'And where are they?', "The Stark boy appears to be less green than we'd hoped.", "There's your peace. Joffrey saw to that when he decided to remove Ned Stark's head. You'll have an easier time drinking from that cup than you will bringing Robb Stark to the table now. He's winning – in case you hadn't noticed.", "Half wrong. l'm new to strategy, but unless we want to be surrounded by three armies, it appears we can't stay here.", 'And do what?', 'Heads, spikes, walls. Why not my uncle? Why not anyone? Why me?', 'So it would seem.', "No, he said l couldn't take with me to King's Landing. He was very specific on that point.", 'What?', 'l believe he used the word "whore".', "My father's probably the most powerful man in the country. Certainly the richest. He has all Seven Kingdoms in his pockets. Everyone everywhere always has to do exactly what my father says. He's always been a cunt. l believe the ladies of the court could learn a great deal from a girl like you. Why don't you come with me, be the Hando s lady? Because the King needs a Hand and the Hand –", 'Beloved nephew.', 'We looked for you on the battlefield. . You were nowhere to be found.', "What a fine job you've done. . Look at you. . More beautiful than ever. . And you! You, you're going to be bigger than the Hound, but much better looking. . This one doesn't like me.", "Me, too, dear. Death is so boring, especially now with so much excitement in the world. . My Lady, I'm sorry for your loss.", 'But still her father. Surely having so recently lost your own beloved father you can sympathize.', 'Of course you are.', 'Well, , enjoy your name day, Your Grace. Wish I could stay and celebrate, but there is work to be done.', "Don't get up. More ravishing than ever, big sister. . War agrees with you. Forgive the interruption, carry on.", "It's been a remarkable journey. I, , pissed off the edge of the Wall, I slept in a sky cell. . I fought with the hill tribes. So many adventures, so much to be thankful for.", 'Yes., well, I, do believe the Hand of the King is welcome at all small council meetings.', 'Yes, but in his absence…', "If I were capable of tricking father, I'd be emperor of the world by now. You brought this on yourself. .", "Quite right. You did nothing when your son called for Ned Stark's head. Now the entire North has risen up against us.", 'Did you? You failed. That bit of theater will haunt our family for a generation.', "Who's won every battle he's fought. Do you understand we're losing the war?", 'Nothing. But I know people. And I know that our enemies hate each other almost as much as they hate us.', 'Joffrey is King.', "I'm only here to advise him. And if the King listens to what I say, the King might just get his Uncle Jaime back.", "You love your children. It's your one redeeming quality. That and your cheekbones. The Starks love their children as well. And we have two of them.", 'One?', "Disappeared? What, in a puff of smoke? We had three Starks to trade. You chopped one's head off and let another escape. Father will be furious. It must be odd for you to be the disappointing child.", 'A bit corpsey, yes.', 'I thought you wanted to come here.', 'You love the smell of dead bodies and shit?', 'You can smell cum from the balcony?', 'And so did the country.', "Yes, well, you need to be careful. No one can know you're here.", "You can't trust anyone in King's Landing. They're all liars; good liars, bad liars, one or two great liars.", "Me? I'm not from here. I'm a slave to the truth.", "Why do you think I am so little? I'm being, , crushed beneath the weight of all that truth.", "Ned Stark actually slept on this, as if the poor man didn't suffer enough. One of the many changes we'll have to make around here.", 'You brought this on yourself.', "Do you understand we're losing the war?", 'It was quite a battle.', 'Strange things do happen. You should taste her fish pie.', "Men like Lord Varys and I can't let our disadvantages get the best of us. We'll make a fisherman of him yet. .", 'Your discretion is legendary, where your friends are concerned.', "I don't like threats.", "I'm not Ned Stark. I understand the way this game is played.", 'And I am not. Threaten me again and I will have you thrown into the sea.', "You've perfected the art of tearing up papers. Give him his father's bones back, at least, as a gesture of good faith.", 'Safe travels, cousin.', 'You have a deft hand with diplomacy.', 'Lord Commander asks that we send more men to man The Wall.', 'Cold winds are rising, and the dead rise with them.', "According to the Commander, one of these dead men attacked him in his chambers. . Mormont doesn't lie.", 'Apparently you burn him.', "I don't know what I believe, but here's a fact for you. The Night's Watch is the only thing that separates us from what lies beyond the Wall.", 'Leave us, Podrick. I believe we know how to pour our own wine.', 'Myself, I prefer the improper ones.', 'You know your wines, my lord.', "Call me Tyrion, please. I'm sure you're getting used to fine dinners, now that you're a lord.", 'Wars have been started for less.', "I heard there was some trouble in Littlefinger's brothel the other night.", "Yes, of course. City Watch must keep the peace. Only, I hadn't realized peace depended on killing babies.", "Quite right. Especially the queen's orders.", "No, but who else would want to murder King Robert's bastards? She's always been a jealous woman.", "You've heard the awful rumors about my brother and sister.", "That's good of you, but you have heard them. I suppose people who do believe that filth, consider Robert's bastards to be better claimants to the throne than Cersei's children.", 'I appreciate your loyalty. Tell me.', 'The fool! He had no idea you were already bought.', "I'm not questioning your honor, Lord Janos. I'm denying its existence.", "Dwarf? You should have stopped at imp. And yes, you will stand here and take it from me, unless you'd like to take it from my friend here.", "I intend to serve as Hand of the King until my father returns from the war, and seeing as you betrayed the last Hand of the King, well, I just wouldn't feel safe with you lurking about.", "The queen regent. And you're a fool to believe she's your friend.", "No, we shan't.", "There's a ship leaving for East Watch by the sea tonight. From there, I'm afraid it's rather a long walk to Castle Black. I hope you enjoy the Wall. I found it surprisingly beautiful, in a brutal, horribly uncomfortable sort of way.", 'His name is Bronn... and he is the new commander of the City Watch.', 'To the new Commander.', "If I told you to murder, an infant girl say, still at her mother's breast, would you do it without question?", "I have every right. I am the King's Hand.", "Listen to me, Queen Regent, you're losing the people. Do you hear me?", "You might find it difficult to rule over millions who want you dead. Half the city will starve when winter comes. The other half will plot to overthrow you. And your gold-plated thugs just gave them the rallying cry, “The Queen slaughters babies.” . You don't even have the decency to deny it.", "It wasn't you who gave the order, was it? Joffrey didn't even tell you. Or did he tell you? I imagine that would be even worse.", "I'm no king, but I think there's more to ruling that that.", 'As has Jaime repeatedly, according to Stannis Baratheon.', 'She was my mother too.', 'Keep your voice down.', "I don't intend for you to stay here. I might be able to bring you into the castle kitchens.", 'Again, only temporary.', "But you wouldn't be a cook. You'd pose as a scullion.", 'Kitchen wench.', 'Yes, but-', "Your lion wants to see you alive. We've come to a dangerous place. My sister wants to hurt me. She'll look for any weakness she can find. She can't know about you.", "It's a compliment, my lady.", 'Language can be a bit tricky here.', "Oh! Thank the gods. I haven't had a proper shit in six days.", "Right. I'm so grateful to have a man of your vast knowledge and wisdom on my side.", 'Please.', 'I can trust you, Pycelle, can I not?', 'These are perilous times. And the crown must forge new alliances. And these alliances must often be sealed in matrimony.', "I'm trusting the council with these plans, but the Queen mustn't know. We can't have her meddling in affairs that could determine the future of the realm. There's too much at stake.", "I'm brokering an alliance with House Martell of Dorne. Princess Myrcella will wed their youngest son when she comes of age, ensuring their loyalty and their army, should we need it.", "But remember, the Queen mustn't know.", 'I plan to marry Princess Myrcella off to Theon Greyjoy.', 'Precisely.', "Theon's father loathes the Starks and will convince the boy to come to our side. Greyjoy can destroy the Northern army from within and we can have his father's ships.", 'But remember, you must tell no one.', 'I plan to wed Princess Myrcella to Robin Arryn of the Vale. Lysa is not fond of me. But perhaps the promise of a royal match will convince her to let bygones be bygones.', "For men in our position, holding grudges can be an encumbrance, don't you think?", 'Who better?', 'The gratitude of the people of Westeros for helping to end this war, the adoration of the King for bringing the Vale back into the fold... and Harrenhal.', "Never took you for a superstitious man. By all means, tear it down and rebuild. You'll be able to afford it. I plan to make you Lord of the Riverlands.", 'You served my family well in the matter of the succession.', "I need you to deliver Lysa Arryn. I didn't need Janos Slynt. It's settled, then?", 'Good. Oh. And remember-', "Myrcella's a princess. Some would say she was born for this.", 'Dorne is the safest place for her.', "That's why we need to seduce them. We're going to need their support in the war your son started.", 'A guest.', "It's done, Cersei.", 'You cannot stop it.', "Just how safe do you think Myrcella is if this city falls? Do you want to see her raped, butchered like the Targaryen children? Make no mistake. They'll mount her pretty little head on a spike right beside yours.", 'No, afraid not. Sorry about that.', 'Yes, I fear so. Sorry about that, too.', "Oh, that's a shame. You were to be the centerpiece of my next deception. My brother Jaime rots in a Northern stockade. I would see him released. That's where you come in.", "No, he won't. But his mother might. How would you like to see your beloved Cat again?", 'Find him?', "No, you don't.", 'You disappoint me, Grand Maester.', 'So loyal that you told the Queen about my plans to send Myrcella to Dorne.', 'See, I told Varys that I was giving the Princess to the Greyjoys. I told Littlefinger that I planned to wed her to Robin Arryn. I told no one that I was offering her to the Dornish. No one but you.', 'Cut off his manhood and feed it to the goats.', 'Well, make do.', 'How long have you been spying for my sister?', "I don't like his beard.", 'How many Hands have you betrayed, Pycelle? Eddard Stark? Jon Arryn?', 'So you poisoned him?', 'But you let him die, made sure he succumbed.', 'Get him out of my sight. Throw him in one of the black cells.', 'For your trouble.', 'Good. One of my better ideas.', "The Council has a reputation for serving past Hands poorly. I don't mean to follow Ned Stark to the grave.", 'Why, am I about to hear one?', 'Depends on the sellsword.', 'He has a sword, the power of life and death.', "I've decided I don't like riddles.", 'What is the meaning of this?', 'What kind of knight beats a helpless girl?', 'Someone get the girl something to cover herself with. She is to be your queen. Have you no regard for her honor?', "For what crimes? She did not fight her brother's battle, you half-wit.", 'The Mad King did as he liked. Has your Uncle Jaime ever told you what happened to him?', "I'm not threatening the king, ser. I am educating my nephew. Bronn, the next time Ser Meryn speaks, kill him. That was a threat. See the difference?", "I apologize for my nephew's behavior. Tell me the truth. Do you want an end to this engagement?", 'Lady Stark, you may survive us yet.', 'You think dipping his wick will cure what ails him?', 'Your visits are too few, cousin.', 'So it is. Will you take a cup with me? I find that mulled wine helps me sleep.', "If my sister was so concerned for Pycelle, I would have thought she'd come herself. Instead she sends you. He may listen to me.', 'nods his head.', 'Last time I was here I killed my father with a crossbow.', 'turns to look at DAVOS. DAVOS walks next to TYRION and stakes the boat anchor into the sand.', 'begins walking towards the path. DAVOS follows him and quickly takes the lead. TYRION stops and looks back towards the unattended boat.', "You're not staying here?", 'What if someone takes the boat?', "I needed to see you and I knew you'd never agree to meet.", "You made me look like a complete fool. I thought I'd surprise you by hitting Casterly Rock, but you were three steps ahead of me. You abandoned the family home. Completely unsentimental. Father would have been proud.", 'Listen to me --', "glances down at the sword in JAIME's hand.", 'It would take you awhile with a sparring sword.', "He was going to execute me. He knew I was innocent. He didn't hate me because of anything I did, he hated me because of what I am. The little monster sent to punish him. Do you think I wanted to be born this way? Did he think I chose --", "Daenerys will win this war. You're a military man. You must know there is no way around it. Daenerys is not her father. She's even willing to suspend hostilities if Cersei agrees to certain terms.", "I -- I don't. Daenerys doesn't. Not right now anyway. She has a more important request.", "Fish hook. Some men you just can't teach.", "He'll do.", "You may not believe it, but I've missed you Mormont. Nobody glowers quite like you. Not even Grey Worm.", 'retrieves a gold coin from his pocket and turns it in his hands.', 'This is the coin the slaver gave me when I suggested he free us and pay us. Remember?', 'smiles and hands the coin to JORAH.', "Take it with you. You'll bring it back. Our queen needs you.", 'is sitting in a chair staring into the fire. DAENERYS stands across the room next to the painted table.', 'turns to look at DAENERYS.', "I honestly don't.", "Oh. I've been heroic on occasion.", "I once charged through the mud gate of King's Landing.", "It's interesting these heroes you name. Drogo, Jorah, Dario, even this Jon Snow, they all fell in love with you.", "Oh, my mistake. I suppose he stares at you longingly because he's hopeful for a successful military alliance.", 'A million, give or take.', "There's more work in the city. And the brothels are far superior.", 'I imagine it was a sad joke at the end. An entire arena for a few sickly creatures smaller than dogs. But in the beginning, when it was home to Balerion the Dread, it must have been the most dangerous place in the world.', 'A pleasant surprise in an unpleasant situation.', 'Supporting the enemy, no less.', 'Cersei will anyway.', 'Here we are the heroes of Blackwater Bay. Strange place for a reunion.', "I don't think I'm anyone's lord anymore, Podrick. Save the titles for Ser Bronn of the Blackwater.", "You've been thinking about our new queen.", "Are you? Helping me to arrange this meeting wasn't exactly looking after yourself, was it? You put yourself at risk.", "It's good to see you again.", 'You might.', 'And some Clegane cunt to help them see it through.', "She'll be here soon.", 'No.', 'We are all facing a unique', 'I think we ought to begin with larger concerns.', "Do you remember when we discussed dwarf jokes? His wasn't even good. He explained it at the end. Never explain. It always ruins it.", "We are a group of people who do not like one another, as this recent demonstration has shown. We have suffered at each other's hands. We have lost people we love at each other's hands. If all we wanted was more of the same, there would be no need for this gathering. We are entirely capable of waging war against each other without meeting face-to-face.", 'We all know that will never happen.', 'There is no conversation that will erase the last 50 years. We have something to show you.', "I'm pleased you bent the knee to our queen", "That is indeed a problem. The more immediate problem is that we're fucked.", 'Only one. Everyone stays here, and I go and talk to my sister.', "I don't want Cersei to murder me either. I could have stayed in my cell and saved a great deal of trouble.", "She'll definitely murder you. I go see my sister.", 'You spoke with her?', "I'm about to step into a room with the most murderous woman in the world who's already tried to kill me twice, that I know of. Who's an idiot?", "A foreign whore you can't abduct, beat, or intimidate. That must be difficult for you.", "I didn't know about that.", "Cersei, I didn't know.", "I am the one preventing that from happening. Daenerys didn't want to debate and negotiate. She didn't want to bring you words. She wanted to bring you fire and blood until I advised her otherwise. I don't want to destroy our family. I never have.", "After he sentenced me to death for a crime I didn't commit, yes, I killed him. Hate me for it if you want. I hate myself for it in spite of what he was, in spite of what he did to me.", 'I have never been more sorry about anything.', 'All right. You love your family, and I have destroyed it. I will always be a threat. So put an end to me.', "If it weren't for me, you'd have a motherIf it weren't for me, you'd have a father.", 'I am more sorry about the children than you could ever know.', "I don't care. I loved them. You know I did. You know it in your heart if there's anything left of it.", "If there's no future, then why are we here? Why did you allow me to come?", 'Yes, no, not what you hoped for, but you must have hoped for something.', 'Mm, not like this.', 'Yes.', 'Because I think she will make the world a better place.', 'She knows herself. She chose an advisor who would check her worst impulses instead of feeding them.', "You're pregnant.", "You should consider yourself lucky. At least your balls won't freeze off.", "Because I have balls, and you don't.", "If anyone survives the war to come, we'll have Jon Snow to thank. He risked his life to show us the threat is real. Thanks to his courage, we have brought with us the greatest army the world has ever seen. We have brought two full-grown dragons. And soon, the Lannister army will ride north to join our cause.", "I know, I know, our people haven't been friends in the past. But we must fight together now or die.", 'My lord. My lady.', 'The Lady of Winterfell. Has a nice ring to it.', "Last time we spoke was at Joffrey's wedding. Miserable affair.", "Yes, it was a bit hard to explain why my wife fled moments after the king's murder.", 'Many underestimated you. Most of them are dead now.', "I'm sure you weren't thrilled to hear the Lannister army's marching north. You have every right to be fearful of my sister. No one fears her more than I do. But I promise, you'll be safe-", 'She did.', 'She has something to live for now. I believe she wants to survive.', 'One of the better sigils. Beats an onion, anyway.', 'And our queen is grateful.', "I sense that you're leading to a proposal.", 'They do make a handsome couple.', "I'm not that old.", 'Not as old as him.', 'Our queen respects the wisdom of age.', 'What is that?', 'Your Grace, I know my brother-', "He came here alone, knowing full well how he'd be received. Why would he do that if he weren't telling the truth?", 'I was a fool.', "I suspect one of you will be wearing this before it's all over.", 'Well, here we are.', 'Together again.', 'And the masses rejoice.', "She's your new queen too.", "They remember what happened the last time Targaryens brought dragons north. They'll come around once they see Daenerys is different.", 'She is.', 'I am.', "It's hard to blame her. I made a mistake common to clever people. I underestimated my opponents.", 'Cersei told me the pregnancy had changed her. A chance for you both to start again. And I believed her.', 'Was she lying about the baby too?', 'She never fooled you. You always knew exactly what she was, and you loved her anyway.', "So we're going to die at Winterfell. Not the death I wouldo ve chosen. I always pictured myself dying in my own bed, the age of 80, with a belly full of wine and-", 'My cock.', "At least Cersei won't get to murder me. I'm sure I'll feel some satisfaction denying her that pleasure while I'm being ripped apart by dead men.", "Maybe after I'm dead I'll march down to King's Landing and rip her apart.", 'How will he find you?', 'When the time comes, Ser Davos and I will be on the walls, to give you the signal to light the trench.', 'Your Grace, I have fought before, I can do it again. Alongside the men and women risking their lives.', 'Do you need help?', "You've had a strange journey.", "I'd like to hear about it.", 'If only we were trapped in a castle, in the middle of winter, with nowhere to go.', 'I wish Father were here.', 'I would love to see the look on his face when he realizes his two sons are about to die defending Winterfell.', 'I remember the first time we were here, the first time I saw this hall.', 'You were a golden lion. I was a drunken whore-monger. It was all so simple.', 'I was speaking in relative terms.', 'Of course I miss it.', "It's not. Things would be easier if it were.", 'The perils of self-betterment.', "To contemplate your imminent death. You've come to the right place. You want some of this piss? It's not bad. It's not good either.", 'And you?', 'Ser Davos, join us.', 'Would you like a drink?', "It's strange, isn't it? Almost everyone here's fought the Starks at one time or another. And here we are in their castle, ready to defend it. Together.", 'I think we might live.', 'I-I do. How many battles have we survived between us? Ser Davos Seaworth. Survivor of both the Blackwater and the Battle of the Bastards.', 'Mm. Ser Jaime Lannister, fabled hero of the Siege of Pyke.', 'Hear, hear! Ser Brienne of Tarth. Defeated the Hound in-Pardon me, Lady Brienne.', 'Ser Brienne of Tarth! Knight of the Seven Kingdoms!', "No, let's stay a bit longer.", 'How about a song? One of you must know one. Ser Davos?', 'Ser Brienne?', 'Mmm.', 'If we were up there, we might see something everyone else is missing. Something that makes a difference.', 'What? Remember the Battle of Blackwater? I brought us through the Mud Gate.', 'And it made a difference. If I was out there right now...', "You might be surprised at the lengths I'd go to avoid joining the Army of the Dead. I could think of no organization less suited to my talents.", 'Maybe we should have stayed married.', 'What a terrifying thought.', 'Why not?', 'Come on! Come on! No! No, no, no!', 'A fitting reward for a hero.', "And a Lord of Storm's End who will be forever loyal to you.", "I'm sure you had your reasons.", 'So did you?', "I don't imagine thinking about that subject will leave you any happier than before.", "Then you're in luck. We may have defeated them, but we still have us to contend with.", 'This is clever. Even better than the saddle I designed for you.', 'You know our history better than anyone. That will be useful as Lord of Winterfell.', "You're the only surviving trueborn son of Ned Stark.", "You don't want it.", 'I envy you.', 'Your Grace?', "There's something you need to know.", 'Yes.', 'Varys.', 'He does.', "I'm glad Sansa told me. I am your Hand. I need to be aware of any threats you're facing.", 'Your Master of Whisperers needs to be aware too.', 'It was a mistake.', 'She trusts me.', 'If I have failed you, my queen, forgive me. Our intentions were good. We wanted what you want. A better world, all of us. Varys as much as anyone.', "But it doesn't matter now.", 'It was me.', "The people who live there, they're not your enemies. They're innocents, like the ones you liberated in Meereen.", "They're afraid. Anyone who resists Cersei will see his family butchered. You can't expect them to be heroes. They're hostages.", 'What does it matter whose fault it is? Thousands of children will die if the city burns.', 'I beg you, my queen-', "Cersei's followers will abandon her if they know the war is lost. Give them that chance. If the city surrenders, they will ring the bells and raise the gates. Please, if you hear them ringing the bells, call off the attack.", 'She wants to attack now.', "Davos. I need to ask you a favor. You're the greatest smuggler alive, aren't you?", 'I drink to eat the skull keeper.', 'I want to eat the skull keeper.', 'I want to see the ...', 'Ah. Good. I want to be alone with the prisoner. Get some rest. Tomorrow will be a long day.', 'Ordered by whom? The queen herself?', 'Well, in that case, as Hand of the Queen, I outrank whomever gave your order. Probably by quite a lot.', 'How did they find you?', 'Did you consider taking it off?', "And you're going back to her, to die with her.", "She's going to die. Unless you can convince her to change her course of action.", 'Try. If not for yourself, if not for her, then for every one of the million people in that city, innocent or otherwise.', 'You do care for one innocent. I know you do. And so does Cersei. She has a reason now.', "She won't. Her enemy's forces have been depleted, as she said they would be.", 'The city will fall tomorrow.', 'I defended the city last time it was attacked. I know it better than anyone. It will fall tomorrow.', 'Why?', "Escape. The two of you, together. Remember where we met, where they keep the dragon skulls, beneath the Red Keep? Take her down there. Keep following the stairways down, down as far as they'll go. You'll come out onto a beach at the foot of the keep. A dinghy will be waiting for you. Sail out of the bay. If the winds are kind, you'll make it to Pentos. Start a new life.", "There won't be an Iron Fleet for much longer. Do it. If you don't, you'll never see Cersei again.", 'Swear to me.', "If it works, give the order to ring all the bells in King's Landing and open the gates. That will be our signal that the city has surrendered.", "I never thought I'd get to repay the favor. Remember, ring the bells and open the gates.", "If Daenerys can make it to the throne without wading through a river of blood, maybe she'll show mercy to the person who made that possible.", "Tens of thousands of innocent lives one not particularly innocent dwarf it seems like a fair trade. If it weren't for you, I never wouldo ve survived my childhood.", "You were the only one who didn't treat me like a monster. You were all I had.", "If you hear the bells ring, they've surrendered. Call off your men.", "I'll find you later.", "I'm going alone.", 'I freed my brother. And you slaughtered a city.', 'Did you bring any wine?', 'Ah... Well... thank you for coming to see me. Our queen doesn\'t keep prisoners for long. I suppose there\'s a crude kind of justice. I betrayed my closest friend and watched him burn. Now Varys\'s ashes can tell my ashes, "See, I told you." It just occurred to me. I\'m talking to the only man alive who knows where I\'m going.', 'So is there life after death?', 'I should be thankful. Oblivion is the best I could hope for. I strangled my lover. I shot my own father with a crossbow. I betrayed my queen.', "I did. And I'd do it again, now that I've seen what I've seen. I chose my fate. The people of King's Landing did not.", "Is it? When you heard her talking to her soldiers, did she sound like someone who's done fighting?", "She liberated the people of Slaver's Bay. She liberated the people of King's Landing. And she'll go on liberating until the people of the world are free and she rules them all.", "Until today. Varys was right. I was wrong. It was vanity to think I could guide her. Our queen's nature is fire and blood.", "My father was an evil man. My sister was an evil woman. Pile up all the bodies of all the people they ever killed, there still won't be half as many as our beautiful queen slaughtered in a single day.", 'The moment the gates fell, the battle was over.', 'And she burned down a city for it.', 'Would you have done it?', "You've been up there, on a dragon's back. You've had that power. Would you have burned the city down?", "Yes, you do. You won't say because you don't want to betray her but you know.", "It matters more than anything. When she murdered the slavers of Astapor, I'm sure no one but the slavers complained. After all, they were evil men.", "When she crucified hundreds of Meereenese nobles, who could argue? They were evil men. The Dothraki khals she burned alive? They would have done worse to her. Everywhere she goes, evil men die and we cheer her for it. And she grows more powerful and more sure that she is good and right. She believes her destiny is to build a better world for everyone. If you believed that if you truly believed it, wouldn't you kill whoever stood between you and paradise?", 'I know you love her. I love her too. Not as successfully as you. But I believed in her with all my heart. Love is more powerful than reason. We all know that. Look at my brother.', 'You just came up with that?', "Sometimes duty is the death of love. You are the shield that guards the realms of men. And you've always tried to do the right thing. No matter the cost, you've tried to protect people. Who is the greatest threat to the people now?", "It's a terrible thing I'm asking. It's also the right thing. Do you think I'm the last man she'll execute? Who is more dangerous than the rightful heir to the Iron Throne?", 'And your sisters? Do you see them bending the knee?', "Why do you think Sansa told me the truth about you? Because she doesn't want Dany to be queen.", 'No. But you do. And you have to choose now.', "It's not for you to decide.", "You're right. And no one's any better for it. But it's not for you to decide. Jon committed his crime here. His fate is for our king to decide. Or our queen.", "You're the most powerful people in Westeros. Choose one.", 'Me? The Imp?', 'Half the people hate me for serving Daenerys, the other half hate me for betraying her.', "Can't think of a worse choice.", "I've had nothing to do but think these past few weeks. About our bloody history. About the mistakes we've made.", "What unites people? Armies? Gold? Flags? Stories. There's nothing in the world more powerful than a good story. Nothing can stop it. No enemy can defeat it. And who has a better story than Bran the Broken? The boy who fell from a high tower and lived. He knew he'd never walk again, so he learned to fly. He crossed beyond the Wall, a crippled boy, and became the Three-Eyed Raven. He is our memory, the keeper of all our stories. The wars, weddings, births, massacres, famines. Our triumphs... mm, our defeats, our past. Who better to lead us into the future?", 'Good. Sons of kings can be cruel and stupid, as you well know. His will never torment us. That is the wheel our queen wanted to break.', 'From now on, rulers will not be born. They will be chosen on this spot by the lords and ladies of Westeros to serve the realm.', "I know you don't want it. I know you don't care about power. But I ask you now, if we choose you will you wear the crown? Will you lead the Seven Kingdoms to the best of your abilities from this day until your last day?", 'To Brandon of House Stark... I say aye.', 'All hail Bran the Broken, First of His Name, King of the Andals and the First Men, Lord of the Six Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm.', "N- No, Your Grace, I don't want it.", "I don't deserve it. I thought I was wise, but I wasn't. I thought I knew what was right, but I didn't. Choose Ser Davos. Choose anyone else.", "Giving you to the Unsullied would start a war. Letting you walk free would start a war. So our new king has chosen to send you to the Night's Watch.", 'The world will always need a home for bastards and broken men.', "You shall take no wife, hold no lands, father no children. The Unsullied wanted your head of course, but Grey Worm has accepted the justice of a life sentence. Sansa and Arya wanted you freed, but they understand our new king needs to make peace. No one is very happy. Which means it's a good compromise, I suppose.", 'What we did.', 'Ask me again in ten years.', "I wouldn't be so sure. A few years as Hand of the King would make anyone want to piss off the edge of the world.", "That's not- Uh-", "What's this?", 'I suppose I come in for some heavy criticism.', "Oh, he's kind to me. Never wouldo ve guessed.", "He's not kind?", 'He what? What does he say about me?', 'Your Grace.', 'Yes, Your Grace. Suitable prospects will be brought to you for an audience in the coming weeks.', 'As you wish, Your Grace.', 'We serve at your pleasure, King Bran the Broken, ruler of the Six Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm. Long may he reign.', 'That will improve.', "Ser Bronn of the Blackwater, Lord of Highgarden, Lord Paramount of the Reach and Master of Coin, would you say the crown's debt to you has been paid?", 'Good. Time to start incurring a new one. We have hungry people to feed. Can we expect some assistance in this regard?', 'Lord Davos, we have an armada to rebuild and ports to repair.', 'Grandmaester, ahem, it is my theory, based on my years of work on the Casterly Rock sewers, that clean water leads to a healthier population.', 'Find the best builders and set them to the task.', 'I once brought a jackass and a honeycomb into a brothel.']

Name: jon snow
Sentence: ["Go on. Father's watching.", 'And your mother.', "Don't think too much, Bran.", "Don't look away.", 'Father will know if you do.', 'You did well.', 'What is it?', 'Now there are five.', 'You want to hold it?', 'Lord Stark? There are five pups. One for each of the Stark children. The direwolf is the sigil of your House. They were meant to have them.', "I'm not a Stark. Get on.", "Why's your mother so dead-set on us getting pretty for the king?", 'Uncle Benjen!', 'Lady Stark thought it might insult the royal family to seat a bastard in their midst.', 'So take me with you when you go back.', 'Father will let me if you ask him, I know he will.', "I'm ready to swear your oath.", "I don't care about that.", "What're you doing back there?", "You're Tyrion Lannister. The queen's brother?", 'Lord Eddard Stark is my father.', 'What the hell do you know about being a bastard?', 'I already have one.', 'Of course I have.', "We've guarded the Kingdoms for 8 000 years.", 'Soon enough.', "It's good you've got help.", 'Impressive.', 'I have something for you. And it has to be packed very carefully.', "Close the door. This is no toy. Be careful you don't cut yourself.", "So are you. I had the blacksmith make it for you special. It won't hack a man's head off, but it can poke him full of holes if you're quick enough.", "You'll have to work at it every day. How does it feel? Do you like the balance?", 'First lesson', "I'm going to miss you... Careful... All the best swords have names, you know.", 'I came to say goodbye to Bran.', "I wish I could be here when you wake up. I'm going north with Uncle Benjen. I'm taking the black. I know we always talked about seeing the Wall together, but you'll be able to come visit me at Castle Black when you're better. I'll know my way around by then. I'll be a sworn brother of the Night's Watch. We can go out walking beyond the Wall, if you're not afraid.", 'You Starks are hard to kill.', 'She was very kind.', 'It was always my color.', 'And you, Stark.', "Is my mother alive? Does she know about me? Where I am, where I'm going? Does she care?", 'Why do you read so much?', 'Is this a trick?', 'Until your brother killed that King.', "Ask me nicely and maybe I'll tell you, dwarf.", "The Night's Watch protects the realm from...", "It's an improvement.", 'Everybody knew what this place was and no one told me. No one but you. My father knew and left me to rot here at the Wall all the same.', "They hate me because I'm better than they are.", "You're leaving?", 'What kind of reports?', "m ready. I won't let you down.", "But I'm better than every...", "Don't stand so still. It's harder to hit a moving target. Except for you. You move too much. I could just hold my sword out and let you do the work for me.", "I'm sorry to see you leave, Lannister.", 'Will you stop at Winterfell on your way South?', "If you see my brother Bran, tell him I miss him. Tell him I'd visit if I could.", "He'll never walk again.", 'Farewell, My Lord.', 'Leg, shoulder, leg. Left foot forward. Good. Now pivot as you deliver the stroke. Put all your weight behind it.', 'Enough! He yielded.', 'Are you sure you want to do this?', "I've had worse.", "It's not going to get any easier, you know? You'll have to defend yourself.", "The Wall's no place for cowards.", "Come stand by the fire. It's warmer.", "You're not. You're freezing.", "You can't fight. You can't see. You're afraid of heights and almost everything else probably. What are you doing here, Sam?", 'Yes, he is.', "Well… You can't get any worse.", 'Watch duty. With Sam.', "He wasn't hungry.", "That's enough. Sam's no different from the rest of us. There was no place for him in the world, so he's come here. We're not going to hurt him in the training yard anymore. Never again, no matter what Thorne says. He's our brother now and we're going to protect him.", 'No one touches Sam.', "I wouldn't doubt it.", 'Sally on the side?', "I didn't think you'd be so upset about it.", "As a matter of fact, I'm the same as you.", 'I came very close once. I was alone in a room with a naked girl, but...', 'I know where to put it.', 'Young and gorgeous. A whore named Ros.', 'Red.', "You don't want to know.", 'Better.', "What's my name?", 'And why is my surname Snow?', "I never met my mother. My father wouldn't even tell me her name. I don't know if she's living or dead. I don't know if she's a noblewoman or a fisherman's wife... Or a whore. So I sat there in the brothel as Ros took off her clothes. But I couldn't do it. Because all I could think was what if I got her pregnant and she had a child, another bastard named Snow? It's not a good life for a child.", 'I build my own fires.', 'Why is he alone?', "There's no rider.", "That's my Uncle Benjen's horse.", 'I do, my lord.', 'Yes, my lord.', "Will I serve the Lord Commander's meals and fetch hot water for his bath.", 'Do you take me for a servant?', 'May I go?', "I see Ser Alliser's revenge, that's all.", 'I just, I always wanted to be a Ranger.', "Just these two, My Lord. Been dead awhile, I'd say.", 'We should burn them.', 'Is there any word of my father?', "My sisters were in King's Landing too.", 'Soon, he says.', 'This is Valyrian steel.', "My lord, you honor me, but l can't –", 'Yes, my lord.', "l'll apologize to Ser Alliser tonight.", 'At what?', 'What is it?', "You can't what?", 'And yet you really want to say. You want to say that…', 'What? What about him?', 'l should be there. l should be with him.', 'Sam said you wanted to see me?', 'No.', 'He would do whatever was right, no matter what.', 'Sam told you.', "And this is my day? ls that what you're saying?", 'You do not know. No one knows. l may be a bastard, but he is my father and Robb is my brother.', 'Who are you?', "You're Aemon Targaryen.", 'Get out of my way, Sam.', 'Better than you do.', "l'm gonna find my brother and put a sword through King Joffrey's throat.", 'Move.', 'Hyah!', 'Ghost?', 'l belong with my brother.', "They'll kill you if they know you came after me. Go back.", 'l have to.', "I don't care about –", 'To hell with all of you.', 'My friends brought me back.', 'They killed my father.', 'No.', 'Beyond the Wall?', 'Having a rough time of it?', 'What happens to the boys?', 'He marries his daughters. What does he do with his sons?', "We're not Southerners.", 'Jon Snow.', 'Lord commander.', 'Your steward.', 'What happens to the boys? What does he do with his sons?', "What're you doing?", "Hello, Gilly. What're you doing?", "I'm sorry, Sam knows we're not supposed to -", 'What? .', "No it doesn't sound a bit mad, it's impossible.", "Sam we can't take her -", "It's just not possible.", "If it's a boy what? . You want us to risk our lives for you, and you won't even tell us why.", 'Do what, ask her a question?', 'Cruel! Sam are you in such a hurry to lose a hand?', 'No you just want to steal her. What do you think Craster cuts off for that?', "We're heading deeper and deeper into wildling territory. We can't take a girl with us. Mormont wouldn't have it. And even if he would, what would we do with her? Who's gonna deliver her baby? You?", "I'm sorry Sam, we can't help her.", 'Lord Commander-', 'I followed him. He took the baby into the woods, the newborn.', "No, you don't understand. He's killing them, all the boys...", 'You know.', "Offerings? He's murdering his own children. He's a monster.", 'I... I saw it. I saw... something take that child.', 'When will he come?', 'My uncle told me stories about him.', 'I heard the Halfhand spent half of last winter beyond the Wall.', 'So it is possible for someone to survive out here on their own.', "I think they were afraid. I think they came here to get away from something. And I don't think it worked.", 'One blast is for rangers returning. Wildlings is two blasts.', "Look. It's Qhorin Halfhand.", 'A fire.', 'Where?', "Lord Commander, I'd like to join Lord Qhorin.", "I've fought and killed a wight. How many rangers can say that?", 'Ghost, stay with us. Ghost!', "He's not a pet.", 'Ghost is different.', "I thought you said you couldn't know wild things.", 'We could do the same.', "My father always said I'm of the North.", "I wasn't joking.", "I'll gladly give my life.", 'I do.', 'A girl.', 'We could question her.', "What's your name?", "I'm Jon Snow.", "No. No, I'll do it.", "I'm as much a crow as they are.", "Can't. Someone might see the smoke.", "I'll find them.", "We'll stop here. Too dark to go any farther today.", "There's no shelter anywhere.", 'No fire.', 'Yes.', 'We start again at first light.
