I need you with me if we're gonna beat them, and we need to beat them if you're going to survive.", "Are you sure they'll come?", 'Lady Mormont.', 'I served under your uncle at Castle Black, Lady Lyanna. He was also a great warrior and an honorable man. I was his steward. In fact- -', 'Stannis Baratheon garrisoned at Castle Black before he marched on Winterfell and was killed. He showed me the letter you wrote to him when he petitioned for men. It said- -', "Robb is gone, but House Stark is not. And it needs your support now more than ever. I've come with my sister to ask for House Mormont's allegiance.", 'Ramsay Bolton cannot be allowed to keep Winterfell, my lady. It is our duty to stop him. Even more so because he holds our brother Rickon Stark as prisoner. What you have to understand, my lady, is that- -', 'Your uncle fought them at the Fist of the First Men. I fought them at Hardhome. We both lost.', 'Thank you, my lady. How many fighting men can we expect?', '62?', 'Lord Glover, if you could just hear us out.', 'The Boltons are traitors. Roose Bolton- -', 'House Mormont.', 'We sent raven to Houses Manderly- -', 'The bulk of the force is made up of wildlings.', 'Lord Glover.', "We're not staying here long. Another storm could hit any day..", 'We have to march on Winterfell now while we still can.', "Ser Davos is the reason I'm standing here talking to you and he served Stannis for years.", "There's no time.", 'We fight with the army we have.', "You don't have to be here.", "You're right. There's no need for a battle. Thousands of men don't need to die. Only one of us. Let's end this the old way. You against me.", "Aye, you have the numbers. Will your men want to fight for you when they hear you wouldn't fight for them?", "If he was smart, he'd stay inside the walls of Winterfell and wait us out.", "It's his weakness, too. His mean don't want to fight for him. They're forced to fight for him. If they feel the tide turning...", "We're digging trenches all along our flanks. They won't be able to hit us the way that Stannis hit you, in a double envelopment.", 'A pincer move.', "They won't be able to hit us from the sides.", 'No. But I wanted to make him angry. I want him coming at us full tilt.', "Aye, for what they're worth.", "You're right.", "He's overconfident.", "Aye, and what have I been doing all my life? Playing with broomsticks? I fought beyond the Wall against worse than Ramsay Bolton. I've defended the Wall from worse than Ramsay Bolton.", 'All right, tell me. What should we do? How do we get Rickon back?', "We can't give up on our brother.", 'Of course he does. What should I do differently?', "Aye, that's good advice.", 'Well, it is a bit obvious.', "When will we have a larger force?! We've pleaded with every house that'll have us! The Blackfish can't help us! We're lucky to have this many men!", "Now, it's not enough! It's what we have! Battles have been won against greater odds.", "SNOW I won't ever let him touch you again. I'll protect you, I promise.", "My lady. You weren't at the war council.", 'Any advice?', "If I do, if I fall, don't bring me back.", "I'm ordering you not to bring me back.", "You're in my camp. I'm the commander.", 'How do you know what he commands?', 'Why?', 'What kind of god would do something like that?', 'Get word --', "We're going to bury my brother in the crypt next to my father.", "When we had feasts, our family would sit up here… and I'd sit down there.", "Aye, you're right. I was luckier than most.", 'What is that?', 'Do you have anything to say for yourself?', "Ride south today. If you return to the North, I'll have you hanged as a murderer.", "I'm having the lordo s chamber prepared for you.", "I'm not a Stark.", "You're the Lady of Winterfell. You deserve it. We're standing here because of you. The battle was lost until the Knights of the Vale rode in. They came because of you. You told me Lord Baelish sold you to the Boltons.", 'And you trust him?', "We need to trust each other. We can't fight a war amongst ourselves. We have so many enemies now.", "Well, Father always promised, didn't he?", 'The free folk, the northerners, and the Knights of the Vale fought bravely, fought together, and we won. My father uses to say we find our true friends on the battlefield.', "The war is not over. And I promise you, friend, the true enemy won't wait out the storm. He brings the storm.", "There's nothing to forgive, my lord.", "I want every northern maester to scour their records for any mention of dragonglass. Dragonglass kills white walkers. It's more valuable to us now than gold. We need to find it, we need to mine it, we need to make weapons from it. Everyone aged 10 to 60 will drill daily with spears, pikes, bow and arrow.", 'Not just the boys.', "We can't defend the North if only half the population is fighting.", "While we're preparing for attack, we need to shore up our defenses. The only thing standing between us and the Army of the Dead is the Wall and the Wall hasn't been properly manned in centuries. I'm not the king of the Free Folk.", "But if we're going to survive this winter together...", 'Last time we saw the Night King was at Hardhome. The closest castle to Hardhome is Eastwatch-by-the-Sea.', 'If they breach the wall, the first two castles in their path are Last Hearth and Karhold.', "The Umbers and the Karstarks have fought beside the Starks for centuries. They've kept faith for generation after generation.", "I'm not going to strip these families of their ancestral homes because of the crimes of a few reckless sons.", 'The punishment for treason is death. Smalljon Umber died on the field of battle. Harald Karstark died on the field of battle.', 'When I was Lord Commander of the Night\'s Watch I executed men who betrayed me. I executed men who refused to follow orders. My father always said, "The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword," and I have tried to live by those words. But I will not punish a son for his father\'s sins, and I will not take a family home away from a family it has belonged to for centuries. That is my decision, and my decision is final.', 'Ned Umber.', 'Alys Karstark.', 'For centuries, our families fought side by side on the battlefield. I ask you to pledge your loyalty once again to House Stark, to serve as our bannermen and come to our aid whenever called upon.', 'Stand.', "Yesterday's wars don't matter anymore. The North needs to band together, all the living north. Will you stand beside me, Ned and Alys, now and always?", 'You are my sister, but I am king now.', 'When you question my decisions in front of the other lords and ladies, you undermine me.', 'Of course you can, but--', "Do you think I'm Joffrey?", 'Thank you.', 'At what?', 'No.', 'What did father used to say? Everything before the word "but" is horse shit.', 'No. No, he never cursed in front of his girls.', "All right, I'll stop trying to protect you and you stop trying to undermine me.", 'And how should I be smarter? By listening to you?', 'Cersei of House Lannister, First of Her Name, Queen of the Andals and the First Men, Protector of the Seven Kingdoms--', "Come to King's Landing. Bend the knee or suffer the fate of all traitors.", "I'm consumed with the Night King because I've seen him. And believe me, you'd think of little else if you had, too.", "There's a thousand miles between us and Cersei. Winter is here. The Lannisters are a southern army. They've never ranged this far north.", 'You almost sound as if you admire her.', 'Read the last bit.', "It's something he said to me the first night we met. You know him better than any of us. What do you think?", 'What?', 'But?', 'Come in.', "This message was sent to me by Samwell Tarley. He was my brother at the Night's Watch. A man I trust as much as anyone in this world. He's discovered proof that Dragonstone sits on a mountain of Dragonglass.", 'I received this a few days ago from Dragonstone. It was sent to me by Tyrion Lannister.', "He's now Hand of the Queen to Daenerys Targaryen. She intends to take the Iron Throne from Cersei Lannister. She has a powerful army at her back and if this message is to be believed, three dragons.", "Lord Tyrion has invited me to Dragonstone to meet with Daenerys and I'm going to accept.", 'We need this Dragonglass, My Lords. We know that Dragonglass can destroy both White Walkers and their army. We need to mine it and turn it into weapons.', "But more importantly, we need allies. The Night King's army grows larger by the day. We can't defeat them on our own. We don't have the numbers. Daenerys has her own army and she has dragon fire. I need to try and persuade her to fight with us. Ser Davos and I will ride for White Harbor tomorrow, then sail for Dragonstone.", 'I know that.', "It could be, but I don't believe Tyrion would do that. You know him. He's a good man.", "You all crowned me your king. I never wanted it, I never asked for it, but I accepted it because the north is my home. It's part of me and I will never stop fighting for it, no matter the odds. But the odds are against us. None of you have seen the Army of the Dead. None of you. We can never hope to defeat them alone. We need allies, powerful allies. I know it's a risk. But I have to take it.", 'Daenerys is a queen. Only a king can convince her to help us. It has to be me.', "I'm leaving both in good hands.", 'Yours. You are my sister. You are the only Stark in Winterfell. Until I return, the north is yours.', "You don't belong down here.", 'I have nothing to say to you.', "Touch my sister and I'll kill you myself.", 'The dwarf of Casterly Rock.', 'You were pissing off the edge, if I remember right. You picked up some scars along the road.', 'Of course.', 'She is.', "I didn't ask --", "She's starting to let on.", 'As long as you tell me how a Lannister became Hand to Daenerys Targaryen.', "My bannermen think I'm a fool for coming here.", "True. But I'm not a Stark.", 'The winds were kind, Your Grace.', 'I am not.', 'Break faith? Your father burned my grandfather alive. He burned my uncle alive. He would have burned the Seven Kingdoms.', "You're right. You're not guilty of your father's crime. And I'm not beholden to my ancestor's vows.", 'Because I need your help and you need mine.', 'I did.', "They're hard to miss.", "But you haven't stormed King's Landing. Why not? The only reason I can see is you don't want to kill thousands of innocent people. It's the fastest way to win the war but you won't do it. Which means at the very least you're better than Cersei.", "Because right now you and I and Cersei and everyone else, we're children playing at a game screaming that the rules aren't fair.", "Your Grace, everone you know will die before winter is over if we don't defeat the enemy to the north.", 'I am not your enemy. The dead are the enemy.', 'The Army of the Dead is on the march.', "You don't know me well, My Lord, but do you think I am a liar or a madman?", "The Army of the Dead is real. The White Walkers are real. The Knight King is real. I've seen them. If they get past the wall and we're squabbling amongst ourselves --", "we're finished.", "You'll be ruling over a graveyard if we don't defeat the Night King.", "There's no time for that. There's no time for any of this. While we stand here debating --", 'And why would I do that?', "I mean no offense, Your Grace, but I don't know you. As far as I can tell your claim to the throne rests entirely on your father's name. And my own father fought to overthrow the Mad King. The lords of the north placed their trust in me to lead them. And I will continue to do so as well as I can.", 'Am I your prisoner?', "I'm a prisoner on this island.", 'Except to my ship. They took my ship.', "I'm not playing word games with you. The dead are coming for us all.", "It's hard for me to fathom. It really is. If someone told me about the White Walkers and the Night King --", "You probably don't believe me.", "You didn't before. Grumpkins and snarks you called them. Do you remember? You said it was all nonsense.", "How do I convince people who don't know me that an enemey they don't believe in is coming to kill them all?", "I know it's a good question. I'm looking for an answer.", "I need to help prepare my people for what's coming. I can't help them from here. I'd like to leave.", "Everyone told me to learn from my father's mistakes. Don't go south. Don't answer a summons from the Mad King's daughter, a foreign invader. And here I am. A northern fool.", 'What do you mean?', 'Amazing thing to see.', "You've been talking to Tyrion?", 'He enjoys talking.', "I don't.", 'I never expected that you would.', "I haven't either.", 'Thank you.', 'So you believe me then about the Night King and the Army of the Dead?', 'Your Grace.', 'I wanted you to see it before we start hacking it to bits.', 'leads DAENERYS and MISSANDEI into the cave. He lights a brazier and illuminates the Dragonglass along the walls. He continues walking deeper into the cave.', "So this is it, all we'll ever need.", 'There is something else I want to show your, Your Grace.', 'and DAENERYS go to a further chamber in the cave. There are murals painted on the walls of Dragonglass.', 'The Children of the Forest made these.', 'A very long time ago.', 'No.', 'They were here together the Children and the First Men.', 'takes DAENERYS by the arm and swings her torch to another part of the wall. There is a mural of the Night King and White Walkers.', 'and DAENERYS look back at the wall with the Night King.', "Because the enemy is real. It's always been real.", "No, I don't think I can.", "My people won't accept a southern ruler, not after everything they've suffered.", 'and DAENERYS, DAVOS and MISSANDEI are walking out of the cave. As they exit TYRION and VARYS are standing on the beach awaiting them. DAENERYS begins addressing Tyrion.', 'I would never presume to --', 'looks over the ocean at the dragons flying.', "I never thought that dragons would exist again. No one did. The people who follow you know that you made something impossible happen. Maybe that helps them believe that you can make other impossible things happen. Build a world that's different from the shit one they've always known.", 'glances back towards the dragons.', "But if you use them to melt castles and burn cities, you're not different. You're just more of the same.", 'and DAVOS are walking along the paths outside of Dragonstone having a discussion.', 'Who?', 'I think she has a good heart.', "There's no time for that. I saw the Night King, Davos. I looked into his eyes. How many men do we have in the north to fight him? 10,000? Less?", 'What?', "It doesn't matter.", 'Of course.', "I'm a bastard. My mother and father weren't married.", 'Why did you leave your homeland?', "I'm sorry.", 'And if you wanted to sail home to Naarth tomorrow --', 'You believe that?', 'notices a single ship sailing into the bay. It has a kraken sigil. MISSANDEI turns to look.', 'Is that a Greyjoy ship?', 'grabs THEON by his shirt and pulls him face to face.', "What you did for her is the only reason I'm not killing you.", 'releases THEON.', 'The queen is gone.', "SNOW is standing on the edge of a cliff looking towards the ocean. DROGON roars and flies over him with DAENERYS on his back. DROGON lands next to JON and charges towards him. DROGON opens his jaws and roars in JON's face. DROGON creeps closer until he is inches from JON. JON removes his glove and slowly extends his hand toward DROGON. DROGON lowers his head and allows JON to touch him. DAENERYS looks surprised and steps down from her mount. DROGON turns and flies away.", "That wasn't the word I was thinking of, but, yes, they are. Gorgeous beasts.", "You weren't gone long.", 'And?', "pauses and doesn't say anything.", "No, I'm not.", 'Thousands.', 'Ser Davos gets carried away.', "doesn't say anything. A group of Dothraki guards approach DAENERYS and speak in their native tongue.", 'I served with your father. He was a great man.', 'I thought Arya was dead. I thought Bran was dead.', 'Bran saw the Night King and his army marching towards Eastwatch. If they make it past the wall --', 'interrupts VARYS.', 'I need to go home.', "We'll fight with the men we have. Unless you'll join us.", "I don't think she'll come see the dead at my invitation.", 'The first White I ever saw was brought into Castle Black from beyond the Wall.', 'pauses and stares at the ground. JORAH breaks the silence.', 'The free folk will help us. They know the real north better than anyone.', "They won't have to.", "I'm the only one here whose fought them. I'm the only one here who knows them.", "With respect, Your Grace, I don't need your permission. I am a king. And I came here knowing that you could have your men behead me or your dragons burn me alive. I put my trust in you, a stranger, because I knew it was the best chance for my people, for all our people. Now I'm asking you to trust in a stranger because it's our best chance.", 'stops and turns around to face DAVOS.', "You survived King's Landing.", 'Your Grace, this is --', 'looks to DAVOS.', 'I saw your father once at Winterfell.', "You're a lot leaner.", 'stops smiling and pauses a moment. Then he chuckles.', 'I grew up on stories about them.', 'Do you know how to use one?', "Well, that's a problem.", 'nods.', 'We could use the help.', "If I don't return at least you won't have to deal with the King in the North anymore.", 'I wish you good fortune in the wars to come, Your Grace.', 'Heave!', 'and the raiding party land on the Beach of Eastwatch. JON looks up at the castle. The men collect their equipment and make for the castle.', 'Two.', 'Both.', 'looks around the table.', 'Not enough.', 'smiles and shakes his head. TORMUND is disappointed.', "You're The Hound. I saw you once at Winterfell.", "He's right. We're all on the same side.", "We're all breathing.", 'Are you all right?', 'Ever been north before?', "You've never been down south.", "That's the north.", "There's not another woman within 100 miles of here.", 'glances at GENDRY. GENDRY backs away from JON and TORMUND.', 'Davos says he is a strong fighter.', "She'll only fight beside us if I bend the knee.", 'The first time I went north of the wall was with your father.', 'I was a prisoner of the Wildlings. But we avenged him. I want you to know that every mutineer found justice.', "I hate that he died that way. My father was the most honorable man I ever met. He was good all the way through. And he died on the executioner's block.", 'I heard.', "I'm glad he didn't capture you.", 'stops walking and loosens the belt holding his sword.', "Your father gave me this sword. He changed the pommel from a bear to a wolf, but it's still Long Claw.", 'hands the sword to JORAH. JORAH slowly takes the sword and looks it over in his hands.', "Lord Commander Mormont thought you'd never come back to Westeros.", "But you are back and it's been in your family for centuries. It's not right for me to have it.", "I'm not his son.", "Who's that?", 'You knew him?', 'I serve the north.', "The lord of light never spoke to me. I don't know anything about him. I don't know what he wants from me.", 'Why?', "That's all anyone can tell me, I don't know. So what's the point in serving a god that none of us knows what he wants.", 'So what are you fighting for?', 'But we all die.', 'I am the shield that guards the realms of men.', "Aye. Maybe that's enough.", 'How many people live here?', "That's more people than the entire North crammed into that. Why would anyone want to live that way?", "This isn't about living in harmony. It's just about living. The same thing is coming for all of us. A general you can't negotiate with. An army that doesn't leave corpses behind on the battlefield. Lord Tyrion tells me a million people live in this city. They're about to become a million more soldiers in the Army of the Dead.", "This is serious. I wouldn't be here if it weren't.", 'We can destroy them by burning them.', "And we can destroy them with dragonglass. If we don't win this fight, then that is the fate of every person in the world.", 'There is only one war that matters the Great War. And it is here.', 'No.', 'I am true to my word. Or I try to be. That is why I cannot give you what you ask. I cannot serve two queens. And I have already pledged myself to Queen Daenerys of House Targaryen.', 'I know!', "I'm not going to swear an oath I can't uphold. Talk about my father.", 'I did this. I should go.', 'No one is less happy about this than I am.', "You're not like everyone else. And your family hasn't seen its end. You're still here.", 'Who told you that?', 'Has it occurred to you she might not have been a reliable source of information?', 'So, what now?', "It appears Tyrion's assessment was correct. We're fucked.", "If we have the Dothraki ride hard on the kingsroad, they'll arrive at Winterfell within the fortnight.", "It's your decision, Your Grace. But if we're going to be allies in this war, it's important for the Northerners to see us as allies. If we sail to White Harbor together, I think it sends a better message.", 'All right.', "We went down there to make peace. And it seems to me we need to be honest with each other if we're going to fight together.", "It's not. It may seem that way from the outside, but I promise you, it's not true. I've done plenty of things that I regret.", 'No. Not compared to you.', 'Our father was more of a father.', 'And you betrayed him. Betrayed his memory.', "But you never lost him. He's a part of you. Just like he's a part of me.", "It's not my place to forgive you for all of it. But what I can forgive, I do. You don't need to choose. You're a Greyjoy and you're a Stark.", 'So, why are you still talking to me?', "I warned you. Northerners don't much trust outsiders.", 'Look at you.', "You're a man.", "Where's Arya?", 'Queen Daenerys of House Targaryen. My sister, Sansa Stark, the Lady of Winterfell.', "We need to send ravens to the Night's Watch as well. There's no sense in manning the castles anymore. We make our stand here.", "It's not important.", "You did, my lady. It was the honor of my life. I'll always be grateful for your faith. But when I left Winterfell, I told you we need allies or we will die. I have brought those allies home to fight alongside us. I had a choice, keep my crown or protect the North. I chose the North.", 'How did you sneak up on me?', "I didn't.", 'You still have it.', 'Have you ever used it?', 'Jealous?', 'Where were you before? I couldo ve used your help with Sansa.', "Sansa thinks she's smarter than everyone.", "Now you're defending her?", 'You?', "Yeah. I'm her family too.", "She doesn't know you. If it makes you feel any better, she didn't like me either when we were growing up.", "What's the matter?", "What's wrong with them?", "I don't know how to ride a dragon.", "What if he doesn't want me to?", 'What do I hold onto?', "You've completely ruined horses for me.", "We'd be pretty old.", "It's cold up here for a southern girl.", 'House Glover will stand behind House Stark as we have for a thousand years." Isn\'t that what he said?', 'I told you we needed allies.', 'I never wanted a crown. All I wanted was to protect the North. I brought two armies home with me, two dragons.', "Do you think we can beat the Army of the Dead without her? I fought them, Sansa. Twice. You want to worry about who holds what title, I'm telling you it doesn't matter. Without her, we don't stand a chance.", 'Do you have any faith in me at all?', "She'll be a good queen. For all of us. She's not her father.", 'Sam?', 'Were you hiding from me?', 'What are you doing in Winterfell? Or did you read every book in the Citadel already?', "What's wrong? Gilly? Is she all right?", 'Little Sam?', 'Know what?', "I'm so sorry. We need to end this war.", "Well, I've executed men who disobeyed me.", "I wasn't a king.", 'I gave up my crown, Sam.', "I bent the knee. I'm not King in the North anymore.", 'What are you talking about?', "My father was the most honorable man I ever met. You're saying he lied to me all my life.", 'Daenerys is our queen.', "That's treason.", 'We need every man we can get.', "I thought we'd lost you.", 'How did you find each other?', 'The Umbers?', 'How long do we have?', "They're coming.", 'We have dragonglass and Valyrian steel.', 'But there are too many of them.', 'Far too many.', "Our enemy doesn't tire.", "Doesn't stop. Doesn't feel.", "We can't beat them in a straight fight.", 'The Night King made them all. They follow his command. If he falls Getting to him may be our best chance.', "We'll put you in the crypt, where it's safest.", "If they're in the field, they're not protecting Bran. We need to be near him. Not too near, or the Night King won't come. But close enough to pursue him when he does.", "Let's get some rest.", 'Your Grace.', 'No.', 'Gilly? Little Sam?', 'If you want to join them.', 'To protect them.', "Now it's just us three.", 'Lyanna Stark.', "He didn't. He loved her.", 'They were married in secret. After Rhaegar fell on the Trident, she had a son. Robert would have murdered the baby if he ever found out, and Lyanna knew it. So the last thing she did, as she bled to death on her birthing bed, was give the boy to her brother, Ned Stark, to raise as his bastard.', 'My name. My real name is Aegon Targaryen.', 'I wish it were.', 'Bran. He saw it.', 'And Samwell confirmed it. He read about their marriage at the Citadel without even knowing what it meant.', "It's true, Dany. I know it is.", 'The Night King is coming.', 'Dany!', 'Get off!', 'Bran!', "We're here to say goodbye to our brothers and sisters. To our fathers and mothers. To our friends. Our fellow men and women who set aside their differences to fight together and die together so that others might live. Everyone in this world owes them a debt that can never be repaid. It is our duty and our honor to keep them alive in memory for those who come after us and those who come after them for as long as men draw breath. They were the shields that guarded the realms of men. And we shall never see their like again.", "Just crossed the Trident. They'll be at the walls of King's Landing in two days. How is she?", "She shouldn't be alone.", "Aren't you worried for her?", "We're not much for riddles where I'm from.", "That's her decision to make. She is our queen.", 'What do you want?', "I don't want it. I never have.", 'She is my queen.', "I don't want it, and that's what I told him.", 'I love you. And you will always be my queen.', 'Daybreak at the earliest.', 'Move, move!', 'No! Get back! Get back!', 'Stay! Stay!', 'Stop!', 'Find somewhere to hide.', 'We need to fall back! Fall back behind the wall! Fall back!', 'Get out of the city! Fall back! Fall back! Fall back!', "It's not safe. Let me send some men with you.", 'Grey Worm!', "It's over.", "And what are the queen's commands?", 'What are you doing here?', 'Hey, what happened?', "She's everyone's queen now.", "Wait for me outside the city gates. I'll come find you.", 'No.', "Not that I've seen.", "You didn't.", "I can't justify what happened. I won't try. But the war is over now.", "And you've been by her side, counseling her. Until today.", "You think our house words are stamped on our bodies when we're born and that's who we are? Then I'd be fire and blood too. She's not her father, no more than you're Tywin Lannister.", 'Cersei left her no choice.', 'She saw her friend beheaded. She saw her dragon shot out of the sky.', "Ah, it's easy to judge when you're standing far from the battlefield.", 'What?', "I don't know.", "What's it matter what I'd do?", 'Love is the death of duty.', 'Maester Aemon said it a long time ago.', "That's her decision. She is the queen.", "I'm sorry it came to this.", 'My sisters will be loyal to the throne.', "She doesn't get to choose.", 'I saw them executing Lannister prisoners in the street. They said they were acting on your orders.', 'Necessary? Have you been down there? Have you seen? Children, little children, burned!', 'And Tyrion?', 'Forgive him.', 'You can. You can forgive all of them, make them see they made a mistake. Make them understand.', 'Please, Dany.', 'The world we need is a world of mercy. It has to be.', "How do you know? How do you know it'll be good?", "I don't.", "What about everyone else? All the other people who think they know what's good.", 'You are my queen. Now, and always.', "There's still a Night's Watch?", 'Was it right? What I did?', "It doesn't feel right.", "I don't expect we'll ever see each other again.", 'The North is free, thanks to you.', "Ned Stark's daughter will speak for them. She's the best they could ask for.", 'You can come see me, you know, at Castle Black.', "You think anyone will dare tell you women aren't allowed?", 'You have your Needle?', 'Your Grace.', "I'm sorry I wasn't there when you needed me."]

Name: daenerys targaryen
Sentence: ["We've been his guests for over a year and he's never asked us for anything.", 'No.', "I don't want to be his queen. I want to go home.", "I don't know.", 'Thank you, ser. Are you from my country?', 'Thank you, Magister.', "She's beautiful. … Ser Jorah, I don't know how to say ‘thank you' in Dothraki.", 'Do you know the Common Tongue?', "Is ‘no' the only word that you know?", "Isn't there anything else?", 'Have you ever seen a dragon?', 'Everywhere? He refused.', 'Your brother stood with your father.', 'Of course.', 'When I was a child, my brother would tell me a bedtime story about the man who murdered our father.', 'Who stabbed him in the back and cut his throat. Who sat down on the Iron Throne and watched as his blood poured onto the floor.', 'He told me other stories as well. About all the things we would do to that man once we took back the Seven Kingdoms and had him in our grasp.', 'Your sister pledged to send her army north.', "I don't see an army. I see one man, with one hand. It appears your sister lied to me.", 'We"?', 'Like you knew your sister?', 'Perhaps he trusts his little brother to defend him, right up to the moment he slits my throat.', 'So why have you abandoned your house and family now?', 'What does the Warden of the North say about it?', 'Very well.', "Either you knew Cersei was lying and let me believe otherwise, or you didn't know at all. Which makes you either a traitor or a fool.", 'Not for the first time.', "Cersei still sits on the throne. If you can't help me take it back, I'll find another Hand who can.", 'Have you done something to offend me?', 'Long ago and long forgiven.', "When I named him Hand, I didn't know if I'd ever see you again.", "I wasn't under the impression you liked him very much.", "He's made mistakes. Serious mistakes.", "You're advising me to forgive the man who stole your position?", 'Lady Sansa, I was hoping we could speak alone.', 'I thought you and I were on the verge of agreement before. About Ser Jaime.', 'I wish I could have that kind of faith in my advisors.', "I didn't ask him to be my Hand simply because he was good.", 'I asked him to be my Hand because he was good, and intelligent, and ruthless when he had to be. He never should have trusted Cersei.', 'I thought he knew his sister.', 'Ours certainly have been.', "We have other things in common. We've both known what it means to lead people who aren't inclined to accept a woman's rule. And we've both done a damn good job of it, from what I can tell.", "And yet, I can't help but feel we're at odds with one another. Why is that? Your brother.", 'That bothers you.', "All my life, I've known one goal", "I'm here because I love your brother and I trust him, and I know he's true to his word. He's only the second man in my life I can say that about.", 'Someone taller.', 'I take the Iron Throne.', 'What is it?', 'Your sister?', "But why aren't you with her?", "Ser Davos is perfectly capable of waving a torch on his own. You'll be in the crypt.", "There are thousands of them and only one of you. You can't fight as well as they can, but you can think better than any of them. You're here because of your mind. If we survive, I'll need it.", "Who's that?", 'My brother, Rhaegar, everyone told me he was decent and kind. He liked to sing. Gave money to poor children. And he raped her.', "That's impossible.", 'Who told you this?', 'He saw it?', "A secret no one in the world knew except your brother and your best friend. Doesn't seem strange to you?", "If it were true, it would make you the last male heir of House Targaryen. You'd have a claim to the Iron Throne.", 'The dead are already here.', 'Dracarys.', 'Go!', 'Jorah!', 'Gendry.', "That's right, isn't it?", "You're Robert Baratheon's son.", "You are aware he took my family's throne and tried to have me murdered?", "Yes, he's dead. His brothers are too. So who's Lord of Storm's End now?", 'Does anyone?', "I think you should be Lord of Storm's End.", "No, you are Lord Gendry Baratheon of Storm's End, the lawful son of Robert Baratheon. Because that is what I have made you.", "See? You're not the only one who's clever.", 'Someone has betrayed me.', 'Jon Snow.', 'He knows the truth about Jon.', 'Because you told him. You learned from Sansa. And she learned from Jon, though I begged him not to tell her. As I said, he betrayed me.', 'And Varys?', 'You spoke to him first. Without coming to me. Without asking my permission.', 'Why do you think Sansa told you? What do you think she hoped to gain?', 'Yes, she trusts you. She trusted you to spread secrets that could destroy your own queen. And you did not let her down.', "No. It doesn't matter now.", 'Lord Varys. I, Daenerys of House Targaryen, First of My Name, Breaker of Chains and Mother of Dragons ...', 'sentence you to die. Dracarys.', 'This was all she brought with her when we crossed the Narrow Sea. Her only possession.', "It's all right, Torgo Nudo. Let me speak with him.", 'What did I say would happen if you told your sister?', "She betrayed your trust. She killed Varys as much as I did. This was a victory for her. Now she knows what happens when people hear the truth about you. Far more people in Westeros love you than love me. I don't have love here. I only have fear.", 'Is that all I am to you? Your queen?', 'All right, then.', 'Let it be fear.', 'In Meereen, the slaves turned on the masters and liberated the city themselves the moment I arrived.', "They are. In a tyrant's grip. Whose fault is that? Mine?", "Your sister knows how to use her enemies' weaknesses against them. That's what she thinks our mercy is - weakness.", "But she's wrong. Mercy is our strength. Our mercy towards future generations who will never again be held hostage by a tyrant.", "Ready the Unsullied. Tonight you sail for King's Landing, to join the Northern armies.", "Wait for me outside the city. You'll know when it's time.", 'Your brother was stopped trying to get past our lines.', "It seems he hasn't abandoned your sister after all. The next time you fail me will be the last time you fail me.", 'Blood of my blood.', 'You kept all your promises to me. You killed my enemies in their iron suits.', 'Your tore down their stone houses. You gave me the Seven Kingdoms.', 'Torgo Nudho.', "You have walked beside me since the Plaza of Pride. You are the bravest of men, the most loyal of soldiers. I name you commander of all my forces, the Queen's Master of War.", "Unsullied. All of you were torn from your mother's arms and raised as slaves. Now you are liberators. You have freed the people of King's Landing from the grip of a tyrant!", 'But the war is not over. We will not lay down our spears until we have liberated all the people of the world!', 'From Winterfell to Dorne, from Lannisport to Qarth, from the Summer Isles to the Jade Sea! Women, men and children have suffered too long beneath the wheel.', 'Will you break the wheel with me?', 'You freed your brother. You committed treason.', 'Take him.', "When I was a girl, my brother told me it was made with a thousand swords from Aegon's fallen enemies. What do a thousand swords look like in the mind of a little girl who can't count to twenty? I imagined a mountain of swords too high to climb. So many fallen enemies, you could only see the soles of Aegon's feet.", 'It was necessary.', 'I tried to make peace with Cersei. She used their innocence as a weapon against me. She thought it would cripple me.', "He conspired behind my back with my enemies. How have you treated people who've done the same to you, even when it broke your heart?", "I can't.", "We can't hide behind small mercies. The world we need won't be built by men loyal to the world we have.", "And it will be. It's not easy to see something that's never been before. A good world.", 'Because I know what is good. And so do you.', "You do. You do. You've always known.", "They don't get to choose.", "Be with me. Build the new world with me. This is our reason. It has been from the beginning, since you were a little boy with a bastardo s name and I was a little girl who couldn't count to twenty. We do it together. We break the wheel together."]

Name: cersei lannister
Sentence: ['And you never worry about anything. When we were seven, you jumped off the cliffs as Casterly Rock. One hundred foot drop into the water. And you were never afraid.', 'What if Jon Arryn told someone?', 'My husband.', 'You should be the Hand of the king.', "We've been riding for a month, my love. Surely the dead can wait.", 'Where is our brother? Go find the little beast.', 'Yes. Lovely country.', 'Hello, little dove. But you are a beauty. How old are you?', "You're tall. Still growing?", 'And have you bled yet?', 'And your dress. Did you make it?', 'Such talent. You must make something for me.', 'I hear we might share a grandchild someday.', "Your daughter will do well in the capital. Such a beauty shouldn't stay hidden up here forever.", 'Stop. STOP.', 'He saw us.', 'He saw us!', 'What do you mean?', "It's no mercy, letting a child linger in such pain.", "I still can't believe you're going. It's ridiculous even for you.", "The children don't need to hear your filth. Come.", 'Please.', "This is your home. I'm your guest. Handsome one, isn't he? I lost my first boy, a little black-haired beauty. He was a fighter too... Tried to beat the fever that took him. Forgive me. It's the last thing you need to hear right now.", 'It was years ago. Robert was crazed, beat his hands bloody on the wall, all the things men do to show you how much they care... The boy looked just like him. Such a little thing... A bird without feathers. They came to take his body away and Robert held me. I screamed and I battled, but he held me. That little bundle. They took him away and I never saw him again. Never have visited the crypt, never. I pray to the Mother every morning and night that she return your child to you.', "Perhaps this time she'll listen.", 'How dare you speak to your King in that manner?', "Your girl and that butcher's boy attacked my son. That animal of hers nearly tore his arm off.", 'Joffrey told us what happened. You and that boy beat him with clubs while you set your wolf on him.', "She's not. Sansa, come here, darling.", "She's as wild as that animal of hers. I want her punished.", 'Joffrey will bear these scars for the rest of his life.', 'And what of the direwolf? What of the beast that savaged your son?', 'We have another wolf.', 'Where is the beast?', 'Ser Ilyn, do me the honor.', 'Is this some trick?', "Please, it's nearly healed.", "A King should have scars, you fought off a direwolf. You're a warrior like your father.", "That's not true. You killed the beast. You only spared the girl because of the love your father bears her father. When Aerys Targaryen sat on the Iron Throne, your father was a rebel and a traitor. Someday you'll sit on the throne and the truth will be what you make it.", "Yes. She's very beautiful and young. If you don't like her, you only need to see her on formal occasions and when the time comes, to make little princes and princesses. And if you'd rather fuck painted whores, you'll fuck painted whores. And if you'd rather lie with noble virgins, so be it. You are my darling boy and the world will be exactly as you want it to be. Do something nice for the Stark girl.", 'No, but you will. The occasional kindness will spare you all sorts of trouble down the road.', 'How would you handle them?', 'A royal army?', 'And if the northerners rebel?', 'And these 10,000 northern troops, would they fight for you or their lord?', "But you've just invaded their homeland, asked them to kill their brothers.", "The North cannot be held... not by an outsider. It's too big and too wild. When the winter comes, the Seven gods together couldn't save you and your royal army. A good King knows when to save his strength... And when to destroy his enemies.", "Everyone who isn't us is an enemy.", 'How could you be so stupid?', "He's a child... 10 years old. What were you thinking?", "Nothing. He's said nothing. He remembers nothing.", 'What if it comes back to him? If he tells his father what he saw...', 'And my husband?', 'Let me go.', 'And if you find the proof?', "You're missing your tournament.", 'I thought we might put what happened on the Kingsroad behind us – the ugliness with the wolves. And forcing you to kill the beast was extreme. Though sometimes we go to extremes where our children are concerned. How is Sansa?', 'The only Stark who does. Favors her mother, not much of the north in her.', 'I might ask the same of you. What is it you hope to accomplish?', "You can't change him. You can't help him. He'll do what he wants, which is all he's ever done. You'll try your best to pick up the pieces.", "You're just a soldier, aren't you? You take your orders and you carry on. I suppose it makes sense. Your older brother was trained to lead and you were trained to follow.", 'As was I.', "I'm sorry your marriage to Ned Stark didn't work out. You seemed so good together.", 'Without a Hand, everything will fall to pieces.', "No. He's not serious enough. I'll say this for Ned Stark - he's serious enough. Was it really worth it? Losing him this way?", "The Dothraki don't sail. Every child knows that. They don't have discipline. They don't have armor. They don't have siege weapons.", 'Is my father wrong?', 'We still outnumber them.', 'Five.', 'What do you want?', 'Our marriage.', 'Every day.', 'Well, seventeen years is quite a long time.', 'Yes, it tis. What was she like?', "At first, just saying her name, even in private felt like I was breathing life back into her. I thought if I didn't talk about her, she'd just fade away for you. When I realized that wasn't going to happen, I refused to ask out of spite. I didn't want to give you the satisfaction of thinking I cared enough to ask. And eventually it became clear that my spite didn't mean anything to you, as far as I could tell, you actually enjoyed it.", "What harm could Lyanna Stark's ghost do to either of us that we haven't done to each other a hundred times over?", 'I felt something for you once, you know?', 'Even after we lost our first boy -- for quite a while, actually. Was it ever possible for us? Was there ever a time, ever a... moment?', "It doesn't make me feel anything.", 'Do you know what your wife has done?', 'By what right dare you lay hands on my blood?', "You were the King's Hand!", 'You shall now be held accountable.', 'Lord Stark was returning drunk from a brothel when his men attacked Jaime.', 'I took you for a king.', "He's attacked my brother and abducted the other. I should wear the armor and you the gown.", 'I shall wear this like a badge of honor.', "You're in pain.", "Perhaps it's time to go home.", 'Do you, Lord Stark? Is that why you called me here, to pose me riddles?', 'Jaime would have killed him.', 'My brother is worth a thousand of your friend.', 'The Targaryens wed brothers and sisters for 300 years to keep bloodlines pure.', 'Jaime and I are more than brother and sister. We shared a womb. We came into this world together. We belong together.', 'Do you love your children?', 'No more than I love mine.', 'Thank the Gods.', 'Hated him? I worshiped him.', 'And what of my wrath, Lord Stark? You should have taken the realm for yourself.', 'Oh, but it was.', 'Robert, my sweet...', 'You condemn yourself with your own mouth, Lord Stark.', 'You think he stands alone?', 'Sansa sweetling, you are innocent of any wrong.', 'Little dove, you must write to Lady Catelyn and your brother, the eldest.', "Word of your father's arrest will reach him soon, no doubt.", 'You disappoint me, child.', 'That depends.', 'On your brother. And on you.', 'Ser Barristan Selmy.', 'Rise, Ser Barristan.', "Whose death, Ser Barristan? Yours or your King's?", 'The Council has determined that Ser Jaime Lannister will take your place as Lord Commander of the Kingsguard.', 'Careful, Ser.', 'Do you have some business for the King and the Council, Sansa?', 'My son, this is madness.', 'Stop talking. Get back into bed.', 'You command the City Watch, do you not, Lord Slynt?', 'And are you not a Lord at my command?', 'Then do your job. Shut the gates to the peasants. They belong in the field, not our capital.', 'What are you doing here?', 'What are you doing here? This is the small council.', 'Our father is Hand of the King.', 'Out! All of you out. . I would like to know how you tricked father into this.', "I've done nothing.", 'I tried to stop it.', 'Robb Stark is a child.', 'What do you know about warfare?', 'Joffrey is King.', 'You are here to advise him.', 'How?', 'One.', 'Arya, little animal, she disappeared.', 'Lord Baelish.', 'I wonder if I might ask you for a favor.', "Ned Stark's youngest daughter Arya... we can't seem to locate her.", 'And yet my friends in the North report no sign of her.', 'If we choose to negotiate with the Starks, the girl has some value. Whoever finds her, well, you know what they say about Lannisters and debts.', "A mockingbird. . You created your own Sigil, didn't you?", 'Appropriate for a self-made man with so many songs to sing.', 'I heard a song once about a boy of modest means who found his way into the home of a very prominent family. He loved the eldest daughter. Sadly, she had eyes for another.', 'And which truth is that?', "Seize him. . Cut his throat. . Stop. Wait. I've changed my mind. Let him go. . Step back three paces. Turn around. Close your eyes. . Power is power. Do see if you can take some time away from your coins and your whores to locate the Stark girl for me. I would very much appreciate it.", 'What is all this?', "We can't find Arya Stark.", "Perhaps. But if not, we need her. They'll never give Jaime back to us for Sansa alone.", "We need to set our armies to the task of finding her. Send out as many men as we can. I'm sure if you asked grandfather -", 'His life is in danger.', 'Our enemies will say anything to weaken your claim to the throne.', 'Of course it is. No one believes this foul gossip -', 'What are you asking?', 'What are you doing here?', "I've done nothing.", 'What are you asking?', "From this time until the end of time, we are not part of your realm, but a free and independent Kingdom of the North.” . He has more spirit than his father, I'll give him that.", "You'll give the Starks our reply, cousin?", 'Did you see my brother when you were the Starks guest?', "If you speak with him, tell him he's not been forgotten.", "If that's everything?", "Another king? How many is that now, Five? I've lost count.", "Perhaps he's forgotten we're fighting a war. We have no men to spare.", 'One trip to The Wall and you come back believing in grumpkins and snarks. .', "I have every confidence the brave men of the Night's Watch will protect us all.", 'Lord Janos Slynt was Commander of the City Watch. You had no right to exile him.', "You're serving as the King's Hand until father gets here. I am Queen Regent.", 'Ha, the people. You think I care?', 'He did what needed to be done. . You want to be the Hand of the King? You want to rule? This is what ruling is! Lying on a bed of weeds, ripping them out by the root one by one before they strangle you in your sleep.', "I don't care what you think! You've never taken it seriously. You haven't, Jaime hasn't. . It's all fallen on me.", "You're funny. . You've always been funny. But none of your jokes will ever match the first one, will they? You remember... back when you ripped my mother open on your way out of her and she bled to death.", "Now they're gone, for the sake of you. There's no bigger joke in the world than that. .", 'Soon, darling, when the war is over.', 'The princess just spoke to you.', 'He might.', 'Would you like that?', "Even if he does, Sansa will do her duty. Won't you, little dove?", "You monster. Myrcella is my only daughter. Do you really think I'll let you sell her like a common whore?", 'I will not let you ship her off to Dorne as I was shipped off to Robert Baratheon.', 'Are you mad? The Martells loathe us.', "She'll be a hostage.", "You won't get away with this. You think the piece of paper Father gave you keeps you safe. Ned Stark had a piece of paper, too.", 'No.', 'No!', 'Get out! Get out!', 'Killed? By whom?', "Really? Who'd have thought?", 'Whomever did it, I say well done.', 'Littlefinger says we can outspend him three to one.', "Aren't there other things you should be doing, like sealing my daughter in a crate so you can ship her away?", 'Yes, I know how concerned you are for her safety.', "So clever. Aren't you always so clever with your schemes and your plots?", 'No need to concern yourself over it. The king is taking personal charge of siege preparations.', 'You may, specifically, or you may ask vaguely. The answer will be the same.', "It's the king's royal prerogative to withhold sensitive information from his councilors.", "One day I pray you love someone. I pray you love her so much, when you close your eyes, you see her face. I want that for you. I want you to know what it's like to love someone, to truly love someone. Before I take her from you.", 'Your mother might have prepared you. You flowered, my dear. No more.', 'In what way?', 'Wait until you birth a child.', "You're a woman now. Do you have any idea what that means?", 'A prospect that once delighted you, bringing little princes and princesses into the world, the greatest honor for a queen.', 'Joffrey has always been difficult. Even his birth, I labored a day and a half to bring him into this world. You cannot imagine the pain. I screamed so loudly, I was sure Robert would hear me in the Kingswood.', "Robert was hunting. That was his custom. Whenever my time was near, my royal husband would flee to the trees with his huntsmen and his hounds. And when he returned, he would present me with some pelts or a stag's head, and I would present him with a baby. Not that I wanted him there, mind you. I had Grand Maester Pycelle, an army of midwives, and I had my brother. When they told Jaime he wasn't allowed in the birthing room, he smiled and asked which one of them proposed to keep him out. Joffrey will show you no such devotion.", 'You may never love the king, but you will love his children.', "That's so very touching to hear. Permit me to share some womanly wisdom with you on this very special day. The more people you love, the weaker you are. You'll do things for them that you know you shouldn't do. You'll act the fool to make them happy, to keep them safe. Love no one but your children. On that front, a mother has no choice.", 'You can try, little dove.', "Since I decided that I can't stand to look at any of my handmaidens for another instant.", 'How many times can you read one raven scroll?', 'More than we have.', "We have strong, high walls. We'll rain fire down on them from above.", "Why not? He has a good mind for strategy, doesn't he?", "I'm sure you'll make a point eventually.", "I'm not the one giving the boy whores to abuse.", 'Did you?', "Do you think I haven't tried? He doesn't listen to me.", "I always hoped he'd be like Jaime. He looks like him. In a certain light.", "Robert was a drunken fool, but he didn't enjoy cruelty. Sometimes I wonder. What? If this is the price for what we've done, for our sins.", 'The Targaryens wed brother and sister for hundreds of years, I know. That\'s what Jaime and I would say to each other in our moments of doubt. It\'s what I told Ned Stark when he was stupid enough to confront me. Half the Targaryens went mad, didn\'t they? What\'s the saying? "Every time a Targaryen is born, the Gods flip a coin."', 'Odd little boy.', 'You and Varys both.', "He's only a boy.", "He's not ready.", "Better than you. Some men have a gift for this sort of thing, some don't. His place is not on the battlefield.", "Do you think I'm an idiot?", 'You shipped off my only daughter. And now you want to send my eldest son to the battlefield to die.', 'Do you know why Varys is so dangerous?', "Because he doesn't have a cock.", "Perhaps I'm dangerous, too. You, on the other hand, are as big a fool as every other man. That little worm between your legs does half your thinking.", "Because I'm happy.", 'Because I have your little whore.', 'Such a droll little fellow. Tell me, have you married this one yet? No? Good. Father will be so pleased.', 'Because a Lannister always pays her debts. You stole my only daughter, you plot to have Joffrey killed.', 'For what? Your skill in battle? Pretty thing, your whore. Lovely body. The bruises will heal in time.', "Varys isn't the only one who hears whispers. Really, a Lannister lion necklace? You need to hide your secret whores more carefully.", "Oh? Well, you're the expert. Tell me.", "You're usually a better liar, baby brother. This one you like. You like her very much. Could it be love? Don't worry, she'll be treated gently enough. Unless Joffrey is hurt. And then every wound he suffers, she'll suffer, too. And if he dies, there isn't a man alive who could devise a more painful death for your little cunt.", "Would you like to see her? I thought you might. Ser Mandon, bring in my brother's whore.", 'Get out.', 'Your words are always wise and measured.', 'You brought me something?', 'I know what ten drops will bring.', "You may not. You must have a lot of work to do. I'm sure many brave men will need your wisdom soon.", 'Be careful on the stairs, Grand Maester. There are so many.', 'Sansa.', 'I was wondering where our little dove had flown. You look pale, child. Is your red flower still blooming?', "Fitting, isn't it? The men will bleed out there and you will bleed in here. Pour Lady Sansa some wine.", "So? I didn't offer you water.", "Ser llyn? He's here to defend us. When the axes smash down those doors, you may be glad to have him.", "Guards we have paid. Should the city fall, they'll be the first ones out of the doors.", "The battle's first traitors. Have Ser llyn see to them. Put their heads on spikes outside the stables as a warning.", 'The only way to keep the small folk loyal is to make certain they fear you more than they do the enemy. Remember that if you ever hope to become a queen.', 'He is. Traitors are a danger to us all. More wine.', 'Sansa, come here, little dove.', 'What are you doing?', "You're perfect, aren't you? Praying. What are you praying for?", 'Oh. On all of us?', 'Even me?', 'Even Joffrey?', "Oh, shut up, you little fool. Praying to the gods to have mercy on us all. The gods have no mercy. That's why they're gods. My father told me that when he caught me praying. My mother had just died, you see. I didn't really understand the concept of death, the finality of it. I thought that if I prayed very, very hard, the gods would return my mother to me. I was four.", "He believes in them, he just doesn't like them very much.", 'One for her.', 'Here. Sit. Drink.', 'Not like that. Drink, girl.', "I should have been born a man. I'd rather face a thousand swords than be shut up inside with this flock of frightened hens.", "It was expected of me, as it will be of you if you ever become Joffrey's queen. If my wretched brother should somehow prevail, these hens will return to their cocks and crow of how my courage inspired them, lifted their spirits.", "You'd like that, wouldn't you? The Red Keep should hold for a time, long enough for me to go to the walls and yield to Lord Stannis in person. If it were anyone else outside those gates, I might have hoped for a private audience, but this is Stannis Baratheon. I'd have a better chance of seducing his horse.", "Have I shocked you, little dove? Tears aren't a woman's only weapon. The best one's between your legs. Learn how to use it. Drink.", "Do you have any notion of what happens when a city is sacked? No, you wouldn't, would you? If the city falls, these fine women should be in for a bit of a rape. Half of them will have bastards in their bellies come the morning. You'll be glad of your red flower then. When a man's blood is up, anything with tits looks good. A precious thing like you will look very, very good. A slice of cake just waiting to be eaten.", "When we were young, Jaime and I, we looked so much alike even our father couldn't tell us apart. I could never understand why they treated us differently. Jaime was taught to fight with sword and lance and mace, and I was taught to smile and sing and please. He was heir to Casterly Rock, and I was sold to some stranger like a horse to be ridden whenever he desired.", "And you will be Joffrey's. Enjoy. I don't think I know this one.", 'Pretty.', "That's the worst curtsy I've ever seen. Here, it's not difficult. I mastered it when I was four. Straighten your back and bend.", "Better. You learn fast. How long have you been in Lady Sansa's service?", 'When did you leave Lorath?', 'I had a Lorathi handmaiden once.', "But she was a nobleman's daughter. You're not. When did you come to Westeros?", "From Lorathi commoner to the Red Keep in ten years, all without learning how to curtsy. I imagine that's a very interesting story. What's your name?", 'Tell us a story, Shae.', 'What news?', 'Where is Joffrey?', 'Bring him back inside at once.', 'What?', 'Bring him back to his chambers now.', 'With the women and children? Do you want him to be mocked as a coward for the rest of his life?', 'Now!', "When I told you about Ser llyn earlier, I lied. Do you want to hear the truth? You want to know why he's really here? He's here for us. Stannis may take the city, he may take the throne, but he will not take us alive.", 'Where is my son?', 'Why do I care what you want? Bring me-', 'Shh! Be calm, my sweet.', "No one's going to hurt you. I'll tell you a story. You know the one about the mother lion and her little cub? They lived in the woods.", 'Yes, my love. In the Kingswood, there lived a mother and her cub. She loved him very much. But there were other things that lived in the woods. Evil things.', 'Like stags.', 'And wolves.', 'He could hear them howling in the night. The little cub was frightened. His mother said, "You are a lion, my son. You mustn\'t be afraid."', 'For one day, all the beasts will bow to you. You will be king. All the stags will bow. All the wolves will bow. The bears in the north and the foxes of the south, all the birds in the sky and the beasts in the sea, they will all come to you, little lion, to rest a crown upon your head.', 'And the cub said, "Will I be strong and fierce like my father?"', 'Yes," said his mother. "You will be strong and fierce just like your father.', 'I will keep you safe, my love. I promise you.', 'Father.', 'Your Grace, in the judgment of your Small Council, it would be neither proper nor wise for you to wed the daughter of a man beheaded for treason, a girl whose brother is in open rebellion against the throne as we speak. For the good of the realm, your councilors beg you to set Sansa Stark aside.', "It's your sister. The queen.", 'Protecting me, I assume.
