Any word from Jaime?", 'Tell him I need to speak to him.', 'What about my son, the king? If you can visit me then surely the king--', 'You need to talk to him, you need to talk to my son to come and see me, come and see his mother.', "I can't stay here.", "Confess? To the High Sparrow? I won't. I made him. I rose him up from nothing, I will not kneel before some barefooted commoner and beg his forgiveness.", "I'll get out of here, you realize. Before long.", 'I can make you a wealthy woman. A lady of the court.', 'I can make sure you die in the most hideous way imaginable, and all I do is sit here imagining ways for you to die.', 'I have sinned. I see that now. How could I have been so blind for so long. I want to be clean again. I want absolution. The Crone came to me with her lamp raised high, and with its holy light--', "Once I've confessed, will I be free?", 'The Mother have mercy then. I lay with a man outside the bonds of marriage, I confess.', 'Lancel Lannister.', 'I was lonely and afraid.', 'A husband of whoring every chance he got.', 'May the gods forgive me.', 'No.', 'I do.', "A lie. A lie from the lips of Stannis Baratheon. He wants the Throne, but his brother's children stand in his way, so he claims they are not his brothers'. The filth. There is not one shred of truth to it. I deny it.", 'Trial? I have confessed?', "I bow to the wisdom of your High Holiness. But if I might beg for just one drop of the Mother's mercy. I haven't seen my son… I don't know how long it's been. I need to see him. Please.", 'Thank you. Thank you.', 'I will, I will. I swear it, day and night.', 'Am I free to go?', 'My atonement?', 'Myrcella…', 'Do you remember the first time you saw a dead body?', 'All I could think about when she died was what would happen to her now Every day, every night, what does Mama look like now? Has she started to bloat? Has her skin turned black? Have her lips peeled back from her teeth?', 'I think about locking Myrcella in a crypt', 'I think about her beautiful little face starting to collapse', "I have to I have to It's not right she has to suffer alone", "She was good From her first breath, she was so sweet I don't know where she came from She was nothing like me No meanness, no jealous, just good", "I thought if I could make something so good, so pure...maybe I'm not a monster", "No, I knew this would happen The witch told me years ago She promised me three children She promised me they'd die “And gold their shrouds” Everything she said came true You couldn't have stopped it It's prophecy It's fate", "Of course I do You told me yourself when Father died You said we had to stay together You said people would try to tear us apart, take what's ours That was a prophecy, too I didn't listen to you, and everything you said came true", 'Get out of my way', "What are the king's orders?", "You're barring me from attending my own daughter's funeral?", 'I would like to speak to my son', 'Did they put her in the red gown or the gold?', 'Good It was always her color', "I understand I'm glad to see you", "It's all right", 'Always', "Varys's little birds", "The High Sparrow has hundreds of Faith Militant surrounding him Ser Gregor will can't face them all And he won't have to He'll only have to face one", 'Not yet', "Don't stop at the city I want little birds in Dorne, in Highgarden, in the North If someone is planning on making our losses their gains I want to hear it If someone is laughing at the queen who walk naked through the streets covered in shit, I want to hear I want to know who they are I want to where they are", 'Why are you here', "Thank you for bringing it up It's well past time we addressed the abuses I endured", 'Grand Maester Pycelle, would you sanction that statement?', "What about Myrcella's death, Uncle? Do you consider the murder of your own blood a troublesome issue?", 'And seeing as you cannot make us leave, we best get on with it', "is walking down the hall to TOMMEN's chamber. She hears MAESTER PYCELLE talking.", 'enters the room', 'What are you doing here?', 'Leave.', 'Is this a Small Council meeting?', "Since I've missed the past several Small Coucil meetings, I wanted to speak to you about a few things.", 'As have we all, unfortunately.', "Look at me. What did they do to me? To the king's own mother?", "It's all right. It's done. It's in the past. And of course Margaery's safety is paramount.", "Whether I like her or not is completely unimportant. Margaery is the queen. Queens must command respect. Kings even more so. Not just for their own sake, but for everyone's. The High Sparrow has no respect for kings or queens. No respect for anything in this world. He has no use for the things of this world. He want to knock them down and replace them with what? With fantasies. With beggars in the street. With nothing.", "You've spoken with him?", 'It would be a breach of confidence which he would not take lightly, given his constant prattling about the truth. I am your mother. You can always trust me.', "The Small Council meeting has been postponed on the king's orders.", "You once spoke of your respect for our father because he understood the necessity of working with one's rivals.", "The High Sparrow seized power knowing full well we'd bicker amongst ourselves instead of seizing it back. Here we are. Well done to us. Now the future of the Seven Kingdoms rest in his dirty, peasant hands. In a few days, he'll have a trial for me. But before that, Queen Margaery will make her walk of atonement. Yes, Margaery will repent her sins before the good people of the city.", 'I agree.', "You hate these fanatics as much as we do. You hate what they've done to your son. Do you want Lancel back or have you given him up for good?", 'Then stand aside and let the people that took him from you be destroyed.', "BEtter you're elsewhere at the head of an army than in the sept dungeons.", 'What, then?', "You can't.", "We should treat them without mercy and we will. But if you kill the High Sparrow, you won't leave the sept alive. And without you, this is all for nothing. Stand at the head of our army where you belong, where Father wanted you. Show our men where their loyalties belong. Show them what lannisters are, what we do to our enemies. And take that stupid little castle back because it's ours and because you can.", "It will be a trial by combat. I have the Mountain. They've made us both stronger, all of them.", "They have no idea how strong we are. No idea what we're going to do to them.", "We've always been together. We'll always be together. We're the only two people in the world.", "I heard you were leaving King's Landing.", "Your grandson is still a prisoner. You'll leave him rotting in a cell?", "You're right. I made a terrible mistake. I carry it with me every single day.", 'I delivered an army of fanatics onto our doorstep. And now we must fight them together. We need each other.', "You love your granddaughter. I love my son. It's the only truth I know. We must defend them.", "Never. I'll never leave my son.", "Have been permitted? That's rather a tortured way of putting it.", 'Who permitted them inside the Red Keep?', 'The king is aware of their presence?', 'His Holiness the High Septon is welcome to see me here in the Red Keep.', "It is a request, Cousin Lancel. You are asking me for something, I'm refusing.", 'He promised me I could stay in the Red Keep until my trial.', 'Get out.', 'I choose violence.', "Please tell His High Holiness he's always welcome to visit.", "There's to be a royal announcement?", "Why wasn't I informed?", 'To stand by my son.', 'And? Was it just a rumor or something more?', 'Confess. Confess.', 'Confess.', "Confess. It felt good. Beating me, starving me, frightening me, humiliating me. You didn't do it because you cared about my atonement. You did it because it felt good. I understand. I do things because they feel good. I drink because it feels good. I killed my husband because it felt good to be rid of him. I fuck my brother because it feels good to feel him inside me. I lie about fucking my brother… because it feels good to keep our son safe from hateful hypocrites. I killed your High Sparrow… and all his little sparrows… all his septons, all his septas, all his filthy soldiers, because it felt good to watch them burn. It felt good to imagine their shock and their pain. No thought has ever given me greater joy. Even confessing feels good under the right circumstances.", "You've always been quiet.", 'I said my face would be the last thing you saw before you died. Do you remember?', "What? Now? Today? You're not going to die today. You're not going to die for quite a while. Ser Gregor.", "This is Ser Gregor Clegane. He's quiet, too.", 'Your gods have forsaken you. This is your god now.', 'Shame.', 'Show me.', 'He should be with his grandfather, his brother, his sister. Burn him and bury his ashes where the sept once stood.', "Its what we've been waiting for our whole lives. It's what Father trained us for, whether he knew it or not.", "It's ours now, we just have to take it.", "You've been quiet since you came home. Are you angry with me?", 'Are you afraid of me?', "Daenerys Targaryen has chosen Tyrion to be her Hand. Right now, they're sailing across the Narrow Sea, hoping to take back her father's throne. Our little brother, the one you love so much, the one you set free, the one who murdered our father and our first-born son, now he stands beside our enemies and gives them counsel. He's out there somewhere at the head of an armada. Where will they land?", 'Enemies to the east.', 'Enemies to the south--Ellaria Sand and her brood of bitches.', 'Enemies to the west--Olenna, the old cunt. Another traitor.', "Enemies to the north. Ned Stark's bastard has been named King in the North and that murdering whore Sansa stands beside him. Enemies everywhere. We're surrounded by traitors. You're in command of the Lannister army now. How do we proceed?", 'Will the Tyrell bannermen stand alongside a Dothraki horde and Unsullied slave soldiers?', "I'm the Queen of the Seven Kingdoms.", "I understand we're in a war for survival. I understand whoever loses dies. I understand whoever wins could launch a dynasty that lasts a thousand years.", 'A dynasty for us, then.', "There's nothing to say.", 'He betrayed me. He betrayed us both. Should we spend our days mourning the dead--mother, father, and all our children?', "I loved them. I did. But they're ashes now and we're still flesh and blood. We're the last Lannisters, the last ones who count.", 'I heard. How could we ever trust a man like that?', 'You think I listened to Father for 40 years and learned nothing?', 'Not all of them.', 'I invited Euron Greyjoy, the new King of the Iron Islands. You said yourself we needed stronger, better allies. There you are.', "So does everyone when it suits them. Unlike the Freys, they have ships. And they're good at killing.", "Euron Greyjoy didn't come here for that.", 'A queen.', 'If not the most humble.', 'What do you want in return?', 'I decline your proposal.', "You're not trustworthy. You've broken promises to allies before and murdered them at the nearest opportunity. You murdered your own brother.", "If the Mad King's daughter takes the Iron Throne, she will destroy the Realm as we know it. Some of you are bannermen of House Tyrell. But House Tyrell is in open rebellion against the Crown. With their help the Mad King's daughter has ferried an army of savages to our shores. Mindless Unsullied soldiers who will destroy your castles and your holdfasts. Dothraki heathens who will burn your villages to the ground, rape and enslave your women, and butcher your children without a second thought. This is how Olenna Tyrell rewards centuries of service and loyalty.", "You all remember the Mad King. You remember the horrors he inflicted upon his people. His daughter is no different. In Essos her brutality is already legendary. She crucified hundreds of noblemen in Slaver's Bay. And when she grew bored of that, she fed them to her dragons.", 'It is my solemn duty to protect the people, and I will but I need your help, My Lords. We must stand together, all of us, if we hope to stop her.', "No, I can't say I have. I haven't seen these since Robert had them removed from the Throne Room.", "They were his trophies. He couldn't keep them around. They would have made him look small. Sometimes he would come down here and look at them. I believe he brought his whores on occasion.", "You've proven yourself the greatest captain on the 14 seas and a true friend to the crown.", 'And you deserve a proper reward for your heroism.', 'You shall have what your heart desires --', 'when the war is won.', 'With Euron Greyjoy commanding our naval forces and Jaime Lannister leading our armies, the sons and daugters of Westeros shall defend our country.', "I want you to know I understand. Even though we're enemies, you and I, I understand the fear that drives you. I was there that day when Ser Gregor crushed your lover's head. I close my eyes I can hear the sound of Oberyn's skull breaking.", "The sound of your scream. I never heard a sound like that. I thought, that's true love. Oberyn looked beautiful that day. He really did. No one moved like him. No one had such skill with a spear. Even Ser Gregor couldn't stop him. If only he hadn't taunted him. He could have walked away and left poor Ser Gregor to die. But that wasn't your lover's way, was it? Now he's burried somewhere. And here Ser Gregor is stronger than ever. That must be difficult for you. When my daughter was taken from me, my only daughter, well, you can't imagine how that feels unless you've lost a child. I fed her at my own breast even though they told me to give her to the wet nurse. I couldn't bear to see her in another woman's arms. I never got to have a mother. But Myrcella did. She was mine and you took her from me. Why did you do that?", "It doesn't matter now.", 'Your daughter is a beauty too. Brown eyes, those lips. A perfect Dornish beauty.', 'I imagine she is your favorite.', "I know, I know, we're not supposed to have favorites. But still, we're only human. We love who we love.", "I'm sorry. I can't understand you. The gag makes it difficult to understand what you're saying. It must be frustrating.", 'We all make our choices. You chose to murder my daughter. You must have felt powerful after you made that choice.', "Do you feel powerful now? I don't sleep very well, not at all really. I lie in bed and I stare at the canopy and imagine ways of killing my enemies. How to destroy Ellaria Sand, the woman who murdered my only daughter. I thought about having Ser Gregor crush your skull the way he did Oberyn's. It would be poetic I suppose but fast. Too fast.", "I thought about having him crush your daughter's skull.", "She's so beautiful. The thought of this lovely face cracking open like a duck egg, no, it's just not right.", "Qyburn, he's the cleverest man I know. Clever enough to learn what poison you used to murder Myrcella. The long goodbye, was that it?", "That's the one.", 'How long does the poison take?', 'But death is certain?', "Your daughter will die here in this cell. You will be here watching when she does. You will be here the rest of your days. If you refuse to eat we will force food down your throat. You will live to watch your daughter rot, to watch that beautiful face collapse to bone and dust all the while contemplating the choices you've made.", "Make sure the guards change the torches every few hours. I don't want her to miss a thing.", "I am queen of the Seven Kingdoms. I'll do as I please.", "Good. And we'll need fresh sheets for the bed.", "The Iron Bank didn't send you hear to offer condolences.", 'The destruction of the Sept of Baelor was a tragic accident.', 'The Iron Bank wants its gold back.', 'And we both know gold wins wars. Your vaults are empty. Your late husbando s profligacy saw to that.', 'And the Iron Bank wants to bet on a winner.', "That's a fancy way of saying bet. The war has already begun. I've drawn first blood. I decapitated the Dornish snake. My armada owns the Narrow Sea.", 'Euron Greyjoy is loyal to me.', "Her dragons might not be as invulnerable as some think. Now, let's talk about the Targaryen girl. You want to invest in her? I'm guessing the Iron Bank invested considerable gold in the slave trade. How are you profits now that Daenerys has freed all the slaves?", 'From what I gather she considers herself more of a revolutionary that a monarch. In your experience how do bankers usually fare with revoltionaries?', 'The Lannisters owe the Iron Bank quite a lot of money but Lannisters always pay their debts. Do former slaves or Dothraki or dragons?', "Give me a fortnight. Stay in King's Landing as my honored guest and when you return to Braavos I swear to you my debt will be paid in full.", 'and TYCHO NESTORIS from the Iron Bank of Braavos are sitting having a discussion.', "You're too kind, My Lord.", 'Is on its way. My brother is supervising its transportation himself.', 'We must devise a way to raise their spirits.', 'My only venture at the moment is reestablishing control over this continent and every person on it.', 'It will indeed. I need to expand my armies, my navies. My hand, Qyburn, had made overtures to the Golden Company in Essos.', "That's good to hear. I too would like them to recover some things that belong to me.", 'How many men did we lose?', "It's armies that win wars. We have the Tyrell gold, we have the Iron Bank behind us. We can buy mercenaries.", "They're not the same as our men but they'll fight if they're well paid, which they will be.", "So what do we do? Sue for peace? I sit on her father's throne, the father you betrayed and murdered. And in her mind she's winning. What sort of offer do you think she'd make?", 'turns and walks away from JAIME.', 'Maybe we can count on Tyrion to intercede on our behalf by way of apology for murdering our father and our son.', 'You saw the crossbow, you saw his body.', 'After all this time it still amazes me --', 'And this was before or after she drank the poison you so kindly provided her?', 'And you believed her?', 'looks away, then sits down.', "I shouldn't have listened to you. She should have died screaming.", 'So we fight and die or we submit and die. I know my choice. A soldier should know his.', "That won't be necessary.", "He's Hand of the Queen. Why are you here?", 'pauses for a moment making JAIME uncomfortable.', 'What did our brother have to say?', 'To discuss a surrender?', 'She just won a great victory. Why would she want a truce now?', 'smirks and looks away from JAIME.', 'Are you going to punish him?', 'Bronn.', 'He betrayed you. He set up a meeting without your knowledge or consent. Do you think anything of importance happens in this city without me knowing?', "I've come to believe that accomodation with the Dragon Queen could be in our immediate interest. She has the numbers. If we want to beat her we have to be clever. We have to fight her like father would have. Dead men, dragons and Dragon Queens, whatever stands in our way we will defeat it ourselves for our house. For this.", "lifts her hands from the chair and places them both on her stomach indicating she's pregnant. JAIME looks shocked.", 'You.', 'stands from her chair and walks in front of JAIME.', 'Do you remember what father used to say about people?', 'Never betray me again.', "Why isn't she with them?", 'And the rest of them?', 'Including our brother.', 'If anything goes wrong, kill the silver-haired bitch first, then our brother, then the bastard who calls himself king.', 'Where is she?', "Didn't travel with you?", "We've been here for some time.", 'Sit down or leave.', 'So instead, we should settle our differences and live together in harmony for the rest of our days?', 'Then why are we here?', 'I imagine for most of them it would be an improvement.', "I don't think it's serious at all. I think it's another bad joke. If my brother Jaime has informed me correctly, you're asking me for a truce.", "That's all? Pull back my armies and stand down while you go on your monster hunt. Or while you solidify and expand your position. Hard for me to know which it is with my armies pulled back until you return and march on my capital with four times the men.", 'The word of a would-be usurper.', 'What are you talking about?', "He's right to be afraid. And a coward to run. If those things come for us, there will be no kingdoms to rule. Everything we suffered will have been for nothing. Everything we lost will have been for nothing. The crown accepts your truce. Until the dead are defeated, they are the true enemy.", 'In return, the King', "I would never ask it of you. You would never agree to it. And if you did, I would trust you even less than I do now. I ask it only of Ned Stark's son. I know Ned Stark's son.", 'Then there is nothing left to discuss. The dead will come north first. Enjoy dealing with them. We will deal with whatever is left of you.', "I shouldn't be surprised, I suppose. She's your kind of woman a foreign whore who doesn't know her place.", "So you bring her here with her pet Northerner, whom you've convinced to bow down before her.", "And now you've got them both working towards the same goal, the goal you've worked towards your entire life.", 'the destruction of this family.', 'You killed our father', 'Oh, poor little man. Your papa was mean to you. Do you have any idea what you did when you fired that crossbow? You left us open. You laid us bare for the vultures, and the vultures came and tore us apart. You may not have killed Joffrey, but you killed Myrcella, you killed Tommen. No one wouldo ve touched them if Father--', 'I will not hear it, not from you.', 'I will not hear it!', 'I will not', "It doesn't matter. Your love doesn't matter. Your feelings don't matter. I don't care why you did what you did. I only care what it cost us. It cost us our future.", 'Not to help my enemies collaborate in my destruction.', 'What did you hope for? To make Jon Snow submit to your queen.', 'But eventually, you want everyone to bend the knee to her.', 'Why?', "You said she'd destroy King's Landing.", "That's the difference between you. I don't care about checking my worst impulses. I don't care about making the world a better place. Hang the world.", "That thing you dragged here, I know what it is, I know what it means. And when it came at me, I didn't think about the world. Not at all. As soon as it opened its mouth, the world disappeared for me, right down its black throat. All I could think about was keeping those gnashing teeth away from the ones who matter most, away from my family. Maybe Euron Greyjoy had the right idea. Get on a boat, take those who matter.", "My armies will not stand down. I will not pull them back to the capital. I will march them north to fight alongside you in the Great War. The darkness is coming for us all. We'll face it together. And when the Great War is over, perhaps you'll remember I chose to help with no promises or assurances from any of you. I expect not. Call our banners. All of them.", 'Ser Jaime.', 'My lords, I need a moment with my brother.', 'What are you doing?', 'Expedition north? I always knew you were the stupidest Lannister. The Starks and Targaryens have united against us, and you want to fight alongside them? Are you a traitor or an idiot?', "I'll say whatever I need to say to ensure the survival of our house. You expect me to trust the man who murdered our father.", "I saw it burn. If dragons can't stop them, if Dothraki and Unsullied and Northmen can't stop them, how will our armies make a difference?", 'And I intend to stay amongst the living. Let the Stark boy and his new queen--', 'Our child will rule Westeros.', "The monsters are real. The white walkers, the dragons, the Dothraki screamers all the frightening stories we heard when we were young, they're all real. So be it. Let the monsters kill each other. And while they battle in the North, we take back the lands that belong to us.", 'And then we rule.', 'The Targaryens and the Starks already want to kill us all. Most of them will die in the North.', 'How many dragons did you see at the pit?', 'What happened to the third?', 'She came here with her dragons and her Dothraki and her Unsullied. She came here to show us all her power. No, something happened.The dragons are vulnerable.', 'No, we have something better. We have the Iron Bank. You shouldo ve listened more when Father--', 'Do you really think Euron Greyjoy turned tail and sailed back to the Iron Islands? Do you think he abandoned the chance to marry the queen?', 'And you conspired with Tyrion, the man who murdered our father without telling me, your queen.', "You met with him in secret without my consent. You planned to promote my enemies' interests. That is the definition of conspiracy.", 'And that will be treason.', 'Disobeying your queen', 'I told you no one walks away from me.', "There's one more yet to come.", 'Good.', 'Twenty-thousand men, is it?', 'Horses?', 'And elephants?', "That's disappointing. I was told the Golden Company had elephants.", "In any event, you are most welcome here in King's Landing, Captain Strickland.", 'You are a true friend of the crown and an honored guest.', 'After the war. That was our agreement.', 'You want a whore, buy one. You want a queen, earn her.', "You're insolent. I've executed men for less.", 'I wanted those elephants.', "You're insulting my late husband?", "Robert had a different whore every night, but he still didn't know his way around a woman's body.", "You enjoy risking your neck, don't you?", "You're not boring, I'll give you that.", "You might be the most arrogant man I've ever met. I like that.", 'But now I want to be alone.', 'All we need is one good shot.', 'The Iron Fleet hold Blackwater Bay. Euron killed one of her dragons. He can kill another.', 'Our men will fight harder than sellswords ever could. They will defend their queen to the last man.', "The Red Keep has never fallen. It won't fall today.", 'The Red Keep is the safest place in the city.', 'Ser Gregor, stay by my side.', 'Ser Gregor, I command you.', "You're hurt.", "You're bleeding.", 'I want our baby to live. I want our baby to live. I want our baby to live.', "Don't let me die, Jaime. Please don't let me die.", "Please don't let me die.", "I don't want to die.", 'Not like this. Not like this. Not like this.']

Name: jaime lannister
Sentence: ["As your brother, I feel it's my duty to warn you", "There was nothing to be afraid of until you told father. [In a whisper, mimicking] We're Lannisters. Lannisters don't act like fools.", 'But who would he tell?', "If he told the king, both our heads would be skewered on the city gates by now. Whatever Jon Arryn knew or didn't know, it died with him. And Robert will choose a new Hand of the king, someone to do his job while he's off fucking boars and hunting whores. Or is it the other way around? And life will go on.", "That's an honor I can do without. Their days are too long, their lives are too short.", "Don't get up.", "You've much to teach me, no doubt. But our sister craves your attention.", "A family trait. Now, the Starks are feasting us at sundown. Don't leave me alone with these people.", "I thought you might say that. But since we're short on time, Come on, girls. See you at sundown.", "I hear we might be neighbors soon. I hope it's true.", "I'm sure we'll have a tournament to celebrate the new title, if you accept. It would be good to have you in the field. The competition has become a bit stale.", 'No? Getting a little old for it?', 'Well said.', 'Are you completely mad?', "It's all right. It's all right.", "I heard you the first time. Quite the little climber, aren't you? How old are you, boy?", 'Ten.', 'The things I do for love.', 'Little brother.', "Tell me you're not thinking of taking the black.", "Even if the boy lives, he'll be a cripple, a grotesque. Give me a good clean death any day.", "My dear brother, there are times you make me wonder whose side you're on.", 'A sword for the wall?', 'Good man. Have you swung it yet?', "At someone, I mean. It's a strange thing, the first time you cut a man. You realize we're nothing but sacks of meat and blood and some bone to keep it all standing. Let me thank you ahead of time for guarding us all from the perils beyond the Wall... Wildlings and White Walkers and whatnot. We're grateful to have good, strong men like you protecting us.", 'Is it "we" already? Have you taken your vows then?', "Give my regards to the Night's Watch. I'm sure it will be thrilling to serve in such an elite force. And if not, It's only for life.", "Thank the gods you're here, Stark. About time we had some stern northern leadership.", "Sturdy old thing. How many kings' asses have polished it, I wonder? What's the line? The King shits and the Hand wipes.", 'I know. People have been swinging at me for years, but they always seem to miss.', "I have a knack for it. It must be strange for you coming into this room. I was standing right here when it happened. He was very brave, your brother. Your father too. They didn't deserve to die like that. Nobody deserves to die like that.", '500 men just stood there and watched. All the great knights of the Seven Kingdoms. You think anyone said a word, lifted a finger? No, Lord Stark. 500 men and this room was silent as a crypt. Except for the screams, of course, and the Mad King laughing. And later... When I watched the Mad King die, I remembered him laughing as your father burned... It felt like justice.', "Tell me... If I'd stabbed the Mad King in the belly instead of the back, would you admire me more?", 'Calm down.', "I was thinking of us. You're a bit late to start complaining about it now. What has the boy told them?", 'Then what are you raving about?', "We'll say he was lying. We'll say he was dreaming. We'll say whatever we like. I think we can outfox a 10-year-old.", "I'll go to war with him if I have to. They can write a ballad about us", 'Never.', "The boy won't talk. And if he does, I'll kill him. Him, Ned Stark, the King... the whole bloody lot of them, until you and I are the only people left in this world.", 'One of the outlaws in the Brotherhood.', 'You killed Simon Toyne with a counter riposte. Best move I ever saw.', 'I cut his head off, so no.', 'He said the same thing he\'d been saying for hours... "Burn them all." If that\'s all, your Grace...', 'Listen. Do you hear them? How many do you think are in there with him? Guess.', "He likes to do this when I'm on duty... He makes me listen as he insults my sister.", 'Why do I have to forgive you? Have you wronged me?', "Have we? Strange, I've forgotten.", "That's where you got your scar?", 'Vicious sons of whores.', "They stopped liking it at the end. That was a proper battle. D'you remember Thoros of Myr charging through the breach?", 'I saw the youngest of the Greyjoy lads at Winterfell. It was like seeing a shark on a mountaintop.', 'I doubt it.', "I don't serve Lord Stark.", 'Such a small pack of wolves.', "Was!... the Hand of the King. Now I'm not sure what he is... Lord of somewhere very far away.", "Get back inside where it's safe. I'm looking for my brother. You remember my brother, don't you, Lord Stark? Innocent or otherwise.', "The child is the reason she'll never give an inch. All the worst things she's ever done, she's done for her children. It's not impossible that she'll win.", "Two of the three dragons are dead. She's evened the odds.", 'She has the Lannister army, she has the Golden Company-', "Then I suppose I'll die tomorrow, if not before.", 'Sail right past the Iron Fleet and into a new life? Sounds a lot less likely than Cersei winning this war-', 'You have my word.', "I'll try.", 'Your queen will execute you for this.', 'You would have.', 'Soldier!', "We need to get the queen out of King's Landing.", 'Well, maybe for you.', "You're no king.", "It doesn't matter.", 'This way.', "It's all right.", 'Just look- Look at me. Look at me.', "Look- Look- Look me in the eye. Don't look away. Don't look- Look at me! Just look at me.", 'Nothing else matters. Nothing else matters. Only us.']

Name: sansa stark
Sentence: ['Thank you.', 'Will you shut up?', 'Would you please shut up.', "Do you think Joffrey will like me? What if he thinks I'm ugly?", "He's so handsome.", 'When would we be married? Soon or do we have to wait?', "Why would he say no? He'd be the second most powerful man in the kingdoms.", "You left your home to come here. And I'd be queen someday. Please make father say yes.", "Please, please. It's the only thing I ever wanted.", 'Thirteen, Your Grace.', 'I think so, Your Grace.', 'No, Your Grace.', 'Arya!', 'Pardon me, Ser.', "I'm sorry if I offended you, Ser. Why won't he speak to me?", "Stay, Lady. I probably shouldn't have any more. Father only lets us have one cup at feasts.", 'Arya!', "He the butcher's boy.", 'Arya, stay out of this.', "No no, stop it, stop it, both of you. You're spoiling it. You're spoiling everything!", "Arya, leave him alone. My prince, my poor prince, look what they did to you. Stay here, I'll go back to the inn and bring help.", "I don't know. I don't remember. Everything happened so fast. I didn't see.", "He doesn't mean Lady, does he? No no, not Lady! Lady didn't bite anyone! She's good!", "Stop them. Don't let them do it. Please! It wasn't Lady!", 'Practicing for what?', 'The Hound killed your friend.', "You're an idiot.", "I haven't played with dolls since I was eight. May I be excused?", 'What if I have a girl?', 'What if I only have girls?', "Jeyne Poole's mother had five children, all of them girls.", 'But what if?', 'And everyone would hate me.', 'Joffrey does.', 'Please shut up about it.', 'Aegon the Conqueror.', 'Maegor the Cruel.', "My grandfather and uncle were murdered here, weren't they?", 'The Mad King.', 'Why were they killed?', "I don't want to speak to my father, ever.", "No, I won't.", "I'm sorry. Do I...?", 'Arya!', 'Gods, who is that?', 'And his opponent?', "I won't tell anyone. I promise.", 'At her dancing lessons. The Knight of the Flowers.', 'Thank you, Ser Loras.', "Don't let Ser Gregor hurt him.", "I can't watch.", "He's going to die.", "Ser Loras would never do that! There's no honor in tricks.", "Well, why shouldn't I? We're in the south.", "My mother isn't from the North.", 'Why do you care? Do you even have hair under there?', "I've never seen it.", 'No. Where are you from anyway, the north or the south?', "Oh, wait. I just realized… I don't care.", 'Septa.', 'My prince.', "It's beautiful. Like the one your mother wears.", "There's nothing to forgive.", 'What?!', 'What about Joffrey?', "Please, Father. Please don't.", "Who cares about your stupid dancing teacher? I can't go. I'm supposed to marry Prince Joffrey. I love him and I'm meant to be his queen and have his babies.", "I don't want someone brave and gentle and strong. I want him! He'll be the greatest king that ever was, a golden lion, and I'll give him sons with beautiful blond hair.", "He is not. He's nothing like that old drunk king.", 'Wait!', "It's not fair!", "She didn't forget. She's with her dancing master.", "What is it? What's happening?", 'Stay away from me.', "He wouldn't do that. He knows how much I love Joffrey.", "No, I'm not.", 'Robb.', 'If...if I could see my father, talk to him about...', 'I only meant that...what will happen to him?', 'On...on what?', 'Ser Aron.', 'Lord Gyles.', 'Your Grace.', 'I do.', 'As it please Your Grace, I ask mercy for my father, Lord Eddard Stark, who was Hand of the King.', 'Thank you, Your Grace.', 'No, My Lords. I know he must be punished.', 'He was badly hurt.', 'If you still have any affection in your heart for me, please do me this kindness, Your Grace.', 'He will.', 'No, stop! Please, someone stop him!', 'Stop him, stop!', 'Thank you, my lord.', 'No! Please, no!', 'You promised to be merciful.', "Please let me go home. l won't do any treason, l swear –", 'How long do l have to look?', 'lf it please Your Grace.', "Or maybe he'll give me yours.", 'It was well struck, Your Grace.', 'Yes, Your Grace.', "You can't!", 'I only meant… it would be bad luck to kill a man on your name day.', "He is. A fool - you're so clever to see it. He'll make a much better fool than a knight. He doesn't deserve the mercy of a quick death.", 'My father was a traitor. My mother and brother are traitors, too. I am loyal to my beloved Joffrey.', "Pardon, Your Grace. I'm sure your dress will be beautiful, Myrcella. I'm counting the days until the fighting is done and I can pledge my love to the King in sight of the gods.", 'Come in.', 'Who are you?', "I didn't know I needed a new handmaiden. You're not from here.", 'What are you doing?', "I shouldn't have to tell you to do things. You should just do them.", 'Change my linens, wash my clothing, scrub the floor, empty my chamber pot, brush my hair.', 'No.', 'Not now.', 'Clean the table.', 'Have you ever been a handmaiden before?', 'For whom?', 'Lady Zuriff', 'There is no Lady Zuriff in this city.', "I don't know how they did things in that city, but in this city, handmaidens wait on ladies, not the other way around. And I don't have time to answer a thousand questions and teach you how to do your job.", 'Just brush my hair.', 'Your Grace, whatever my traitor brother has done, I had no part. You know that. I beg you, please', 'I am loyal to King Joffrey, my one true love.', 'I saw you cry.', 'My little brother cried when I left Winterfell.', 'It seems a normal thing.', 'No.', 'Please! No! No!', 'Ow!', 'I thought they were going to kill me.', 'He hated me, the man who hit me. I saw it in his eyes. Hated me. He never met me before, but he wanted to hurt me.', 'Why? Why would a stranger-', 'I would have given them bread if I had it. I hate the king more than any of them.', "But you're not the wrong people.", 'I beg pardon, ser. I should have come to you after to thank you for saving me. You were so brave.', 'Does it give you joy to scare people?', 'It was his duty. He never liked it.', 'Why are you always so hateful?', 'No, no!', 'No. Oh, no.', "If the Queen sees, I can have Joffrey's children now.", 'My mother told me, but I thought it would be different.', 'I thought it would be less messy.', "I'm fit to bear children for the king?", 'His Grace was not with you?', 'I love His Grace with all my heart.', "But shouldn't I love Joffrey, Your Grace?", 'She has, my lord, but King Joffrey sent for me to see him off.', 'I will pray for your safe return, my lord.', "Just as I pray for the king's.", 'Will you slay him yourself?', "So you'll be outside the gates fighting in the vanguard?", "I'm sorry, Your Grace. You're right, I'm stupid. Of course you'll be in the vanguard. They say my brother Robb always goes where the fighting is thickest. And he is only a pretender.", 'Joffrey will. The worst ones always live.', "I don't know why she wants me here. She's always saying how stupid I am. She hates me.", 'I doubt it.', 'Why would she be jealous?', 'Yes.', "What's he doing here?", 'But we have guards to defend us.', 'You said he was here to protect us.', 'My queen.', 'Praying.', 'For the gods to have mercy on us all.', 'Yes, Your Grace.', 'Of course, Your Grace.', 'Joffrey is my-', "Your father doesn't believe in the gods?", 'They are your guests under your protection. You asked them here.', 'And if the city should fall?', "You were Robert's queen.", "Don't be afraid. The queen has raised the drawbridge. This is the safest place we can be. Joffrey's not hurt. He's fighting bravely. His knights have rallied behind him. They will save the city. Shall we sing a hymn? Gentle mother, fount of mercy...", 'Come with me.', "The queen said they'd rape everyone.", 'What are you doing here?', 'Where?', 'What about the king?', "I'll be safe here. Stannis won't hurt me.", "You won't hurt me.", "They're right. I'm not good enough for him.", "But, if he's not marrying me-", "King's Landing is my home now.", "Dorne. It's going to Dorne.", "It's carrying silk and it's supposed to bring back wine in exchange. But it's not coming back. The captain's tired of risking his life so King's Landing lords and ladies can get drunk on better wine than they deserve. He's going to stay in Dorne. Wait out the winter where it's beautiful and warm.", "Don't ruin the game.", 'What about that one there?', 'Why?', "That's not how the game works. You're not supposed to just blurt out the right answer. You've got to invent a story about where the ship is going and why.", 'Because the truth is always either terrible or boring.', 'Lord Baelish.', "Arya's alive? You said you'd take me home.", "I won't tell anyone.", "Because I'm a terrible liar. You said so yourself. Please, Lord Baelish. Tell me what to do. Tell me when.", "He didn't. He didn't want anything. He just takes an interest because he loved my mother.", "Littlefinger's not in love with me.", "He's too old.", 'No.', 'Why? What will you do? I will make him stop.', 'Send him in.', 'Ser Loras.', "You are too kind, Ser Loras. You probably don't remember the first time we met. At the Hando s tourney, you gave me your favor. A rose, a red rose.", 'Thank you, Ser Loras.', "And I was sorry when I heard of Lord Renly's death, Lady Margaery. He was very gallant.", "Lemon cake's my favorite.", "I haven't had the pleasure.", 'I-, I-', 'Joff-King Joffrey, he-His Grace is very fair and handsome and as brave as a lion', 'My father always told the truth.', "Joffrey. Joffrey did that. He promised he would be merciful and he cut my father's head off. And he said that was mercy. Then he took me up on the walls and made me look at it.", "I-I can't. I never meant-my father was a traitor. My brother as well. I have traitor's blood. Please don't make me say anymore.", "He's a monster.", "Please, don't stop the wedding.", "He's such a splendid fighter. Do you have any idea when we might", "Joffrey won't let me leave. He's got too many reasons to keep me here.", 'What is?', 'Is it?', 'Many ladies wear it this way.', 'You still want me to come with you?', "Of course. More than anything. But maybe it would be better to wait. I've been thinking how dangerous it would be. Not just for me, but for you. You've been so kind. I'd feel terrible if anything happened to you. I can't tell you how touched I am by your concern for my welfare.", 'I do, Lord Baelish.', 'Petyr.', "That's a wonderful pin.", "I'm very happy about", "I feel like I'm in a dream.", "No. I had never left Winterfell before I came to King's Landing. But it sounds wonderful. I can't wait to see it. And to leave this place.", 'Do you think people will like it?', "You're right. It's not my wedding. Anyway, from what I can tell, the dressmakers in Highgarden will be far superior to the ones in King's Landing. They'd never make me anything as dull as this for my wedding. Loras likes green and gold brocade.", 'Will they let me invite my family?', 'But do you think they will?', "Good afternoon, Lord Tyrion. I was just trying on a gown for King Joffrey's wedding.", 'Of course.', "Shae. Please excuse her, Lord Tyrion. She's not from here. But I trust her, even though she tells me not to.", "It's all right, really.", "Growing up at Winterfell, all I ever wanted was to escape, to come here to the capital. See the southern knights and their painted armor and King's Landing after dark- all the candles burning in all those windows. I'm stupid. A stupid little girl with stupid dreams who never learns.", 'How do I make the best of my circumstances? I have to marry him.', 'No.', "He's tried.", "He's a Lannister.", "I'm sorry. Here I am complaining to you.", "My son with him. I'll have to- we'll have to-", "I'm not afraid of the pain. Not after what Joffrey's done to me.", "He's a dwarf. And Loras- Loras.", "And that's a good thing?", 'How do you know all this? Did your mother teach you?', 'You look very handsome, my lord.', 'I hope I will not disappoint you, my lord.', 'I doubt that very much, my lord.', 'When I have to.', 'What are you doing?', 'Will you pardon me, my lord?', 'Thank you, Your Grace.', 'Yes, Your Grace.', 'Is that wise, my lord?', 'Is that wise, Tyrion?', 'What?', 'Fourteen.', 'But your father-', 'What if I never want you to?', 'What are you doing?', 'A list of people you mean to kill?', 'You should learn to ignore them.', "You're a Lannister. I am the disgraced daughter of the traitor Ned Stark.", 'So how should we punish them?', 'Ser Eldrick Sarsfield and Lord Desmond Crakehall.', "I hear that you're a pervert.", "We could sheep shift Lord Desmondo s bed. You cut a little hole in his mattress and you stuff sheep dung inside. Then you sew up the hole and make his bed again. His room will stink, but he won't know where it's coming from.", 'My sister used to do that when she was angry with me. And she was always angry with me.', "That's the vulgar word for dung.", 'Well, you asked me.', 'No, thank you.', "I don't need to eat.", 'How can you help me?', 'I lie awake all night staring at the canopy thinking about how they died.', "Do you know what they did to my brother? How they sewed his direwolf's head onto his body? And my mother. They say they cut her throat to the bone and threw her body in the river.", "Will you pardon me, my lord? I'd like to visit the godswood.", "I don't pray anymore. It's the only place I can go where people don't talk to me.", "You're drunk.", "Ser Dontos. The king's nameday celebration. I'm sorry. I should have remembered.", 'Anyone would have done the same.', "I can't take it. It's very, very kind of you, but I can't.", "I'll wear it with pride, Ser Dontos.", 'We have a new queen.', 'Can we leave now?', 'Where are we going?', 'Lord Baelish?', "I didn't murder anyone.", 'Why did you kill him?', 'He saved me.', 'He was helping me because I saved his life.', "We're all liars here.", 'Where are you taking me?', 'Did you kill Joffrey?', 'I know it was you.', "Well, there was Ser Dontos. You used him to get me out of King's Landing, but you would never trust him to kill the king.", "Because you're too smart to trust a drunk.", 'No.', 'I just do.', "The poison. I don't understand. The Lannisters gave you wealth, power. Joffrey made you the Lord of Harrenhal.", "I don't believe you. If they catch you, they'll put your head on a spike just like my father's. You'd risk that just to confuse them?", 'And what do you want?', 'Who could trust you?', 'But how would they know?', 'Is this the only way into the Eyrie?', "It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance, Lady Arryn. My name is Al...", "It's wonderful to meet you, Aunt Lysa.", 'Of course. I understand.', 'I would never say a thing.', "They did, and my father's.", 'Make him fly?', "They did. They made us both. Lord Tyrion didn't want to.", 'No. We never...', "It's a pleasure to meet you, Robin.", 'Thank you.', 'Really?', "My mother, fat? She never let me have my pudding until I'd finished all my proper food.", "They're delicious. Where did you get the lemons? You can't grow them up here.", "Yes. I'm very lucky.", "Oh, I know he does. I'm so grateful.", "Well, I'm half Tully. He loved your family so much.", 'No.', "He loves you, Aunt Lysa. He's married to you.", 'No, never.', 'What? No, I told you. Lord Tyrion and I never-', 'Aunt Lysa, no, I-', "Nothing. I'm a virgin.", "You're hurting me.", "I'm a virgin, I swear it. He loves you, Aunt Lysa. All he says is that I'm stupid. I'm a stupid little girl with stupid dreams who never learns and I'm a terrible liar, so I should always tell the truth. And I swear to you that he has never touched me. Not once, not ever.", 'Hello, Robin.', "I'm building my home, Winterfell. At least I think I am. I haven't been back there in a very long time.", "It's a long story.", 'Yes, you certainly are.', "Probably never. My family doesn't live there anymore and someone burned it down.", "No, I'm afraid not. It's not high up in the mountains. It's down on the ground.", "We don't.", "I never did anything with them at all. Girls didn't take part in that where I came from.", 'I like the sound of that.', 'All right.', "Careful. You've ruined it. Now I'm going to have to rebuild the whole thing.", 'You did.', "Knocking things down isn't fixing them. It's ruining them.", "You're being stupid.", "Robin, I'm sorry, I-", 'I hit him.', "I shouldn't have done that.", 'If he tells Aunt Lysa...', "I was trying to remember what everything looked like. I'll never see it again.", 'Why did you really kill Joffrey? Tell me why.', 'Lord Baelish...', 'You wanted to see me, Aunt Lysa?', 'No.', "I'm so sorry, Aunt Lysa. I never should have hit Robin, I know it. I promise it won't happen-", "I didn't. You don't understand.", 'He kissed me. I pulled away.', 'Please!', 'He can stay.', "to Petyr* I'm sorry, Lord Baelish. I have to tell the truth. *to the council* I'll tell you everything.", "My name is not Alayne. It's Sansa Stark, eldest daughter of Lord Eddard Stark. Lord Royce, we met when you came to Winterfell. You were escorting your son Ser Waymar to the Wall.", "Lord Baelish has told many lies. All to protect me. Since my father was executed, I have been a hostage in King's Landing. A plaything for Joffrey to torture or Queen Cersei to torment. They beat me, they humiliated me, they married me to the Imp. I had no friends in King's Landing...except one. He saved me. Smuggled me away when he had the chance. He knew I'd be safe here in the Eyrie with my own blood, my Aunt Lysa. The Lannisters have friends everywhere. Even the Vale. He made me swear not to tell anyone my true name.", "You knew her well, my lords, my lady. You knew she was a troubled woman. She always loved Lord Baelish. She told me herself. From the moment he arrived at the gates of Riverrun, a boy of eight carrying everything he owned in a little sack. She confessed to me she never loved Lord Arryn. She did as her father commanded, as so many of us have. When the gods finally allowed her to be with Lord Baelish, she was so happy. For a time. My aunt was a jealous lady. She was terrified that Lord Baelish didn't love her anymore. That he would abandon her for a younger woman. And then...one day she saw him kiss me.", "It was a peck on the cheek, Lord Royce, nothing more. Lord Baelish is my uncle now, in truth, by marriage. He's always been so kind to me. I was so happy to be here, to be free. All because of him. But my aunt turned on me. She cursed me. Called me a whore. Promised to throw me through the Moon Door. When Lord Baelish tried to calm her, she struck him. She said she didn't want to live anymore. She stood on the edge of that Moon Door. He tried to reason with her. Promised her she was the only one he had ever loved, but she stepped through those doors and she was...*begins sobbing*", 'Yes?', 'They would have thrown you through the Moon Door if they found you guilty.', "If they'd have executed you, what would they have done with me?", 'Neither do I.', 'I know what you want.', 'Shall we go?', "Goodbye Lord Royce, and thank you for all you've done for me.", 'You told Lord Royce we were going to the Fingers.', "But we're heading west.", 'If he wanted to betray us, he already would have.', 'No. Do you trust the carriage driver or the knights escorting us?', 'So where are we going? To a land where you trust everyone?', 'Before we left, a maester gave you a raven scroll.', 'My mother used to say, "dark wings, dark words".', 'So it was good news.?', 'I thought you still mourn the death of my beloved Aunt Lysa.', "I'll have some.", "I don't see what all the fuss is about. Why do men love it so much?", 'Does it give you courage?', 'No.', "I saw you at Joffrey's wedding bowing to the king.", 'And sometimes we do. You should leave.', "That's Moat Cailin.", "On our way down to King's Landing, with my father and Arya and… where are you taking me?", "The Boltons have Winterfell. . The marriage proposal, it wasn't for you?", 'Roose Bolton murdered my brother. He betrayed my family!', 'He serves the Lannisters.', "I won't go.", 'Not anymore.', "I can't marry him. You can't make me. He's a traitor. A murderer.", 'No!', "No, you can't make me. I will starve myself. I will die before I have to go there.", 'Lord Bolton.', 'Thank you.', "Father never talked about her. Sometimes I'd find him down here, lighting the candles. They say she was beautiful.", 'Yes, he chose her… and then he kidnapped her and raped her.', 'Dressed for riding?', 'Where are you going?', "King's Landing?", "You can't leave me here!", 'How do you know?', "You don't know that.", "You think he'll defeat the Boltons?", "And if you're right?", "But I, I wouldn't… Wardeness of the North", "What if you're wrong? What if Stannis never attacks Winterfell, or he does and the Boltons defeat him?", "I don't know how to do that.", 'His father frightens me.', "I expect I'll be a married woman by the time you return.", "Oh, I don't need-", 'But who -', 'I made it myself.', 'Who, who are you?', 'My mother. .', 'Thank you.', "I'd rather have a mother.", 'What is it?', 'Theon?', 'Yes, thank you, my lord.', "This isn't a strange place. This is my home. It's the people who are strange.", 'Why are you doing this?', "I'm very happy for you.", 'What do you want?', 'What others?', 'Hunt?', 'What was your name again?', "And how long have you loved him, Myranda. Did you imagine that he would be with you forever, is that it? Then I came along and ruined it. I am Sansa Stark of Winterfell. This is my home and you can't frighten me.", 'Go. I can finish on my own.', 'Yes?', 'No.', "I'm not touching you.", 'Do you think I care what he does to you.', 'I take this man.', 'Yes.', 'Lord Tyrion was kind, he was gentle, he never touched me.', 'No, my lord.', 'Yes sir.', 'Theon, wait.', 'Help me.', 'Theon', "He already hurts me every night. All day I'm locked in this room and every night he comes. It can't be worse.", 'What did he do to you?', 'You betrayed my family!', 'You have to help me!', "My family still has friends in the North. All I have to do is give a signal and they'll rescue me. Climb to the top of the Broken Tower, light this candle, and put it in the window. Promise me, Theon.", 'Your name is Theon Greyjoy. Last surviving son of Balon Greyjoy, Lord of the Iron Islands, do you hear me? Theon. Promise me.', "But isn't your step mother pregnant?", 'What happens if she has a boy?', "But he'll be the heir.", "But you're a bastard, a true born will always have the stronger claim.", 'Tommen Baratheon. Another bastard.', 'Why. Why Theon.', 'Reek. Why did you tell him, Reek?', "Good. If it weren't for you I'd still have a family. If I could do to you what Ramsay did to you right here, right now, I would.", 'Only what?', 'Tell me!', "Tell me, they weren't what?!", "Tell me why Bran and Rickon should be dead while you still breathe the air. Tell me to my face Theon, tell me that they weren't your brothers!", "You didn't…?", 'Do you know where they went, Bran and Rickon?', 'Theon, you have to tell me, do you have any idea where Bran and Rickon--', "I know what Ramsay is. I know what he'll do to me. If I'm going to die, let it happen while there's some of me left.", "I can't", "But it's too cold I can't I won't make it I'll die", "No, I won't make it without you", 'And I vow...that you shall always have a place by my hearth and…', 'Meat and mead at my table And I pledge to ask no service of you that might bring you dishonor I swear it by the old gods and the new Arise', "You don't know which way she went?", 'How did she look', "No, she wouldn't be", 'I shouldo ve gone with you while I had the chance', "We just have to make it to Castle Black Once we're with Jon, Ramsay won't be able to touch us", "I won't let him I'll tell him the truth about Bran and Rickon", 'When you take the black, all your crimes are forgiven', "You're not coming with us?", 'Where will you go?', 'This is good soup Do you remember those kidney pies Old Nan used to make?', 'Mmm', "Don't you wish we could go back to the day we left? I want to scream at myself, “Don't go, you idiot”", 'I spent a lot of time thinking about what as ass I was to you I wish I could change everything', 'I was awful, just admit it', 'Can you forgive me?', 'Forgive me', 'Where will you go?', 'Where will we go?', "There's only one place we can go Home", "We'll take it back from them", 'How many wildlings did you save?', 'They owe you their lives', "You think they'll be safe here if Roose Bolton remains Warden of the North?", "Winterfell is our home It's ours and Arya's and Bran's and Rickon's Wherever they are, it belongs to our family We have to fight for it", "If we don't take back the North, we'll never be safe I want you to help me But I'll do it myself if I have to", 'JON SNOW, BRIENNE, TORMUND, and DOLOROUS EDD are eating at a table. SANSA looks at the meat on her fork. JON SNOW, DOLOROUS EDD, and TORMUND eat vigorously. BRIENNE looks around at the men eating. TORMUND stares intently at BRIENNE. BRIENNE looks away. TORMUND smiles. DOLOROUS EDD notices their interaction.', "That's all right. There are more important things.", 'Go on.', 'You will watch as my soldiers take turns raping your sister. You will watch as my dogs your wild little brother. Then I will spoon your eyes from their sockets and let my dogs do the rest. Come and see. Ramsay Bolton, Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North.', "His father's dead. Ramsay killed him. And now he has Rickon.", 'Yes, we do.', "I heard him say 5,000 once when he was talking about Stannis's attack.", "You're the son of the last true Warden of the North. Northern families are loyal. They'll fight for you if you ask.", 'A monster has taken our home and our brother. We have to go back to Winterfell and save them both.', 'Yes?', "How far is Mole's Town?", 'Unharmed? What are you doing here?', "To come to my aid? Did you know about Ramsay? If you didn't know, you're an idiot. If you did know, you're my enemy.", "Would you like to hear about our wedding night? He never hurt my face. He needed my face, the face of Ned Stark's daughter. But the rest of me, he did what he liked with the rest of me as long as I could still give him an heir. What do you think he did?", 'What do you think he did to me?', 'Yes, he enjoyed that. What else do you think he did?', 'What else?', 'Maybe you did know about Ramsay all along.', "I thought you knew everyone's secrets.", "The other things he did, ladies aren't supposed to talk about those things, but I imagine brothel keepers talk about them all the time. I can still feel it. I don't mean in my tender heart it still pains me so. I can still feel what he did in my body standing here right now.", 'You said you would protect me.', "I don't believe you anymore. I don't need you anymore. You can't protect me. You won't even be able to protect yourself if I tell Brienne to cut you down. And why shouldn't I?", 'What if I want you to die here and now?', 'You freed me from the monsters who murdered my family and you gave me to other monsters who murdered my family. Go back to Moat Cailin. My brother and I will take back the North on our own. I never want to see you again.', 'I have an army.', 'The Umbers gave Rickon to our enemies. They can hang. But the Karstarks declared for Ramsay without knowing they had another choice.', 'How well do you know the North, Ser Davos?', 'My father always said Northerners are different. More loyal, more suspicious of outsiders.', "The North remembers. They remember the Stark name. People will still risk everything for it, from White Harbor to Ramsay's own door.", 'No, but I do.', "Jon is every bit as much Ned Stark's son as Ramsay is Roose Bolton's. Ant there are also the Tullys. They're not Northern, but they will back us against the Boltons without question.", 'My uncle the Blackfish has reformed it and retaken Riverrun.', 'Ramsay received a raven before I escaped Winterfell.', 'You heard them. We need more men and my uncle has an army.', "Can't risk Ramsay intercepting it. It has to be you.", "Ride for Riverrun. My uncle will talk to you and you'll know how to talk to him.", 'What is it?', 'With Jon?', "Jon isn't Tormund. Jon isn't Davos, the Red Woman, or Stannis for that matter. Jon is Jon. He's my brother. He'll keep me safe. I trust him.", 'I made it myself. Do you like it?', 'Good, because I made this for you.', 'I made it like the one Father used to wear. As near as I can remember.', "You're welcome.", "I remember when you were born, my lady. You were named for my Aunt Lyanna. It was said she was a great beauty. I'm sure you will be, too.", 'I did what I had to do to survive, my lady. But I am a Stark. I will always be a Stark.', 'I would remind you that House Glover is pledged to House Stark. Sworn to answer when called upon.', "And that's a good thing?", '62 Mormonts.', "So he's your most trusted advisor now? Because he secured 62 men from a ten year old?", "Stannis who lost the Blackwater, who murdered his own brother, who doesn't have a head?", "It's not enough. We need more men.", 'If we went down to Castle Cerwyn, I know that Lord- -', 'Yes, I do.', 'How do we know you have him?', "You're going to die tomorrow, Lord Bolton. Sleep well.", "So you've met the enemy, drawn up your battle plans.", "You've known him for the space of a single conversation, you and your trusted advisors, and you sit around and make your plans on how to defeat a man you don't know. I lived with him. I know the way his mind works. I know how he likes to hurt people. Did it ever once occur to you that I might have some insight?", "You think he's going to fall into your trap. He won't He's the one who lays traps.", "He plays with people. He's far better at it than you. He's been doing it all his life.", "You don't know him.", "We'll never get him back. Rickon is Ned Starks trueborn son, which makes him a greater threat to Ramsay than you, a bastard, or me, a girl. As long as he lives, Ramsay's claim to Winterfell will be contested, which means he won't live long.", 'Listen to me, please. He wants you to make a mistake.', "I don't know! I don't know anything about battles! Just don't do what he wants you to do.", "You think that's obvious?", 'If you had asked for my advice earlier, I would have told you not to attack Winterfell until we have a larger force, or is that obvious, too?', "It's not enough!", "If Ramsay wins, I'm not going back there alive. Do you understand me?", 'No one can protect me. No one can protect anyone.', 'Jon.', 'Where is he?', 'Your words will disappear. Your house will disappear. Your name will disappear. All memory of you will disappear.', "You haven't fed them in seven days. You said it yourself.", "They were. Now they're starving.", "Mother and Father's room? You should take it.", 'You are to me.', 'He did.', "Only a fool would trust Littlefinger. I should have told you about him, about the Knights of the Vale. I'm sorry.", 'Jon.', 'A raven came from the Citadel. A white raven. Winter is here.', "I'm done with all that. I came here every day when I was a girl. I prayed to be somewhere else. Back then I only ever thought about what I wanted, never about what I had.", 'I was a stupid girl.', 'What do you want?', 'I was wrong.', "It's a pretty picture.", "You've declared for other houses before, Lord Baelish. It's never stopped you from serving yourself.", 'The castles committed no crimes. And we need every fortress we have for the war to come. We should give the Last Hearth and Karhold to new families, loyal families who supported us against Ramsay.', 'And then they broke faith.', "So there's no punishment for treason and no reward for loyalty?", 'They died fighting for Ramsay. Give the castles to the families of the men who died fighting for you.', 'Will you start wearing a crown?', "So I can't question your decisions anymore?", 'Joffrey never let anyone question his authority. You think he was a good king?', "You're as far from Joffrey as anyone I've ever met.", "You're good at this, you know.", 'At ruling.', 'You are. You are. They respect you, they really do, but you have to--', 'Why are you laughing?', 'He never said that to me.', "Because he was trying to protect us. He never wanted us to see how dirty the world really is, but Father couldn't protect me and neither can you. Stop trying.", "I'm not trying to undermine you.", 'You have to be smarter than Father. You need to be smarter than Robb. I loved them, I miss them, but they made stupid mistakes, and they both lost their heads for it.', 'Would that be so terrible?', 'What does she want?', "You've been so consumed with the enemy to the north, you've forgotten about the one to the south.", 'We still have a wall between us and the Night King. Theres nothing between us and Cersei.', "You're the military man, but I know her. If you're her enemy, she'll never stop until she's destroyed you. Everyone who's ever crossed her, she's found a way to murder.", 'I learned a great deal from her.', 'What do you want, Lord Baelish?', "I am safe. I'm at home, surrounded by friends. I have Brienne to protect me from anyone who would harm me.", 'At the moment, peace and quiet.', "No need to seize the last word, Lord Baelish. I'll assume it was something clever.", 'We need his men. Without the Vale, Ramsay Bolton would still hold this castle. Littlefinger saved us.', 'I know exactly what he wants.', "Do you think it's really Tyrion? It could be someone trying to lure you into a trap.", 'All dwarfs are bastards in their father\'s eyes." What does that mean?', 'Tyrion is not like the other Lannisters. He was always kind to me, but it\'s too great a risk. "The Seven Kingdoms will bleed as long as Cersei sits on the Iron Throne. Join us. Together we can end her tyranny."', "You're not suggesting Jon meet with her?", "Have you forgotten what happened to our grandfather? The Mad King invited him to King's Landing and roasted him alive.", "She is here to reclaim the Iron Throne and the Seven Kingdoms. The north is one of those seven kingdoms. This isn't an invitation, it's a trap.", "Then send an emissary. Don't go yourself.", "You're abandoning your people. Your abandoning your home.", 'Whose?', 'How much do we have?', 'What does that mean?', "What's the longest winter in the past 100 years?", "You're telling me we don't have enough food, especially not if the armies of the north come back to defend Winterfell.", "We must prepare for that eventuality. Every direction the threat comes from, this is the best place to be. We need to start building up our grain stores with regular shipments from every keep in the north. If we don't use it by winter's end we'll give it back to them, but if the entire north has to flee to Winterfell there won't be enough time to bring wagonloads of grain with them.", "Maester Wolkan, you'll see to it?", 'Are they covering those breastplates in leather?', "Well, shouldn't they be once the real cold comes?", 'So they should be.', "You don't know Cersei better than anyone here.", 'That the woman who murdered my mother, father and brother is dangerous? Thank you for your wise council.', 'I wish Jon was here.', "Your father's last living true born son. You're Lord of Winterfell.", "I don't know what that means.", 'Try, please, for me.', 'How do you know all of this?', 'I thought you were the three-eyed raven.', 'Bran --', 'I have to go back inside, Bran.', 'sighs.', "You don't have to. I know where she is.", 'hesitates for a moment.', 'Yes.', 'begins smiling then walking towards ARYA. SANSA reaches out and hugs ARYA.', "You shouldn't have run from the guards.", 'smirks at ARYA.', 'He did. I hope he comes back soon. I remember how happy he was to see me. When he sees you, his heart will probably stop.', 'Everyone who knew his face is dead.', 'I wish I had.', 'Your list?', 'begins to laugh. ARYA joins her.', 'How did you get back to Winterfell?', "Yes. It's not a very pleasant one.", "No, they're not.", "Arya, Bran's home too.", 'Bran has visions.', 'Why would you go back there?', 'Who else is on your list?', "He's declared for House Stark.", 'steps up closer to BRAN and speaks to him.', 'Why would he give you a dagger?', 'Why?', 'The cutthroat after your fall?', "He's not a generous man. He wouldn't give you anything unless he thought he was getting something back.", "What do you mean it doesn't matter?", 'and BAELISH are walking along the upper section of the courtyard having a conversation.', "If they haven't contributed the right amount of grain to the stores then I'm afraid they'll have to make due with --", 'sees ARYA in the courtyard speaking with BRIENNE and stops to watch her.', "You're very kind, my lords, but Jon is our king. He is doing what he thinks is best.", "and ARYA are walking through the hall to SANSA's quarters having a discussion.", "I warned Jon this would happen. He can't leave the north and expect it to just sit and wait for him like Ghost.", "Well, he's not making it easy. The northern lords are proud.", 'And?', "Don't do that.", 'turns around to face ARYA.', 'Say what you mean.', 'drops the papers in her hand on a table and looks at ARYA.', 'Are you angry with me?', 'I listened to their complaints, which is my responsibility as Lady of Winterfell.', 'Glover has 500 men. Royce has 2,000. Offend them and Jon loses his army.', "Winterfell didn't just fall into our hands. We took it back, and the Mormonts and the Hornwoods and the Wildlings and the Vale, all of us working together. Now, I'm sure cutting off heads is very satisfying, but that's not the way you get people to work together.", 'How can you even think such a horrible thing?', 'and ARYA stare at each in silence for a moment.', 'I have work to do.', 'turns and walks away from ARYA.', 'I remember.', 'turns to look at ARYA.', 'What?', "You don't have to read it. I remember.", 'They forced me to do it.', "You don't know what it was like. I was a child.", 'They told me it was the only way to save father.', 'You were there?', 'And what did you do? Did you come running to the rescue? Did you fight off the Lannisters and save father?', "But you didn't. Just like me.", "You should be on your knees thanking me. We're standing in Winterfell again because of me. You didn't win it back. Jon didn't win it back. He lost the Battle of the Bastards. The Knight's of the Vale won the battle and they rode north for me while you were off where, traveling the world?", 'Training. Well, while you were training I suffered things you can never imagine.', 'You never would have survived what I survived.', 'What are you doing to do with that letter.', 'Who did you show it to? Where did you find it?', 'Arya --', "Do you know how happy Cersei would be if she saw us fighting? This is exactly what she wants. This is what she's always wanted, to tear us apart --", "You're angry. Sometimes anger makes people do unfortunate things.", "No, this is the way he is, the way he's always been. He never asked for my opinion. Why would he start now?", "This is his writing, his signature. He pledged to fight for Daenerys Targaryen. He's bent the knee.", 'What does that have to do with anything?', 'You think he wants to marry her?', "Even if I wanted to, Arya would never go along. She always loved Jon far more than she ever loved me, and she'd kill anyone who betrayed her family.", 'Do you know what she is now? Do you know what the Faceless Men are?', "They're killers. And Arya was one of them. What do you think she's after?", 'She could want me dead because she thinks I wronged my family.', 'To kill me for marrying our enemies and betraying my family.', 'To provide proof of my betrayals. To provide justification after she murders me.', 'Lady', 'Have my sister', "It's not what I want. It's what honor demands.", 'That I defend my family from those who would harm us. That I defend the North from those who would betray us.', 'You stand accused of murder. You stand accused of treason. How do you answer these charges Lord Baelish?', "Which charges confuse you? Let's start with the simplest one you murdered our aunt, Lysa Arryn. You pushed her through the Moon Door and watched her fall. Do you deny it?", 'You did it to take power in the Vale. Earlier, you conspired to murder Jon.', 'You had Aunt Lysa send a letter to our parents telling them it was the Lannisters who murdered Jon.', 'You conspired with Cersei Lannister and Joffrey Baratheon to betray our father.', 'Protected me? By selling me to the Boltons?', "Sometimes when I'm trying to understand a person's motives, I play a little game. I assume the worst. What's the worst reason you have for turning me against my sisterThat's what you do, isn't it? That's what you've always done turn family against family, turn sister against sister. That's what you did to our mother.", "I'm a slow learner, it's true. But I learn.", 'And yet, you betrayed her.', 'And yet, you betrayed me.', "When you brought me back to Winterfell, you told me there's no justice in the world, not unless we make it. Thank you for all your many lessons, Lord Baelish. I will never forget them.", "It's just strange. In his own horrible way, I believe he loved me.", 'You did it.', 'Does that bother you?', "You would have. You're the strongest person I know.", "Well, don't get used to it. You're still very strange and annoying.", 'Father', 'Me, too.', 'Lurking somewhere.', 'Winterfell is yours, Your Grace.', 'As soon as we heard about the Wall, I called all our banners to retreat to Winterfell. Lord Umber when can we expect your people to arrive?', "You'll have as many as we can spare. Hurry back to Last Hearth and bring your people here.", "May I ask, how are we meant to feed the greatest army the world has ever seen? While I ensured our stores would last through winter, I didn't account for Dothraki, Unsullied and two full-grown dragons. What do dragons eat, anyway?", 'So does Hand of the Queen. Depending on the queen, I suppose.', 'It had its moments.', 'Apologies for leaving like that.', 'We both survived.', 'Cersei told you her army was coming north to fight for you?', 'And you believed her?', 'I used to think you were the cleverest man alive.', 'Come in.', "Lord Glover wishes us good fortune, but he's staying in Deepwood Motte with his men.", 'I will stand behind Jon Snow," he said.', 'The King in the North.', "You didn't tell me you were going to abandon your crown.", 'And a Targaryen queen.', 'You know I do.', "No, she's much prettier.", 'Did you bend the knee to save the North or because you love her?', "You're right. We can't trust him. He attacked my father in the streets. He tried to destroy my house and my family, the same as he did yours.", 'You vouch for him?', 'You would fight beside him?', 'I trust you with my life. If you trust him with yours, we should let him stay.', 'Keep them open for as long as you can. There are still people coming in from the countryside.', 'Brienne has been loyal to me, always. I trust her more than anyone.', 'Tyrion is a good man. He was never anything but decent towards me.', 'You never should have either.', 'Families are complicated.', 'A sad thing to have in common.', 'He loves you, you know that.', "Men do stupid things for women. They're easily manipulated.", 'I should have thanked you the moment you arrived. That was a mistake.', 'Who was the first?', 'And what happens afterwards? We defeat the dead, we destroy Cersei. What happens then?', "What about the North? It was taken from us, and we took it back. And we said we'd never bow to anyone else again. What about the North?", 'You want us to use you as bait?', "I'm not abandoning my people.", "I don't know how to use it.", "You'd die. There's nothing you can do.", "Witty remarks won't make a difference. That's why we're down here, none of us can do anything. It's the truth. It's the most heroic thing we can do now look the truth in the face.", 'You were the best of them.', "It wouldn't work between us.", 'The Dragon Queen. Your divided loyalties would become a problem.', "Where's Jon?", 'So is Lord Tyrion. They were both to be brought to this gathering.', "If you look outside the walls of your city, you'll find thousands of Northmen who will explain to you why harming Jon Snow is not in your interest.", 'You swore to follow a tyrant.', 'Uncle? Please sit.', "Bran has no interest in ruling and he can't father children.", "I love you, little brother. I always will. You'll be a good king. But tens of thousands of Northmen fell in the Great War defending all of Westeros. And those who survived have seen too much and fought too hard ever to kneel again. The North will remain an independent kingdom, as it was for thousands of years.", 'I wish there had been another way. Can you forgive me?', 'But they lost their king.', 'Where are you going?']

Name: arya stark
Sentence: ['Move!', "Where's the Imp?", 'Arya.', "That's Jaime Lannister. The queen's twin brother.", 'Thank you, Nymeria. Septa Mordane says I have to do it again. "My things weren\'t properly folded", she says. Who cares how they\'re folded?! They\'re going to get all messed up anyway.', 'Watch. Nymeria, gloves.', 'Shut up. Nymeria, gloves!', 'A present?', "It's so skinny.", 'I can be quick.', 'I think so.', 'I know which end to use.', "Sansa can keep her sewing needles. I've got a needle of my own.", 'What are you doing here? Go away.', "He's my friend.", 'Stop it!', 'Nymeria!', "You've got to go. They'll kill you for what you did to Joffrey. Go on... run. Go! Leave now!", 'Go!', "I'm sorry.", 'No.', "That's not true! She just... Bit him a little. He was hurting Mycah.", "That's not what happened!", 'Liar!', 'Liar! Liar liar liar!', 'Liar liar liar!', "Lady wasn't there! You leave her alone!", "I'm practicing.", 'The Prince.', "He's a liar and a coward and he killed my friend.", 'The Hound does whatever the Prince tells him to do.', "You're a liar. And if you told the truth, Mycah would be alive.", 'Go away!', 'Mine.', "I wasn't playing. And I don't want to be a lady.", "It's called Needle.", "Stick 'em with the pointy end.", 'I was trying to learn. I asked Mycah to practice with me. I asked him. It was my fault.', 'I hate them! I hate all of them. The Hound, the Queen and the King and Joffrey and Sansa.', 'So was I! He is a liar.', 'But how you can let her marry someone like that?', 'Winter is coming.', "I don't hate her. Not really.", 'I can keep it?', 'Who are you?', "It's too heavy.", 'What if I drop it?', "I'm a girl.", 'A needle.', 'Syrio says a water dancer can stand on one toe for hours.', "Syrio says every hurt is a lesson and every lesson makes you better. Tomorrow I'm going to be chasing cats.", "He says every swordsman should study cats. They're quiet as shadows and as light as feathers. You have to be quick to catch them.", "Now that Bran's awake will he come live with us?", "He wants to be a knight of the King's Guard. He can't be one now, can he?", 'Can I be Lord of a holdfast?', "No. That's not me.", 'Why do they call you Littlefinger?', "Come on. I'm not gonna hurt you.", "I'm not a beggar. I live here.", 'I want to see my father.', "My father is Hand of the King! I'm not a boy. I'm Arya Stark of Winterfell and if you lay a hand on me, my father will have both your heads on spikes! Now are you going to let me by or do I need to smack you on the ear to help with your hearing?", 'They said they were going to kill you.', "I didn't see them, but I think one was fat.", "I'm not lying!
