They said you found the bastard and the wolves are fighting the lions and the savage... something about the savage.", 'In the dungeons, near the dragon skulls.', 'Chasing a cat.', "I'm a girl!", 'How many guards does my father have?', "You wouldn't let anyone kill him, would you?", "I don't want to practice today.", "They killed Jory. My father is hurt. I don't care about stupid wooden swords.", 'Yes -', "I don't like dolls and k -", "Are you dying because of your leg? Is that why you're sending us home?", "You can't. I've got my lessons with Syrio. I'm finally getting good.", "Can't we take Syrio back with us?", 'Seven hells.', "The lion's not his sigil, idiot. He's a stag, like his father.", 'Come on!', 'You said right, but you went left.', "Only 'cause you lied.", 'I was so. I watched, but you...', "My father wouldn't send you.", "And I don't have to go with you if I don't want.", 'Come with me. Run.', 'Not today.', 'Not today. Not today.', 'Needle.', 'What do you want?', "Leave me be. My father's a lord. He'll reward you.", 'Stay away!', 'Could l have one? A lemon one or any of them.', 'How about a nice fat pigeon?', 'Do you have any stale ones from yesterday? Or any burnt ones?', "Hey, where's everyone going? What's happening?", 'Who?', 'Let me go.', "l'm not a boy!", 'Arry.', "You want it? l'll give it to you. l already killed one fat boy. l bet you never killed anyone. l bet you're a liar. But l'm not. l'm good at killing fat boys. l like killing fat boys.", 'lt was a gift.', 'Which are you?', 'What do you want?', 'I have friends.', 'You should have asked nicely.', "They don't scare me.", "What are gold cloaks doing this far from King's Landing?", "They're looking for me.", "If you got within a mile of a battle, you'd fill your pants.", 'Liar.', 'So?', "Gendry's an armorer's apprentice. Hot Pie, tell Gendry what makes it a battle.", 'What do the gold cloaks want with you?', "You're a liar.", "Then I wouldn't get to insult anyone. .", 'No goodo s ever come? Who asked questions before?', 'Who asked questions?', 'Lord Stark.', 'What did they ask about?', "Who's your mom?", 'And who was your father?', "I'm not a girl!", "Stupider. Night's Watch doesn't take girls, everyone knows that.", 'I am not!', "I don't need to take a piss… Lommy and Hot Pie can't know. No one can know.", "My name's not Arry. It's Arya. Of House Stark. Yoren is taking me home to Winterfell.", 'He was never a traitor! Joffrey is a liar.', 'No. I mean yes. My mother was a lady, and my sister -', 'Do not call me milady.', "I can't sleep.", "I don't like the taste.", 'How do you sleep?', "But you've seen things, horrible things.", 'How do you sleep when you... when you have those things in your head?', 'I close my eyes and I see them up there. All of them standing there. Joffrey, the Queen and... and my sister.', 'Get up.', "No, I'm not afraid.", 'Dragonfire.', 'Dead people.', 'Does anyone live?', 'Joffrey. Cersei. llyn Payne. The Hound. Joffrey. Cersei. llyn Payne. The Hound. Joffrey. Cersei. llyn Payne. The Hound.', 'The Mountain. What are you doing?', 'Joffrey. Cersei. llyn Payne. The Hound.', 'Polliver. The Mountain.', 'Safer to travel, my lord.', 'Maidenpool, my lord.', 'House Mooton, my lord.', 'Barrowton, my lord. House Dustin. Two crossed longaxes beneath a black crown.', 'They call him the Young Wolf.', "They say he rides into battle on the back of a giant direwolf. They say he can turn into a wolf himself when he wants. They say he can't be killed.", 'No, my lord. Anyone can be killed.', 'I was always a girl.', "You're one of them now. I should have let you burn.", "I didn't have a choice.", 'Three what?', "I can name anyone and you'll kill him?", 'The one who tortures everyone.', "I don't know his name. They call him the Tickler.", 'You should stand sideface.', 'Sideways.', 'Smaller target.', "You're practicing for a fight. You should practice right.", 'Pardon, my lord.', 'My father, my lord.', 'A stonemason.', 'He taught himself.', 'Loyalty.', "Did... Forgive me, my lord. I shouldn't ask questions.", 'Did you know your father, my lord?', "I'll fetch more wood for the fire, my lord.", 'The armory, my lord.', 'Lord Tywin sent me.', 'Lord Tywin gave it to me.', 'To take to the armory.', 'Amory Lorch.', 'Now!', "But he's going to tell Tywin. He's getting away. It has to be now.", 'Yes, my lord.', "I'll bring something else.", 'No.', "I'll eat in the kitchen later.", "I eat a lot. I just don't grow.", 'Have you ever lost before?', 'Dragons?', 'Aegon and his sisters.', "It wasn't just Aegon riding his dragon. It was Rhaenys and Visenya, too.", 'Rhaenys rode Meraxes. Visenya rode Vhagar.', 'Visenya Targaryen was a great warrior. She had a Valyrian steel sword she called Dark Sister.', 'Most girls are idiots.', 'From my father.', 'Have you met many stonemasons, my lord?', 'My mother served Lady Dustin for many years, my lord. She taught me how to speak proper Properly.', 'Yes.', "Where's Jaqen?", "I need him now. Lord Tywin's marching tonight.", "He's helping me.", 'Where?', "I'm sorry. I'll-", 'Where were you?', "Tywin Lannister was right here, and now he's gone.", 'How long after I give you the name does it take you to kill someone?', "He's taking his army to attack my brother. I need him dead right now.", "You promised you'd help me.", "And you'll kill them? Anybody?", "All right. Jaqen H'ghar.", "That's right.", "I'm not joking. A man can go kill himself.", 'No.', "I'll un-name you.", 'If you help me and my friends escape.', "Fine, Jaqen H'ghar.", 'A girl will obey.', 'Shut up. What did you bring?', 'He didn\'t say. He just said, "Walk through the gates."', "He didn't say anything about the guards.", 'We have to trust him.', "Shut up. Stay here if you're afraid.", 'What are you doing here?', "How did you know we'd come this way?", 'How did you kill those guards? Was it hard?', 'Show me how. I want to be able to do it, too.', 'Where?', 'My dancing master was from Braavos.', "I want to. But I can't. I need to find my brother and mother. And my sister. I need to find her, too.", 'What is it?', 'Could it buy a horse?', 'Then what good is it?', 'Valar Morghulis.', "Please don't go, Jaqen.", 'Would you please shut up about it?', "I'm not listening.", 'Shut up.', 'Jaqen got us out of Harrenhal, so why are you complaining?', 'Where are we going?', 'If we were going north, we should have come to the Red Fork River by now.', "It's a hundred feet wide. How could we have passed it? If we hit the Red Fork, we can follow it west to Riverrun. My mother grew up there. My grandfather, he's a lord. He'll protect us.", 'Shh.', "Don't.", "You go on down the road. Just keep on singing so we know where you are. Leave us be and I won't kill you.", 'What friends?', 'Who are you?', 'No, who do you fight for?', "I don't drink ale.", "We're not children.", "Gendry's a smith. He was apprenticed in the armory.", 'Gendry stole us weapons.', 'He knows how to use a sword and so do I.', 'My brothers taught me.', "You'll free us?", "Why are you helping him? He takes us prisoner and now he's our friend?", 'What am I?', 'So I can walk away, then?', 'You remember the last time you were here?', "What are you doing? We're about to leave.", 'Winterfell.', "I'm sure.", 'What is it?', "That's the tail?", 'Good-bye, Hot Pie.', "Hey, Hot Pie. It's really good.", 'You murdered Mycah. The butchers boy. My friend. He was twelve years old. He was unarmed. And you rode him down. You slung him over your horse like he was some deer.', "That's a lie! I hit Joffrey. Mycah just ran away.", 'Kill him!', 'No! Let go of me! Let me go!', 'Burn in hell!', "You can't let him go. He's a murderer. He's guilty.", "You can't!", 'What are you doing?', 'Why?', "Have you lost your mind? When the Lannisters find this place, you think they'll spare the smiths? They'll cave your head in with your own helmet.", "You don't have to do this.", "Robb needs good men, too. We're leaving tomorrow. And then you-", 'You just said you were serving Lord Beric.', 'I can be your family.', 'Joffrey. Cersei. Ilyn Payne. Ser Meryn. The Hound. What are you going to do with me?', "I'm a hostage and you're selling me.", 'But it is that way.', "More is than isn't.", "So why don't you?", 'No.', 'I thought he killed you.', 'But how?', 'Could you bring back a man without a head? Not six times. Just once.', "I would. You're alive.", 'Joffrey. Cersei. Ilyn Payne.', "Face, tits, balls- I hit 'em right where I wanted to.", 'What?', 'But I have to aim.', 'Never aim?', "There's someone out there.", "I don't like that woman.", 'What does that have to do with anything?', 'What are you doing? Let go of him.', 'Tell them to stop. Come on. He wants to be one of you. He wants to join the Brotherhood. Stop them!', 'Did the Lord of Light tell you that or did she?', "You're not doing this for your god. You're doing it for gold.", "You're a witch. You're going to hurt him.", "I don't talk to traitors.", 'But you did. You took the gold and you gave him up.', "He's not my one true god.", 'Death.', "But what about Riverrun? It's not south. It's west of here.", 'You swore.', 'Why? So you can steal their gold?', "I don't care what you swear because you're a liar. You lied to Gendry, you lied to me. You'll lie to anyone. I hope the Lannisters kill you all.", "There's no one worse than you.", "You're lying.", 'Is that the Blackwater?', "Back to King's Landing to Joffrey and the queen.", 'But why?', 'Why would they be at the Twins?', "Don't! Don't kill him.", "You're so dangerous, aren't you? Saying scary things to little girls. Killing little boys and old people. A real hard man you are.", "You're wrong. I know a killer. A real killer.", "You'd be like a kitten to him. He'd kill you with his little finger.", 'No.', "Don't kill him! Please. Please don't.", "No one's going to believe you're a hog farmer if you eat them all.", "I know they're still there.", "I'm not afraid.", "I knew fear when I saw it in you. You're afraid of fire.", "When Beric's sword went up in flames, you looked like a scared little girl.", "And I know why, too. I heard what your brother did to you. Pressed your face to the fire like you're a nice juicy mutton chop.", 'Might do.', "Someday I'm gonna put a sword through your eye and out the back of your skull.", 'Mind if I keep warm?', "But I'm hungry.", "I've got money.", "It's worth a lot.", 'Sorry.', 'From you.', 'The first man.', 'Valar morghulis.', 'When am I going to get a horse of my own?', 'The little lady wants away from your stench.', "Why don't you have any money? Didn't you steal anything from Joffrey before you left?", "You're not very smart, are you?", "You're fine with murdering little boys, but thieving is beneath you?", "You think I'm gonna escape? Where would I go? I'd be dead by nightfall without you. My family's gone. I've got no one.", "I'm hungry. You're hungry.", 'I know him. The small one. His name is Polliver. He captured us and took us to Harrenhal.', 'He killed Lommy.', "He was my friend. Polliver stole my sword and put it right through his neck. He's still got it.", 'My sword Needle.', 'Lots of people name their swords.', 'My brother gave me that sword.', 'He killed my friend.', 'Something wrong with your leg, boy?', "Can you walk? I've got to carry you?", 'Fine little blade.', "Maybe I'll pick my teeth with it.", 'Gonna rain soon. Where are we?', "You think? You don't have a map?", 'Maybe we should get one.', 'How far is it to the Eyrie?', "And you're sure we're going the right way?", 'On your way where?', "I'd like to see Braavos one day.", 'I have friends there.', "We were just watering the horses. We'll be on our way. Forgive my father. He was wounded fighting in the war. Our cottage burned down while he was gone and my mother with it.", "He's never been the same.", 'The Tullys of Riverrun.', 'Father!', "I'm so sorry.", 'Really good.', 'What did you do?!', "You told me you weren't a thief.", 'He took us in. He fed us and you...', "You don't know that.", "You're the worst shit in the Seven Kingdoms.", 'Joffrey. Cersei. Walder Frey. Meryn Trant. Tywin Lannister. The Red Woman. Beric Dondarrion. Thoros of Myr. Ilyn Payne. The Mountain.', "I can't sleep until I say the names.", "Only the ones I'm going to kill.", 'If he were here right now, what would you do?', "I'm almost done. Only one name left.", 'The Hound.', 'Practicing.', "No one's going to kill me.", "It's not fighting. It's water dancing.", 'The greatest swordsman who ever lived. Syrio Forel, the First Sword to the Sealord of Braavos.', 'What do you know about anything?', 'It was not.', 'Yes.', 'He was killed.', "Meryn Trant. That's why Ser Meryn-", 'He was outnumbered.', "Syrio didn't have a sword. Or armor. Just a stick.", 'Could be soldiers.', "You shouldn't be sitting out here like this.", 'So why go on?', 'Nothing could be worse than this.', "Nothing isn't better or worse than anything. Nothing is just nothing.", 'My name is Arya. Arya Stark.', "You were Yoren's prisoners when he was taking me to the Wall. He told me he'd fuck me bloody with a stick.", "He can't be. I don't know his name.", 'Thank you.', "You're doing it wrong. You need to burn away that horrible bit there. Otherwise it's gonna get infected and fester. I know you don't like fire, but if you don't do it right-", "It'll only take a second. It won't hurt that much.", 'Why?', 'Let me wash it out and help you sew it up at least.', 'Lots of things make me happy.', 'Killing Polliver, killing Rorge.', 'At least I could have been there to watch. I wanted to see the look in his eyes when he knew it was over.', 'You protected him for most of his life. You think you could have saved him?', "That's your stupid pride talking. It's why you'll never be a great killer. I'd have killed Joffrey with a chicken bone if I had to.", 'You should have let me burn it.', "That fleabite's got you walking a lot slower than you used to.", 'You really think my aunt will pay for me?', "I've never even met her.", "I'm not a lady.", "People coming. You can shit later, there's people coming!", 'Morning.', 'About ten more miles.', 'Are you a knight?', 'But you know how to use that sword.', 'Does it have a name?', "Mine's “Needle.”", 'Who taught you how to fight?', 'Mine never wanted to. Said fighting was for boys.', "My mother's dead.", "You're not a northerner.", "Why didn't you?", "The Bloody Gate's ten miles.", "I don't care what you swore!", "I don't need saving.", "You're gonna die?", "I'll last longer than you.", 'I want to see the captain.', 'I want to go north, to the wall.', 'I can pay.', "I wouldn't need a cabin. Please, I could work, scrubbing the floors, or…", "Where's home?", 'Wait, I have something else.', "It's not silver, it's iron.", 'Valar morghulis.', "He's just a statue.", "I'm not afraid.", 'Thank you for bringing me.', 'Valar dohaeris.', 'Hello. Valar Morghulis.', "Jaqen H'ghar gave me this.", 'Please. I crossed the Narrow Sea. I have nowhere else to go.', 'But wait!', 'Cersei, Walder Frey, The Mountain, Meryn Trant. Cersei, Walder Frey, The Mountain, Meryn Trant.', 'The Mountain, Meryn Trant.', 'Turn around and go. Turn around and go.', "Nothing's worth anything to dead men.", 'Who are you? Why were they scared of you?', "You said there was no Jaqen H'ghar here.", 'Well who are you then?', "I've been sweeping this floor for days.", "I didn't come here to sweep floors.", "You said that I could be your apprentice. You said you'd teach me how to a Faceless Man.", 'I want to serve. .', 'Which one is the Many-Faced God? I see the Stranger. I see the Drowned God. I see the Weirwood Face.', 'Where are they taking him?', 'What do you want?', 'What?', 'No one.', 'Ow! Cunt!', "I told you, I'm no - . Do that again and -", "You're about to find out.", 'I am ready.', 'What do we do with them after we wash them?', 'What are they doing with the bodies?', "No! I've been here for weeks. I'm not scrubbing one more corpse until you tell me why I'm doing it.", 'When?', 'When do I get to play the game?', 'The game. The game of faces.', "I didn't even know I was playing.", 'No one.', "Well who are you? What are you doing here? How'd you get here?", 'What?', 'Arya.', "Westeros. My family home is Winterfell. I'm the youngest daughter of a great lord. Eddard Stark. He died in battle.", 'After he was executed I fled the capital. Had to kill a stable boy. Drove my sword through his back.', 'I stabbed him in the gut. I tried to find my mother and brother. I never did. They were murdered by Walder Frey. An outlaw kidnapped me. A man called Polliver.', "A man called the Hound. Sandor Clegane. He tried to sell me but was wounded in a fight. He begged me to kill him but I wouldn't. I left him in the mountains to die. I wanted him to suffer, I hated him.", 'I hated him.', 'I hated him!', "That's not a lie!", 'Yes.', "I'm not playing this stupid game anymore!", 'Valar dohaeris.', "I know. Don't be afraid. I used to be like you. I was sick. I was dying. But my father never gave up on me. He loved me. More than anything in the world, just like your father loves you. So he brought me here. My father prayed to the many faced god. And I drank the water from this fountain. It healed me.", "I've devoted my life to him now. You don't want to hurt anymore. Drink.", "My name is Lana. I'm an orphan. When I was 8 I begged enough money to buy my first bucket of oysters, and I sold that bucket and made enough money to buy 2 more.", 'Iit took a while but I finally saved enough to buy myself an oyster cart. Now every morning I make my way down to the canals. I pass the fish mongers and the bakers. I usually see Lhara, my first customer of the day on my way home. Then I turn left onto Moonsinger Lane--', 'Left onto Ragman Lane, where I do most of my trade.', 'How will she serve him?', 'What will she do there?', 'See what?', 'Oysters, clams and cockles!', 'Oysters clams and cockles! Oysters clams and cockles!', 'Best in the city.', 'So why would a captain make the wager in the first place?', 'If the captain dies, the thin man pays his family a lot of money.', "The Many Faced God. You said you didn't know what I would see at the docks.", 'And then what?', 'Oysters, clams, and cockels! Oysters, clams, and cockels! Oysters, clams, and cockels! Oysters, clams, and cock--', 'Oysters, clams, and cockels! Oysters, clams, and cockels!', 'Three coppers.', "The Thin Man wasn't hungry today.", 'Tomorrow.', "You were the first person on my list, you know. For killing Syrio Forel, remember him? Probably not. I've gotten a few of the others. The Many Faced God stole a few more for me. I'm glad he left me you. Do you know who I am?", "I can't hear you.", "You know who I am. I'm Arya Stark.", 'Do you know who you are?', "You're no one. You're nothing.", "No! No! No, you don't die! Don't die!", 'He was my friend.', "But if you're… Who's this?", "I can't see!", "What's happening?! What's happening?!", 'Thank you', "I can't see", 'No one', 'A girl has no name', 'No one', 'Arya Stark', 'Her father was Eddard Stark Her mother was Catelyn Stark She had one sister, Sansa, and four brothers', 'Three brothers', 'Rob, Bran, Rickon And a half-brother, Jon', 'They may be dead for all a girl knows', 'Also dead', 'Arya Stark left him to die He was on her list', "He was not on her list anymore She'd taken him off it", 'She did and she did not', 'Yes, she was', 'Cersei Lannister, Gregor Clegane, Walder Frey', 'Which name would you like a girl to speak?', 'A girl has no name', 'Who was the first?', 'Where did they go?', 'A girl has no desires.', 'Who?', 'A girl will poison the rum. Lady Crane is the only one who drinks it.', 'If a girl could use one of the faces from the hall…', "She's a good actress.", 'Seems like a decent woman.', 'No. Who wants her dead?', "The younger actress. She's jealous because Lady Crane is better.", 'A girl has decided.', 'Nothing.', 'Three times.', 'No.', "You're very good.", 'So change it. It would all just be farting, belching, and slapping without you.', "The queen loves her son more than anything. And he was taken from her before she could say good-bye. She wouldn't just cry. She would be angry. She would want to kill the person who did this to her.", 'Mercy.', "I have to go. My father's waiting for me.", 'Careful of that one. She wants you dead.', "You're Westerosi.", 'I want to book passage home.', 'Why do you care?', "I want a cabin. And we'll leave at dawn.", 'See you at sunrise.', "You're good at that. Where did you learn?", 'And good at putting holes in them.', 'What happened to the actress? The one who wanted you dead.', 'Mmm.', "I can't.", "I don't think I could remember all of the lines.", "You wouldn't be safe. Not while she's looking for me.", "She doesn't have a name.", "Essos is east and Westeros is west. But what's west of Westeros?", "Nobody does. That's where all the maps stop.", "I'd like to see that.", "What's that?", "I don't want any.", 'Lady Crane?', 'You told her to kill me.', "A girl is Arya Stark of Winterfell and I'm going home.", "My name is Arya Stark. I want you to know that. The last thing you're ever going to see is a Stark smiling down at you as you die.", 'When people ask you what happened here, tell them the North remembers. Tell them winter came for House Frey.', "That's a pretty song. I've never heard it before.", "I don't want to steal your food.", "King's Landing.", 'Not so bad, is it?', 'What are you doing in the Riverlands?', "Oh, no, I couldn't. You don't have enough.", "You're a long way from home. I'm sure you've had some adventures, though.", 'Boy or girl?', 'Why?', "It's really good.", "I'm going to kill the queen.", "Hello, Hot Pie. Sit down. Who's that for?", 'Mmm. This is good.', "I didn't do that.", 'One or two.', 'Big lady?', 'She found me.', 'You got any ale?', "King's Landing.", "I heard Cersei's queen now.", 'Hmm.', 'Cersei would do that.', 'Why would I go there? The Boltons have it.', 'What?', "You're lying.", 'Thanks for the pie.', 'Thanks.', 'Take care of yourself, Hot Pie. Try not to get killed.', 'Nymeria?', "Nymeria, it's me, Arya. I'm heading north, girl, back to Winterfell. I'm finally going home. Come with me.", 'Come with me.', "That's not you.", "approaches the main gate on foot. Two guards are huddled by a brazier getting warm. There's indistinct chatter. One of the men notice ARYA walking to the gate and approach her.", 'In there. I live here.', "I'm Arya Stark. This is my home.", "Send for Maester Llewyn or Ser Rodrick. They'll tell you who I am.", "Go ask Jon Snow then, the King in the North. He's my brother", 'If Jon Snow is gone who is in charge of Winterfell?', 'Which Lady Stark?', 'Tell Sansa her sister is home.', "I'm getting into this castle one way or another. If I'm not who I say I am, I won't last long. But if I am, and Sansa finds out that you turned me away...", 'keeps glancing at the men. They look uneasy. They bring her inside of the gate. They indicate towards a cart near the entrance.', 'is glancing around Winterfell. Men are working building tools and cutting wood. ARYA looks over and sees a Winterfell flag sigil hanging from the wall. The two guards are still arguing.', 'is standing look at a statue of Ned Stark holding his sword. ARYA hears a sound and turns to see SANSA approaching. SANSA stops when she sees ARYA.', 'Do I have to call you Lady Stark now?', "I didn't run. You need better guards.", 'It suits you, Lady Stark. Jon left you in charge?', "That doesn't look like him. It should have been carved by someone who knew his face.", "We're not.", 'turns to face SANSA.', 'They say you killed Joffrey. Did you?', 'Me too. I was angry when I heard someone else had done it. However long my list got he was always first.', "Of people I'm going to kill.", "It's a long story. I imagine yours is too.", "Mine neither, but our stories aren't over yet.", "smiles and looks at SANSA. SANSA doesn't smile back. The smile fades from ARYA's face.", 'steps forward and throws her arms around BRAN. SANSA smiles in the background. ARYA lets go and steps back.', 'You saw me?', 'So did I.', 'stares at BRAN. ARYA turns to look at SANSA.', 'Most of them are dead already.', 'Where did you get this?', "Littlefinger, he's here?", 'turns to look at SANSA.', 'Why would a cutthroat have a Valyrian steel dagger?', "Are you sure? It's Valyrian steel.", 'looks down at the dagger. She steps forward and takes it from BRAN.', 'is pushing BRAN in his wheelchair and SANSA is next to them. The Stark children are walking back through the gate of Winterfell. Men are milling around doing various jobs. BRIENNE and PODRICK see the Stark children all back at Winterfell together.', 'is watching the sparring session from across the courtyard. She begins to approach Brienne.', "Don't fight someone like her in the first place.", 'looks down at the Valyrian dagger and unsheathes it. She approaches BRIENNE flipping the knife several times in her fingers. BRIENNE takes the dagger and examines it.', "It's been awhile since I've trained.", "He didn't beat the hound. You did. I want to train with you.", "You swore to serve both of my mother's daughters, didn't you?", "I won't cut you. Don't worry.", 'No one.', 'collects her sword. SANSA walks away. BAELISH remains on the balcony staring at ARYA who looks up at him. BAELISH bows to ARYA and walks away.', "He didn't. He trusted you to hold it for him.", "These are mother and father's chambers.", 'Nothing.', 'What?', 'You always liked nice things. It made you feel better than everyone.', 'They were insulting Jon and you sat there and listened.', 'Their opinions are important to you?', 'Not if they lose their heads first.', "And if Jon doesn't come back, you'll need their support, so you can work together to give you what you really want.", "You're thinking it right now. You don't want to be, but the thought just won't go away.", 'My lady.', 'exits the room.', "is in the kennels observing PETER BAELISH and a Winterfell servant having a conversation. The servent is whispering in BAELISH's ear. ARYA can't hear the conversation. ARYA sees BAELISH hand the servant a raven scroll. The servant turns to leave. BAELISH senses someone is watching him and he looks to where ARYA stood but she has already vanished. BAELISH turns and leaves the kennels.", "is on the upper level looking down at BAELISH. He is having a conversation with ROBETT GLOVER and YOHN ROYCE. She can't hear what's being said. BAELISH finishes his conversation and walks away from the men. ARYA disappears behind the corner and continues following BAELISH.", "is walking down the hallway. She pauses, peers around a corner and looks towards the door of BAELISH's quarters. BAELISH appears and unlocks his door. Before he walks in MAESTER WOLKAN approaches him. She continues watching the men.", "Father used to watch us from up here. He wouldn't say much. You probably don't remember. You were inside knitting all the time.", "One time the boys were shooting arrows with Ser Rodrick. I came out here after and Bran had left his bow behind just lying on the ground. Ser Rodrick would have cuffed him if he saw. There was one arrow in the target. There was no one around, just like now. No one to stop me. So I started shooting. And every shot I had to go out there and get my one arrow and walk back and shoot it again. I wasn't very good. Finally I hit the bullseye. It could have been the 20th shot or the 50th. I don't remember. But I hit the bullseye and I heard this.", 'starts a slow clap.', "I looked up and he's standing right here smiling down at me. I knew what I was doing was against the rules. But he was smiling so I knew it wasn't wrong. The rules were wrong. I was doing what I was meant to be doing and he knew it. Now he's dead. Killed by the Lannisters with your help.", 'retrieves a raven scroll from her pocket and unrolls it.', 'That\'s your pretty handwriting. Septa Mordane used to crack my knuckles because I couldn\'t write as well as you. "Robb, I write to you today with heavy heart. Our good King Robert is dead. Killed from wounds he took in a boar hunt --', "Father has been charged with treason. He conspired with Robert's brothers against my beloved Joffrey and tried to steal his throne. The Lannisters are treating me well and providing me with every comfort. I beg you, come to King's Landing, swear fealty to King Joffrey and prevent any strife between the great houses of Lannister and Stark. Your faithful sister, Sansa.", 'Did they. With a knife at your throat? Did they put you on a rack and stretch you until your bones started to pop?', 'So was I. I would have let them kill me before I betrayed my family.', 'And you were stupid enough to believe them. I remember you standing on that platform with Joffrey and Cersei when they dragged father too the block. I remember the pretty dress you were wearing. I remember the fancy way you did your hair.', "I was there standing in the crowd near Baelor's statue.", 'I wanted to.', "I didn't betray him. I didn't betray Robb. I didn't betray our entire family for my beloved Joffrey.", 'I was training.', "Oh, I don't know about that. I can imagine quite a lot.", "I guess we'll never know.", "I don't know yet.", "You're scared, aren't you? What are you scared of? You didn't commit any crimes. No one's going to hang you.", "Are you scared I'll show it to Jon and he'll be angry? No. That's not Jon. He'll understand. You were just a scared little girl all alone with the wicked Lannisters.", 'The northern lords will read it. They wouldn\'t think much of Lady Sansa if they knew how she did Cersei\'s bidding. What would little Lyanna Mormont say? She\'s younger than you were when you wrote this. Are you going to say, "But I was just a child"?', "Sometimes fear makes them do unfortunate things. I'll go with anger.", 'turns and walks away.', 'Are you sure you want to do this?', 'And what does honor demand?', 'All right, then. Get on with it.', 'My sister asked you a question.', 'You told our mother', 'Are you all right?', 'You did the right thing.', "I'm just the executioner. You passed the sentence. You're the Lady.", 'I was never going to be as good a lady as you. So I had to be something else. I never could have survived what you survived.', "I believe that's the nicest thing you've ever said to me.", 'In winter, we must protect ourselves. Look after one another.', 'I miss him.', 'You used to be taller.', 'How did you survive a knife through the heart?', 'Needle.', 'Once or twice.', 'Valyrian steel.', 'Too heavy for me.', "She doesn't like your queen, does she?", "She's the smartest person I've ever met.", "I'm defending our family. So is she.", "Don't forget that.", 'Leave him be.', 'First I robbed you.', "That was a nice ax you made for him. You've gotten better.", 'Thanks. So do you.', 'Stay close to that forge, then.', "Don't call me that.", "Here's my wish.", 'Can you make it?', 'Can you make it or not?', "You don't know any other rich girls.", 'You make my weapon yet?', "You should make mine first. And make sure it's stronger than this.", 'Are you going to be down in the crypt?', "But you're a fighter.", "You've fought them?", 'How many?', 'What are they like?', 'Really bad"?', 'Even a smith\'s apprentice can do better than "really bad." What do they look like? What do they smell like? How do they move? How hard are they to kill?', 'I know Death.', "He's got many faces.", 'I look forward to seeing this one.', 'My weapon?', "We're not leaving you alone out there.", 'Dragonfire will stop him?', "Guess I've changed.", 'What are you doing up here?', "No, I mean, what are you doing up here? You joined the Brotherhood. You went beyond the Wall with Jon. You're here now. Why? When was the last time you fought for anyone but yourself?", 'For a little while.', "I'm not spending my final hours with you two miserable old shits.", 'That for me?', "This'll work.", 'What did the Red Woman want with you?', 'Why your blood?', 'Was that your first time?', 'Your first time with a woman.', "Were you with other girls before that in King's Landing?", 'Or after?', "You don't remember?", 'One? Two? Twenty?', 'Yes, you did.', "We're probably going to die soon. I want to know what it's like before that happens.", "I'm not the Red Woman. Take your own bloody pants off.", 'Get down to the crypt.', 'Take this and go.', 'Stick them with the pointy end.', 'I know you.', "You said we'd meet again.", "You said I'd shut many eyes forever. You were right about that too.", 'Not today.', "I'm Arya Stark. I'm going to kill Queen Cersei.", "I'm going to kill her.", 'Sandor.', 'Thank you.', 'Let go.', 'Wait! Wait! No!', "You can't stay here. You have to keep moving.", 'You have to.', "If you stay here, you'll die. Follow me.", 'Follow me!', 'Get up. Get up!', 'We have to keep moving.', 'Come on! Come on!', 'I came to kill Cersei. Your queen got there first.', 'Try telling Sansa.', "Jon. She knows who you are. Who you really are. You'll always be a threat to her. And I know a killer when I see one.", "Say another word about killing my brother and I'll cut your throat.", "I can't.", "I'm not going back north.", "What's west of Westeros?", "No one knows. It's where all the maps stop. That's where I'm going.", 'Right here.']

Name: davos
Sentence: ['Not now.', "Stannis is our king. We follow where he leads, even if we don't like the path.", "I don't serve the others. I serve Stannis.", "What's the truth?", 'A harmless courtesy, Your Grace.', 'Your Grace, the Lannisters are the true enemy. If, for the time being, you could make peace with your brother -', 'Well, many have already declared for him; Mace Tyrell, Randyll Tarly.', 'And how many ships has the Lord of Light got in his fleet?', "I'm sure he doesn't, but we do if we're going to war. If not Renly, Your Grace, join forces with Robb Stark.", "Don't.", "You'll have your gold when we take the treasury at King's Landing.", "Because you're a smart gambler. Stannis has proved himself in war. Twice. His baby brother has never set foot on a battlefield. Neither has the false king, Joffrey.", "Stannis has just begun the fight. His bannermen will rally to his cause. There's no man in the Seven Kingdoms more honorable than Stannis Baratheon. Or more worthy of loyalty.", 'Matthos.', "Of course you do. Every time you leave harbor, you're leaving on a promise. A promise that somewhere on the seas, somebody's got some gold and you can take it from them.", "As is mine. You're not the young man, Salladhor. And correct me if I'm wrong", "You want to spend your last few years on the sea, stealing from Pentoshi cheesemongers and Midanese silk merchants, then go. They're out there waiting for you. That's easy. What I'm offering you is hard. Come with me and plunder the greatest city in Westeros. You'll be the richest man in Lysene. And the most famous. They'll be singing songs about you as long as men have voices to sing.", 'It is. .', 'The queen?', "He's young yet. I promise you the gold. I promise you the glory. I cannot promise you the queen.", 'He is the one true king.', "Get me to the gates of King's Landing and I will.", 'As soon as his God wills it.', 'Oh you and your mother.', "I wish I had a God, truly! I'm not mocking you, but I've seen men pray to every God there is. Pray for wind, pray for rain, pray for home. None of it works!", "I wasn't praying.", "You want me to have a god, fine. King Stannis is my god. He raised me up and blessed me with his trust. He gave you a future I could never have imagined. You know how to read, you'll be a knight someday. You think your fire god commanded all that? It was Stannis. Only Stannis.", "Don't tell him that.", 'Your Grace.', 'Salladhor Saan will join our fleet. 30 ships. His men know how to fight.', 'Does seem the wiser choice.', "Salladhor Saan is an old friend, I've known him 30 years. I've never trusted him.", 'At once, Your Grace.', 'Come.', 'Your Grace.', "Well, life's been good since you hacked them off, Your Grace. And it's four less fingernails to clean.", 'Pardon?', 'It reminds me of where I come from and where I am now. It reminds me of your justice. Five minutes later, he's back in the race. Here, have a taste.", 'scoops up a bit of fermented crab and offers it to the guards. Both men reach out and take a pinch. The guards sniff the crab and put it in their mouth. They both recoil from the taste and look at each other.', "I'd hurry to your favorite establishment or you'll put a whole in that chainmail.", 'quickly walks to cut the guards off.', "I really wouldn't try anymore until you see how the first bite hits you.", 'is still standing behind the guards. He retrieves his gold pouch again and holds it up shaking it.', "Perhaps there's some arrangement?", 'is looking at TYRION and motions towards GENDRY.', 'This is Gendry.', "We're leaving today. The king's got a lot on his mind.", "He doesn't need to be thinking about harboring the bastard of a dead king.", "You're just Clovis, a smith who's come to pay his respects before he heads off to work at the Winterfell forges.", 'and GENDRY enter the mouth of the cave. JON is walking along the corridor.', 'Begging your pardon, Your Grace.', 'Yet again.', 'He was meant to keep that to himself.', "Don't be a fool. You're not a soldier.", 'He can handle himself.', "As my father used to say, it's better to be a coward for a minute than dead for the rest of your life.", "Yeah. Nobody mind me. All I've ever done is live to a ripe old age.", "I've been failing at that job of late.", "I'll be staying behind. I'm a liability out there as you well know.", "Our reasons aren't your reasons.", 'Maybe it still is.', "I wish you hadn't done that.", 'Any ideas as to how we might change that state of affairs?', "Can't argue with that.", 'Not so long ago, the Starks and the Karstarks were slaughtering each other on the battlefield. Jon Snow brought peace to the houses.', "Her gratitude is lovely, but that's not my point. The Northmen are loyal to Jon Snow, not to her. They don't know her. The Free Folk don't know her. I've been up here a while, and I'm telling you, they're stubborn as goats. You want their loyalty, you have to earn it.", "A proposal is what I'm proposing. On the off chance that we survive the Night King, what if the Seven Kingdoms, for once in their whole shit history, were ruled by a just woman and an honorable man?", "You are now. Look, I made it through most of my years without ever getting near a fight, but then I survived the Battle of the Bastards. Right outside these walls. If I can live through that, you can live through this. They'll outfit you with weapons at the forge. Right that way.", 'Which way do you want to go?', "I'm sure a lot of people would.", "We'll hold off the rest of them for as long as we can.", 'The dragons should give us an edge in the field.', 'Well, what do we have here?', 'No, not for me, thanks. Came here for this.', 'I figured I could wait to die freezing my balls off out there or wait to die nice and warm in here.', 'Maybe I will have that drink.', 'All without a shred of combat ability.', "We're out of wine.", "You'll pray for a quick death.", 'Open the gate!', "She can't see us.", 'Light the trenches!', 'Man the walls!', "To Lord Gendry Baratheon of Storm's End.", "The last time I saw her, I told her I'd kill her if I ever saw her again.", 'I did. I do.', 'Never got the chance. She did it to herself. Or her god did it to her. Lord of Light. We play his game for him, we fight his war and win, and then he fucks off. No signs, no blessings. Who knows what he wants?', "And what if I'm not trying to be happy?", 'Thank you. I feel much better.', 'The rearguard should be here by daybreak.', "I'm not gonna like this favor, am I?", 'Quickly. Quickly.', "How much more defeated do you want them to be? They're on their knees.", 'Look around you, friend. We won.', 'Easy, men. Easy! Easy.', 'Jon. We should speak with the queen.', "Friends, please. We've been cutting each other's throats long enough. Torgo Nudho. Am I saying that properly?", "If it weren't for you and your men, we wouldo ve lost the war with the dead. This country owes you a debt it can never repay, but let us try. There is land in the Reach. Good land. The people that used to live there are gone. Make it your own. Start your own house with the Unsullied as your bannermen. We've had enough war. Thousands of you, thousands of them. You know how it ends. We need to find a better way.", 'Who, then?', "I'm not sure I get a vote, but aye.", 'Your Grace.', 'Long may he reign.', 'We have. These projects will begin as soon as the Master of Coin and Lord of Lofty Titles provides funding.', 'Any more.']

Name: theon greyjoy
Sentence: ['Mountain lion?', "It's a freak.", 'Right. Give it here.', 'I take orders from your father, not you.', "The runt of the litter. That one's yours, Snow.", "It's for the queen, I bet. I hear she's [sleek as a mink?]", 'Think of all those southern girls he gets to stab with his right royal prick.', 'Saw what, my lady?', "If it comes to that, you know I'll stand behind you.", 'We have visitors.', "Really? If I was cooped up all day with no one but this old bat for company, I'd go mad. Anyway, you don't have a choice. Robb's waiting.", "Neither do I. But Robb's Lord of Winterfell, which means I do what he says and you do what I say. Hodor! Help Bran down the hall.", "Couldn't resist some northern ass? If you like redheads, ask for Ros.", "He's not my master.", "She wasn't feeling well.", "My lady's whereabouts...", 'Must have been a pretty sight.', 'We were outnumbered 10 to one.', 'Careful, Imp.', 'Famed for their skills at archery, navigation and lovemaking.', "Shh... Keep it down. You're not supposed to be inside the castle walls.", 'Important enough for the likes of you.', "Who? the Imp? I'd call him half a nobleman.", 'Why should I be jealous?', "Anyone with a few coppers in his pocket can own you for the night. What's a dwarf like down below? I've always wondered.", 'Hmm?', 'Generous tipper. I guess gold is cheap for a Lannister.', "I'm a Greyjoy. We've been Lords of the Iron Islands for 300 years. There's not a family in Westeros that can look down on us, not even the Lannisters.", "I've been Lord Stark's ward since I was eight years old.", 'My father fought for the freedom of his people! What did your father do? Fucked a cook and whelped a whore.', "I'm not a boy.", "I don't want to pay for it.", 'When are you gonna tell him?', 'Blood for blood. You need to make the Lannisters to pay for Jory and the others.', "I'm talking about justice.", "A Lannister put his spear through your father's leg. The Kingslayer rides to Casterly Rock where no one can touch -", "You're not a boy anymore. They attacked your father. They've already started the war. It's your duty to represent your House when your father can't.", "I don't know. It's not my House.", "Tough little lad. In the Iron Islands, you're not a man until you've killed your first enemy. Well done.", "He would have killed you and cut Bran's throat.", "To what, to save your brother's life? It was the only thing to do, so I did it.", 'Stop! Stop! What are you doing?!', 'In a turnip cart?', 'And you can afford that?', "There's a thousand girls like you in King's Landing.", "Yes, you'll be very popular until some fat lord comes to visit with a big belly and a little prick and he can't get it up so he knocks all your teeth out.", "Don't be a fool.", 'Let me see it one more time?', "I'm going to miss you!", "You're a very lucky girl. Do you know that?", 'The Iron Islands.', "You've never heard of the Iron Islands?", "Trust me, My Lord. You're not living in the wilderness anymore.", 'Lord.', 'Why? What do you mean why? My father is Balon Greyjoy, Lord of the Iron Islands.', 'I will be lord after my father.', 'No, you...You having a go at me? Is that it?', "I'm not a Southerner.", "You're an impudent little wench, aren't you?", 'Impudent. It means rude. Disrespectful.', 'I thought she was our prisoner.', 'Lord Frey controls that bridge.', "Robb's right.", 'Or so Walder Frey would have you think.', "Just march up to his gates and tell him you're crossing. We've got five times his numbers. You can take the Twins if you have to.", 'Or throw you in a dungeon. Or slit your throat.', 'Kill him, Robb. Send his head to his father. He cut down ten of our men. You saw him.', 'The bards will sing songs of their sacrifice.', 'Am l your brother, now and always?', 'My sword is yours in victory and defeat, from this day until my last day.', 'A word, Your Grace?', "It's not so bad once you get used to it.", 'The Lannisters are going to reject your terms, you know?', "We can fight them in the fields as long as you like, but we won't beat them until you take King's Landing. And we can't take King's Landing without ships. My father has ships and men who know how to sail them.", "Men who fought King Robert to free themselves from the yoke of the South, just like you're doing now. I'm his only living son. He'll listen to me. I know he will. I'm not a Stark. I know that. But your father raised me to be an honorable man. We can avenge him together.", "We won't beat them until we take King's Landing, and we can't take King's Landing without ships. My father has ships, and men who know how to sail them.", "I'm his only living son. He'll listen to me.", 'Looks smaller.', "They'll be waiting for me on the docks.", "Anyone who matters, , this is a big day for them. They haven't had much to get excited about since I left. It's a hard place the Iron Islands always has been. It's cold and it's wet.", 'They say hard places breed hard men, , and hard men rule the world.', 'Try smiling with your lips closed. . Hmm, better.', "I don't blame him.", "Quit talking about your father. He's right about us. Our wives from the Iron Islands, they're for breeding. That's not enough for us. That's why we take saltwives, from the women we capture.", 'Your place is on this ship.', "I haven't paid you.", 'Pears and oranges. Wine from the Arbor. And the heir to Pyke of the Iron Islands. . The only living son of Balon Greyjoy. . Me.', 'I need to get to Pyke.', 'I bet you can.', 'None like you.', "You don't know what you're like. You need someone to teach you. Know who I am?", 'Have my things sent up to the castle.', "You should give me the reins, I'm a better rider than you. I've been on horseback for the last nine years.", "Don't you worry about my hands. . The sea's in my blood.", "I have a proposal for my father. One that will make him king again. And me after him. You may stay at the castle tonight, if you're lucky.", 'An order, from your future king. You can tell your grandchildren about this night.', 'Father.', 'A man. Your blood and your heir.', 'Lord Stark is gone.', "What's done is done. I've brought you a proposal from Robb Stark.", 'If my clothes offend you, I will change them.', 'Gold.', 'My blood is salt and iron.', 'The offer he makes, is one I proposed.', "I've lived with him, hunted with him, fought at his side, he thinks of me as a brother.", 'I forget nothing. I remember my brothers. And I remember when my father was a king.', 'I will lead the attack myself.', "I'm your son. Your only living heir. Who else?", 'I told you to wait outside. . How did you get past the guards?', 'Yara?', "She can't lead an attack!", "You're a woman!", "You won't stand a chance against the Lannisters on your own.", 'What are you doing here?', 'You lying bitch.', 'Recognize you? How could I? The last time I saw you- you looked like a fat little boy.', "Why didn't you tell me?", 'Father.', "And what's my role in all this?", 'A ship? You give her thirty and I get one?', "I'm to fight fishermen?", "Father, I fought with Robb Stark. I know his men. He won't give up the North so easily.", "What do you know of it, woman? I'm a proven warrior.", "I'm not protecting anyone. I just wonder if it's not wiser to wait. Why risk going against the North if they would be our allies? Rise up against them and they could destroy us. But if we pledge fealty to them, they'll give us Casterly Rock.", 'We do not sow.', 'You act as if I volunteered to go. You gave me away, if you remember. The day you bent the knee to Robert Baratheon. After he crushed you. Did you take what was yours then?', 'You gave me away!', "Your boy! Your last boy! You gave me away like I was some dog you didn't want anymore. And now you curse me because I've come home.", 'I have no other family.', 'I would.', 'What is dead may never die.', "You're the crew of the Sea Bitch? I'm your commander. Welcome.", 'Stop. Stop! Your captain commands you to stop!', "The Stony Shore, to raid their villages. There'll be spoils in it for you, and women, if you do your jobs well.", 'I do. Your captain.', 'You could do that, take the ship, head out on your own. And I will hunt you down, drag you back here in chains and hang you for a traitor.', 'Thank you. Kind of you to come see me off.', "You'd better get out there. Wouldn't want her to set sail without you.", 'Who are you?', "Why aren't you with the rest of them? Or did they send you to row me out and dump me halfway in the sea? That would be good for a laugh.", 'And how am I supposed to prove myself by pillaging piss-poor fishing villages?', "And yet that's the task my father has given me to prove that I'm a true Iron Islander.", "The Stony Shore's not far from Torrhen's Square.", "No, we could. We could never hold it for more than a few days. As soon as Winterfell got word that we'd taken Torrhen's Square, the Starks would send their men to take it back. And then-", 'Take me to my ship.', "I've taken your castle.", "It's Prince Theon now. Get up. You have to get dressed. I've taken Winterfell. I took it. I'm occupying it. I sent men over the walls with grappling claws and ropes.", 'To take the castle.', "And he sent me back to Pyke. I'm a Greyjoy. I can't fight for Robb and my father both. Where's Hodor?", 'Find the halfwit.', 'My men are bringing your people together in the courtyard.', "So you and I can go down and tell them - how you've yielded Winterfell to me.", 'Yes, you will.', "The castle is mine. But these people are still yours. You'll yield to keep them safe, to keep them alive. That's what a good lord would do. Think carefully about what you want to say.", 'Louder. Say Prince Theon.', 'Listen to your little lord, Farlen. He has more sense than you do.', 'My father has donned the ancient crown of Salt and Rock and declared himself King of the Iron Islands. He claims the North as well by right of conquest. You are all his subjects.', "If you serve me as loyally as you served Ned Stark, I will be as good to you as he ever was. Betray me, and you will wish you hadn't. Maester Luwin, send a raven to Pyke informing my father of my victory here. And one to Deepwood Motte to my sister. Inform her that she's to bring You are a maester of the Citadel, sworn to serve the Lord of Winterfell, are you not?", 'I am the Lord of Winterfell as Bran just informed you. Send the ravens.', "I see you've finally learned how to address your betters. What do you want? I was brought here a captive.", "I'm the one who took you. What of it?", 'Serve me how? I need fighters, not kitchen sluts.', 'So you can bury it in my neck? Do you take me for a fool? Get up.', "You'll all go about your tasks as usual. And in a few days' time-", 'Ser Rodrik, it grieves me that we meet as foes.', 'They are not my people.', 'My brothers are dead. They died fighting Stark men, men like you.', 'Among them, but not one of them. I was his hostage, taken from my home.', "He's not. He's dead. The Seven Kingdoms are at war. And Winterfell is mine.", "You've served this house faithfully, old man. But keep talking and I'll-", 'Take him to the cells. Lock him up', "I'll lock him in a cell until he rots.", 'Ser Rodrik, I sentence you to death!', "The old man couldn't keep his mouth shut.", 'He disrespected me in front of my men. That was his decision, not mine.', "You'll address me as Prince Theon or you'll be next.", "You don't give commands anymore, little lord.", 'Any last words, old man?', 'Why on earth would I trust the word of a lying little savage like you?', 'All wildlings are liars and savages with no loyalty to anything or anyone.', "How? And don't tell me to put a spear in your hand.", "I'm a prince now, and you'd do well-", 'Like what?', 'You know things? Like what? How to eat dirt?', 'Wait outside.', 'I always wondered what you had under there.', "I'm not killing you. That's your price.", 'What do you want then, other than your miserable life?', 'Well, you shall have it, then. But only if you serve me well.', "A cripple? You let a cripple escape? The boy can't walk, but somehow he slipped past you?", "The giant? Hodor? Oh, that's all right, then. You let a halfwit escape with a cripple. And Rickon, too? The little one?", 'Right. Get the horses and the hounds.', 'Enjoying your first hunt?', "With hunting, there's blood at the end.", "I was a little boy when I was torn away from my home and brought here. So I kept my word. I never ran away. If I find them soon enough, I won't hurt them. Well, I'll hurt them, but I won't kill them.", 'They have no value to me missing.', "Robb's in the Riverlands. My sister's in Deepwood Motte. She'll get here long before they do. And Ned Stark always said 500 men could hold Winterfell again 10,000.", "The hounds have the scent. Come, Maester, don't look so grim. It's all just a game.", 'Try again.', "I'm looking at spending the rest of my life being treated like a fool and a eunuch by my own people. Ask yourself, is there anything I wouldn't do to stop that from happening? The hounds will find the scent again. I'll beat them until they do. I'll whip every man here until I have both those boys in hand. And once I've got them, the pampered little shits It's better to be cruel than weak.", 'Where are they?', 'The Stark boys. Where are they?', 'Think harder.', 'Go back to Winterfell. Take him back.', 'I told you what would happen. All of you. I told you what would happen if you served me loyally. And what would happen if you did not.', 'If there are any who still question whether your new lord means what he says, here is the answer to your question.', "Envy isn't attractive.", "You should be proud of your brother's achievement. I took the great castle of Winterfell with twenty men.", 'I treated the Stark boys with honor, and they repaid me with treachery.', 'Before I had to kill them- I treated them-', 'Exactly.', 'They made me a promise', "Don't call me", "If I hadn't killed them, the Northerners would think me weak.", "I'm warning you.", "You haven't brought enough men. How am I supposed to defend Winterfell with just this lot?", 'Is this a joke? Winterfell is the heart of the North.', "He won't find out. We've killed all the ravens. We have all the horses. I've taken Winterfell. And I will keep Winterfell.", "I don't intend to die.", 'We should bury them.', "If they haven't got the damn message yet, a few more days won't help. As you say. But it don't hurt to let 'em rot a while longer.", 'Gold for the farmer. For his trouble.', "I will kill that man. I don't care how many arrows they feather me with, how many spears they run through me, I will kill that horn-blowing cunt before I fall.", "I know I'm surrounded. I know that because I stood on the battlements and saw I was surrounded.", 'Thank you, wise bald man. Thank you for explaining siege tactics to me.', 'No word from my father?', 'Send more ravens.', 'The first time I saw Winterfell-', 'First time I saw Winterfell, it looked like something that had been here for thousands of years and would be here for thousands of years after I was dead. I saw it and I thought, "Of course, Ned Stark crushed our rebellion and killed my brothers. "We never stood a chance against the man who lives here."', "Yes, my captors were so very kind to me. You love reminding me of that. Everyone in this frozen pile of shit has always loved reminding me of that. You know what it's like to be told how lucky you are to be someone's prisoner? To be told how much you owe them? And then to go back home to your real father", 'I will kill that man. I swear to the Drowned God, the Old Gods, the New Gods, to every fucking god in every fucking heaven, I will kill that man.', "And what's your counsel, trusted friend?", "There's nowhere to run. I'd never make it back to the Iron Islands. And even if I did, even if by some miracle I slipped through the lines and made it home, I'd be a coward. The Greyjoy who ran. The shame of the family.", "I won't make it to the Wall. I won't make it ten feet past the Winterfell gates.", 'The opportunity for Jon Snow to cut my throat in my sleep.', "I've done a lot, haven't I? Things I never imagined myself doing.", "You may be right. But I've gone too far to pretend to be anything else.", "You hear that? That's the mating call of the Northmen. They want to fuck us. Well, I haven't had a good fuck in weeks. I'm ready for one.", 'They say every Ironborn man is worth a dozen from the mainland.', "You think they're right?", 'We die today, brothers. We die bleeding from a hundred wounds with arrows in our necks and spears in our guts, but our war cries will echo through eternity. They will sing about the battle of Winterfell until the Iron Islands have slipped beneath the waves. Every man, woman and child will know who we were and how long we stood. Aggar and Gelmarr, Wex and Urzen, Stygg and Black Lorren. Ironborn warriors will cry out our names as they leap onto the shores of Seagard and Faircastle.', 'Mothers will name their sons for us.', 'Girls will think of us with their lovers inside them.', 'And whoever kills that fucking horn-blower will stand in bronze above the shores of Pyke!', 'What is dead may never die!', 'Where am I? Who are you? What do you want?', 'Stop! Stop!', 'About what?', "I don't know what you want.", 'What truth?', 'I took it to-I took it-', 'No one. I took it on my own.', 'To take the North while it was vulnerable.', 'Hold it. Rule it.', 'Why did you do that?', 'I took it to bring glory to my house and my father.', 'Wait. Wait, wait, wait. I took it because I hated the Starks. I hated them for holding me prisoner. I wanted to hurt them.', 'What are you doing?', 'Please.', "I'll tell you anything. Just take it off. Please. Please, just take it off.", 'Yara?', "No, don't go. Please, please. No, please don't leave me. Please, please. Please, please don't go! Please. Please. Don't leave me. Please don't go.", 'I can ride.', "I'll make you a Lord of the Iron Islands for this.", 'Come on. Come on. Come on. Come on. Come on.', 'Come on! Come on! Come on! Come on.', 'No! No! No, no, no!', "No, please! No, no, no! No, don't!", 'No, please! No! No!', 'Wa-', 'Please.', "I'll tell you everything, please.", "If I win, you'll let me go?", 'The North.', 'Deepwood Motte.', 'Last Hearth.', 'Karhold!', 'No. It was just a guess.', 'Torrhen Karstark.', 'He was your brother. Your father is Lord Rickard Karstark.', 'You swore to tell me if I-', "Lord Rickard Karstark is Robb Stark's bannerman. I betrayed Robb. That's why you're torturing me.", 'Please, cut it off! Cut it off! Cut it off!', 'Where is he?', 'Please.', 'He sent you.', 'Help me. If he comes back-', 'Please. No. No! Mercy, please! Please, mercy! Mercy!', 'No! No! No! Please, no! No! No! No, please! Please!', 'Kill me.', 'Kill me!', 'Theon Greyjoy.', 'Th- Theon Greyjoy.', 'Please.', 'Reek. My name is Reek.', 'A fine shot, master. My lady.', "I'm sorry, my lord.", "I don't know, my lord.", 'No, my lord. Just two farm boys.', 'Yes, my lord.', 'Jon Snow is at Castle Black.', 'No!', "You can't trick me. Tell him. Tell him you couldn't trick me.", 'Not Theon! Reek! Reek! My name is Reek!', "No, you can't! You can't!", "No, I don't believe her! I know who I am! I'm Reek! Reek! Loyal Reek! Good Reek! I've always been Reek!", "I'm Reek! Loyal Reek!", 'Reward?', "I-- I didn't want them to take me. I was so scared. I didn't want them--", 'Yes, of course, my lord.', 'But how can--', 'Pretend to be who?', "I'm Theon Greyjoy, son of Balon, heir to the Iron Islands.", "I'm Reek.", 'Always. Forever.', 'Yes.', 'I was born on Pike to Balon Greyjoy. His third and last-living son. I am your prince. I swear it by the drowned god. What is dead may never die.', 'Lord Bolton took me captive after Winterfell. He sent me to treat with you in good faith as your fellow Ironborn.', "You are fading from sickness. You are badly outnumbered and you're hundreds of miles from the sea. Lord Bolton implores you to protect your men and abandon this fortress you can no longer hold. Do this and he will be just and fair with you as he is being with me. The Boltons will give you safe passage to the stony shore.", 'My own father, your king, surrendered years ago to Robert Baratheon. I watched him bend the knee. There was no shame there. He fought with honor, as did you.', "I'm sorry, I didn't hear...", "scared* You don't know.", 'whispering* Reek. Reek.', 'Reek.', "Yes. Have your men raise the white flag and open the gates. You're going home.", "Yes m'lord. Will we go home now?", "You shouldn't be here.", 'No, my lord.', 'She saw me.', 'Sansa. Lady Sansa. She came to the kennels.', "Yes. I'm sorry, master. Forgive me. I didn't think -", 'Yes, master.', "I'm sorry.", 'For killing your brothers.', "I've come to escort you to the Godswood, my lady. If you please, my lady, will you take my arm?", "Lord Ramsay, he said I'm to take your arm.", "Please. He'll punish me.", 'Sansa of the House Stark comes here to be wed. A woman grown, trueborn and noble. She comes to beg the blessings of the gods. Who comes to claim her?', "Theon of House Greyjoy. Who was… who was her father's ward.", 'Not Theon, my lady. Reek.', "You're his wife now.", "Do what he says. Do what he says or he'll hurt you.", 'It can. It can always be worse.', 'Please…', "I'm sorry. I'm sorry!", "He'll see us. You don't know him.", 'Reek, my lady, Reek!', 'Not Theon. There is no Theon. Reek.', 'I was helping you. You were trying to escape, there is no escape. Not ever. Theon Greyjoy tried to escape. The master knew. He knows everything. He hunted him, he caught him, he strapped him to a cross, and cut away piece after piece until there was no Theon left.', 'I deserved everything. I deserve to be Reek. I did terrible things. Turned on Robb. Captured Winterfell. Killed those boys.', "They weren't “those boys”, they were Bran and Rickon. They were your brothers, you'd know them since they were born.", "They weren't. They were only--", "I can't..", "I can't, not unless the master says...", "They weren't...", "They weren't Bran and Rickon! I couldn't find them. It was two farm boys. I killed them and burned them so no one would know.", "I can't talk to you anymore.", 'Not Theon, Reek!', 'Go with her. Please.', "He's coming back.", "We can't stop", 'We have to cross here', "It's the only way to throw off the hounds", "I've seen what his hounds do to a person This way is better", 'Over here Come on', 'Sansa Sansa', "Stay here. I'll lure them away", "You will Go north, only north Jon is Lord Commander at Castle Black He'll help you", 'Dead', 'She broke her leg jumping from the ramparts I left her to die in the snow', "We shouldn't be lighting fires It's not safe He won't stop hunting us", 'Jon will have me killed the moment I step through the gate', 'And the truth about the farm boys I killed in their place The truth about Ser Rodrik, who I beheaded', 'And the truth about Rob, who I betrayed', "I don't want to be forgiven I can never make amends to your family for all the things that I've done They'll keep you safer than I ever could", 'I would have taken you all the way to the Wall I would have died to get you there', 'May I take one of the horses?', 'Home', 'approaches Pyke Castle by boat.', 'I escaped.', "I'm sorry.", "I know. I know and I'm sorry.", 'He broke me. He broke me into a thousand pieces.', "You don't know.", 'Where else could I go?', 'No, no. I only heard he died after we docked.', "I didn't know.", "I don't want to be king.", "I shouldo ve listened to you. You're the only one --", 'You should rule the Iron Islands. Let me help you.', 'I am Theon Greyjoy...last living son of Balon Greyjoy.', 'And she is your rightful ruler. Those of you that have sailed under her, and there are many of you here, you know what she is.', 'She is a reaver!', 'She is a warrior!', 'She is ironborn!', 'We will find no better leader. This is our queen.', "That would have been hard to do. You weren't here. Last I heard, you were gallivanting around the world having a grand old time.", 'You were gone. Yara was here. Being Ironborn. Leading Ironborn. Getting ready to bring us back to glory.', 'Why did we have to come here?', "I don't want one.", "You think Uncle Euron's hunting for us?", "He'll find us.", "I don't want any.", 'Some bad years?', 'If I got justice, my burnt body would hang over the gates of Winterfell.', 'It was a long time ago.', "I didn't murder the Stark boys. But I did things that were just as bad or worse.", 'Not my claim. Hers.', "I'm not fit to rule.", 'Our Uncle Euron returned home after a long absence. He murdered our father and took the Salt Throne from yara. He would have murdered us if we had stayed.', "There are and Euron is building more. He's going to offer them to you.", "The Iron Fleet isn't all he's bringing. He also wants to give you --", "He murdered our father and would have murdered us. He'll murder you as soon as you have what he wants.", 'All of them.', 'Your ancestors defeated ours and took the Iron Islands. We ask you to give them back.', "It's fine.", 'Whatever my queen demands.', 'Euron has her.', "I couldn't save her. I tried.", 'GREYJOY and other Iron Born are pulling their landing boat onto the beach wading through the surf. They pull the boat onto the sand. JON SNOW, MISSANDEI, DAVOS and Dothraki guards are waiting to meet them. JON sees THEON and both men freeze and stare at each other. JON steps forward towards THEON.', "Jon. I didn't know you were here.", 'steps closer to JON.', 'Sansa, is she all right?', 'I should be.', 'Euron has her. I came to ask the queen to help get her back.', 'Where did she go?', 'Jon.', 'Can I speak with you?', "What you did in King's Landing, what you said... You couldo ve lied to Cersei about bending the knee to Daenerys. You risked everything to tell an enemy the truth.", "You've always known what was right. Even when we were all young and stupid, you always knew. Every step you take it's always the right step.", "Not compared to me, you haven't.", "I always wanted to do the right thing. Be the right kind of person. But I never knew what that meant. It always seemed like there's like there was an impossible choice I had to make. Stark or Greyjoy.", 'He was.', 'I did.', "But the things I've done.", "When I was Ramsay's prisoner, Yara tried to save me. She's the only one who tried to save me. She needs me now.", "All of us chose to follow Yara. We left the Iron Islands for Yara. She would never leave one of us behind. We're not leaving her behind.", "She's not dead.", "She's our queen", 'I did. I ran from my uncle.', "We're done with all that.", "Yara did. She made a pledge. We're going to find her, and we're going to set her free.", 'Not for me. For Yara!', 'Daenerys went north.', "You're my queen. I go where you command.", 'What is dead may never die.', 'My queen.', "She only has a few ships, and she couldn't sail them here. So, she's sailing to the Iron Islands instead, to take them back in your name.", "I want to fight for Winterfell, Lady Sansa, if you'll have me.", "He won't be. I'll stay with him. With the Ironborn. I took this castle from you. Let me defend you now.", 'They lit the trench. Bran I just want you to know... I wish... The things I did', 'Go where?', 'Here they come!', 'Steady, lads.', 'Steady now. Make every shot count.']

Name: petyr baelish
Sentence: ["But we have a Kingdom to look after. I've hoped to meet you for some time, Lord Stark. No doubt Lady Catelyn has mentioned me.", 'All too well. I still carry a token of his esteem from navel to collarbone.', "It wasn't the man that I chose, my Lord. It was Catelyn Tully. A woman worth fighting for, I'm sure you'll agree.", 'We are the lords of small matters here.', 'Mmm, how much?', "I'll have to borrow it. The Lannisters will accommodate, I expect. We already owe Lord Tywin 3 million gold. What's another 80,000?", "I'm telling you the Crown is six million in debt.", 'The Master of Coin finds the money. The King and the Hand spend it.', "As you will. But still, we'd best make our plans.", 'Cat! Go on. Go upstairs.', 'I meant no disrespect to you of all people.', "No one will come looking for you here. Isn't that what like you wanted? I'm truly sorry... about the locale.", 'A dear friend told me.', "Well well, this is an historic day. Something you don't know that I do. There's only one dagger like this in all of the Seven Kingdoms. It's mine.", "At least it was, until the tournament on Prince Joffrey's last nameday. I bet on Ser Jaime in the jousting, as any sane man would. When the Knight of the Flowers unseated him, I lost this dagger.", 'Tyrion Lannister. The Imp.', "Good news? Perhaps you'd like to share it with your wife?", 'Is she?', "I thought that she'd be safest in here. One of several such establishments I own.", 'The Starks... Quick tempers, slow minds.', "The mere suggestion that the Queen's brother tried to kill your boy would be considered treason.", "Which Lord Tyrion will say was stolen from him. The only man who could say otherwise has no throat, thanks to your boy's wolf.", "I'll try to keep you alive, for her sake. A fool's task, admittedly, but I've never been able to refuse your wife anything.", "Don't tell anyone. I have a reputation to maintain.", 'I will?', 'And every inn in the city is full and the whores are walking bow-legged.', "I hear you're reading a boring book.", "He never stops. Do you know Ser Hugh of the Vale? Not surprising. Until recently, he was only a squire... Jon Arryn's squire. He was knighted almost immediately after his master's untimely death.", "I promised Cat that I'd help you.", "A singularly bad idea. Do you see that boy there? One of Varys's little birds. The Spider has taken a great interest in your comings and goings. Now look there. That one belongs to the Queen. And do you see that Septa pretending to read her book?", "No. She's one of mine. Is there someone in your service whom you trust completely?", 'The wiser answer was no, my Lord. Get a message to this paragon of yours... Discreetly. Send him to question Ser Hugh. After that, you might want him to visit a certain armorer in the city. He lives in a large house at the top of the street of Steel.', "I have my observers, as I said, and it's possible that they saw Lord Arryn visit this armorer several times in the weeks before his death.", "Distrusting me was the wisest thing you've done since you climbed off your horse.", "Lover's quarrel?", "An old friend of the family. I've known your mother a long long time.", "No, it's quite all right. When I was a child I was very small and I come from a little spit of land called The Fingers, so you see, it's an exceedingly clever nickname.", 'Ser Gregor Clegane. They call him the Mountain. The Houndo s older brother.', "Ser Hugh of the Vale. He was Jon Arryn's squire. Look how far he's come.", "Not what you were expecting? Has anyone ever told you the story of the Mountain and the Hound? Lovely little tale of brotherly love. The Hound was just a pup, six years old maybe. Gregor a few years older, already a big lad, already getting a bit of a reputation. Some lucky boys just born with a talent for violence. One evening... Gregor found his little brother playing with a toy by the fire... Gregor's toy, a wooden knight. Gregor never said a word, he just grabbed his brother by the scruff of his neck and shoved his face into the burning coals. Held him there while the boy screamed, while his face melted. There aren't very many people who know that story.", "No, please don't. If the Hound so much as heard you mention it, I'm afraid all the knights in King's Landing would not be able to save you.", '100 gold dragons on the Mountain.', 'Now what will I buy with 100 gold dragons? A dozen barrels of Dornish wine? Or a girl from the pleasure houses of Lys?', 'And tell me, Lord Renly, when will you be having your friend?', 'Loras knew his mare was in heat. Quite crafty, really.', 'No honor but quite a bit of gold.', 'You do move quietly.', 'You look a bit lonely today. You should pay a visit to my brothel this evening. First boy is on the house.', 'Am I? All those birds that whisper in your ear, such pretty little things. Trust me, we accommodate all inclinations.', "I'm a purveyor of beauty and discretion, both equally important.", 'All desires are valid to a man with a full purse.', "Strictly speaking, such a thing would not be in accordance with the King's laws.", "Tell me. Does someone, somewhere, keep your balls in a little box? I've often wondered.", 'Since you last saw me or since I last saw you?', 'Saw me with your own eyes?', 'Council business. We all have so much to discuss with Ned Stark.', 'One shudders at the thought.', 'But you know something? I do believe that I have seen you even more recently than you have seen me.', 'Yes. Earlier today, I distinctly recall seeing you talking to Lord Stark in his chambers.', "And not long after that when I saw you escorting a certain foreign dignitary... Council business? Of course you would have friends from across The Narrow Sea. You're from there yourself, after all. We're friends, aren't we, Lord Varys? I'd like to think we are. So you can imagine my burden, wondering if the King might question my friendo s sympathies… To stand at a crossroads where turning left means loyalty to a friend, turning right, loyalty to the realm.", 'To find myself in a position where a simple word to the King --', 'To a small council meeting?', "Jorah Mormont's a slaver, not a traitor. Small difference, I know, to an honorable man.", 'When you find yourself in bed with an ugly woman, best close your eyes, get it over with. Cut her throat. Be done with it.', 'His Grace went on about you at some length after you took your leave. The word "treason" was mentioned.', 'When do you return to Winterfell?', "If you're still here come nightfall, I'll take you to see the last person Jon Arryn spoke with before falling ill. If that sort of thing still interests you.", "It won't take more than an hour. But as you please.", "Brothels make a much better investment than ship, I've found. Whores rarely sink.", 'Well, he has more than you, for a start.', 'Does it matter? If you fuck enough women, some of them will give you presents.', "He was the King's Hand. Perhaps Robert wanted them looked after. He was overcome with fatherly love.", "What's the meaning of this, Lannister?", "My Lords! I'll bring the City Watch!", "Fish. The sigil of House Tully. Isn't that your wife's House - Tully - my Lord Hand?", 'That sounds like someone we know. The Mountain.', "I've heard him called “Tywin Lannister's mad dog.” I'm sure you have as well. Can you think of any reason the Lannisters might possibly have for being angry with your wife?", 'It would be almost as brazen as attacking the Hand of the King in the streets of the capital.', "A bold move, my Lord, and admirable. But is it wise to yank the lion's tail? Tywin Lannister is the richest man in all the Seven Kingdoms. Gold wins wars, not soldiers.", "No no no no! Is that what they teach you up in the North? And you-- wherever you're from, do you have any idea how ridiculous you sound? Either of you understand a thing that I'm saying?", "Let's start over, shall we? You be the man and you be the woman.", "I'm saving myself for another.", 'A stupid saying.', 'No, not really. Impeccable bloodlines though.', 'For many years. Most of my life really.', 'Oh no. He got himself killed before the wedding.', 'Oh, everything, my dear. Everything there is.', 'My Lord protector.', 'So when the King dies...', 'So it would seem. Unless...', 'And he cannot take the throne without your help.', 'You are now Hand of the King and Protector of the Realm.', "You'll need someone to share these burdens. I assure you, my price would be modest.", 'Only if we lose.', 'So it will be Stannis and war?', 'So why did you call me here? Not for my wisdom, clearly.', 'Look at you. You know what you want me to do.', 'Now!', 'I did warn you not to trust me.', 'The girl is innocent, Your Grace.', 'A naked Knight, apparently.', "Do you deny your father's crime?", "lt's hard for them to simper and bow without heads.", 'And what would you do, my friend, if you found yourself sitting up there?', "You must be one of the few men in the city who isn't a man.", "When they castrated you, did they take the pillar with the stones? l've always wondered.", "l picture a gash. Like a woman's. ls that about right?", 'Must be strange for you, even after all these years… a man from another land, despised by most, feared by all.', "But you carry on whispering in one king's ear and then the next. l admire you.", "A useful talent, l'm sure you'd agree.", 'Playing our roles.', 'Long may he reign. My king.', "We have enough wheat for a five-year winter. If it lasts any longer, , we'll have fewer peasants.", 'Your Grace.', 'Of course, Your Grace.', "If she's escaped the capital, Winterfell seems the logical destination.", 'Curious.', "Well, you could ask Varys where she is. He'll have an answer for you. Whether you believe it,,, Myself, I have always had a hard time trusting eunuchs. Who knows what they want?", 'Yes.', "I'm glad you like it. Some people are fortunate enough to be born into the right family. Others have to find their own way.", "When boys and girls live in the same home, awkward situations can arise. Sometimes, I've heard, even brothers and sisters develop certain affections. And when these affections become common knowledge, well, that is an awkward situation, indeed. Especially in a prominent family. But prominent families often forget a simple truth, I've found.", 'Knowledge is power.', "That's why they're called wildlings.", 'One moment, my friend. A moment.', 'Please accept my sincerest apologies. Ramka will take good care of you.', 'Shhh. Did he hurt you?', 'Who?', 'Ah, yes, that was poorly handled. Sometimes those with the most power have the least grace.', "You know, you remind me of another girl. A lovely thing I once acquired from an Elysium pleasure house. Beautiful, like yourself, and intelligent as yourself. But she wasn't happy. She cried, often. I asked her why but, we didn't have the kind of rapport that you and I have. Yes, it was quite sad. Girls from Elysium pleasure houses are expensive. Extremely expensive. And this one wasn't making me any money. I hate bad investments. Really, I do. They haunt me. I had no idea how to make her happy, no idea how to mitigate my losses. A very wealthy patron, he offered me a tremendous amount of money to let him transform this lovely, sad girl. To use her in ways that never occur to most men. And you know what occurs to most men. I would not say he succeeded in making her happy but my losses were definitely mitigated. . Take tonight off to mourn Mhaegen's child. I'll see you tomorrow. But you'll be happy? . That makes me happy.", 'Tell no one what?', 'She imprisoned you. She tried to execute you. And you offer her son a princess?', 'And I suppose you want me to broker this agreement?', "Yes, I could sing this song to Lysa, if I cared to.
