What's in it for me?", 'Harrenhal is cursed.', "With a single stroke, you'd make me one of the greatest lords in the realm.", 'So did Janos Slynt, and he was given Harrenhal, too. Until you snatched it away.', "The Queen mustn't know.", "I don't appreciate being made a fool of, dwarf. If Myrcella marries the Martell boy, she can't very well marry Robin Arryn, can she?", "And Harrenhal, I suppose that's off the table as well.", 'Leave me out of your next deception.', 'Robb Stark will never release the Kingslayer.', 'Your Grace.', "I'm a practical man.", "And who would you have me be loyal to? Your brother's corpse?", 'You still have many friends at court, Your Grace, many who believe Ned Stark erred by not supporting your claim.', 'I would give priority to my head.', "I understand that you don't like me, and while that saddens me greatly, I did not come here today seeking your affection. When you march on King's Landing, you may find yourself facing a protracted siege or open gates.", 'All of these tents look the same to me. Would you be so kind-', 'Your tent"? Not "Our tent"? The king snores, perhaps? Or simply prefers solitude? Pressures of command, no doubt. Four kings vying for the throne.', "If war were arithmetic, the mathematicians would rule the world. I did notice your brother entering His Grace's tent just now.", "And on the night of your wedding, who was by the king's side then?", 'Your marriage is quite interesting. Not only to me, but to the realm. The marriage of a wealthy girl always breeds interest, if nothing else.', "I've been unlucky in my affections, sadly.", 'You may have heard false reports.', 'Betrayed? I wanted him to serve as Protector of the Realm. I begged him to seize the moment.', 'No, my lady.', "Cat, I've I've loved you since I was a boy. It seems to me that fate has given us this chance", 'Do you want to see your girls again? Sansa, more beautiful than ever? And Arya, just as wild as ever?', 'Both girls are healthy and safe. For now. But you know the Queen and you know Joffrey. I fear for their longevity if they remain in the capital.', 'The Lannisters will trade your daughters for the Kingslayer.', "I'm not bringing these terms to him. I'm bringing them to you.", "Robb has surprised them all with his skills in battle, but he's not a mother. Consider it, Cat. You may not get another chance. I've brought you a gift.", 'Your husband was an honorable man. He should rest beside his family in the crypts beneath Winterfell. You may not believe', 'My lord, my lady.', "Stannis will be here in an hour. When he arrives, Renly's bannermen will flock to him. Your former companions will fight for the privilege of selling you to their new king.", 'You will note that I am standing here talking to you, not Stannis.', 'Stannis.', 'Tell me, Ser Loras, what do you desire most in this world?', "I have always found that to be the purest of motivations, but you won't have a chance to put your sword through Stannis, not today. You'll be cut to pieces before he sets foot on solid ground. If it is justice that you want, be smart about it.", 'He was, Your Grace.', 'Do you want to be a queen?', 'Lord Tywin.', 'Thank you.', "I traveled here directly from Renly Baratheon's camp.", 'So they say. There has been talk of other forces at work. Dark forces.', 'It is my belief that a moment of chaos affords opportunities lost soon after.', 'After the Lannisters and the Starks, the Tyrells command the largest host. Their lands are the most fertile in the Seven Kingdoms, feeding horses and soldiers.', "The Tyrells have not yet declared for any of the surviving kings. Loras wants revenge. He blames Stannis for Renly's death. And Margaery-", 'Yes, she does.', 'They did. And perhaps that treason should be punished one day, after Stannis and Robb Stark are defeated.', "If you will allow me to represent your family's interests, I believe that an advantageous agreement TYWIN", 'They have.', "It's only wine.", 'Tonight, with your leave.', "On your son Tyrion's directive, I met with Catelyn Stark.", 'He had an interesting proposal for her concerning her daughters.', 'You honor me beyond words, Your Grace. I shall have to acquire some sons and grandsons.', 'My lady. My sincerest condolences.', "You shouldn't say that. You'll be good enough for many things. He'll still enjoy beating you. And now that you're a woman, he'll be able to enjoy you in other ways as well.", "He'll let you go home? Joffrey's not the sort of boy who gives away his toys. You have a tender heart, just like your mother did at your age. I can see so much of her in you. She was like a sister to me. For her sake, I'll help get you home.", "Look around you. We're all liars here. And every one of us is better than you.", 'Lovely day for it. Watching the ships.', 'Might I speak with Lady Sansa alone for a moment?', "I saw your mother not long ago. She's very eager to see you. And your sister.", "You said King's Landing was your home. You are the property of the crown. Stealing you would be treason. If you were to tell just one person ...", 'How do I know?', "I'm waiting for word on an assignment that will take me far away from the capital. When I set sail, I might be able to take you with me. But you'll need to be ready to leave on a moment's notice.", 'For which I am extremely grateful to you, my lord. Lady Arryn and I have known each other since we were children. She has always been positively predisposed toward me.', 'Titles do seem to breed titles.', "I'm surprised you're surprised. This is the safest place in the city.", 'Thank you, my dear.', 'I hear you owe that boy a significant debt.', 'You should have him knighted.', 'If only. I owe you a significant debt. Our redheaded friend. You secured her release when the queen detained her.', 'Apparently, Her Grace believed that you two had some sort of special relationship.', 'I know.', 'I know. But how would the queen get that idea?', 'Keep a low profile.', 'Well, you are richer than I am.', "They're only numbers. Numbers on paper. Once you understand that, it's easy to make them behave. Trivial even. You want a real challenge? Try whores.", 'Your Grace.', 'Of course, Your Grace.', 'I see. And have you shared these suspicions with Lord Tywin?', 'Myself, I often find them a hindrance.', 'I shall do my best.', 'I assure you that it will.', "That didn't take long.", "Is he? And who's the lucky girl?", "She may not be the grandest ship in the world or the fastest, but she's mine. I've always wanted a ship. Now I want a dozen. Strange, isn't it?", "It doesn't matter what we want, once we get it, then we want something else. Your hair is different.", 'Lady Margaery wears it that way.', "I have good news. I'll be leaving the city soon.", "It's not a question of what I want. It's what you want. You want to go home, don't you?", "I hope you know that I'm your friend, Sansa. Your true friend.", 'Petyr.', 'If you wish to stay, then of course you will stay.', "We'll speak again when I return.", "There aren't. There aren't even two hundred. I've counted.", 'Early days, my friend. It is flattering, really, you feeling such dread at the prospect of me getting what I want.', "You're so right. For instance, when I thwarted your plan to give Sansa Stark to the Tyrells. If I'm going to be honest, I did feel an unmistakable sense of enjoyment there. But your confidant, the one who fed you information about my plans, the one you swore to protect, you didn't bring her any enjoyment. And she didn't bring me any enjoyment. She was a bad investment on my part. Luckily, I have a friend who wanted to try something new. Something daring. And he was so grateful to me for providing this fresh experience.", "The realm? Do you know what the realm is? It's the thousand blades of Aegon's enemies. A story we agree to tell each other over and over till we forget that it's a lie.", "Chaos isn't a pit. Chaos is a ladder.", 'Many who try to climb it fail and never get to try again. The fall breaks them.', 'And some are given a chance to climb, but they refuse. They cling to the realm or the gods or love. Illusions. Only the ladder is real. The climb is all there is.', 'Petyr... Are you hurt, my lady?', "Good. Good. I'm sure you've had quite a fright. Rest easy. The worst is past. Ser Dontos shouts up from his boat.", 'Softly, my friend... Voices carry over water.', "Shh. You don't want the queen to hear, do you? 1,000 gold cloaks are searching for you. And if they found you, how do you think they would punish the girl who murdered the king?", 'I know. I know. But you must admit it looks suspicious. The king who executed your father, who tormented you for years, and you fled the scene of his murder.', "Because he was a drunk and a fool and I don't trust drunk fools.", "Saved you? My lady, he followed my orders. Every one of them. And he did it all for gold. Money buys a man's silence for a time. A bolt in the heart buys it forever.", 'Yes, and he gave you a priceless necklace that once belonged to his grandmother. The last legacy of House Hollard.', 'I had it made a few weeks ago. What did I once tell you about the capital?', "Come, my lady. I know you've had a difficult day. But you're safe now. I promise you that. You're safe with me and sailing home.", "I'm getting married to your Aunt Lysa. She's waiting for us at the Eyrie. You'll be safe there.", "Did I kill Joffrey? I've been in the Vale for weeks.", 'And who helped me with this conspiracy?', 'Why not?', 'Then perhaps it was your husband.', 'How do you know?', "You're right. He wasn't involvedi n Joffrey's death. But you were. Do you remember that lovely necklace Dontos gave you? I don't suppose you noticed that a stone was missing after the feast.", "A man with no motive is a man no one suspects. Always keep your foes confused. If they don't know who you are or what you want, they can't know what you plan to do next.", "So many men they risk so little. They spend their lives avoiding danger. And then they die. I'd risk everything to get what I want.", 'Everything. My friendship with the Lannisters was productive. But Joffrey, a vicious boy with a crown on his head, is not a reliable ally. And who could trust a friend like that?', "I don't want friends like me. My new friends are predictable. Very reasonable people. As for what happened to Joffrey, well, that was something my new friends wanted very badly. Nothing like a thoughtful gift to make a new friendship grow strong.", 'Pull up your hood. A memorable shade.', "You know what kind of stories poor men enjoy the most? Ones about rich girls they'll never meet.", "The mountains are impassable. If you want to get to the Eyrie, you need to go through the Bloody Gate. It doesn't matter how large your army is, if you attack this gate, you do it on this road, three men abreast and get slaughtered like goats. The first Lords of the Vale didn't have much, but they had these mountains and they knew how to use them. And the fortress they built here has never been overcome. Not once in a thousand years. Know your strengths, use them wisely, and one man can be worth ten thousand.", 'Lord Petyr Baelish and his niece, Alayne.', 'My lord.', 'Oh. I have brought you a gift.', 'My lady.', "Go. We'll speak soon.", 'Arranging for the ascension of King Tommen I, extricating Sansa, getting her here alive.', 'Ought we not... inform the Lords of the Vale about the ceremony?', 'I do think that we could wait until...', 'Like it was yesterday.', 'The deed is done. Faded into nothing. Only speaking of it can make it real.', 'Tonight it is, then.', "Let me bathe and dress for the occasion. Once I'm presentable, I'll call on the septon immediately.", 'Children.', 'Yes, I saw.', 'No, his mother should have a long time ago. Consider it a step in the right direction.', 'Let me worry about Aunt Lysa.', 'A lot can happen between now and never. If you want to build a better home, first you must demolish the old one.', "I loved your mother more than you could ever know. Given the opportunity, what do we do to those who've hurt the ones we love? In a better world, one where love could overcome strength and duty, you might have been my child. But we don't live in that world.", "You're more beautiful than she ever was.", 'Call me Petyr.', 'Lysa! Let her go.', 'Let her go.', "I'll send her away. I swear on my life. I swear to all the gods. Let her go, Lysa.", 'Oh, my sweet wife. My sweet, silly wife.', 'I have only loved one woman... only one, my entire life. Your sister.', 'Lord Arryn will never be a great warrior.', "Some boys develop more slowly. He's still young.", 'He has other gifts.', "The gift of a great name. Sometimes that's all one needs.", "I have no doubt that upon my return, Robin's skills will have improved immeasurably.", 'I did.', 'We are.', "Lord Royce may be as honorable as he thinks he is, but he's not alone in that castle. Do you trust all those knights and ladies, stable boys and serving girls?", "No. But I pay them well, and they've seen what happens to men who disappoint me.", "So a land so far from here, even Cersei Lannister can't get her hands on you.", 'You are becoming an observant young lady.', 'An old saying. Inaccurate in this case.', 'My marriage proposal has been accepted.', 'Do you like the taste?', 'It gives some men courage.', 'We\'ve met. With Renly Baratheon. What did he say about you? He said, "You\'re a loyalty comes free of charge." Someone appears to have paid quite a bit for it since then.', "Please, Lady Brienne. No need for such formality. You are Catelyn Stark's sworn sword?", 'Strange. I knew Cat from the time we were children. She never mentioned you.', 'Ah, yes. You were accused of killing him.', 'But you were accused.', 'Then what did happen?', 'A shadow? With a face? This woman swore to protect Renly; she failed. She swore to protect your mother; she failed. Why would I want somebody with your history of failure guiding Lady Sansa?', "Because I am her uncle. I married her Aunt Lysa shortly before my belovedo s untimely death. We're family now, and you're an outsider. Forgive me, Lady Brienne, but experiences made me wary of outsiders.", "We don't want our new friend wandering the countryside alone. The roads of these parts aren't safe. Why don't you stay?", "Yes. A bit shabby, isn't it? You've been here before.", 'Home.', 'No.', 'He did.', 'For now.', 'Winterfell is your home.', "Always. You're a Stark. Dyeing your hair doesn't change that. You're Sansa Stark. The eldest surviving child of Ned and Catelyn Stark. Your place is in the North.", "You're not marrying Roose Bolton. No, you'll be marrying his son and heir, Ramsay. One day he'll be Warden of the North and you will -", 'Sansa -', "I won't force you to do anything. Don't you know by now how much I care for you? Say the word and we turn the horses round, but listen to me. Listen. . You've been running all your life. Terrible things happened to your family and you weep. You sit alone in a darkened room, mourning their fates. You've been a bystander to tragedy from the day they executed your father. Stop being a bystander, do you hear me? Stop running. There's no justice in the world. Not unless we make it. You loved your family. Avenge them.", "I hope so too. I've become quite fond of Lady Sansa during our travels together. She's suffered enough.", "I've heard very little about you. Which makes you quite a rare thing, as lords go.", 'He seems pleased.', "I assure you she's still a virgin. Tyrion never consummated the marriage. By the law of the land, she's no man's wife. Inspect her, if you must.", "Then I have delivered everything I've promised.", "The Lannister name doesn't mean what it once did. Tywin is dead. He kept his house in power through sheer will. Without him, Jaime has one hand and no allies, Tommen is a soft boy, not a king to fear.", 'Queen Margaery adores Sansa. Cersei is Queen Mother, a title whose importance wanes with each passing day.', 'A message for me, you say. Strange that the seal is broken.', "Every ambitious move is a gamble. You gambled when you drove a dagger into Robb Stark's heart. It appears that your gamble paid off. You're Warden of the North.", "The Eyrie is mine. The last time the lords of the Eyrie formed an alliance with the lords of the North, they brought down the greatest dynasty this world has ever known. I'd like to borrow one of your birds. Cersei will expect a reply.", 'I thought I might find you here. . Your Aunt Lyanna.', "I saw her once. I was a boy, living with your mother's family. Lord Whent had a great tourney at Harrenhal. Everyone was there. The Mad King, your father, Robert Baratheon. And Lyanna, she was already promised to Robert. You can imagine what it was like for me, a boy from nowhere, with nothing to his name, watching these legendary men, tilting at the lists. The last two riders were Barristan Selmy and Rhaegar Targaryen. When Rhaegar won, everyone cheered for the prince. I remember the girls laughing when he took off his helmet and they saw that silver hair. How handsome he was. Until he rode right past his wife, Elia Martell, and all the smiles died. I've never seen so many people so quiet. He rode past his wife, and he lay a crown of winter roses in Lyanna's lap. Blue as frost. How many tens of thousands had to die because Rhaegar chose your aunt?", "Come. . Let's speak somewhere the dead can't hear us. .", 'I am.', "King's Landing.", 'Cersei sent for me. . We must not let her sniff out any trouble.', "I know how hard it is to live with people you despise, believe me. But it won't be for long.", "Stannis Baratheon garrisons at Castle Black. He'll march south to King's Landing before the winter snows block his way. But first, he has to take Winterfell.", "I do. Once he liberates these lands from the Boltons he'll rally your father's bannermen to his cause. With the North behind him, Stannis can finally take the Iron Throne.", "He has a larger army. He's the finest military commander in Westeros. A betting man would put his money on Stannis. . As it happens, I am a betting man.", "Stannis takes Winterfell, he rescues you from the most despised family in the North. Grateful for your late father's courageous support for his claim, he names you Wardeness of the North.", 'You are the last surviving Stark. He needs you.', 'Then you will take this Bolton boy, Ramsay, and make him yours.', "Of course you do. He's already fallen for you.", "He should, he's a dangerous man. But even the most dangerous men can be outmaneuvered. And you've learnt to maneuver from the very best. . I return before too long. . You'll be strong without me. . The North will be yours. Do you believe me?", 'Yes? Lancel Lannister.', "That's quite a family to abandon.", 'Well done.', "I'm here on urgent business for the Queen Mother. Should I send word that I'll be delayed?", 'We both peddle fantasies, Brother Lancel. Mine just happen to be entertaining.', "Do you think it's wise, your Grace, arresting the heir to Highgarden?", 'Of course. And the Faith were armed on your orders.', "House Tyrell won't tolerate these insults.", "One's choice of companion is a curious thing.", 'Lysa was a good woman. A kind woman.', 'I know how hard it can be to lose both of your parents at such a young age.', 'Young Lord Robyn heeds my advice. And I have always counseled loyalty to the throne.', "There is another matter, your Grace. Something so urgent I couldn't trust the words to a raven. You once charged me with finding Arya Stark. To my shame I failed you. But I have found Sansa Stark. Alive, and well, and home again. In Winterfell.", 'My sources are well placed. They tell me Roose Bolton plans to marry her to his son, Ramsay, a bastard recently legitimized by King Tommen.', 'Indeed. As reward for stabbing his own king in the heart.', 'Marrying his son to the last of the Starks gives him more legitimacy in the North than an alliance with a hated southern house.', 'I would counsel patience, your grace.', "Stannis Baratheon is also a traitor, marching with his army on Winterfell. Let Stannis and Roose battle, let the enemies of the throne slaughter each other and when they're done seize Winterfell from whichever thief survives.", 'That is why it is critical to strike soon, while the victor still licks his wounds. Surely your Uncle Kevan could muster a force.', 'Ser Jaime, then.', 'Perhaps I can help. The Knights of the Vale are some of the best fighters in Westeros, trained to battle in the ice and the snow.', "You wouldn't risk a single Lannister soldier or a single coin from the Royal Treasury. What do you have to lose, a brothel keeper?", 'Name me Warden of the North.', "I'll not rest until the lion flies over Winterfell.", 'As I said. I live to serve.', "I'm sorry about the locale.", 'It felt like the safest place.', "It was an establishment like no other. The sheer range of appetites catered to, desires that didn't exist until we invented them.", "The past is the past. The future is all that's worth discussing. The future of House Tyrell.", 'I promise you..', "Cersei summoned me to King's Landing. I dared not refuse her.", 'A piece of info that she know that I had. Neither silence nor lies were an option. But I have other information of which she is unaware. And as you say, our interests are aligned. I have a gift for you.', 'The same kind I gave Cersei. A handsome young man.', 'The Defender of the Vale!', 'My lord Come and see', 'I missed your name day Go on', 'A gyrfalcon The greatest and rarest of birds', 'Indeed I was', 'On our way to the Fingers, we were set upon by a large force of Bolton men Seemed to know exactly when we were traveling and exactly whom we were transporting', 'Tell me, Lord Royce, how many people knew of my travel plans with Sansa Stark? I shared my intentions with you and no one else', 'Your home is the Vale The Lord of the Vale stands before us And only his judgment concerns me', 'Lord Royce has served the Vale well He;s enjoyed a distinguished military career If we could trust his absolute loyalty, he would make a capable commander in the wars to come', 'I think he deserves one more chance What do you say?', "I bring good news My friends in the North tell me Sansa has escaped Winterfell I expect she's headed to Castle Black where her brother serves as Lord Commander But she won't be safe there, not with the Boltons after her", 'That was my instinct as well', 'Our lord has spoken Gather the Knights of the Vale The time has come to join the fray', 'Sansa. Lady Brienne. When I heard you had escaped WInterfell, I feared the worst. You have no idea how happy I am to see you unharmed.', "I rode north with the Knights of the Vale to come to your aid. They're encamped at Moat Cailin as we speak.", "I can't begin to contemplate --", 'He beat you.', 'Sansa, I --', 'Did he cut you?', "I didn't know.", 'I made a mistake, a horrible mistake. I underestimated a stranger.', "I'm so sorry.", 'And I will. You must believe me when I tell you that I will.', "Do you want me to beg for my life? If that's what you want, I will. Whatever you ask that is in my power, I will do.", 'Then I will die.', "I would do anything to undo what's been done to you. I know that I can't. Will you allow me to say one more thing before I go? Your great-uncle Brynden the Blackfish has gathered what remains of the Tully forces and retaken Riverrun. You might consider seeking him out. The time may come when you need an army loyal to you.", "Your brother's army.", 'Half-brother.', 'I delivered his bones myself. I presented them to Lady Catlyn as a gesture of goodwill from Tyrion Lannister. It seems like a lifetime ago. Do give Lord Tyrion my best when you see him.', "I was sorry when he died. Your father and I had our differences but he loved Cat very much. So did I. She wasn't fond of you, was she? Well, it appears she vastly underestimated you. Your father and brothers are gone, yet here you stand King in the North. Last best hope against the coming storm.", 'Forgive me. We have never talked properly. I wanted to remedy that.', "Not even thank you? If it weren't for me you'd have been slaughtered at that battlefield. You have many enemies, My King, but I swear to you I'm not one of them. I love Sansa as I loved her mother.", 'Command suits you. The northerns are all facing north worried about the threat beyond the wall.', 'I know Cersei better than anyone here. If you turn your back on her --', 'I only meant to say --', 'One of two things will happen. Either the dead will defeat the living, in which case all our troubles come to an end. Or life will win out. And what then?', "Don't fight in the north or the south. Fight every battle everywhere always in your mind. Everyone is your enemy, everyone is your friend, every possible series of events is happening all at once. Live that way and nothing will surprise you. Everything that happens will be something that you've seen before.", 'This is for you.', 'flips the knife in his hand and extends it towards BRAN.', 'The last man who wielded it meant to cut your throat, but your mother fought him off.', "The other dagger, the one that took her life, I would have stopped that dagger with my own heart if I could have. I wasn't there for her when she needed me most. But I am here for her now. To do what she would have done, to protect her children. Anything I can do for you, Brandon, you need only ask.", "No. That very question was what started the War of the Five Kings. In a way, that dagger made you what you are today. Forced from your home, driven out to the wilds beyond the Wall. I imagine you've seen things most men wouldn't believe.", 'hands the sheath of the knife to BRAN. BRAN slides the knife into the sheath.', 'To go through all of that and make your way home again only to find such chaos in the world, I can only imagine --', "I'm sorry to have disturbed you, Lord Stark.", 'stands up to leave.', 'bows and walks past Meera and closes the door.', 'reads the note then looks at WOLKAN.', 'Are you sure this is the only copy at Winterfell?', 'Lady Stark thanks you for your service.', "It's not easy for ravens to fly in these storms. Perhaps Jon tried to send word earlier.", "I can't believe he'd surrender the Northern crown without consulting you.", "I've heard gossip that the Dragon Queen is quite beautiful.", 'Jon is young and unmarried. Daenerys is young and unmarried.', "An alliance makes sense. Together, they'd be difficult to defeat. He was named King.", 'You are family, too. Would Arya really murder her own sister?', 'Only by reputation. They worship the God of Death, I believe. I never trust godly men.', "She's your sister", 'Why did she come to Winterfell?', 'Why did she unearth the letter Cersei made you write?', 'And after she murders you, what does she become?', "Lady Sansa, forgive me I'm a bit confused.", 'I did it to protect you.', 'Whatever your aunt', 'I know of no such letter.', 'I deny it! None of you were there to see what happened. None of you knows the truth.', "Lady Sansa, I have known you since you were a girl. I've protected you.", 'If we could speak alone, I can explain everything.', 'Sansa, please.', 'Give me a chance to defend myself. I deserve that.', 'I am Lord Protector of the Vale and I command you to escort me safely back to the Eyrie.', 'Sansa, I beg you! I loved your mother since the time I was a boy.', 'I loved you. More than anyone.', 'Sansa! I--']

Name: bran stark
Sentence: ['Jon said he was a deserter.', 'Our way is the old way?', 'Is it true he saw the White Walkers?', 'So he was lying?', "Where will they go? Their mother's dead.", 'NO!', 'Please, father!', 'What about you?', "I saw the king! He's got hundreds of people!", "But he's coming right now! Down our road!", 'I promise.', 'What?', 'Come on, you.', 'Ten', 'I hate your stories.', "Those weren't my favorites. My favorites were the scary ones.", 'Maybe we do.', "I did though. It's true, isn't it... what Maester Luwin says about my legs? I'd rather be dead.", "I'd rather be dead.", "I don't want to see anyone.", "I don't want to go.", 'Kneel, Hodor.', 'Yes. Well, I mean I did like to.', "I'm not a cripple.", 'Will I really be able to ride?', 'The Iron Islands. Sigil - a Kraken. Words - "We do not sow".', 'The Greyjoys.', "Sigil - a stag. - A crowned stag now that Robert's King.", 'Words - "Ours is the fury". Lords - the Baratheons.', 'The Westerlands - sigil - a lion.', 'Words - "A Lannister always pays his debts."', 'Lords - the Lannisters.', "I don't know them.", 'Unbowed, unbent, unbroken".', 'Righteous in wrath".', 'Family, duty, honor".', 'Family, duty, honor"... Is that the right order?', 'Family comes first?', "How can she protect the family, if she's not with her family?", 'And then she left!', 'Why did she leave?', 'Do you know where she is now? Today?', "Then how can you promise me she'll be home soon?", "I'll never shoot another arrow.", 'You need legs to work a bow.', 'Really?', 'Come on, Dancer.', 'Robb?', "I'm not alone, my brother is with me.", "I can't. The saddle, the straps.", "I'm Brandon Stark of Winterfell and if you don't let me be, I'll have you all killed!", 'Robb!', "No, don't.", "Yes, it doesn't hurt.", 'lt had three eyes. lt told me to come with him, so l did. We went down into the crypts and my father was there.', "You're afraid. Just like Hodor.", "You've lived beyond the Wall. What are you scared of? l'm a crippled boy and l'm willing to go.", "That's my grandfather, Lord Rickard. He was burned alive by the Mad King, Aerys. That's Lyanna, my father's sister. King Robert was supposed to marry her, but Rhaegar Targaryen kidnapped her. Robert started a war to win her back. He killed Rhaegar, but she died anyway. That's where l saw Father.", 'Rickon!', 'What are you doing down here? Come back up with us.', "How many times have l told you? He's in King's Landing with Sansa and Arya.", 'Saw him when?', "King Robb. And it's not his war. He didn't choose it.", 'Joffrey killed my father, your liege lord. Do you remember your vows, Ser?', "I didn't like the way he was talking about Robb.", "Don't have any pain.", 'That way.', "I don't dream.", "I don't. Heard some of the men talking about the comet. . They say it's an omen. They say it means Robb will win a great victory in the South.", "The dragons are all dead. They've been dead for centuries.", "Every night it's the same.", "I'm walking and running, but I'm not I'm not me. I'm running through the godswood, sniffing the dirt, tasting blood in my mouth when I've made a fresh kill, howling. Old Nan used to tell me stories about magical people who could live inside stags, birds, wolves.", "So she was lying? They don't exist?", 'No, my dreams are different. Mine are true. I dreamt of my father dying. And Rickon had the same dream.', 'We can send two orphan boys from Winterstown home with you to help watch over your flock if you can give them room and board.', "Stop it. If that's everyone, I'm going to go for a ride before dark.", 'Hodor.', 'We have to help them.', "If we can't protect our own bannermen, why should they protect us? Go, Ser Rodrik. Take the men you need.", 'So, what does it mean?', "I did ask him. He'd never heard of a three-eyed raven.", "You're lying.", 'You know what it means.', "You didn't give me an honest answer.", "Well, it's not far off.", 'I dreamt that the sea came to Winterfell. I saw waves crashing against the gates and the water came flowing over the walls. It flooded the castle. Drowned men were floating here, in the yard. Ser Rodrik was one of them.', "I know. It's just a stupid dream.", 'Osha. The three-eyed raven, what do they say about it north of the Wall?', 'Theon?', 'Why?', 'You went with Robb.', "I don't know.", "I won't.", "I won't. I'll never yield. We'll fight you and throw you out.", 'Theon. Did you hate us the whole time?', "I've yielded Winterfell to Theon.", "I've yielded Winterfell to Prince Theon. You all know me.", 'Farlen, you be silent.', 'All of you should do as he commands.', 'No! You said no harm would come to them if I yielded.', 'No! No! Theon! Please. Ser Rodrik!', "I'm begging you.", 'Stop. Stop! Stop right now!', 'Please, stop this. Please stop him.', 'You said no harm would come! You said no harm would come. Theon, please.', "Theon, please don't.", "I'll do anything, please! No, please stop it!", "We couldn't risk going to the kitchens.", "And if Theon found out, he'd hang them.", 'Wait, I know that farm. I sent those two Winterfell orphans there.', "We can't risk it. If Theon tracks us here, he'll torture them until he finds out where we are.", "They'll be after us with hounds.", 'Osha, what are you doing?', 'Tell us what medicine to get from your chambers.', 'They burned it down. They burned everything.', "I don't want to leave you.", 'Father?', 'Why not?', "It's all right, Hodor.", 'No, it was the three-eyed raven.', "I tried to kill it, but I couldn't. There was a boy.", 'But you asked.', "I didn't ask for black magic dreams.", "We don't know who might be after us. No one even knows we're alive.", 'No.', "Where's Rickon and Hodor?", "What's out there?", "It's all right. The wolves will protect him.", "Only when I'm asleep.", "It's not just wolves. Sometimes in my dreams there's a-", "You've seen it?", 'Does it have anything to do with warging?', "Seeing things that haven't happened yet?", 'When my father died, I dreamt it.', 'You have the sight, too?', 'Your father is Howland Reed? Yeah.', "He saved my father's life during the rebellion.", 'What else have you seen?', 'How?', 'Mother.', "Mother, I need to find it. It's here. It's calling me.", 'Mother! Mother!', "You're both very good at skinning rabbits.", 'Stop it!', "You've been fighting since you met. Just stop it.", "You've been nasty to her every day. Of course she's nasty back.", "First time I met you, you held a knife at me. We can't fight each other. We'll never make it to the Wall. I want you both to make peace.", 'Osha!', "He's having one now?", 'You saw him? At Castle Black?', "It's all right, Osha.", "The raven's been coming to me ever since I fell from that tower. He wants me to find him. I don't have my legs anymore. This is what I have now.", 'What if I belong in the North? What if I fell from that tower for a reason?', "You don't understand. You don't know.", "The Gift, I think. Brandon The Builder gave all this land south of the Wall to the Night's Watch for their sustenance and support. Maester Luwin taught me that.", 'Wildlings.', 'Sorry. But they come over the Wall and raid, steal, carry off women.', "I don't see any.", "How are we going to get past the Wall? My uncle said it's 700 feet high.", 'How did you get past it?', 'It would take us two months to get to the Bay of Seals.', "Even Hodor's not strong enough to climb the Wall with me on his back.", 'My uncle said the gates were sealed with ice and stone when the castles were deserted.', 'Hunting.', 'To Hodor] Hush, Hodor. No, no more Hodoring.', 'Hodor, calm down.', 'Hodor, be quiet.', 'Hodor, calm down. Hodor, be quiet!', "Nothing. I don't know.", "I can't do it by choice. I don't know how. It happens in my dreams.", "I can't.", "You were right. I can get inside Summer's mind whenever I want.", "They can't do that north of the Wall?", "When I was looking through Summer's eyes, I saw Jon.", 'He was with the wildlings. They tried to kill him but he got away.', "For all we know, Castle Black's already under attack. If this many wildlings got through-", 'Everything Jojen told me is true. You saw what I did to Hodor. I have to find the three-eyed raven.', "Don't worry, I'm not asking you to come with me. It won't be safe for Rickon.", "No. You and Osha and Shaggydog head for the Last Hearth. The Umbers are our bannermen. They'll protect you.", 'Right now, I have to protect you.', "Robb's at war and I'm going beyond the Wall. If something happens to us, you're the heir to Winterfell.", 'Will you know how to find the last Hearth?', "You don't have to do any of this.", "You're leaving now? It's the middle of the night.", "Don't, Hodor.", "Maybe we shouldn't stay.", 'There are a lot of stories about this place. Horrible stories.', 'So did I. Once.', 'You ever heard about the Rat Cook?', "Just a cook in the Night's Watch. He was angry at the king for something, I don't remember. When the king was visiting the Nightfort, the cook killed the king's son, cooked him into a big pie with onions, carrots, mushrooms and bacon. That night he served the pie to the king. He liked the taste of his son so much, he asked for a second slice. The gods turned the cook into a giant white rat who could only eat his own young. He's been roaming the Nightfort ever since, devouring his own babies. But no matter what he does, he's always hungry.", "It wasn't for murder the gods cursed the Rat Cook or for serving the king's son in a pie. He killed a guest beneath his roof. That's something the gods can't forgive.", 'Hodor.', "My brother, he's in the Night's-", "No, I'm not.", 'Take us north of the Wall.', "I don't want to. I have to.", 'Please, Sam. I have to go north. I have to.', 'What is it?', 'Why? What are they for?', 'Take it, Hodor.', 'I wish I could. I really do.', 'Why did you wake me?', 'I was hungry.', 'I was just eating.', 'Hodor, take me to the tree.', 'I know where we have to go.', 'Do you hear that?', "I'm going out there.", "I'm going.", "Summer, he's hurt. They've caught him in a trap.", "I didn't see, but they have my brother's wolf. They have Ghost.", "They're Night's Watch. Look. Jon might be here.", 'No.', "I'm not leaving without Summer.", 'The east side of the keep.', "I'm Brandon Stark! I'm Brandon Stark of Winterfell.", 'They already have stopped me.', "You've seen it, too.", 'We will.', 'Stop.', 'Stop. Stop!', 'Stop! Please.', 'Please, get off her!', 'Please! Please, leave her alone!', 'Please, stop. Stop.', 'What are you doing? Leave her alone!', 'No!', 'Is Jon with you?', 'Hodor. Hodor, get his knife. Cut me loose.', 'Hodor, get his knife. Hodor. Cut me loose, Hodor.', 'Jojen and Meera, free them. Go!', 'Jon.', 'Jon!', "He's my brother.", 'Hodor.', 'We need to free Summer. And we need to go.', 'Jojen. Jojen! Look, Jojen, look.', 'Help them! Now!', 'Help them!', 'Who are you?', "You're the three-eyed raven.", "I didn't want anyone to die for me.", "You're going to help me walk again?", "Where are you going, huh? Aren't we better looking than the fat man?", "Even in White Harbor, I'd want a kiss.", 'One little kiss.', 'A man gets lonely guarding the Wall.', "There's no need to be rude.", 'Sam the Slayer. Are you gonna slay me with that sword?', 'Alright. Hold still.', "You're gonna get yourself killed.", "That's my father. And my Uncle Benjen", 'They were all so happy', "My Aunt Lyanna I've seen her statue in the crypt My father never talked about her", 'Hodor?', 'Hodor talks?', 'Please, a little longer', 'You finally show me something I care about and then you drag me away', "I wasn't drowning I was home", 'Wylis', 'I saw you as a boy You could talk What happened?', "Where's Meera?", "You shouldn't be here It's not safe outside the cave", "I saw that Hodor wasn't always Hodor", 'His real name is Wylis And he could talk and fight and -- and then --', "What's wrong?", "The Three-Eyed Raven says there's a war coming", "That's my father", 'Ser Arthur Dayne', 'Father said he was the best swordsman he ever saw', "He's better than my father", 'But Father beat him', 'I know he did Heard the story a thousand times', 'He stabbed him in the back', "What's in the tower?", "I want to see where he's going", 'Father!', 'Why did you do that? Take me back there I want to go back', 'He heard me', "What's in that tower? I want to go back there", 'Why do I want to return? So I can be a cripple again? So I can talk to an old man in a tree?', 'So why did you?', "I don't want to be you", 'Learn what?', 'It was you. You made the White Walkers.', 'From whom?', 'What?', 'He saw me, the Night King! He saw me!', "I don't know. He was close, but --", "But he can't get in.", "I'm sorry. I didn't mean to.", 'The time for what?', 'But am I ready?', 'Meera. They found us.', 'Who are you?', 'Uncle Benjen. The last letter Jon wrote me said you had been lost beyond the Wall.', 'How?', 'Dragonglass. A shard of dragonglass plunged into your heart.', "I didn't have time to learn. I can't control anything.", 'Thank you, Uncle Benjen.', "I'm the Three-Eyed Raven now. I have to be ready for this.", "You were at the Fist of the First Men. You were at Hardhome. You've seen the Army of the Dead. You've seen the Night King. He's coming for us. For all of us.", 'Hello, Sansa.', 'Yes. I need to speak to him.', "I can never be the Lord of Winterfell. I can never be lord of anything. I'm the three-eyed raven.", "It's difficult to explain.", "It means I can see everything. Everything that's ever happened to everyone. Everything that's happening right now. It's all pieces, fragments. I need to learn to see better. When the long night comes again I need to be ready.", 'The three-eyed raven taught me.', "I told you it's difficult to explain.", "I'm sorry for all that's happened to you. I'm sorry it had to happen here at our home. It was so beautiful that night. Snow falling just like now. And you were so beautiful in your white wedding dress.", "I'll stay a bit longer.", "is sitting in a wheelchair. PETER BAELISH is sitting next to him. BAELISH unsheathes a Valyrian steel dagger and shows it to BRAN. It's the same dagger used in the attempt to assassinate BRAN years ago.", 'reaches out and takes the knife, turning it and looking it over carefully.', 'Do you know who this belonged to?', 'Chaos is a ladder.', 'is staring at BAELISH. BAELISH stops speaking. The door opens and Meera appears.', "I'm not Lord Stark.", 'Maester Wolkan built it for me so I can move around more easily.', "You're leaving?", "No, I don't.", 'Thank you.', 'For helping me.', "I'm not really, not anymore. I remember what it felt like to be Brandon Stark, but I remember so much else now.", 'is sitting next to the Weirwood tree. SANSA and ARYA approach. BRAN turns to look at them. BRAN begins speaking to ARYA.', 'You came home.', 'I saw you at the crossroads.', 'I see quite a lot now.', "I thought you might go to King's Landing.", 'Cersei is on her list of names.', 'produces the Valyrian dagger that BAELISH gave him and unsheathes it.', 'Littlefinger gave it to me.', "He thought I'd want it.", 'Because it was meant to kill me.', 'Someone very wealthy wanted me dead.', "It doesn't matter.", "I don't want it.", 'holds the knife out to ARYA. ARYA looks at BRAN.', "It's wasted on a cripple.", 's eyes are pure white. They wash back to their normal color. He is sitting in front of the Weirwood. Maester Wolkan stands next to him.', 'Ravens. We need to send ravens.', 'You held a knife to his throat.', 'You said, "I did warn you not the trust me."', 'Come in.', 'Samwell Tarly.', 'I remember everything.', "You helped us get beyond the Wall. You're a good man.", 'I became the Three-Eyed Raven.', 'I can see things that happened in the past. I can see things happening now all over the world. Why did you come to Winterfell?', "He's on his way back to Winterfell with Daenerys Targaryen. You you saw this in a vision?", 'He needs to know the truth.', "About himself. No one knows. No one but me. Jon isn't really my father's son He's the son of Rhaegar Targaryen and my aunt.", 'Dornish bastards are named Sand.', 'Are you certain?', "Robert's Rebellion was built on a lie. Rhaegar didn't kidnap my aunt.", 'He loved her. And she loved him.', "And Jon - Jon's real name.", "He's never been a bastard.", 'Almost.', "We don't have time for all this. The Night King has your dragon.", "He's one of them now. The Wall has fallen, the dead march south.", "Waiting, for an old friend. It's time to tell Jon the truth.", "I'm not his brother. He trusts you more than anyone. Now's the time.", 'The things we do for love.', "You weren't sorry then. You were protecting your family.", "You still would be, if you hadn't pushed me out of that window. And I would still be Brandon Stark.", "No. I'm something else now.", "I'm not angry at anyone.", "You won't be able to help us in this fight if I let them murder you first.", 'How do you know there is an afterwards?', 'Yes, he will.', "He'll come for me. He's tried before, many times, with many Three-Eyed Ravens.", 'An endless night. He wants to erase this world, and I am its memory.', 'His mark is on me.', 'He always knows where I am.', "No. We need to lure him into the open before his army destroys us all. I'll wait for him in the Godswood.", "I don't know. No one's ever tried.", 'No.', 'Stranger than most.', "It's a long story.", 'Everything you did brought you where you are now. Where you belong. Home.', "I'm going to go now.", 'Theon.', "You're a good man.", 'Thank you.', "It's the same as the one Daeron Targaryen built for his crippled nephew 120 years ago. I liked that one.", "I'm not Lord of Winterfell.", "I don't really want anymore.", "You shouldn't envy me. Mostly I live in the past.", 'Why do you think I came all this way?', 'Lord Tyrion, you will be my Hand.', "And I don't want to be king.", 'I choose you.', "Yes, I can. I'm king.", "He just got it. He's made many terrible mistakes. He's going to spend the rest of his life fixing them.", 'You were exactly where you were supposed to be.', 'We appear to be missing a Master of Whisperers. And a Master of Laws. And a Master of War.', 'And Drogon? Any word?', 'Perhaps I can find him. Do carry on with the rest.', "I'm sure it will."]

Name: sam
Sentence: ["Nothing's killed me yet.", 'You offered me a ride!', 'Are those girls?', "I haven't seen a girl in six months.", "That's foul.", 'Hmm?', "Seems a bit greedy for one man to have so many wives. Wouldn't two, or three, be enough for him?", 'Nothing like the sight of a woman walking away.', "I'm sure that's nice too.", 'You were with her? How many times?', "Wish I'd grew up on a farm.", "Oh, oh. Right. I'm sorry. I just wanted to make sure you weren't hurt. .", "This is Gilly, she's one of Craster's daughters.", "She's pregnant. . We have to take her with us, when we leave.", 'I know it sounds a bit mad.', 'The Lord Commander, , we are sworn to protect -', 'Why did you do that?', 'You were cruel.', "I didn't touch her!", "I can't steal her, she's a person not a goat.", "I could try. . What? I've read about it. A bit.", 'Lord Commander-', 'Gilly.', 'I, I wanted to give you something. It belonged to my mother.', "Please. I want you to. My mother used it for sewing. She'd let me sit with her in her chamber while she sewed and I'd read to her. My father put a stop to it when he found out. It's the only thing I have of hers. She gave it to me before I left for the Wall.", "I'm not giving it away. I'm giving it to you.", 'Keep it safe for me. Til I come back.', "Beautiful, isn't it? Gilly would love it here.", 'The Fist of the First Men. Think of how old this place is. Before the Targaryens defeated the Andals, before the Andals took Westeros from the First Men.', "Thousands and thousands of years ago, the First Men stood here where we're standing all through the long night. What do you think they were like, the First Men?", "And three for White Walkers. It's been a thousand years, but that's the only time they blow the horn three times.", 'Well I read it in a book.', "I don't see very well.", "I could take up Jon's duties while he's gone, my lord. It would be no trouble.", "I'm not cut out for this sort of work.", 'Where do you think Jon is right now?', "He's not dead. No, Jon's a great fighter.", "He's got a Valyrian steel sword.", 'And Qhorin Halfhand is the greatest ranger alive.', 'The First Men made these marks. Help me with it.', "That's a Night's Watch cloak.", 'Oh. Must be dragonglass.', 'The maesters call it obsidian.', "If you step back and think about it, the thing about Gilly that's so interesting is", "No, truly. The thing about her that I find so interesting is that after all that Craster's done to her, she's still got hope that life might get better.", 'And the thing about you that I find so interesting is absolutely nothing.', "It's Jon and the Halfhand. They're back.", 'Wait! Wait for me!', 'Grenn!', 'Edd!', 'Brother?', 'No.', "I can't.", "You don't care.", 'You left me. When the white walkers came, you left me.', 'Ghost?', "I'm sorry. He's beautiful.", "He's beautiful. Does he have a name?", 'Are you going to give him one?', 'Gilly.', 'I wanted you to have it.', 'But the more wood, the bigger the fire.', 'Huh. You know your fires.', "It doesn't get so cold down in the Reach. And there were servants, of course.", 'Oh, I found something at the Fist of the First Men. Buried treasure. Thousands of years old. I think.', "I'm not sure that it does anything. It's beautiful, though, isn't it?", 'Not so far. A few more days.', "Bigger. So big you can't even see the top sometimes. It's hidden in clouds.", "I'm not. It's seven hundred feet high, all made of ice. On a warm day you can see it weeping. Castle Black is nice enough. They keep a fire burning in the long hall day and night. And Hobb makes venison stew with onions. Very tasty. Sometimes, one of the brothers will sing. Dareon sings best.", 'No. No, no, no. Not very well.', "Oh, all right. Let's see.", "Oh ahem. The father's face is stern and strong / He sits and judges right from wrong / He weighs our lives, the short and long / And loves the little children / The mother gives the gift of life / And watches over every wife / Her gentle smile ends all strife /And she loves her little children.", "It's getting dark. We could stay here for the night.", 'How hard can it be to build a fire?', 'He winked at me before.', 'I saw him wink at me.', "I suppose it's a rather philosophical difference between a wink and a blink.", "Well, I mean, there's no real difference.", 'You thought of a name yet? It would be easier to refer to him if he had a name.', 'What? No. This is just the way I talk.', "Don't you think he should have a name?", "Let's see, there's Duncan, Kevan, Jo,n Guymon, Feldan, Tristifer.", "Uh, yes. Maybe that's not-", "That's a lovely idea, but Mormont's a last name.", "Well, it's a family name. For instance, I'm Samwell Tarly. Samwell is my birth name and Tarly is my family name. You see? So my father is also a Tarly.", 'No, Randyll Tarly.', "Please don't name him Randyll.", 'Different manner of cruel.', "I'll be back. I just want to look.", "Go inside. Go back inside. I'll-", 'Stay back!', 'You stay back!', "Don't kill me!", "To Castle Black. I'm a brother of the Night's Watch.", "Who's your brother?", "You're Jon's brother. The one who fell from the window.", "I've been around Ghost enough to know a direwolf when I see one. And I've heard all about Hodor.", "I'd be dead if it wasn't for Jon. If you're his brother, you're my brother, too. And anything I can do to help you, I will.", 'What? Why in the world would you want to go-', "Come with us. There are steps carved into the south side of the Wall. Hodor can carry you to the top. We'll walk straight to Castle Black.", "If Jon is alive, then Castle Black's where he'll be. It's the safest place for you.", "What I know is what I saw. And if you saw it, too, you'd run the other way.", 'How do you know all that?', "But you're going to stop them?", 'We found them at the Fist. Someone buried them a long time ago. Someone wanted us to find them.', 'Killing White Walkers.', 'Well, I suppose someone had to be the first.', "And the archer. I got lucky with one of them. There are more. Many more. And for every one of them, the dead men, more than you could count. I wish you'd come with us.", 'I know how this must look. What I meant was-', 'Maester.', "She hasn't chosen a name yet.", "He's not my child, Maester Aemon. She's one of Craster's wives. I remember every word of the oath. Night gathers and my watch begins. I am the shield that guards the realms of men. The realms of men. That means her as well as us. We didn't build five hundred miles of ice walls seve hundred feet high to keep men out. The night is gathering, Maester Aemon. I've seen it. It's coming for all of us.", 'Miles better.', "Jon! Jon! Jon, it's us.", "Hush, now. You're home. Carry him inside. Gently.", 'Sometimes I want to hate you.', "Well, you're better than me at everything. Except reading.", "They're... they're ready for you.", "No one's going to hang you. You've done nothing wrong.", "She's not a whore.", "They all think I'm lying.", 'Killing the white Walker.', "But you're the only one that saw it. And they all think you're just a...", 'Well, a wildling.', "It's not a very nice word, I suppose.", 'So... are you all right? No one bothering you?', 'I worry about it sometimes. All the time.', '100 men, one woman.', "That's the only thing they think about.", "I'm not being silly. There's 100 men lying awake at night picturing you.", 'What about me? Gilly? I worry about you.', 'For what?', "I don't know if you're safe here. They're my brothers, but some of them were thieves before they came here. Some of them were rapers. You saw what they did at your father's keep.", "Maybe you'd be safer in Mole's Town.", 'Bored of you? I... I want to protect you.', "He's seen some adventures, hasn't he?", "That's right. She'll clean and cook and look after the other girls' babies.", 'No other work.', "I promise to come back and visit whenever I can. You'll be safer here. Who's gonna protect you at Castle Black? Me?", "This is different. They're brothers of the Night's Watch and I can't just stab them in the back and I can't run away, which is what we did at Craster's.", "You have to trust me. It's for the best.", "Oh, Gilly. Please don't.", 'I should neverhave taken her away.', "She's not safe out there. I should have known. You told us there were wildlings south of the Wall. If they're raiding the smaller villages, Mole's Town could be next.", 'I should go back for Gilly.', 'I remember when you disobeyed orders and rode south to help Robb.', 'I wish I could have convinced him to come back with me. I tried. Really, I did.', "I don't know. They'd pass wildling villages. They could try to find shelter at one of them.", "Craster's? You think Bra nmight have found...", 'All right, Jon?', 'I should never have left her there.', 'Of course I couldo ve known. They were raiding the villages close by.', "She's dead because of me.", "Little Same. As if I'd cut their throats myself.", 'She might have.', 'What was she like?', 'Oh? How big were her feet?', "I want you to tell me what it was like to have someone. To be with someone. To love someone and have them love you back. We're all gonna die a lot sooner than I'd planned. You're the closest I'll ever get to know it.", 'No...she just had a baby! ...and she never offered.', 'The interesting thing is, our vows never specifically forbid intimate relations with women.', 'I shall take no wife" yes, that\'s in there, there\'s no denying that. "I shall father no children" it\'s very specific. But what our vows have to say about other...activities...is open to interpretation.', "Anyway, there's nothing for him to interpret. We didn't. So what's it like?", "No, you're really not.", "There'll be arrows for all of us soon I imagine.", "They've already done the worst thing to me they could ever do.", 'Maester Aemon. How did you know-', 'Let me help you.', 'Maester Faull', "But what he says about what they do...it's all true. It's exactly what the survivors of their raids report.", "I don't love her.", 'No.', 'You were?', "I'm sorry Maester, I didn't mean it like that.", 'Who was she?', 'Pyp! Open the gate.', 'Yes!', 'Oh, Pyp. Open the fucking gate!', 'Yes, well, best get used to it.', "Are you alright? Shh, you're alright. Yeah, of course you are my brave little fella.", "I'm so so sorry. I didn't know until I got back.", 'Never.', 'Anyone who tries to throw you out will be having words with me. From now on, wherever you go, I go too.', "You'll be safe down here. I'll check on you as soon as I can.", "I'm not leaving you!", "I...I didn't mean in the same room.", 'Help my brothers.', "I can't just hide here with you while they're fighting out there.", "Look. I am a man of the Night's Watch, Gilly. I made a promise to defend The Wall and I have to keep it, because that's what men do.", "I promise you I won't die.", "There's a lot more Wildlings on the other side of the wall than this side. We've got us some weapons and things. This is the perfect place for us to be.", "Of course I'm afraid, there's a band of Wildlings coming to kill us.", "I didn't know I was going to kill it, but I had to do something I didn't have any choice, he was going to kill Gilly and take the baby. If someone had asked me my name right then, I wouldn't have known. I wasn't Samwell Tarly anymore. I wasn't a Steward in the Night's Watch or son of Randyll Tarly or any of that. I was nothing at all. And when you're nothing at all, there's no more reason to be afraid.", "Yes, well, I'm not nothing anymore.", 'Did you get one?', 'Yeah?', 'If you keep missing we will.', 'Oh, is it over?', 'Well then. *hands Pyp a loaded crossbow*', "You're alright. You're alright. I'll get help. Shh, shh. Maester Aemon is coming, he's gonna make it alright.", 'to Grenn* We need more men down here.', 'But we need men here.', 'to Olly* Get me to the top! You hear me?!', "Your name's Olly, right? Listen to me Olly, get me to the top and when we give a signal, bring us back down. Do you hear me?", 'And find a weapon, Olly. Fight them!', "The Wildlings are over the walls. Ser Alliser has fallen. The castle walls can't stand much longer.", "You can't protect me forever. There won't be anywhere to hide if the castle falls.", 'We need you boy.', "Woah! It's me. It's me. I promised you, didn't I?", 'We held them off.', 'This is a great victory.', 'Where are you going?', "To...you can't do that. No one gave you any orders.", "Without Mance? You're going to kill him?", "They'll never let you within a hundred yards of him. And if you did, even if you managed to kill him.", "He won't just kill ya. They'll boil you. They'll filet you. They'll make it last days!", 'What are you doing?', 'Jon. Come back.', "Well, I'm hardly a new recruit. How many brothers can say they've killed a white walker and a Thenn? I might be the first in history!", 'If Ser Alliser is chosen as the new Lord Commander… he hates the wildlings.', 'All the wildlings.', "It's not a sure thing. Ser Denys Mallister has commanded the Shadow Tower for 20 years, and people say he's a good man. He's running against Ser Alliser--", 'I told you. Wherever you go, I go, too.', 'Hmm! Did you know that the youngest Lord Commander in history, Osric Stark, was elected at the age of 10?', "I only said that the more time you spend practicing, the faster you'll be able to read.", 'Three?! Who taught you, your mother?', 'Did you ever see them?', 'Your Grace.', "He'll make you a Stark with the stroke of a pen?", "You deserve this. You do. I couldn't be happier for you.", "But you'd be Lord of Winterfell.", 'Maester Aemon.', 'Her name is Gilly. Brother Slynt knows her quite well. They cowered together in the larder during the battle for the Wall.', 'A wildling girl, a baby, and Lord Janos. I found him there when the battle was over in a puddle of his own making.', 'Whilst Lord Janos was hiding with the women and children, Jon Snow was leading.', "Ser Alliser fought bravely, it is true. And when he was wounded, it is Jon who saved us. He took charge of the wall's defense. He killed the Magnar of the Thenns. He went North to deal with Mance Rayder, knowing it almost certainly meant his own death. Before that, he led the mission to avenge Lord Commander Mormont. Mormont himself chose Jon to be his steward. He saw something in Jon, and now we've all seen it, too. He may be young, but he's the commander we turned to when the night was darkest.", "He apologizes for not being here. He's not feeling well.", 'Alright, alright! Enough of that.', 'Lord Ashford. . Lady Caulfield. . Lord Smallwood.', "They haven't heard of you either. . But we need men and they have some.", 'More than Lord Wibberley.', "I know, I'm sorry, but we need men and supplies. And Roose Bolton is the Warden of The North.", "We swore to be the Watchers on the Wall. We can't watch the Wall with 50 men. And we can't get more men without help from the Warden of the North.", 'Apologies, my Lady.', 'And though Daenerys maintains her grip on Slaver\'s Bay, forces rise against her from within and without. She refuses to leave until the freedom of the former slaves is secure." She sounds like quite a woman.', "Don't say that, Maester Aemon.", 'There is good farmland in the Gift. . Land that no one uses now. A dozen abandoned villages.', 'Every book there is?', 'Well, no. There are thousands and thousands of books out there. This library is rather small, actually.', "My father's not the most literate man. They say the Citadel has the largest library in the world.", 'The Citadel? In Oldtown.', 'Gilly, look at me. You know how to do a hundred things I can never do. You can build a fire with wet wood. You can cook. You can stitch a wound.', 'Well -', "It's where they train the maesters.", "I wanted to be one when I was young. Instead, I became a man of the Night's Watch. Far more adventure up here anyway. I wouldn't have met you.", 'Ah, Your Grace.', 'I am, Your Grace.', 'I did, Your Grace.', 'With a dagger made of dragonglass.', 'What the maesters call obsidian -', "I don't know. I've been going through all the old manuscripts hoping to find something, and all I've learned is that the children of the forest used to hunt with dragonglass.", "I've seen it, Your Grace.", 'The army of the dead. And when they come -', 'Safe travels, Lord Commander.', 'Oh, and…', "It's Dragonglass. It's what I used to kill the White Walker. I hope you don't need them.", 'His little brother, Aegon. He became king.', "You don't know that.", "I'll stay too. He's always been good to me. I can't leave him now.", "His name was Aemon Targaryen. He came to us from King's Landing, a Maester of the Citadel, chained and sworn. And a sworn brother of the Night's Watch, ever faithful. No man was wiser or gentler or kinder. At the Wall a dozen Lord Commanders came and went during his years of service, but he was always there to counsel them. He was the blood of the dragon, but now his fire has gone out. And now his watch has ended.", 'Get your hands off her. Brother Derryk. Brother Brand. I believe you both have guard duty tonight.', 'Gilly go on, Get back to your room and lock the door.', "I'm warning you.", 'I said get your hands off her.', "I killed a White Walker. I killed a Thenn. I'll take my chances with you.", "I'm alright.", "I will not. They wouldo ve… I don't know what they would have done", 'No. They were tiring out. I had them in the palm of my hand.', 'What kind of man would I be if I ran away when I saw someone hurting you?', "Of course I will. And I'll take care of you, too.", 'Stay. Please.', 'Oh. Oh my.', 'No.', 'How are you?', 'You know what I mean.', 'Are you scared?', 'Me too.', "Who's there?", 'Come in.', "Not to worry. Men brawl from time to time. It's only natural.", "You're a good lad.", 'Now then. How can I help?', 'Yes?', "We've been fighting them for years.", 'Wildlings are people, just like us. There are good ones and bad ones.', 'Olly...', "I've seen the army of the dead. I've seen the white walkers, and they're coming for us, for all the living. And when it's time we'll need every last man we can find.", "Jon's taking a risk, but he has to. We don't stand a chance otherwise. Sometimes a man has to make hard choices, choices that might look wrong to others but you know are right in the long run.", 'With all my heart.', "Try not to worry Olly. I've been worrying about Jon for years. He always comes back.", "It wasn't.", "You didn't fail him, or him, or her. Every one of them is alive because of you, and no one else.", 'So what are you gonna do?', 'But… the Dragonglass?', 'But… you killed a White Walker.', "He's made of Valyrian steel. How many Valyrian steel swords are left in the Seven Kingdoms?", "You were friends with me when I first got here. And I wasn't winning any elections back then.", "I wanted to ask you something. To ask something of you. Send me, Gilly, and the baby to Oldtown so I can become a Maester. That's what I'm meant to be, not this.", "Well, there's Edd.", "I'll be more use to you as a Maester. More use to everyone now that Maester Aemon's gone. The Citadel has the worldo s greatest library. I'll learn about history, strategy, healing. And other things. Things that will help when they come.", "If Gilly stays here then she'll die. And the baby that she named after me will die. And I'll end up dying, too, trying to protect them. Which means that the last thing that I'll see in this world will be the look in her eyes when I fail them. I'd rather see a thousand White Walkers than see that.", 'Thank you.', "They'll bloody try.", 'What?', 'Very carefully.', "I'll come back.", 'To my return.', "Oh, yes. Once you get south of the Riverlands, very different sorts of trees start to take over. Maple, elm, beech, poplar. The odd willow. And of course now that summer's over, you'll start seeing the autumn colors coming in. Still, you'll find more green here than anywhere else.", "I didn't think I'd ever come back here after my father made me renounce my title and inheritance and, well, threaten to kill me if I didn't. A person just doesn't feel welcome at that point.", "And I certainly didn't expect to be introducing him to my family. So you know what to tell them.", "Yes, now that's very important. If he thinks that Little Sam is his grandchild, he'll take you in. He'll get an education. He'll learn to read. And you can help teach him. Huh?", 'I told them I met you in the North.', "Well, it wasn't a very large piece of parchment.", "The thing is...my father doesn't like wildlings. He hoped I'd make a man of myself by “killing some bloody wildlings,” so it's probably a good subject to avoid if at all possible.", 'Oh, hello, Mother.', 'Oh.', "Talla? Gods, you're a woman now.", 'Oh, um, Mother, this is Gilly.', 'Oh, and this, this is our son Samwell.', 'Where is Father? And Dickon?', "It's beautiful. You're beautiful.", "This venison, it's very tasty. Is it from today's hunt?", 'Oh, of course. Sorry. Long journey.', "Oh, that's a fair distance.", "Oh, yes. Yes. A good amount. North of the Wall, you don't hunt, you don't eat.", "Rabbits. Sometimes squirrels. I say “we,” it's my friend Jon mostly. Sometimes Edd. Oh, and Gilly. She's- - she's quite a good hunter as well. Um, huntress.", 'Oh, yes. Yes, please. Thank you, Mother.', 'I travelled south under orders from the Lord Commander. He wants me to- -', "Yes. And once I have my chain, I'll return to Castle Black.", 'Gilly.', "I'm sorry I let him treat you that way. I was afraid he'd turn you and Little Sam away.", 'First light.', 'Say good-bye to him for me.', 'Good-bye, Gilly.', "We're leaving.", 'Get your things.', 'We belong together. All of us.', "Oh, they'll understand.", "She won't mind. Looks better on you anyway.", "It's my family's sword.", 'He can bloody well try.', 'Hello.', 'From Lord Commander Snow at Castle Black.', "I'm-- I'm to be the new maester.", 'He died.', "Maester Aemon became quite ill shortly after the election. He's since passed away. Which is why I'm here.", 'Yes, well, I suppose that life is irregular.', 'Archmaester, I was wondering...', 'Um, 147.', 'I was wondering if you had considered my proposition.', "I asked you if, in light of what I've seen in the North, if I could have access to the restricted area of the library.", 'No.', "Archmaester, with respect, I've seen them--the Army of the Dead. The white walkers. W was sent here to learn how to defeat them, but everyone in the Citadel, those who will even talk to me, they all doubt the walkers ever existed in the first place.", 'Sources in the restricted area?', 'So, you believe me.', 'That makes you the only person south of the Twins who does.', "The dead don't.", 'The Targaryens used dragonglass to decorate their weapons without even knowing what the First Men used it for.', "It's a map of Dragonstone. The Targaryens built their first stronghold there when they invaded Westeros.", "A mountain of it. Beneath the ground. Stannis told me, but I didn't think... This is important. Jon needs to know.", 'Who?', "Haven't heard anything.", 'stops working and turns around.', 'turns to collect his work and leave. The maesters begin talking to one another.', 'is seated at a table surround by papers and candles. He is writing notes into a book. Gilly is seated across from him reading aloud from a tome. SAM JR. is playing on the bed.', 'No.', 'looks up from his work annoyed. He remains silent and continues working.', 'is walking through a dark library. He heads to the restricted section and unlocks the barred gate. He begins removing books and scrolls from shelfs and stuff them in his satchel. After retrieving what he needs, SAM quickly walks to the exit of the library. He pauses before he leaves and turns around. He glances back at the library. It is many stories tall lined with countless shelves of books. SAMWELL looks at the library one last time, turns and walks out of the door.', "I wasn't sure if you'd remember me.", "Oh, well, thank you, but, um, I'm not sure that I am. What happened to you beyond the Wall?", "Oh! I don't know what that means.", "Um, Jon's the one to lead the fight against the dead. I know he is. But he can't do it alone, so I've come here to help him.", 'Oh.', 'The truth about what?', "It's not.", "At the Citadel, I transcribed a High Septon's diary. He annulled Rhaegar's marriage to Elia. He wed Rhaegar and Lyanna in a secret ceremony.", "It's what the High Septon wrote in his private diary. I don't know why he'd lie. Is this something you can see?", 'Uh, hold on.', 'Why just us?', "Um- We represent all the great houses, but whomever we choose, they won't just rule over lords and ladies. Maybe the decision about what's best for everyone should be left to well, everyone.", 'Aye.', "A Song of Ice and Fire. Archmaester Ebrose's history of the wars following the death of King Robert. I helped him with the title.", "Oh, I wouldn't say that.", 'He-', "I don't believe you're mentioned, ahem.", 'Your Grace.', 'He was last spotted flying east, toward-', 'Long may he reign.', 'The Archmaester has done some research on this subject and it turns out-', 'Uh... the Archmaester is less than enthusiastic about the salutary effects of brothels.']

Name: bronn
Sentence: ['You can have my room.', 'Your first? You need a woman. Nothing like a woman after a fight.', "Give me 10 good men and some climbing spikes... I'll impregnate the bitch.", "I'll stand for the dwarf.", 'No. He did.', "You wouldn't know him.", 'l took her.', "From, uh, Ser What's-his-name? l don't know. Ginger cunt, three tents down.", 'He said something.', "Oh, well. l, uh, think l'll go and find myself one.", 'Drink.', "There's a Braavosi knife game l could teach you.", 'Not if you win.', 'This sounds like a boring game.', 'But my mother hit harder.', 'lt was a woman. She swung an axe at me.', 'Work.', 'The whole shit-stained world could drink off that one.', 'Our lord here used to be married.', 'You hear lots of things playing dice with Lannister soldiers.', "l'm guessing the lady and l can tell more unpleasant stories than your lordship.", 'For three chickens, l should hope so.', 'Well, l imagine that was the end of all that.', 'l would have killed the man who did that to me.', "You're sleeping through the war.", "They stole a night's march on us. They're a mile north.", "You don't have a squire.", 'Stay low.', "lf you're lucky, no one will notice you.", "You're a shit warrior.", "You're alive.", "We wouldn't be having this conversation if we didn't.", 'Yeah, good.', "Can't imagine why.", "The lads will escort you. The streets aren't safe at night, my lord.", 'Boys?', "Without question? No. I'd ask how much.", 'Oh, aye. And he has company. Filthy old stoat. Almost hate to interrupt.', "No, I don't.", "Careful, now. We don't want to get blood all over your pretty white cloak.", "The little king's backed up. Clogged from balls to brains.", "There's no cure for being a cunt. But the boy's at that age. And he's got nothing to do all day but pick wings off flies. Couldn't hurt to get some of the poison out.", 'It will be my pleasure.', "There's that mind of yours you keep going on about.", "Good thing. I'd be out of a job. What about your father?", 'Not after what he did to your birthday present.', "He's talking about you.", "People think you're pulling the king's strings. They blame you for the city's ills.", "You don't need to convince me.", "If I could tell you how many crazy old men I've seen pushing carts around army camps making grand claims about jars full of pig shit. Name: tywin lannister
Sentence: ['Attacking him was stupid.', "Lannisters don't act like fools.", 'Why is he still alive?', 'Ned Stark.', 'Clean...', 'You spend too much time worrying about what other people think of you.', "Now that's what you want people to think of you.", 'When you hear them whispering "Kingslayer" behind your back, doesn\'t it bother you?', "The lion doesn't concern himself with the opinions of the sheep.", "He's a Lannister. He might be the lowest of the Lannisters, but he's one of us.", "No, it's not an opinion, it's a fact!", 'Hmm.', 'The rumors of your demise were unfounded.', 'And who are these Companions of yours?', 'This is Shagga Son of Dolf, Chieftain of the Stone Crows.', 'You left us no choice. The honor of the House was at stake.', 'Is our hostage.', 'Robert Baratheon is dead.', 'A green boy.', "The wolf rushes into the lion's jaws.", 'It is said that the men of the Mountain clans are great warriors.', 'The boy may lack experience and sense, but he does have a certain mindless provincial courage.', "l do hope your savages are going to be of some use, otherwise we've wasted good steel on them.", 'When the battle commences, you and your wildlings will be in the vanguard.', 'When soldiers lack discipline, the fault lies with their commander.', "There'll be no more discussion on the matter.", "You're wounded.", 'Huh! The scouts were wrong. There were 2,000 Stark bannermen, not 20 [thousand].', "He wasn't here.", 'With his other 18,000 men.', 'They have my son.', "They have my son! Get out, all of you. Not you. You were right about Eddard Stark. lf he were alive, we could have used him to broker a peace with Winterfell and Riverrun, which would have given us more time to deal with Robert's brothers. But now – madness. Madness and stupidity. l always thought you were a stunted fool. Perhaps l was wrong.", "No one will stay here. Ser Gregor will head out with 500 riders and set the Riverland on fire from Godo s Eye to the Red Fork. The rest of us will regroup at Harrenhal. And you will go to King's Landing.", 'Rule. You will serve as Hand of the King in my stead. You will bring that boy king to heel, and his mother too, if needs be. And if you get so much as a whiff of treason from any of the rest – Baelish, Varys, Pycelle…', "You're my son. Oh, one more thing. You will not take that whore to court. Do you understand?", "What's this?", 'Evidently not. Why are these prisoners not in their cells?', 'Are we so well-manned that we can afford to discard able young bodies and skilled laborers?', 'You, do you have a trade?', "He'll do no such thing. This one's a girl, you idiot, dressed as a boy. Why?", 'Smart. More than I can say for this lot. Get these prisoners to work. Bring the girl. I need a new cupbearer.', "The Starks understand winter better than we ever will. The cold won't beat them.", "And I'm sure if those same spies snuck into our own encampments, they would report growing discontent amongst the Southern lords. This is war, no one's content. We've underestimated the Stark boy for too long. He has a good mind for warfare, his men worship him. And as long as he keeps winning battles, they'll keep believing he is King in the North. You've been waiting for him to fail. He is not going to fail, not without our help. So how do we stop him?", "Yes, I think you would, Reginald. And because you're my cousin, I might even let you wake from that sleep. Go, I'm sure your wife must miss you.", "Well, then you'd better start riding. Go, before I change my mind and send her your head.", "If your name wasn't Lannister, you'd be scrubbing out pots in the cook's tent. Go!", "Not wine, water. We'll be here for some time. Girl, where are you from?", 'And who are the Lords of Maidenpool? Remind me.', 'And what is their sigil?', "A red salmon. I think a Maidenpool girl would remember that. You're a Northerner, aren't you?", 'Good. One more time, where are you from?', 'And what do they say of Robb Stark in the North?', 'And?', 'And do you believe them?', 'Fetch that water.', 'Can you read?', 'This letter detailing our infantry movements was meant for Lord Damon of House Marbrand. It was sent to Lord Marlyn of House Dormand.', "Girl, fetch me the History of the Greater and the Lesser Houses. It's the one on this-", 'My cupbearer can read better than you.', 'To whom does House Dormand owe allegiance?', "To the Starks of Winterfell! Who have twenty thousand men and my son! I judged you might be good for something more than brutalizing peasants. I see I overestimated you. If you ever put my son's life at risk again, I'll Leave us.", "Put the book away, girl. Maybe you should devise our next battle plan while you're about it.", 'Mmm. Give us the room.', 'Clear all this.', 'Baelish.', 'Wine?', 'What news from the capital?', 'Ah, the late King Renly. Rather a short reign. Murdered by a woman, I hear.', 'Here. Men love to blame demons when their grand plans unravel.', 'You say that as if you were the first man alive to think it. Yes, a crisis is an opportunity. What other brilliant insights have you brought me today?', 'Yes, yes, yes.', 'Wants to be queen.', 'House Tyrell rebelled against the Iron Throne. Against my grandson.', 'More wine for Lord Baelish.', 'You would ride there yourself?', "I'll have an answer by nightfall. That'll be all, girl.", 'And what else?', 'Why?', 'Hmm.', 'Who taught you to read?', "Hmm. I taught my son Jaime to read. The maester came to me one day, told me he wasn't learning. He couldn't make sense of the letters. He reversed them in his head. The maester said he'd heard tell of this affliction and that we simply must accept it. Ha! After that, I sat Jaime down for four hours every day until he learned. He hated me for it, for a time. For a long time. But he learned. Hmm. Where is your father? Is he alive? Who was he?", 'A stonemason who could read? Hmm.', 'Quite a man. What killed him?', "You're a sharp little thing, aren't you?", "No. But you've already begun.", 'I did. I grew up with him. I watched him grow old.', "He loved us. He was a good man, but a weak man. A weak man who nearly destroyed our house and name. I'm cold.", 'Mmm.', 'Guard!', 'Wolfsbane. A rare substance. This is no common assassin.', "I don't care if you hanged a hundred. A man tried to kill me. I want his name and I want his head.", "Pretentious name for a band of outlaws. We can't allow rebels behind our lines to harass us with impunity. We look like fools and they look like heroes. That's how kings fall. I want them dead, every one.", 'Burn the villages, burn the farms. Let them know what it means to choose the wrong side.', 'Mmm. Is that mutton?', "Don't like mutton.", 'Leave it.
