Are you hungry?', 'Of course you are. Eat.', "It's bad manners to refuse a lordo s offer. Sit. Eat.", "You're small for your age. I suppose you've been underfed your whole life.", 'Mmm. This will be my last war. Win or lose.', "Do you think I'd be in my position if I had lost a war?", "But this is the one I'll be remembered for. The War of the Five Kings, they're calling it. My legacy will be determined in the coming months.", "Do you know what legacy means? It's what you pass down to your children and your children's children. It's what remains of you when you're gone. Harren the Black thought this castle would be his legacy. The greatest fortress ever built.", 'The tallest towers, the strongest walls. The Great Hall had thirty-five hearths. Thirty-five. Can you imagine? Look at it now. A blasted ruin. Do you know what happened?', 'Yes. Dragons happened.', "Harrenhal was built to withstand an attack from the land. A million men could have marched on these walls, and a million men would have been repelled. But an attack from the air with dragon fire, Mmm-mmm. Harren and all his sons roasted alive within these walls. Aegon Targaryen changed the rules. That's why every child alive still knows his name", 'Mmm?', 'Correct. A student of history, are you?', "I'm sure I knew that when I was a boy.", "Hmm. She's a heroine of yours, I take it?", "Aren't most girls more interested in the pretty maidens from the songs? Jonquil with the flowers in her hair?", 'You remind me of my daughter. Where did you learn all this stuff about Visenya and her Valyrian steel sword?', "He was a well-read stonemason. Can't say I've ever met a literate stonemason.", 'Careful now, girl. I enjoy you, but be careful. Take that back to the kitchen. Eat what you want.', 'And, girl.', "M'lord.", 'Lowborn girls say "m\'lord," not "my lord. " If you\'re going to pose as a commoner, you should do it properly.', "You're too smart for your own good. Has anyone told you that?", 'Go on.', 'Surrender the Iron Throne?', "No, a king who runs will not be king for long. He's a Lannister. He'll stand and fight. Stannis, two days from the capital and the wolf at my doorstep.", "Ha! The last time the scouts assured us of Stark's movement, he lured us into a trap. Which is why my son is his prisoner.", 'Too close to Casterly Rock.', "He's a boy and he's never lost a battle. He'll risk anything at any time because he doesn't know enough to be afraid.", "We'll ride at nightfall. I want a full night's march before he knows we're on the move. Clegane, you'll maintain a garrison here at Harrenhal. Track down this brotherhood and destroy them. The girl has proven herself a good servant. She'll stay on with you. See that he doesn't get drunk in the evenings. He's poor company when he's sober, but he's better at his work.", 'The battle is over. We have won.', 'Thank you, Your Grace.', 'Am I enjoying it?', 'Yes. I heard how happy you were.', 'blows on his paper to dry the ink.', 'You brought a whore into my bed.', 'I sent you here to advise the king. I gave you real power and authority. You chose to spend your days as you always have, bedding harlots and drinking with thieves.', 'What do you want, Tyrion?', 'Maester Pycelle assured me your wounds were not fatal.', 'Jugglers and singers require applause. You are a Lannister. Do you think I demanded a garland of roses every time I suffered a wound on a battlefield? Hmm? Now, I have seven kingdoms to look after and three of them are in open rebellion. So tell me what you want.', 'You want Casterly Rock?', "We'll find you accommodations more suited to your name and as a reward for your accomplishments during the battle of Blackwater Bay. And when the time is right, you will be given a position fit for your talents so that you can serve your family and protect our legacy. And if you serve faithfully, you will be rewarded with a suitable wife. And I would let myself be consumed by maggots before mocking the family name and making you heir to Casterly Rock.", "Why? You ask that? You, who killed your mother to come into the world? You are an ill-made, spiteful little creature full of envy, lust, and low cunning. Men's laws give you the right to bear my name and display my colors since I cannot prove that you are not mine. And to teach me humility, the gods have condemned me to watch you waddle about wearing that proud lion that was my father's sigil and his father's before him. But neither gods nor men will ever compel me to let you turn Casterly Rock into your whorehouse. Go, now. Speak no more of your rights to Casterly Rock. Go.", "Oh, one more thing. The next whore I catch in your bed, I'll hang.", 'What news of Jaime?', 'Twenty thousand unwashed Northerns have known about his escape for weeks. Collectively, you control more spies and informants than the rest of the world combined. Do you mean to tell me that none of you has any notion of where he is?', 'Try harder. What do we have, then?', 'Well, let him have it. The name suits our purposes far more than that useless pile of rubble. The Lord of Harrenhal will make a worthy suitor for the widow Arryn.', "You'll leave for the Eyrie as soon as possible and bring Lysa Arryn into the fold. Then the young wolf can add his own aunt to the list of people who have taken up arms against him.", "Fully agreed. Which is why I'm naming you new Master of Coin.", 'It would appear to be a position that best suits your talents.', "You're late.", 'Our business concerns her, too. Sit.', 'Never mind that now. We have something important to discuss.', 'Your sister has learned that your new friends the Tyrells are plotting to marry Sansa Stark to Ser Loras.', 'Your jokes are not appreciated.', 'I bring them into the royal fold and this is how they repay me, by trying to steal the key to the North out from under me.', 'The Karstarks have marched home. The young wolf has lost half his army. His days are numbered. Theon Greyjoy murdered both his brothers. That makes Sansa Stark the heir to Winterfell. And I am not about to hand her over to the Tyrells.', "There's nothing to refuse. This is a plot. Plots are not public knowledge. And the Tyrells won't carry this one out until after Joffrey's wedding. We need to act first and kill this union in its crib.", 'We find Sansa Stark a different husband.', 'I can and I do.', "Do you intend on mistreating her? The girl's happiness is not my concern, nor should it be yours.", "There, you see? You will wed her, bed her, and put a child in her. Surely you're capable of that.", 'You wanted to be rewarded for your valor in battle. Sansa Stark is a finer reward than you could ever dare hope for. And it is past time you were wed.', 'Only too well.', "Tyrion will do as he's bid. As will you.", "You'll marry Ser Loras.", 'The boy is heir to Highgarden. Tyrion will secure the North, you will secure the Reach.', "Yes, you will. You're still fertile. You need to marry again and breed.", "You're my daughter! You will do as I command and you will marry Loras Tyrell and put an end to the disgusting rumors about you once and for all.", "Not another word. My children. You've disgraced the Lannister name for far too long.", 'Why?', 'Is rich, the most beautiful woman in all seven kingdoms and the mother of the king.', 'Old?', "The years punish us as well, I promise you that. My stomach remains quite strong, however. The only thing that might turn it are details of your grandson's nocturnal activities. Do you deny them?", 'And a boy with his affliction should be grateful for the opportunity to marry the most beautiful woman in the kingdoms and remove the stain from his name.', 'Of course.', 'No.', 'Never.', 'Perhaps Highgarden has a high tolerance for unnatural behavior.', 'I will not breathe further life into a malicious lie by discussing it.', "I don't care what people believe. And neither do you.", 'Now, if the rumors about my children were true, then Joffrey is no king at all and House Tyrell is throwing its prized flower into the dirt.', "The uncertainty makes you uncomfortable. All right. I'll remove it for you.", "If you refuse to marry Loras to Cersei, I will name him to the Kingsguard. I'm sure you're familiar with the Kingsguard vows. He will never marry. He will never have children.", 'The Tyrell name will fade. And Highgarden will go to the children of Joffrey and Margaery.', 'I would have my grandson protected by a skilled warrior who takes his vows seriously. So, shall I draw up the order? Or do you consent to this marriage?', 'Your Grace.', 'You wanted to speak to me?', "You're welcome to attend the meetings of your small council, Your Grace. Any or all of them.", 'Of course.', 'I have, yes.', 'The Tower of the Hand is where I work. To walk from there to here would take time, time I could otherwise spend productively.', 'We could arrange to have you carried.', 'Where did you hear about this?', 'Apparently so.', "When I was Hand of the King under your father's predecessor, the skulls of all the Targaryen dragons were kept in this room. The skull of the last of them was right here. It was the size of an apple.", 'Yes, and the creature to whom it belonged died 300 years ago. Curiosities on the far side of the world are no threat to us.', 'Because we have been told as much by the many experts who serve the realm by counseling the king on matters about which he knows nothing.', 'You are being counseled at this very moment.', 'From now on, I will see to it that you are appropriately consulted on important matters whenever necessary. Your Grace.', 'You seem rather drunk.', "This isn't about your wedding. Renly Baratheon had a wedding. Your wife needs a child, a Lannister child, as soon as possible.", "If you're going to give her one, you need to perform.", 'More than once.', 'You can drink, you can joke, you can engage in juvenile attempts to make your father uncomfortable, but you will do your duty.', "I believe we can dispense with the bedding, Your Grace. I'm sure Tyrion did not mean to threaten the king.", 'Your uncle is clearly quite drunk, Your Grace.', "Any man who must say, 'I am the king' is no true king. I'll make sure you understand that when I've won your war for you.", 'The king is tired. See him to his chambers.', 'Grand Maester, perhaps some essence of nightshade to help him sleep.', 'Not you.', "You're a fool if you believe he's the most powerful man in Westeros.", 'You really think a crown gives you power?', 'Mm-hmm.', 'Which he got from me. Do you disapprove?', 'But to slaughter them at a wedding. Explain to me why it is more noble to kill ten thousand men in battle than a dozen at dinner.', "To end the war. To protect the family. Do you want to write a song for the dead Starks? Go ahead, write one. I'm in this world a little while longer to defend the Lannisters, to defend my blood.", 'Good. Let them remember what happens when they march on the south. All the Stark men are dead. Winterfell is a ruin. Roose Bolton will be named Warden of the North until your son by Sansa comes of age.', 'I believe you still have some work to do on that score.', 'One way or another, you will get that girl pregnant.', 'Shall I explain to you in one easy lesson how the world works?', "The house that puts family first will always defeat the house that puts the whims and wishes of its sons and daughters first. A good man does everything in his power to better his family's position regardless of his own selfish desires.", 'Does that amuse you?', 'Easy for me, is it?', "The day that you were born. I wanted to carry you into the sea and let the waves wash you away. Instead, I let you live. And I brought you as my son. Because you're a Lannister.", 'Mm-hmm.', 'It is.', "There are three living smiths who know how to rework Valyrian steel. The finest of them was in Volantis. Came here to King's Landing at my invitation.", 'From someone who no longer had need of it.', 'And now we have two.', 'The original weapon was absurdly large. Plenty of steel for two swords.', "You'll have to train your left hand.", "You'll never be as good.", "You can't serve in the Kingsguard with one hand.", 'The war is over. The king is safe. The king is never safe.', 'Other knights protected the king while you were a prisoner. They will continue to do so when you go home.', "You'll return to Casterly Rock and rule in my stead.", "I am the King's Hand. My place is here. I don't expect to see the Rock again before I die.", "You won't be breaking anything. There is a precedent to relieve a Kingsguard of his duties. The king will exercise that prerogative.", 'No?', "I don't believe I asked you a question.", 'If you think your bloody honor comes before...', 'What do you want?', "For 40 years I've tried to teach you. If you haven't learned by now, you never will. Go. If serving as a glorified bodyguard is the sum of your ambition, go serve.", 'Keep it.', 'A one-handed man with no family needs all the help he can get.', 'Have her brought to the Tower of the Hand before the wedding.', 'One of only two Valyrian steel swords in the capital, Your Grace, freshly forged in your honor.', "Bit much, wouldn't you say?", 'Proportionate to what?', 'People who spend their money on this sort of nonsense tend not to have it for long.', 'Shall we stick golden roses in half the meat pies to commemorate your generosity?', "I'm not worried about the Iron Bank.", "You're in rather a good mood.", "I won't ask why.", 'Prince Oberyn.', 'Charmed.', 'Please give him our regards. With any luck, the gout will abate with time and he will be able to walk again.', "Noblemen in my part of the country don't enjoy the same lifestyle as our counterparts in Dorne.", 'Find her. Bar the gates of the city. Seize every ship in the harbor.', 'No one leaves the capital! No one!', 'Your brother is dead. Do you know what that means?', "I'm not trying to trick you.", "Yes, you will become king. What kind of king do you think you'll be?", "Mm, I think so as well. You've got the right temperament for it. But what makes a good king? Hmm? What is a good king's single most important quality?", 'Hmm. Baelor the Blessed was holy. And pious. He built this sept. He also named a six-year-old boy high septon because he thought the boy could work miracles. He ended up fasting himself into an early grave because food was of this world and this world was sinful.', "Yeah. A good king must be just. Orys I was just. Everyone applauded his reforms. Nobles and commoners alike. But he wasn't just for long. He was murdered in his sleep after less than a year by his own brother. Was that truly just of him? To abandon his subjects to an evil that he was too gullible to recognize?", 'No.', 'Yes. Strength. King Robert was strong. He won the rebellion and crushed the Targaryen dynasty. And he attended three small council meetings in 17 years. He spent his time whoring and hunting and drinking until the last two killed him. So, we have a man who starves himself to death, a man who lets his own brother murder him, and a man who thinks that winning and ruling are the same thing. What do they all lack?', 'Yes!', "Yes. But what is wisdom? Hmm? A house with great wealth and fertile lands asks you for your protection against another house with a strong Navy that could one day oppose you. How do you know which choice is wise and which isn't? You've any experience of treasuries and granaries or shipyards and soldiers?", "No. Of course not. A wise king knows what he knows and what he doesn't. You're young. A wise young king listens to his counselors and heeds their advice until he comes of age. And the wisest kings continue to listen to them long afterwards... Your brother was not a wise king. Your brother was not a good king. If he had been, perhaps he'd still be alive. Now, as the king, you will have to marry. Do you understand why?", 'Yes, but why? To further the family line. Do you know how that happens?', 'Yes, but has anyone explained the details to you?', 'Prince Oberyn.', 'May we have the room?', 'No, thank you.', 'Are you?', 'Which way is that?', 'Some believe the king choked.', 'I hear you studied poisons at the Citadel.', 'Your hatred for my family is rather well known. You arrive at the capital, an expert in poisoning, some days later my grandson dies of poisoning.', 'You spoke with Tyrion in this very brothel on the day that you arrived. What did you discuss?', 'What did you discuss?', 'For which you blame me.', 'Here I stand unarmed, unguarded. Should I be concerned?', "Men at war commit all kinds of crimes without their superiors' knowledge.", 'Categorically.', "I'm sure he would enjoy speaking with you.", 'I could arrange for this meeting.', 'There will be a trial for my son. And as custom dictates, three judges will render a verdict. I will preside. Mace Tyrell will serve as the second judge. I would like you to be the third.', 'Not long ago, the Tyrells sided with Renly Baratheon. Declared themselves enemies of the throne. Now they are our strongest allies.', "I will also invite you to sit on the small council to serve as one of the new king's principal advisors.", 'We are not the Seven Kingdoms until Dorne returns to the fold. The king is dead. The Greyjoys are in open rebellion. A wildling army marches on the Wall. And in the East, a Targaryen girl has three dragons. Before long, she will turn her eyes to Westeros. Only the Dornish managed to resist Aegon Targaryen and his dragons.', "We need each other. You help me serve justice to the king's assassins and I will help you serve justice to Elia's.", 'When will the wedding take place in your mind?', 'A fortnight?', 'No jugglers, no jousting dwarves, no seventy-seven-course meals.', 'And your wedding to Loras?', 'Shortly?', "I know you don't like them. I didn't like your husband. Used to pat me on the back a lot. I didn't trust him.", "You don't need to make formal alliances with people you trust.", 'Ourselves alone.', 'The Tyrells are our only true rivals in terms of resources and we need them on our side.', 'Robert had me funding him. Wars swallow gold like a pit in the earth.', 'Do you know how much gold was mined in the Westerlands this past year?', 'Go on, your best guess.', "Doesn't matter. The answer is the same.", 'Our last working mine ran dry three years ago.', 'The crown owes the Iron Bank of Braavos a tremendous amount of money.', 'A tremendous amount.', 'The Iron Bank is the Iron Bank. There is no someone.', "And a temple is comprised of stones. One stone crumbles and another takes its place. And the temple holds its form for a thousand years or more. That's what the Iron Bank is... a temple. We all live in its shadow and almost none of us know it. You can't run from them. You can't cheat them. You can't sway them with excuses. If you owe them money and you don't want to crumble yourself, you pay it back. Vesting the Tyrells in the crown will help a great deal in this respect.", "I know you're building a strong case against Tyrion. And as a mother, that is your right. But as a judge, I cannot discuss the trial with you.", 'The trial begins this afternoon. We only have the morning for affairs of state. Shall we begin?', 'What would it take to make the common soldier stupid enough to try his luck with the Hound?', 'Make it 100. What else?', 'The Targaryen girl?', "Joffrey didn't die on his watch. Dismissing him was as insulting as it was stupid.", "Dragons haven't won a war in 300 years. Armies win them all the time. She must be dealt with.", 'Eventually, if it comes to that. Can your little birds find their way into Meereen?', 'Mmm. Lord Tyrell, be a good man. Fetch my quill and paper.', 'Tyrion of the House Lannister, you stand accused by the Queen Regent of regicide. Did you kill King Joffrey?', 'Did your wife, the Lady Sansa?', 'How would you say he died, then?', 'So you would blame the bakers?', 'The crown may call its first witness.', 'Silence.', "Silence! You will not speak unless called upon. You're dismissed, Ser Meryn.", 'By whom?', "Grand Maester, you examined King Joffrey's corpse. Was it without question poison that killed him?", 'Was this one of the poisons stolen from your store?', 'Thank you, Your Grace, for the courage of your testimony.', "You're excused, Lord Varys.", 'One.', 'We will adjourn for now.', "Toll the bells in an hour's time.", "I've condemned no one. The trial is not over.", 'I know nothing of the sort.', 'He killed his king.', "It won't be murder. It'll be justice.", "I'm performing my sworn duty as Hand of the King. If Tyrion is found guilty, he will be punished accordingly.", "No, he'll be punished accordingly.", "I'm well aware of your oath.", "What happens to my dynasty if I spare the life of my grandson's killer?", 'Done.', "When the testimony's concluded and a guilty verdict rendered, Tyrion will be given the chance to speak. He'll plead for mercy. I'll allow him to join the Night's Watch. In three days' time, he'll depart for Castle Black and live out his days at the Wall. You'll remove your white cloak immediately. You will leave King's Landing to assume your rightful place at Casterly Rock. You will marry a suitable woman and father children named Lannister. And you'll never turn your back on your family again.", 'And you have mine.', 'The crown may call its next witness.', 'State your name.', 'Do you swear by all the gods that your testimony will be true and honest?', 'Do you know this man?', 'How do you know him?', 'This man stands accused of murdering King Joffrey. What do you know of this?', 'Silence! Continue.', 'How did you come to be in his service?', 'Silence. Silence!', 'You wish to confess?', 'Tyrion. Do you wish to confess?', 'You admit you poisoned the king?', 'You are not on trial for being a dwarf.', 'Have you nothing to say in your defense?', 'Ser Meryn. Ser Meryn. Escort the prisoner back to his cell.', 'standing up* The gods have made their will known. Tyrion Lannister, in the name of King Tommen of the House Baratheon, First of His Name, you are hereby sentenced to death.', "Not another word. We've been over this, the matter's closed.", 'You are betrothed to Loras Tyrell. Still betrothed to Loras Tyrell and you will marry Loras Tyrell as soon as Tommen marries Margaery.', "Jaime cannot marry or inherit lands. Tyrion's sentence will be carried out tomorrow. You have, on several occasions, made great claims about your commitment to this family's future. Your role in that future is more vital now than it ever was.", 'When you were nine years old, I was called to the capital. I decided to take your brother with me and not you. You insisted that you would not be left at Casterly Rock under any circumstances and if you recall-', "Do you think you'll be the first person dragged into a sept to be married against her will?", 'No.', 'And how will you do that?', 'And what truth would that be?', 'Known what?', 'No, no, no, no, no.', "I don't believe you.", "Tyrion! Put down the crossbow. Who released you? Ah, your brother ,I expect. He always had a soft spot for you. Come, we'll go and talk in my chambers. Is this how you want to speak to me? Shaming your father has always given you pleasure…", "Yes. But you refused to die. I respect that, even admire it. You fight for what's yours. I'd never let them execute you; is that what you fear? I'd never let Illyn Payne take your head. You're a Lannister. You're my son.", 'Who?', 'Bah, Tyrion. Put down that crossbow.', "It doesn't matter.", 'She was a whore!', "And what? You'll kill your own father in the privy? No. You're my son. Enough of this nonsense…", "Enough. We'll go back to my chambers and speak with some dignity.", 'What, are you afraid of a dead whore?', "You shot me. You're no son of mine."]

Name: jorah mormont
Sentence: ['A small gift for the new Khaleesi. Songs and histories from the Seven Kingdoms.', 'Ser Jorah Mormont of Bear Island. I served your father for many years. Gods be good, I hope to always serve the rightful king.', "There is no word for ‘thank you' in Dothraki.", 'You need to drink, child... And eat.', 'The Dothraki have two things in abundance', "We're still not far from Pentos, your Grace. Magister Illyrio has extended his hospitality. You'd be more comfortable there.", 'As you wish, your Grace.', 'Selling to one... Some poachers I caught on my land.', "The Dothraki don't believe in money. Most of their slaves were given to them as gifts.", 'If you rule a city and you see the horde approaching, you have two choices', 'You want the entire horde to stop? For how long?', "You're learning to talk like a Queen.", 'Shall we return to the Khalasar, Khaleesi?', "For a man on horseback, the curved blade is a good thing, easier to handle. It's a good weapon for a Dothrakan. But a man in full plate... the arakh won't get through the steel. That's where the broadsword has the advantage. Designed for piercing plate.", 'Armor.', 'Slow.', "It's true, but it also keeps a man alive.", "I've heard that your father was a famous warrior.", 'He still is. A man of great honor. And I betrayed him.', "I don't think she wants to eat dog.", "I'll have the boys butcher a goat for supper. I need to ride to Qohor.", "Don't worry. I'll catch you. The horde's easy to find.", 'Vaes Dothrak. The city of the horselords.', "The Dothraki have never crossed the Narrow Sea. They fear any water their horses can't drink.", 'King Robert is fool enough to meet them in open battle, but the men advising him are different.', 'I fought beside them once, long ago. Now Ned Stark wants my head. He drove me from my land.', 'Aye.', 'I had no money and an expensive wife.', 'In another place, with another man.', 'Your brother Rhaegar was the last dragon. Viserys is less than the shadow of a snake.', 'The truth now', "The common people pray for rain, health and a summer that never ends. They don't care what games the high Lords play.", 'Home.', "She's doing well.", 'The prince is riding. I have heard the thunder of the hooves. Swift as the wind he rides. His enemies will cower before him… and their wives will weep tears of blood.”', "She's going to have a boy.", 'The stallion who mounts the world.” The stallion, is the khal of khals. He shall unite the people into a single khalasar. All the people of the world will be his herd.', 'She truly is a queen today.', "Don't let them see you carrying a sword in Vaes Dothrak. You know the law.", "They don't belong to you.", 'Once, perhaps.', 'And you have all three.', "You can go, but you can't have the eggs.", 'It means everything to me.', 'And here I stand.', 'Come.', 'Khal Drogo says there is a place for you. Back there.', "Put the sword down. They'll kill us all.", 'Look away Khaleesi.', 'Khaleesi…', 'The Dothraki do things in their own time, for their own reasons.', "Forgive me, Khaleesi, but your ancestor Aegon the Conqueror didn't seize six of the kingdoms because they were his right.", 'Ah well, having a few dragons makes things easier.', 'Have you ever seen a dragon, Khaleesi? I believe what my eyes and ears report.', "No no, don't trouble yourself. Enjoy the market. I'll rejoin you soon enough.", 'Rakharo.', 'I have a thirst. Open it.', 'Open it.', 'Pour.', 'You first.', 'Come.', 'Khaleesi.', 'He will die tonight, Khaleesi.', "Even a queen doesn't have that power. We must go quickly. l've heard there's a good port in Asshai.", "He's already gone, Khaleesi.", "This isn't Westeros, where men honor blood. Here they only honor strength. There will be fighting after Drogo dies. Whoever wins that fight will be the new khal. He won't want any rivals. Your boy will be plucked from your breast and given to the dogs.", 'Rein in your tongue. She is still your Khaleesi.', "l think you're right.", 'No further, horselord.', 'Are you hurt?', 'Hmm?', 'Fetch the midwives.', "They'll come or l'll have their heads.", 'Gently, gently.', 'The boy did not live.', 'What is there to tell?', 'He never lived, my princess. The women say –', 'They say the child was –', 'Time enough for that later –', "A khal who cannot ride is no khal. The Dothraki follow only the strong. l'm sorry, my Princess.", 'He seems to like the warmth, Princess.', "l don't want you alone with this sorceress.", 'Drogo will have no use for dragon eggs in the Night Lands. Sell them. You can return to the Free Cities and live as a wealthy woman for all your days.', 'Khaleesi, my Queen, l vow to serve you, obey you, to die for you if need be, but let him go, Khaleesi. l know what you intend. Do not.', "Don't ask me to stand aside as you climb on that pyre. l won't watch you burn.", 'Blood of my blood.', 'I remember.', "A trick I never learned, I'm afraid.", "This is further east than I've ever been. But, yes, Khaleesi, everything ends, even the red waste.", 'If we go south to the land of the Lazarheen, the Lamb Men will kill us and take your dragons. If we go west to the Dothraki Sea, the first Khalasar we meet will kill us and take your dragons.', 'They are too weak to fight, as are your people. You must be their strength.', 'Everything ends, even the red waste.', 'Khaleesi.', "You don't need to see this.", "Khal Pono perhaps, Khal Jhaqo They don't like the idea of a woman leading a Khalasaar.", 'Only that the desert around their walls is called the Garden of Bones. Every time the Qartheen shut their gates on a traveler, the garden grows.', 'If you heard a Dothraki horde was approaching your city, you might do the same, Khaleesi.', 'Khaleesi, please be careful.', 'Malakko says the statue is too heavy to carry. Kovarro says that Malakko is an idiot. They can pry out the gems, the rest is pure gold. Very soft. He can chop off as much as we can carry.', "It's not the only thing. They're quite good at killing the better men.", 'Do I know you?', 'Who are you?', 'If you cross the sea with an army you bought and a foreign husband who paid for it...', 'To win Westeros, you need support from Westeros.', 'According to your new friend who earned your trust by cutting his hand?', "Rich men do not become rich by giving more than they get. They'll give you ships and soldiers and they'll own you forever. Moving carefully is the hard way, but it's the right way.", "I know the opportunity before you seems like the last you'll ever have, but you musT-", 'I only want-', 'To see you on the Iron Throne.', "You have a good claim. A title. A birthright. But you have something more than that. You may cover it up and deny it, but you have a gentle heart. You would not only be respected and feared, you would be loved. Someone who can rule and should rule. Centuries come and go without a person like that coming into the world. There are times when I look at you and I still can't believe you're real.", 'Make your own way. Find your own ship. You only need one. The allies we need are in Westeros, not Qarth.', "I'll find it for you. A sound ship with a good captain.", 'Khaleesi.', 'As soon as I heard. Do you know anything?', 'I know. She was a good-', 'Doreah?', 'I should have been here.', "My place is by your side. I shouldn't have left you alone with these people.", 'They are not to be trusted.', 'Your people are in Westeros.', 'They will soon enough.', 'You are not your brother. Trust me, Khaleesi.', 'You are too young to be so-', 'Forgive me, Khaleesi. No one can survive in this world without help. No one. Let me help you, please. Tell me how.', "I didn't come here for lessons.", 'You have them? Where are they?', 'Where are the dragons?', 'Never.', 'Careful, Khaleesi. Xaro owns this city and the warlocks have a thousand eyes watching for you. I found one. A ship with a good captain. She leaves for Astapor tomorrow.', 'We cannot stay here.', "They're not your children. I know they call you the Mother of Dragons and I know you love them, but you didn't grow them in your womb. They didn't suckle at your breast. They are dragons, Khaleesi. And if we stay in Qarth, we'll die.", "You know I would die for you. I will never abandon you. I'm sworn to protect you, to serve.", "That's what the warlock wants. He told you so himself. If you enter that place, you will never leave again. His magic is strong.", "Until my last breath, I will remember. After I have forgotten my mother's face.", 'No guards. The warlocks kill with sorcery, not steel.', 'Khaleesi! Khaleesi!', "It's all a lie.", 'Aye, a small ship.', 'Take all the gold and jewels.', "They're growing fast.", "We'll be in Astapor by nightfall. Some say the Unsullied are the greatest soldiers in the world.", 'Do those people have any better ideas about how to put you on the Iron Throne?', "You're right. Another lovely day on the high seas.", "The Dothraki follow strength above all, khaleesi. You'll have a true khalasar when you prove yourself strong. And not before.", 'Even the bravest men fear death.', 'The Unsullied are a means to an end.', "They're not men. Not anymore.", 'Do you think these slaves will have better lives serving Kraznys and men like him or serving you?', "You'll be fair to them. You won't mutilate them to make a point.", "You won't order them to murder babies. You'll see they're properly fed and sheltered. A great injustice has been done to them. Closing your eyes will not undo it.", "I know him as one of the greatest fighters the Seven Kingdoms has ever seen and as the Lord Commander of Robert Baratheon's Kingsguard.", 'Khaleesi, this man has been sentenced to death.', 'And what is she to do for soldiers?', "Is it 'we' already, Ser Barristan? If you want to sit on the throne your ancestors built, you must win it. That will mean blood on your hands before the thing is done.", 'How many wars have you fought in, Ser Barristan?', "Have you ever seen a war where innocents didn't die by the thousands?", "I was in King's Landing after the sack, khaleesi. You know what I saw? Butchery. Babies, children, old men. More women raped than you can count. There's a beast in every man and it stirs when you put a sword in his hand. But the Unsullied are not men. They do not rape. They do not put cities to the sword unless they're ordered to do so. If you buy them, the only men they'll kill are those you want dead.", 'Rhaegar fought valiantly, Rhaegar fought nobly, and Rhaegar died.', 'Khaleesi, please.', 'Khaleesi, a dragon is worth more than any army.', 'It was a bitch of a siege.', 'The second. Thoros of Myr went in alone, waving that flaming sword of his.', "Proudest moment of my life. One knee in the dust, the king's sword on my shoulder, listening to the words. 'In the name of the Warrior, I charge you to be brave.' All I could think of was how badly I had to piss.", "In full plate metal for sixteen hours. Never occurred to me till the fighting was over. I was very nearly the first man knighted to piss on the king's boots.", 'You swore an oath.', 'With all my heart.', 'King Robert wanted her dead.', 'I suppose no one on the small council could speak sense to him.', "No? Doesn't the Lord of the Kingsguard traditionally-", 'Yeah, I imagine I would, too. Hours spent jabbering about backstabbings - and betrayals the world over.', "Still, she'll have to wade through that muck if she wants to rule the Seven Kingdoms.", 'Which men do you have in mind?', 'It suffered for a reason. I sold men into slavery.', "Our cause? Forgive me, Ser Barristan, but I was busy defending the khaleesi against King Robert's assassins while you were still bowing to the man.", "You only joined us a few days ago. I can't speak to your intentions.", "You're not Lord here. You're just another exile. And I take my orders from the queen.", 'Yunkai. The Yellow City.', "On the field, with ease. But they won't meet us on the field. They have provisions, patience, and strong walls. If they're wise, they'll hide behind those walls and chip away at us, man by man.", "We don't need Yunkai, khaleesi. Taking this city will not bring you any closer to Westeros or the Iron Throne.", 'Two hundred thousand if not more.', "I don't know.", "They can be trusted to kill you if they're well paid. The Yunkish are paying them well.", 'Only by the broken swords on their banners. They\'re called the Second Sons. A company led by a Braavosi named Mero, "The Titan\'s Bastard."', "He's a dangerous man, khaleesi. They all are.", "I imagine you're right.", 'He may not agree to meet.', 'Mind your tongue.', 'The Second Sons have faced worse odds and run.', 'Your men but not you?', "Or perhaps you'll lead Grey Worm and me to the slaughter, cutting the head off our army. The masters of Yunkai will pay you your fee and you won't have to split it three ways cause you've already slaughtered your partners.", 'You command the Unsullied. What do you think?', "Very good. We'll prepare.", "You're the Queensguard, Ser Barristan. Your place is by the Queen. If we are truly her loyal servants, we'll do whatever needs to be done. No matter the cost, no matter our pride.", 'There may be others.', "That's what you call a few guards?", 'It was just as you said. They did not believe until it was too late. Their slave soldiers threw down their spears and surrendered.', "You didn't conquer them. You liberated them.", "They're dragons, Khaleesi. They can never be tamed. Not even by their mother.", "There's one on every mile marker between here and Meereen.", 'A single rider. A champion of Meereen. They want you to send your own champion against him.', "They're not meaningless if half the city you intend to take is listening to them.", "I've been by your side longer than any of them, Khaleesi. Let me stand for you today as well.", '163, Khaleesi.', 'King Joffrey Baratheon is dead. Murdered at his own wedding.', 'The Lannisters have more.', "It's hard to say. It could be enough. But we're not fighting to make you Queen of King's Landing. Ten thousand men can't conquer Westeros.", 'The old houses will flock to whichever side they think will win, as they always have.', 'There\'s other news. From Yunkai. Without the Unsullied to enforce your rule, the Wise Masters have retaken control of the city. They\'ve re-enslaved the freedmen who stayed behind and sworn to take revenge against you. And in Astapor, the council you installed to rule over the city has been overthrown by a butcher named Cleon who\'s declared himself "His Imperial Majesty."', "You could sail for Westeros and leave it all behind. A boy sits on the Iron Throne. A boy many believe to be a bastard with no right to it. They've never been more vulnerable.", "You're a Targaryen. You're the Mother of Dragons.", 'What, then?', 'Khaleesi.', 'Later than some.', "It's not a question of approval, it's a question of trust.", "Why would I? The man's a sellsword.", 'I did.', 'Daario Naharis killed his captains and dumped their heads at your feet when he grew tired of their commands. How could you ever have faith in a man like that?', 'You have?', 'Without you there to rule, Khaleesi, I fear the masters will simply bide their time, wait for the invaders to leave and reassert control.', "Herding the masters into pens and slaughtering them by the thousands is also treating men like beasts. The slaves you freed, brutality is all they've ever known. If you want them to know something else, you'll have to show it to them.", "It's tempting to see your enemies as evil, all of them, but there's good and evil on both sides in every war ever fought.", 'I sold men into slavery, Khaleesi.', "I wouldn't be here to help you if Ned Stark had done to me what you want to do to the masters of Yunkai.", 'Hizdahr zo Loraq?', 'Yes, Khaleesi.', "I'm taking you to the Queen.", 'Your captor.', 'No.', 'Then stay awake.', "I'm not taking you to your sister.", "I am. Queen Daenerys Targaryen. She's the Queen I serve.", 'What business would you have with the Queen?', 'We are.', 'No wine.', 'I am.', 'No.', "I think you'll be plenty.", 'No. But the pirates are.', "And then they weren't.", 'The city of a thousand years, and all that men had learned; The Doom consumed it all alike, and neither of them turned.', "Stone Men! Don't let them touch you!", 'Get behind!', "Tyrion? Tyrion. Tyrion. Tyrion. You're all right.", "You're heavier than you look. Did any of them touch you?", "I suppose that's why they send them there.", "We walk, up the coast. With luck, we'll find a fishing village. Maybe another boat.", "We've got a long walk ahead of us. I'll get some wood for a fire. Try to get some rest, huh?", 'I can.', "Of course I'm hungry.", 'I am not your travelling companion.', 'Do you ever shut up?', 'Why?', "I'm sure you've visited many brothels in many cities.", 'What do you know about my father?', 'How?', 'We better keep moving.', 'Do you believe in anything?', "In something greater than ourselves, I mean. The Gods. Destiny. Do you believe there's a plan for this world?", "Neither did I. I was a cynic, just like you. Then I saw a girl step into a great fire with three stone eggs. When the fire burned out I thought I'd find her blackened bones. Instead I found her. Daenerys. Alive and unhurt. Holding her baby dragons. Have you ever heard baby dragons singing?", "It's hard to be a cynic after that.", "No it doesn't.", 'First we have to conquer the world.', 'Then she rules.', 'She is the rightful heir.', "Shh! It's a slave ship", 'They probably came ashore for--', 'Queen Daenerys has outlawed slavery.', 'I killed a Dothraki blood rider in single combat.', "It's no lie. His name was Qotho. He was bloodrider to Khal Drogo. Take me to Slaver's Bay, put a sword in my hand, I'll prove my worth.", 'Khaleesi, please, I just need a moment of your time. I brought you a gift.', 'Your Grace, I want to say--', 'You said whoever wins would fight at the Great Pit in front of the queen. I won.', "I've been flogged if it makes you happy. I'm the best you've got. If I win at the Great Pit how much can you sell me for?", 'Let me fight for her and I belong to you.', 'I fight and die for your glory, oh glorious Queen.', 'This way!', 'Torgo Nudho.', 'None of that matters now. The longer we sit here bantering the longer Daenerys is out there in the wilderness.', "We? You're a Lannister. The Queen intends to remove your family from power.", "You've been here for how many days now? I've fought for her for years. Since she was little more than a child.", 'Careful now.', 'The second time thanks to you.', 'If I ever kill you your eyes will be wide open.', "He's a foreign dwarf that barely speaks the language. Why would the Meereenese listen to him?", 'Ram', "Don't know anything else that can melt a ram's horn", "She's too smart to like it", "I've been all over the world There's no escaping men like us", 'You know why', 'Of course it is', 'If you grow old', 'So do I', 'Not an army A horde', 'They have her', "I'm fine", 'What?', "Makes me sad You'll disappoint her before long She'll move on", "We need each other right now After we're done needing each other --", "You didn't get much discipline as a child, did you?", 'The road running through the Horse Gate, they call that the godsway', "Eastern Market, Western Market When Khal Drogo died, she was supposed to come here and join the Dosh Khaleen, the widows of the dead khals That's where they would have taken her, the Temple of the Dosh Khaleen", "It's forbidden to carry weapons in the sacred city", "If they spot us and we're unarmed, we'll say we're traders heading for the Western Market But if they see weapons…", "There's 100,000 of them down there We can't fight our way out We wait till dark, and then we'll find her", "Don't worry it didn't touch you", 'I know what happens', 'Come on', 'My friends...We wandered off from the Western Market and got lost Could you show us the way back?', "Wine Come down to my stall tomorrow, I'll give you a cask of the Arbor's finest", 'If they find a body with a stab wound, the whole city will be looking for us', 'We have to go now', 'All we can do is try', 'You must send me away.', "I don't know.", "I don't know that either. But I've seen what happens when it goes far enough. I'll end things before that.", "Don't be. All I've ever wanted was to serve you. Tyrion Lannister was right. I love you. I'll always love you. Goodbye, Khaleesi.", 'Has she come yet?', 'The Dragon Queen. Daenerys Stormborn.', 'How long?', "But how long 'till...", 'Jorah. Jorah Mormont.', "There's no need. I've been dead to them for years.", 'What are you doing?', 'What is it?', 'Have you ever done this before?', 'A bit. Less than before.', "I don't know anything about that. I just started feeling better. I assumed it was the rest that did it.", 'And the climate.', 'How bad is it?', "I surrendered to this sickness the moment I first saw it. I knew it would kill me or I'd kill myself before it could. Daenerys Stormborn convinced me otherwise. The only place for me is with her.", 'I owe my life to her and you.', 'Perhaps our paths will cross again?', 'kneels before DAENERYS.', 'Your Grace.', 'stands.', 'nods to JON.', "I wouldn't be here if I hadn't. I return to your service, my queen, if you'll have me.", "With the queen's permission I'll go north and take one.", 'You asked me to find a cure so I could serve you. Allow me to serve you.', 'It was supposed to last us the rest of our lives.', 'nods to TYRION. DAENERYS appears and walks up to JORAH.', 'Your Grace, I --', 'We were hoping some of your men could help.', 'Thoros?', 'I hardly recognized you.', 'He was my father.', 'You returned the favor, as I recall.', "Don't you want to know what we're doing?", 'He was a good man. He deserved a better son. Were you with him at the end?', "I can't think of a worse way for him to go. The Night's Watch was his life. He would have died to protect every one of those men, and they butchered him.", 'Your father wanted to execute me.', "He was in the right of course. It didn't make me hate him any less.", 'and JON glance at each other.', 'Me too.', 'stops examining the sword and looks up to JON.', 'pauses, then nods at JON.', 'He gave it to you.', 'pulls the sword halfway out of the sheath and inspects the blade, turning it in his hands.', "I brought shame to my house. I broke my father's heart.", 'resheaths the blade and hands it back to JON.', "I forfeited the right to claim this sword. It's yours. May it serve you well and your children after you.", "Dragons don't understand the difference between what is theirs and what isn't. Land, livestock, children... Letting them roam free around a city was a problem.", "Perhaps you should fly to Winterfell, Your Grace. You have many enemies in the North. Thousands fell fighting your fatherAll it takes is one angry man with a crossbow. He'll see your silver hair on the kingsroad and know that one well-placed bolt will make him a hero. The man who killed the conqueror.", "They could, they just wouldn't.", 'Forgive me, khaleesi.', 'Many things.', "But you did forgive, despite my failures. When I heard you'd named Tyrion your Hand, it broke my heart.", 'You made the right choice.', "I didn't. His mouth hardly stopped moving between Volantis and Meereen. It was all I could do not to throw him in the sea.", 'But the mind behind all those words-', 'As have we all. He owns his and learns from them.', "I am. And one other suggestion, if you'll allow me.", 'We have all we need to win this war.', "Please, listen to me. You're the future of our house.", "You'll be safer in the crypt. These things we're fighting-", 'Thank you, my lady.', 'What have you got there?', 'You still have a family.', "I'll wield it in his memory to guard the realms of men.", 'Go! Go.', "I'm hurt."]

Name: varys
Sentence: ['Lord Stark.', "I was grievously sorry to hear of your troubles on the Kingsroad. We are all praying for Prince Joffrey's full recovery.", 'His Grace has many cares. He entrusts some small matters to us that we might lighten the load.', "You are the King's Hand, Lord Stark, we serve at your pleasure.", 'Lady Stark.', 'To see you again after so many years is a blessing. Your poor hands.', 'Knowledge is my trade, my Lady. Did you bring the dagger with you, by any chance? My little birds are everywhere. Even in the north. They whisper to me the strangest stories. Valyrian steel.', 'I must admit I do not.', 'Dreadful.', 'The realm prospers from such events, my Lord. They give the great a chance at glory, and the lowly a respite from their woes.', 'How is your son, my Lord?', 'But his mind is sound?', 'A blessing then. I suffered an early mutilation myself. Some doors close forever... others open in the most unexpected places. May I?', "If the wrong ears heard what I'm about to tell you, off comes my head. And who would mourn poor Varys then? North or South, they sing no songs for spiders. But there are things you must know. You are the King's Hand and the King is a fool... your friend, I know, but a fool... and doomed unless you save him.", "I didn't trust you.", 'The Queen is not the only one who has been watching you closely. There are few men of honor in the capital. You are one of them. I would like to believe I am another, strange as that may seem.', 'The same sort as Jon Arryn. The tears of Lys, they call it. A rare and costly thing, as clear and tasteless as water. It leaves no trace.', 'Some dear friend, no doubt. But which one? There were many. Lord Arryn was a kind and trusting man. There was one boy... all he was he owed to Jon Arryn.', 'Pity what happened to him, just when his life seemed to be going so nicely.', 'Someone who could afford it.', 'He started asking questions.', "He's found one bastard already. He has the book. The rest will come.", "The gods alone know. The fools tried to kill his son. What's worse, they botched it. The wolf and the lion will be at each other's throats. We will be at war soon, my friend.", 'This Hand is not the other.', 'Delay," you say. "Move fast, " I reply. This is no longer a game for two players.', 'The first to arrive and the last to leave. I admire your industry.', 'We all have our qualities.', "I think you're mistaking business with pleasure.", "Oh, I'm sure. Lord Redwyne likes his boys very young, I hear.", 'Though I suppose beauty is a subjective quality, no? Is it true that Ser Marlon of Tumblestone prefers amputees?', 'And I heard the most awful rumor about a certain lord with a taste for fresh cadavers. Must be enormously difficult to accommodate that inclination. The logistics alone... to find beautiful corpses before they rot.', 'Strictly speaking.', 'Do you know, I have no idea where they are? And we had been so close. But enough about me. How have you been since we last saw each other?', 'Now the last time I saw you, you were talking to the Hand of the King.', 'Eyes I own.', "Everyone's well aware of your enduring fondness for Lord Stark's wife. If the Lannisters were behind the attempt on the Stark boy's life and it was discovered that you helped the Starks come to that conclusion... To think... A simple word to the Queen...", 'Oh.', 'Have you?', 'Was that you under the bed?', 'Oh, please.', "Disturbing news from far away. Haven't you heard?", 'No rumor, my Lord. The princess is with child.', 'Ser Jorah Mormont. He is serving as adviser to the Targaryens.', 'I understand your misgivings, my Lord. Truly, I do. It is a terrible thing we must consider, a vile thing. Yet, we who presume to rule must sometimes do vile things for the good of the realm. Should the gods grant Daenerys a son, the realm will bleed.', "You've seen better days, my lord.", 'No, no, many still love you. Sansa came to court this morning to plead for your life.', 'You do me wrong, my lord. Your blood is the last thing l want.', "When l was still a boy - before they cut my balls off with a hot knife - l traveled with a group of actors through the free cities. They taught me that each man has a role to play. The same is true at court. l am the master of whisperers. My role is to be sly, obsequious and without scruples. l'm a good actor, my lord.", "l could. But will l? No. As l said, I'm no hero.", "Peace. Did you know that your son is marching south with an army of Northmen? Loyal lad. Fighting for his father's freedom.", "Boys have been conquerors before. But the man giving Cersei sleepless nights is the king's the late king's brother. Lord Stannis has the best claim to the throne. He is a proven battle commander and he is utterly without mercy.", 'Sansa pleaded so sweetly for your life. lt would be a shame to throw it away. Cersei is no fool. She knows a tame wolf is more use to her than a dead one.', 'l want you to serve the realm! Tell the queen you will confess your vile treason, tell your son to lay down his sword and proclaim Joffrey as the true heir. Cersei knows you as a man of honor. lf you give her the peace she needs, and promise to carry her secret to your grave, l believe she will allow you to take the black and live out your days on the Wall with your brother and your bastard son.', "Pity. Such a pity. What of your daughter's life, my lord? ls that a precious thing to you?", 'When you imagine yourself up there, how do you look? Does the crown fit? Do all the lords and ladies simper and bow, the ones who sneered at you for years?', "A man with great ambition and no morals… l wouldn't bet against you.", "l must be one of the few men in this city who doesn't want to be King.", 'Oh, you can do better than that.', "Have you? Do you spend a lot of time wondering what's between my legs?", 'l am flattered, of course, to be pictured at all.', 'Am l? That is good to know. Do you lie awake at night fearing my gash?', 'And l admire you, Lord Baelish. A grasper from a minor House with a major talent for befriending powerful men – and women.', 'So here we stand in mutual admiration and respect.', 'Serving a new King.', 'My king.', 'The peasants say, a long summer means an even longer winter.', 'Your father has named Lord Tyrion to serve as Hand in his stead while he fights -', 'Your father has named Lord Tyrion to serve as hand in his stead.', 'My lord.', 'We were just speaking of your bravery in the victory against the Stark auxiliary forces.', 'I heard you suffered a terrible head wound. The northerners are such fearsome warriors.', "To find so lovely creature working in your father's kitchen. It almost beggars belief.", 'How can you tell?', "I am glad your new friend was able to accompany you to the capital. Friends are such an important part of life. Unfortunate that your father didn't want her to come. But rest easy my lord, I am very good at keeping secrets for my good friends.", 'How unspeakable of me to go on and on, when all you want to do is rest. I will leave you. . Welcome to Kings Landing, my dear. The city is made brighter by your presence. We have a council meeting, my lord.', 'Who threatened you?', 'Ned Stark was a man of honor.', "You might be disappointed in the results. The storms come and go. The big fish eat the little fish. And I keep on paddling. Come, my lord. We shouldn't keep the queen waiting.", 'Trouble with the wildlings?', "Somewhat less wild these days. It seems they've stopped killing each other and started following this King-Beyond-the-Wall.", 'How do you kill a dead man?', 'Ooh. "The Queen mustn\'t know." I love conversations that begin this way.', 'Theon Greyjoy? Forgive me, my lord, but how? He grew up a ward of Winterfell. He fights for Robb Stark.', "You'll be pleased to know our mutual friend is doing quite well in Lady Sansa's service.", 'And it seems the Grand Maester has found his way into a black cell?', 'Well played, My Lord Hand. But should I be worried? Janos Slynt, Pycelle - The Small Council grows smaller every day.', 'Power is a curious thing, my lord. Are you fond of riddles?', 'Three great men sit in a room. A king, a priest and a rich man. Between them stands a common sellsword. Each great man bids the sellsword kill the other two. Who lives, who dies?', 'Does it? He has neither crown nor gold nor favor with the gods.', "But if it's swordsmen who rule, why do we pretend kings hold all the power? When Ned Stark lost his head, who was truly responsible? Joffrey? The executioner? Or something else?", "Power resides where men believe it resides. It's a trick, a shadow on the wall. And a very small man can cast a very large shadow.", "My Lord Hand. Commander. I must compliment you on the gold cloaks' performance these last few weeks. Did you know there has been a marked drop in thievery?", 'Given the circumstances, my lord, I believe extreme measures are warranted.', 'Ah. "The Great Sieges of Westeros." Thrilling subject. Shame Archmaester Ch\'Vyalthan wasn\'t a better writer.', 'And if Stannis does attack the Mud Gate, what is our plan?', "We don't have that many books.", 'What do we have?', "No man can be in all rooms at all times. I have many little birds in the North, my lord, but I haven't heard their songs since Theon Greyjoy captured Winterfell.", 'I am trying.', 'Oh, no one disputes that, my lord, not even the multitudes who despise you.', 'I wish we could, too.', "If we're going to play, you'll have to start.", 'A most highborn plumber.', "You're quite good at being Hand, you know? Jon Arryn and Ned Stark were good men. Honorable men. But they disdained the game and those who played. You enjoy the game.", 'And you play it well.', 'They say he burns his enemies alive to honor the Lord of Light.', 'In the Summer Isles, they worship a fertility goddess with sixteen teats.', 'This morning, I heard a song all the way from Qarth beyond the Red Waste. Daenerys Targaryen lives.', "She has three dragons. But even if what they say is true, it'll be years before they are fully grown. And then there will be nowhere to hide.", "I've always hated the bells. They ring for horror. A dead king, a city under siege.", 'Exactly. Podrick, is that it?', "I'm not entirely sure what you're suggesting.", 'Do you trust him?', 'Good.', 'The map you asked for.', 'Closer to fifty. The Targaryens built this city to withstand a siege and to provide escape if necessary.', "That is good to hear. Though I'm sure many captains say the same while their ship is afloat. You look well suited for battle, my lord.", 'For all our sakes, I hope you are wrong. My little birds tell me that Stannis Baratheon has taken up with a red priestess from Asshai.', "You don't believe in the old powers, my lord?", "I think you believe in what you see and in what those you trust have seen. You probably don't entirely trust me.", "And yet I have seen things and heard things, things you have not, things I wish I had not. I don't believe I've ever told you how I was cut.", 'One day, I will. The dark arts have provided Lord Stannis with his armies and paved his path to our door. For a man in service to such powers to sit on the Iron Throne, I can think of nothing worse. And tonight, I believe you are the only man who can stop him.', 'No need for that, my dear.', "I'm not like most men.", "I would like you to tell me if working for Lord Baelish has been all you'd hoped it would be.", "You wouldn't remember me if we had?", 'And I think you remember all of them. I think your true talents are wasted on them.', "You're afraid. Why? Nothing dangerous down there.", "And, unlike your current employer, I protect those who work for me. I don't abuse them to satisfy royal whims or force them to abuse each other.", 'I thought you said you knew who I was.', 'Littlefinger looks at you and sees a collection of profitable holes. I see a potential partner.', "Oh, you should be. He's a dangerous man. But everyone has their weaknesses. Your current employer hides his very well, but not as well as he thinks.", 'Why would I lie about it?', "Where before there was nothing but love. Ser Mandon Moore tried to kill you on your sister's orders. If it weren't for your squire's bravery, you'd be a dead man.", "I'm afraid your friend has been relieved of his command of the City Watch. The gold cloaks are now firmly in the hands of your father or your sister. It varies from cloak to cloak.", "Have gone home. Your father paid them quite handsomely. I'm afraid we won't be seeing each other for some time, my lord.", 'We are. Podrick, would you mind?', "There are many who know that without you this city faced certain defeat. The king won't give you any honors, the histories won't mention you, but we will not forget.", 'Come along now, Podrick.', 'We are trying, my lord.', "Robb Stark and most of his bannermen are in Riverrun for the funeral of his grandfather Lord Hoster Tully. In Stark's absence, Roose Bolton holds Harrenhal, which would seem to make him Lord of Harrenhal, in practice if not in name.", 'Oh, Lord Tyrion. Come in, come in.', 'Oh, always in confidence.', "Oh, no. It's a wonderful time.", 'End your life?', 'Proof? Will there be a trial?', 'I have no proof, only whispers. Before all this nastiness, I was going to tell you the story of how I was cut. Do you want to hear it still?', "As a boy, I traveled with a troupe of actors through the Free Cities. One day in Myr, a certain man made my master an offer too tempting to refuse. I feared the man meant to use me as I'd heard some men used small boys. But what he wanted was far worse. He gave me a potion that made me powerless to move or speak, yet did nothing to dull my senses. With a hooked blade he sliced me, root and stem, chanting all the while. He burned my parts in a brazier. The flames turned blue and I heard a voice answer his call. I still dream of that night. Not of the sorcerer, not of his blade. I dream of the voice from the flames. Was it a god? A demon? A conjurer's trick? I don't know. But the sorcerer called and a voice answered. And ever since that day, I have hated magic and all those who practice it. But you can see why I was eager to aid in your fight against Stannis and his Red Priestess. A symbolic revenge of sorts.", 'You do not possess at the moment.', "But influence is largely a matter of patience, I have found. Once I had served the sorcerer's purpose, he threw me out of his house to die. I resolved to live to spite him. I begged. I sold what parts of my body remained to me. I became an excellent thief and soon learned that the contents of a man's letters are more valuable than the contents of his purse. Step by step, one distasteful task after another, I made my way from the slums of Myr to the small council chamber. Influence grows like a weed. I tended mine patiently until its tendrils reached from the Red Keep all the way across to the far side of the world where I managed to wrap them around something very special.", "Hello, my old friend. It's been a long time. I have no doubt the revenge you want will be yours in time if you have the stomach for it.", 'Is he very large?', 'Extraordinary.', "We're talking about the same Podrick? The quiet boy in Lord Tyrion's service? Seems a bit simple?", 'What did he do to them?', 'So what did they say?', 'Huh. Prodigies appear in the oddest of places. And what did Littlefinger say about this loss of income?', 'Ah, yes, to pursue his enduring love of the Lady Arryn and the title that comes with her. Sad, really. Is that all it takes to make our friend lose interest in poor Sansa Stark?', 'What makes you say so?', 'Ah. You can read. Rare for a woman in your profession.', "Of course. I'm missing something obvious you're about to point out?", 'Who is important enough to Littlefinger to merit a featherbed besides Littlefinger? Could he be bringing one of his girls?', 'How do you know?', 'Prodigies in odd places indeed.', "A thousand blades taken from the hands of Aegon's fallen enemies, forged in the fiery breath of Balerion the Dread.", "Ha, I'm sure you have. Ugly old thing. Yet it has a certain appeal. The Lysa Arryn of chairs. Shame you had to settle for your second choice.", "Thwarting you has never been my primary ambition, I promise you. Although who doesn't like to see their friends fail now and then?", 'I did what I did for the good of the realm.', 'But what do we have left once we abandon the lie? Chaos. A gaping pit waiting to swallow us all.', 'Your Grace, Lady Sansa is your aunt by marriage.', 'When did you come to this strange country?', 'You were only a child.', "You've been a good influence on our mutual friend, you know. He used to drink from sundown to sunup, visit three brothels a night, gamble away his father's money. Now it's just the drinking.", 'She is a sweet young thing. None of this is her fault.', 'No, I expect not.', "We break bread with them, but that doesn't make us family. We've learned their language, but we'll never be their countrymen. If you let yourself believe that a foreign girl with no name could spend her life with the son of Tywin Lannister-", 'You have one name. As do I. Here only the family name matters.', "Diamonds. I'd tell you to beware carrying so much wealth, but you know how to protect yourself. Get on one of those ships. Sail to Pentos or Lys or Myr. You can buy a house with these diamonds, a very large house. Hire servants. Start a new life, a good life, far from here. The mysterious foreign beauty. You'll have suitors lining up.", "Tyrion Lannister is one of the few people alive who could make this country a better place. He has the mind for it, he has the will, he has the right last name. And you- you are a complication. I know you love him. And I know it's true love not bought by gold and silver. I'm not asking you to leave him for money. I'm asking you to leave because your presence in the capital endangers him. This will never be your home, my lady. Find a true home somewhere far from here while there's still time.", "I'm afraid foreigners aren't welcome at such exclusive affairs.", 'Ahem.', "Shae has been noticed. Sansa's maid saw you with her. She already told your sister. It's only a matter of time before your father hears.", 'No, I will not. How long do you imagine your father and sister would let me live if they suspected me of lying? I have no pet sellsword to protect me. No legendary brother to avenge me. Only little birds who whisper in my ear.', 'No one weeps for spiders or whores. I have friends across the sea who could help her.', 'Your father has promised to hang the next whore he finds you with. Have you ever known your father to make an idle threat?', 'Your Grace.', 'Sandor Clegane has been spotted in the Riverlands, my lord.', 'My birds tell me the Hound slaughtered five of our soldiers. I believe the phrase "fuck the king" was uttered.', '10 silver stags seems a generous bounty.', 'More whispers from the east, my lord.', 'Daenerys has taken up residence in Meereen. She has conquered the city and rules as its queen.', 'She commands an army of Unsullied, my queen. Some 8,000 strong. She has a company of sellswords-- the Second Sons. She has two knights advising her-- Jorah Mormont and Barristan Selmy. And she has three dragons.', 'No longer. He appears to be fully devoted to her. As for Ser Barristan, it would seem he took his dismissal from the Kingsguard a bit harder than anticipated.', 'A child with two seasoned warriors counseling her and a powerful army at her back, Your Grace.', 'Most certainly, my Lord Hand.', 'Prince Oberyn.', "Only Varys. I'm not actually a nobleman. No one is under obligation to call me lord.", 'You seem quite knowledgeable about the Unsullied. Did you spend much time in Essos?', 'May I ask why?', "Most of us aren't princes.", "I have an ear for accents. I've lost my accent entirely.", "It's a long story.", 'People I trust.', 'Not at all. But I was never interested in girls, either.', 'Nothing.', "Not me. When I see what desire does to people, what it's done to this country, I am very glad to have no part in it. Besides, the absence of desire leaves one free to pursue other things.", 'I\'m afraid I do, my lord. He said, "Perhaps you should speak more softly to me, then. Monsters are dangerous and just now kings are dying like flies."', "Yes. After we received word of Robb Stark's death. He didn't seem gladdened by the news. Perhaps his marriage to Sansa Stark had made him more sympathetic to the northern cause.", 'Sadly, my lord, I never forget a thing.', "What have you done? Quickly. Trust me, my friend, I've brought you this far.", 'Apologies.', 'I saved your life. If they catch you, they catch me. I cannot say I feel overly guilty about leaving you in that “fucking crate”.', "No. I only know what it's like to pick up your shit and throw it overboard.", 'The home of my colleague. Ilyrio Mopatis. A merchant. He and I met many years ago, through mutual friends. A group of people who saw Robert Baratheon for the disaster he was. We tried to do what was best for the realm by supporting the Targaryen restoration. And thus began the chain of mistakes that has led us both here. Things have gotten worse, not better. Westeros needs to be saved from itself.', 'My lord?', 'You already drank yourself across the Narrow Sea.', 'Because we are talking about the future of our country.', 'Imp, half-man.', 'There are faster ways to kill yourself.', 'You are many things, my friend, but not a coward.', 'Your brother asked me to.', 'Refuse the Kingslayer? A dangerous proposition.', "I didn't do it for you. I did it for the Seven Kingdoms.", "I don't believe in saviors. I believe men of talent have a role to play in the war to come.", 'You have many admirable qualities, self-pity is not one of them. Any fool with a bit of luck can find himself born into power. But earning it for yourself, that takes work.', "I think you are. You have your father's instinct for politics, and you have compassion.", 'I never said you were perfect.', 'Peace. Prosperity. A land where the powerful do not prey on the powerless.', "Perhaps. And perhaps we've grown so used to horror we assume there's no other way. If you sat on the Iron Throne, would you spread misery throughout the land?", "No, you won't. But you could help another climb those steps and take that seat. The Seven Kingdoms need someone stronger than Tommen, but gentler than Stannis. A monarch who can intimidate the high lord and inspire the people. A ruler loved by millions with a powerful army and the right family name.", "Who said anything about him? You have a choice my friend. You can stay here at Ilyrio's palace and drink yourself to death, or you can ride with me to Mereen, meet Daenerys Targaryen, and decide if the world is worth fighting for.", 'Yes, best be careful. You might accidentally consume some solid food.', "You don't like it?", "You can't. Cersei has offered a lordship to the man who brings her your head.", 'Are we really going to spend the entire road to Volantis talking about the futility of everything?', 'The road to Meereen.', 'I told you. A ruler.', 'You were quite good, you know. At ruling. During your brief tenure as Hand.', 'Still, a man of talent.', 'Yes, but showed great promise in other areas as well.', 'Why?', 'People follow leaders. And they will never follow us. They find us repulsive.', 'And we find them repulsive, which is why we surround ourselves with large, comfortable boxes to keep them away. And yet, no matter what we do, people like you and me are never really satisfied inside the box. Not for long.', 'No.', 'Volantis is a large city.', 'The likelihood of you being spotted here increases a hundredfold.', "I'm not sure how many new ways I can find of saying this.", "It's a perfectly good face.", "If anyone recognizes you, you'll lose more than that.", 'Yes. The Volantene masters are very organized. . Flies for dung shovelers. . Hammers for builders. . Tears for whores. Lest they forget.', 'We should keep moving.', 'Thank you.', 'Someone who inspires priests and whores is worth taking seriously.', "Where're you going?", 'I thought we were so happy together until you abandoned me.', "The birds sing in the west, the birds sing in the east. If one knows how to listen. They tell me you've already found favor with the Mother of Dragons.", "Information is the key. You need to learn your enemies' strengths and strategies. You need to learn which of your friends are not your friends.", 'If only. A grand old city, choking on violence, corruption, and deceit. Who could possibly have any experience managing such a massive, ungainly beast?', 'Oh, I know.', 'You walk like a rich person', 'You walk as though the paving stones were your personal property I used to steal from people like you when I was a boy', 'She thinks you want to eat her baby', 'His Valyrian is terrible He only wants to give you money, so your baby can eat', 'Mhysa means mother in Valyrian', 'Who wrote it?', 'The Sons of the Harpy?', 'She did fly away on a dragon and not come back', 'The Sons of the Harpy planned their attack in the fighting pits very carefully, which means they take orders from someone', "My little birds have already taken wing Soon they'll return, singing songs of men in gold masks", 'I do not make dwarf jokes', "So, the fleet It's been burned", 'Astapor and Yunkai have stopped asking us for aid', "The Masters have retaken both cities Outside of Meereen, the whole of Slaver's Bay has returned to the slavers", 'Do they know that?', "I don't know how you stand it in all that leather", 'If we could have the room', 'You look lovely today, my dear You really do How you climbed all those steps without breaking a sweat', 'I am not a torturer', 'Though it so often is what people deserve', "And it does provide answers But they're usually the wrong answers My job is to find the right answers Do you know how I do that? I do it by making people happy I'd like to make you happy, Vala That's your name, isn't it, Vala?", "That's all right I know who you are and what you've done You've done a lot You've sacrificed your body for a cause, which is more than most people do And you've helped the Sons of the Harpy murder the Unsullied and the Second Sons", "I understand Well, that makes perfect sense from your perspective I have a different perspective, of course I think it's important that you try to see things from my perspective just as I will try to see them from yours Because that is the only way that I can make you and Dom happy That is how you pronounce it -- Dom? I'm afraid I don't really speak the language Such a handsome boy Those big, brown eyes Good luck keeping the ladies away", "Children are blameless I have never hurt them Your boy is in no immediate danger, this I swear to you But between us, dear, you did conspire to kill the queen's soldiers We both know the penalty for that crime How will poor Dom get on without his mother? And with his breathing problem", "Yes, from your perspective, this is a problem There is a third option, though A ship leaving tomorrow for Pentos I've already booked passage for a woman and her young son I'll even throw in a bag of silver to help you start again", "Though I'm afraid we'll have to ask one of our leather-clad friends back in to carry it Far too heavy for me The boat sails at dawn You need to decide now A new life for you and Dom or…", "Sorry I was busy learning who funds the Sons of the Harpy Some things you can't rush", 'The good masters of Astapor And the wise masters of Yunkai With help from their friends in Volantis', 'Of course Man can be fickle, but birds always trust', 'In the last fortnight since our pact with the Masters, how many killings have been carried out by the Sons of the Harpy?', 'And how many Masters have been butchered by the free men.', "So it's safe to say that a fragile peace has taken hold.", 'For now is the best we get in our profession.', "Considering the city was on the brink of civil war, I'd say it's a good start.", 'Sounds like quite the hero. Where would we find him?', "A man named Stannis Baratheon was anointed as the chosen one by one of your priestesses. He, too, had a glorious destiny. He attacked King's Landing and was soundly defeated by the man standing beside me. Last I had heard, he'd been defeated again, this time at Winterfell and this time for good.", "I suppose it's hard for a fanatic to admit a mistake. Isn't that the whole point of being a fanatic? You're always right. Everything is the Lordo s will.", 'And you, an honest servant of the lord, why should I trust you to know any more than the priestess who counseled Stannis?', 'Would you?', 'You made a pact with fanatics.', "If you shaved your beard with a straight razor, you'd say the razor worked. That doesn't mean it won't cut your throat.", 'I know.', "If I don't return, you'll know I was wrong.", 'We need friends in Westeros. And we need ships.', "She'll come back. She has to. My heart's been broken too many times already.", "I'll walk the rest of the way myself. I can't go off on a secret mission in the company of the most famous dwarf in the city.", 'Fire and blood.', "I remember that storm. All the dogs in King's Landing howled through the night.", 'Cersei controls fewer than half the Seven Kingdoms. The lord of Westeros despise her. Even before your arrival, they plotted against her. Now...', 'They joined our side, my queen, because they believe in you.', 'I did.', "I had a choice, Your Grace--serve Robert Baratheon or face the headman's axe.", 'Robert was an improvement on your father, to be sure. There have been few rulers in history as cruel as the Mad King. Robert was neither mad nor cruel. He simply had no interest in being king.', 'Until your marriage to Khal Drogo, Your Grace, I knew nothing about you, save your existence and that you were said to be beautiful.', 'Which you turned to your advantage.', 'King Robert.', 'Your Grace, I did what had to be done to--', "The kind the realm needs. Incompetence should not be rewarded with blind loyalty. As long as I have my eyes, I'll use them. I wasn't born into a great house. I came from nothing. I was sold as a slave and carved up as an offering. When I was a child, I lived in alleys, gutters, abandoned houses. You wish to know where my true loyalties lie? Not with any king or queen, but with the people. The people who suffer under despots and prosper under just rule. The people whose hearts you aim to win. If you demand blind allegiance, I respect your wishes. Grey Worm can behead me or your dragons can devour me. But if you let me live, I will serve you well. I will dedicate myself to seeing you on the Iron Throne because I choose you. Because I know the people have no better chance than you.", 'I swear it, my queen.', 'I would expect nothing less from the Mother of Dragons.', "She once served another who wanted the Iron Throne. It didn't end well for Stannis Baratheon, did it?", "And why do you think the Lord of Light singled out this Jon Snow aside from the visions you've seen in the flames, that is?", "I wondered why you weren't there to meet our guests. You begged us to summon the King in the North. Don't you want to see him again?", "Strange. You spoke so highly of Jon Snow but when he arrives you hide on a cliff. I didn't take you for a bashful girl.", "Oh, I doubt that. Give us common folk one taste of power we're like the lion who tasted man. Nothing is ever so sweet again.", 'Why?', 'So where will you go?', "Good. If you don't mind my saying, I don't think you should return to Westeros. I'm not sure you'd be safe here.", 'My Lady --', 'Our Iron Born and Dornish allies were attacked on route to Dorne.', 'Two or three ships escaped. The rest sunk our captured. Ellaria and the sand snakes dead or captured. The Greyjoys are dead or captured.', "Your Grace, he's already destroyed a good portion of our fleet. To send our remaining ships after him --", 'The Unsullied will be there soon.', "A difficult situation. They know we're coming.", 'and TYRION are sitting on the stairs of the Throne Room alone. VARYS has a sealed raven scroll in his hand tapping it on the stone. TYRION is drinking a glass of wine having a discussion with VARYS.', 'Not burn him alive alongside his son.', "That's what I used to tell myself about her father.
