I found the traitors but I wasn't the one burning them alive. I was only a purveyor of information.", "reaches over to TYRION's cup of wine, picks it up and begins to drink from it. He grimaces as he drinks.", 'It\'s what I told myself when I watched them beg for mercy, "I\'m not the one doing it." As the pitch of their screams rose higher, "I\'m not the one doing it." When their hair caught fire and the smell of the burning flesh filled the Thone Room, "I\'m not the one doing it."', 'drinks again and sets the cup down next to TYRION. TYRION picks it up.', 'And she never will be... with the right counsel. You need to find a way to make her listen.', 'Jon Snow.', "It's a sealed scroll for the King in the North.", 'Nothing good.', 'The Wall has kept them out for thousands of years. Presumably --', 'Anything you bring back will be useless unless Cersei grants us an audience and is somehow convinced not to murder us the moment we set foot in the capital.', 'Fair point. How do you propose to find one?', 'And that would be double what now, exactly?', 'You take great offense at dwarf jokes, but love telling eunuch jokes. Why is that?', 'The Karstarks.', "You overestimate our influence. Jon and Daenerys don't want to listen to lonely old men.", "Of course she does. Respect is how the young keep us at a distance, so we don't remind them of an unpleasant truth.", 'Nothing lasts.', "At least we're already in a crypt.", 'And got your face cut in half.', 'Come in.', 'And?', 'Nothing?', "We'll try again at supper.", 'Who?', "Of course they are. That's their job.", 'What have I told you, Martha?', "Go on. They'll be missing you in the kitchen.", 'The Northern armies?', "She hasn't seen anyone since we returned. Hasn't left her chambers, hasn't accepted any food.", "You're worried for her. I admire your empathy.", "I'm worried for all of us. They say every time a Targaryen is born, the gods toss a coin and the world holds its breath.", "We both know what she's about to do.", 'Men decide where power resides, whether or not they know it.', "All I've ever wanted. The right ruler on the Iron Throne. I still don't know how her coin has landed. But I'm quite certain about yours.", "I have known more kings and queens than any man living. I've heard what they say to crowds, and seen what they do in the shadows. I have furthered their designs, however horrible. But what I tell you now is true", "I hope I deserve this. Truly, I do. I hope I'm wrong. Goodbye, old friend."]

Name: brienne
Sentence: ['Your Grace, I ask the honor of a place in your Kingsguard.', 'I will be one of your seven, pledge my life to yours, and keep you safe from all harm.', 'Your Grace. And you should kneel when you approach the King.', 'At once, Your Grace. Shall I return after?', "If you'll follow me, my lady.", "I fought for my king. Soon I'll fight for him on the battlefield. Die for him if I must. And, if it please you, Brienne's enough. I'm no lady.", 'No! No.', "I won't leave him.", 'Not that way.', 'It looked like Stannis.', 'In the shape of Stannis.', 'Will you stay there long, my lady?', 'I never knew my mother.', "It's a bloody business.", "Once you're safely back amongst your own people, will you give me leave to go, my lady?", 'I swore a vow.', 'I only held him that once as he was dying.', "I do not know your son, my lady. But I could serve you, if you would have me. You have courage. Not battle courage, perhaps, but, I don't know, a woman's kind of courage. And I think that when the time comes, you will not hold me back. Promise me that you will not hold me back from Stannis.", 'Then I am yours, my lady. I will shield your back and give my life for yours, if it comes to that. I swear it by the Old Gods and the new.', 'No farther.', "Don't enter without an invitation, man.", 'Threatening my lady is an act of treason.', 'Your son returns at dawn, my lady?', "The Kingslayer won't last the night. The more they drink, the angrier they'll get. And when the Karstarks draw their swords Who wants to die defending a Lannister?", 'Brienne of Tarth.', 'Your crimes are past forgiveness, Kingslayer.', "You've harmed others, those you were sworn to protect, the weak, the innocent.", 'You will not provoke me to anger.', "I've never seen you fight.", "All my life men like you have sneered at me. And all my life I've been knocking men like you into the dust.", 'Do you take me for an idiot? In!', "Maybe one day we'll find out, Kingslayer.", 'Walk.', 'One or two tried.', 'Not interested.', "I don't serve the Starks. I serve Lady Catelyn.", 'Burying them.', "I think these women would understand if I don't care what you think.", 'Traveling a prisoner.', "If you've quite finished up-", "All right, we'll be going.", 'The Starks.', 'No, stealing is a crime.', 'To Riverrun.', "Steal from the Tullys, it's their dungeons you rot in.", "I don't give the orders. He must be important to someone.", 'I hope you gave them quick deaths.', "If this is the Kingslayer, I think I'd know about it.", "He's not the Kingslayer. Sorry to disappoint you. If he was, I'd only be traveling his head.", 'Two quick deaths.', "I don't serve the Starks. I serve Lady Catelyn. I told you I'd take you to King's Landing, and that's what I'm going to do. Stay.", 'Yes.', 'By putting one foot in front of the other.', "I'm here to take you to King's Landing and bring back Lady Stark's daughters in exchange. Dull is fine.", "If Lady Stark is unhappy with any aspect of my service, I'm sure she'll let me know. She's an honest woman.", 'Not your concern, Kingslayer.', 'How would you know?', 'Move.', 'Gods, no.', 'Shut your mouth.', 'I knew him as well as anyone. As a member of his Kingsguard, he trusted me with everything. He would have been a wonderful king.', 'I did not fancy him.', "I'm not interested in foul rumors.", 'Shut your mouth!', 'South. You?', 'And you.', "He doesn't.", "We're not doing it. He's an innocent man.", 'Silence, Kingslayer.', 'Good luck.', 'Be quick about it.', 'Get up.', 'Get up now.', 'You were armed when we were taken.', "All my life I've been hearing, 'Jaime Lannister, what a brilliant swordsman.' You were slower than I expected. And more predictable.", "And I'm a woman. I was still beating you.", 'Maybe you were as good as people said once. Or maybe people just love to overpraise a famous name.', 'Would I?', 'You think I care about my teeth?', 'What does it matter?', "If you were a woman, you wouldn't resist? You'd let them do what they wanted?", "My lord, I am Brienne of Tarth. Lady Catelyn Stark commanded me to deliver Ser Jaime to King's Landing.", "He's going to fall. He's going to fall off his horse. Someone help him.", 'Stop!', 'Thank you, my lord.', 'What are you doing here?', "There's another tub.", 'Why should I care how you die?', "Don't you mock me.", 'You need trust to have a truce.', 'Of course.', "If this is true why didn't you tell anyone? Why didn't you tell Lord Stark?", 'Help! Help! The Kingslayer!', "Yes. Most kind of them. You're a Stark bannerman, Lord Bolton. I am acting on Lady Stark's orders to return Jaime Lannister to King's Landing.", 'I am charged with bringing Ser Jaime to-', 'I thought you were gone.', 'Have they told you what they plan to do with me?', 'With Locke?', "When Catelyn Stark released you, we both made a promise to her. Now it's your promise. You gave your word. Keep it and consider the debt paid.", 'Good-bye, Ser Jaime.', 'Ah!', 'I will not.', 'Hold my legs.', 'Pull him up!', 'My lady. My lady. Please pardon me for interrupting. My name is Brienne of Tarth.', 'My lady, I know this is a very busy time for you, but if I could just have a moment.', "A shadow with the face of Stannis Baratheon. I swear to you by all the gods it was Stannis. He plunged his sword through Renly's heart and disappeared. One day, my lady, I will avenge our king.", 'I meant no offense.', 'There she is.', 'And? You made a promise.', 'To keep them safe.', 'A complication does not release you from a vow.', "Look me in the eye and tell me that you think she'll be safe in King's Landing.", 'Your Grace. My king. My queen.', "I'm no lady, Your Grace.", 'Apologies, Your Grace. I never did master the curtsy.', 'I just wanted to congratulate you both and wish you good fortune. The country has been at war too long. I hope your reign is long and peaceful.', 'As you say, Your Grace.', 'In truth, he rescued me, Your Grace. More than once.', "Not such a fascinating story, I'm afraid.", "I don't serve your brother, Your Grace.", 'Your Grace.', "Ser Jaime Lannister. Knighted and named to the Kingsguard in his 16th year. At the sack of King's Landing, murdered his king Aerys II. Pardoned by Robert Baratheon. Thereafter known as the Kingslayer.", 'Valyrian steel.', "I can't accept this.", "I'll find her. For Lady Catelyn. And for you.", "I don't need a squire.", "He'll slow me down.", 'Oathkeeper.', "Didn't they teach you how to ride a horse?", "Perhaps you should have stayed with him. It's not going to be a pleasant journey for you. It could take weeks to get to the Wall, depending on the weather.", "Well, Lady Sansa's brother's at Castle Black. If I were her, that's where I'd go. Feel free to stop at any point.", "I've made it this far in the world without a squire. I don't see why I need one now.", "I'm not a knight. And I'm not a slaver, either. I don't own you.", 'I am releasing you from that oath. That means you could leave.', 'What do you think will happen if you leave?', 'Did you remove the skin?', 'Have you ever cooked a rabbit before?', 'Did you ever cook anything for Lord Tyrion?', 'What are you doing?', "I've been removing my own armor for quite some time, thank you very much.", 'What exactly did you do for Lord Tyrion?', "Oh. Whilst in Lord Tyrion's service, did you ever do anything remotely related to combat?", 'Who?', 'How did you kill a Kingsguard?', 'Bloody ridiculous. Help me with these straps.', "Bit of comfort never hurt anyone. We've been sleeping in ditches the last few weeks. I think we can treat ourselves to a featherbed for the night and a hot meal not cooked by you.", "Just don't start expecting silk underclothes. Not working for your former lord any longer.", "Don't get drunk.", 'No, this will do nicely, thank you. Kidney pie is wonderful.', 'No.', "We're looking for someone.", 'A girl, tall, red hair, very pretty. Her name is Sansa Stark, but she may be using a different name.', "I pledged my life to their mother Catelyn Stark. I swore to her I'd bring her daughters home.", 'What?', "You wouldn't be screwing your face up like that if it was nothing.", "You're not interesting enough to be offensive.", 'What about? Not kidney pie.', "No one's seen Arya Stark since her father was beheaded. She's presumed dead.", 'When was that?', 'So what happened to her?', 'The quick version.', 'Um, you were saying?', "Her mother's dead, grandfather's dead, Walder Frey is the new lord of Riverrun. The Brotherhood isn't going to Riverrun.", 'Why the Eyrie?', 'Sansa could be there, too.', 'You sure about this?', 'Podrick. Podrick! Where are the horses?', 'What sort of hobble?', 'If you did it like I taught you then the horses would be here.', "It's at least thirty miles to the Eyrie from here. You're carrying the saddle bags.", 'Morning!', 'I like your sword. Are we getting close to the bloody gate?', 'Did you hear that Podrick? Only about ten more miles to the Bloody Gate.', 'No.', 'I do.', 'Oathkeeper.”', 'Good name.', 'My father.', "Mine said the same. But I kept fighting the boys anyway. Kept losing. Finally my father said, “If you're going to do it, you might as well do it right.”", "Seven blessings. I'm Brienne of Tarth, this is Podrick Payne.", "You're Arya Stark.", 'I swore to your mother I would bring you home to her.', 'I know. I wish I couldo ve been there to protect her.', 'I know, but I swore a sacred vow to protect her.', "She commanded me to bring Jaime Lannister back to King's Landing.", "I'm not paid by the Lannisters.", 'Jaime Lannister gave me this sword.', 'I swore to your mother by the Old Gods and the New -', 'Arya!', 'She is.', "Come with me Arya. I'll take you to safety.", "And that's what you're doing? Watching over her?", 'I have no wish to kill you Ser.', 'Arya! Arya! ARYA! Where is she?', "Why weren't you watching her?", 'Which way Pod? Which way did she go?', "Us? The only reason you're here is that Jaime Lannister told me you weren't safe in the capital. You're hundreds of miles from King's Landing. No one knows what you look like. No one cares. You're safe.", 'Do you even know what a squire is?', "I'm not a knight. That means you're not a squire.", "I don't care, I'm not your mother.", "I found Arya. She didn't want my protection.", "Will you shut your mouth? I didn't ask for advice. I don't want anyone following me. I'm not a leader. All I ever wanted is to fight for a Lord I believed in. The good lords are dead and the rest are monsters.", 'What is it?', 'You sure?', 'Littlefinger?', "Bunch? What's a bunch? 100? 6? 20?", 'Ready the horses.', 'Find more.', 'Lord Baelish, Lady Sansa, my name is Brienne of Tarth.', "Lady Sansa, before your mother's death, I was her sworn sword. I gave my word I would find you and protect you. I will shield your back and keep your council, and give my life for yours if need be. I swear it by the old gods and the new.", 'I was.', "It was after Renly's murder.", 'I tried to save him.', "By men who didn't see what happened.", 'He was murdered by a shadow. A shadow with a face of Stannis Baratheon.', 'Why should you have any say in her affairs?', 'Lady Sansa, if we can have a word alone--', 'Please, my lady. If I could explain--', "Neither of us wanted to be there. Sometimes we don't have a choice.", 'Podrick!', 'Down, Podrick, down!', 'Podrick?', 'You can stand now.', "Wary of strangers, as she should me. I saw her riding on the East Trail with Littlefinger. We'll follow them.", "I swore to their mother I'd protect those girls.", "Do you think she's safe from Littlefinger?", 'Get your horse.', "We don't. We go around. .", "Doesn't matter. I know where they're going.", "Aren't you getting a bit old to be a squire? How did you end up squiring for the Imp?", "Well, he's not here to complain about it, is he?", 'He borrowed it?', 'As punishment. For both of you.', 'Yes, all of your lords were very kind to you. All except me. Sorry you have to squire such a nasty person.', "I'm sorry I'm always snapping at you.", 'You want to be a knight, Pod?', "Starting tomorrow, we'll train with the sword twice a day, before we ride in the morning and after we camp for the evening. . And I'm going to show you how to ride properly.", "I can't knight you, but I can teach you how to fight.", 'I was.', 'He was.', "When I was a girl, my father held a ball. I'm his only living child, so he wants to make a good match for me. He invited dozens of young lords to Tarth. I didn't want to go, but he dragged me to the ballroom. . And it was wonderful. None of the boys noticed how mulish and tall I was. The shoved each other, and threatened to duel if they thought it was their turn to dance. And whispered in my ear how they wanted to marry me and take me back to their castles. . My father smiled at me and I smiled at him. I'd never been so happy. . Till I saw a few of the boys sniggering. And then they all started to laugh, they couldn't keep the game going any longer. They were toying with me. ‘Brienne the Beauty', they called me. Great joke. And I realized I was the ugliest girl alive. A great lumbering beast. I tried to run away, but Renly Baratheon took me in his arms. “Don't let them see your tears,” he told me. “They're nasty little shits. The nasty little shits aren't worth crying over.” He danced with me and none of the other boys could say a word. And he was the king's brother after all.", "Yes, Pod, he liked men, I'm not an idiot. He didn't love me, he didn't want me, he danced with me because he was kind and he wouldn't see me hurt. He saved me from being a joke. From that day until his last day. And I couldn't save him in return. Nothing's more hateful than failing to protect the one you love. One day, I will avenge King Renly.", 'A shadow with the face of Stannis Baratheon. I know it was Stannis. I know it in my heart. Stannis is a man, not a shadow. And a man can be killed.', "Better off with the Boltons who murdered her mother and brother? Sansa's in danger even if she doesn't realize it.", "Thank you. You've lived here a long time?", 'Did you know Lord Eddard?', "Not all of them. I know who's inside that castle.", "I'm not talking about the Boltons. I need to get a message to her. To Sansa Stark.", 'Someone who swore to keep her safe.', 'Her mother.', "That doesn't release me from an oath. I served Lady Catelyn. I serve her still. Who do you serve?", "How do you know it's Stannis?", "I do not fight for the Boltons. I'm Brienne of Tarth. I was Kingsguard to Renly Baratheon. I was there when he was murdered by a shadow with your face. You murdered him? With blood magic?", 'In the name of Renly of House Baratheon, First of his Name, Rightful King of the Andals and the First Men, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms, and Protector of the Realm, I, Brienne of Tarth, sentence you to die. Do you have any last words?', 'Lady Sansa, I offer my services once again I will shield your back and keep your council and give my life for yours if need be I swear it by the old gods and the new', "I saw her with a man I don't think he hurt her She didn't want to leave him, he didn't want to leave her", 'I spent three days looking for her She disappeared', "She looked good She wasn't exactly dressed like a lady", 'What happened at Winterfell', 'It was a difficult choice, my lady', "We've all had to make difficult choices", "I saw what happened I saw Stannis' forces defeated in the field", "We've met before I was Kingsguard to Renly Baratheon Before Renly was assassinated with bloodmagic", "Yes, it's in the past It doesn't mean I forget Or forgive He admitted it, you know", 'Stannis Just before I executed him', 'Lady Sansa asked you a question.', "I've sworn to protect you, my lady.", 'We can send the Blackfish a raven.', "I don't like leaving you here alone.", "Not him. He seems trustworthy. A bit brooding, perhaps. I suppose that's understandable, considering. The others, though. Davos and the Red Woman helped a man murder his own brother with blood magic. And when Stannis paid for his crime, where were they? Already out looking for a leader with better prospects. And that wildling fellow with the beard --", 'Then why did you lie to him when he asked you how you learned about Riverrun?', 'You have a keen military mind, Pod.', "My name is Brienne of Tarth. Please inform Ser Jaime Lannister I've come to speak with him. Tell him I have his sword.", 'Why would you assume that?', "I don't think you know many girls like her.", "I've come for the Blackfish.", 'Lady Sansa desires to take her ancestral seat back from the Boltons and assume her rightful position as Lady of Winterfell.', 'The Tully army.', "The Tullys are rebels because they're fighting for their home?", 'As a reward for betraying Robb Stark and slaughtering his family.', "You're a knight, Ser Jaime. I know there is honor in you. I've seen it myself.", 'I do no such thing. Take Riverrun without bloodshed. Ride south with your mission complete and your army intact.', 'Allow me to enter Riverrun under a flag of truce. Let me try to persuade the Blackfish to give up the castle.', "Because you'll allow him to lead the Tully forces safely north.", 'No.', "I need your word. If I persuade him to abandon the castle, you'll grant us safe passage north.", "You gave it to me for a purpose. I've achieved that purpose.", 'one last thing, Ser Jaime.', "Should I fail to persuade the Blackfish to surrender, and if you attack the castle, honor compels me to fight for Sansa's kin.", 'To fight you.', 'I have a signed letter from your niece Sansa Stark.', 'As I have said, my name is- -', 'He always spoke highly of you.', 'Riverrun cannot stand against the Lannisters and the Freys.', "He's not my friend.", 'Ser Jaime kept his word to your niece Catelyn Stark. He sent me to find Sansa, to help her as Catelyn wanted. He gave me this sword to protect her. That is what I have done and I will continue to do until the day I die.', 'You have more than she does.', 'Find the maester. We need to get a raven north to Sansa.', 'Tell her I failed.', 'Come with us.', "Your family is in the North. Come with us. Don't die for pride when you can fight for your blood.", 'Nope.', 'Why is he still here?', 'He wants something.', 'I did next to nothing.', "I'm not a --", 'pauses for a moment.', 'Thank you, Podrick.', 'and PODRICK are sparring. BRIENNE kicks PODS foot out from under him and he lands face first in the dirt.', "Don't lunge.", "Don't go where your enemy leads you.", 'Up.', 'begins striking at PODRICK while he blocks her blows. BRIENNE hits PODRICK in the stomach with the hilt of her sword and PODRICK lands on the ground.', "And don't --", 'Nice sword. Very nice dagger.', 'I can go and find the Master of Arms for you, My Lady.', 'chuckles.', 'nods her head in agreement.', 'Move aside, Podrick.', "You can't use that, My Lady. It's too small.", 'smirks and raises her sword to a fighting posture.', "I'll try not to.", "strikes at ARYA who quickly sidesteps and parries the attack. BRIENNE attacks again and ARYA sidesteps, dodges multiple strikes and parries BRIENNE while smiling. ARYA strikes at BRIENNE and hits her hand causing BRIENNE to flinch and lose her two-handed grip on her sword. BRIENNE regains composure and starts to circle ARYA. BAELISH and SANSA are still watching from the upper balcony. ARYA is waiting for an attack with her sword behind her back. BRIENNE strikes and ARYA blocks her attacks, spins and stabs behind her back and hits BRIENNE in the knee causing BRIENNE's sword to strike the dirt. BRIENNE kicks ARYA in the stomach and sends ARYA to the ground. ARYA quickly gets back to her feet. BRIENNE overpowers ARYA and ARYA drops her sword on the ground. BRIENNE strikes again but ARYA dodges, draws her Valyrian dagger and puts it near BRIENNE's neck. BRIENNE and ARYA both stop fighting and sheathe their weapons smiling.", 'Who taught you to do that?', 'I thought you were dead.', 'I was only trying to protect her.', "She's alive. Arya.", 'Winterfell.', 'The only one that needs protecting is the one that gets in her way.', 'Ser Jaime.', 'We both saw what just happened. We both saw that thing.', 'Oh, fuck loyalty!', 'This goes beyond houses and honor and oaths. Talk to the queen.', "You don't know me well, Your Grace.", 'But I know Ser Jaime. He is a man of honor. I was his captor once. But when we were both taken prisoner and the men holding us tried to force themselves on me, Ser Jaime defended me. And lost his hand because of it.', "Without him, my lady, you would not be alive. He armed me, armored me, and sent me to find you and bring you home because he'd sworn an oath to your mother.", 'I do.', 'I would.', 'Ser Jaime.', "He's alright. Still has a lot to learn.", "I am. It's, uh-it's good ground.", 'The rise, it should give us some advantage.', 'If we can keep a tight formation, we might be able to beat them back.', 'What are you doing?', 'I think you know.', 'We have never had a conversation last this long without you insulting me. Not once.', 'No!', 'I better get back.', "Oh, we didn't mean to interrupt. We were just looking for somewhere warm to-", "I don't think that's wise.", 'The battle might start at any moment.', 'Half cup.', 'No, thank you. I should try and get some sleep.', 'All right. Just a bit.', "Yes, well, I'm glad you're here.", 'Here fighting with us. Glad you survived Eastwatch.', "At least we'll die with honor.", "Women can't be knights.", 'Tradition.', "I don't even want to be a knight.", 'Stand your ground!', 'Fall back!', 'Hey! Hey! Hey!', 'Go! Hey! Go! Go!', 'Come on!', 'Aye.', 'Ser Podrick.', 'Long may he reign.', 'I think we can all agree that ships take precedence over brothels.']

Name: eddard stark
Sentence: ['And which one of you was a marksman at ten? Keep practicing, Bran. Go on.', 'Get the lads to saddle their horses.', 'He swore an oath, Cat.', "Tell Bran he's coming, too.", "He won't be a boy forever. And winter is coming.", 'nods yes, and WILL is positioned on the tree limb that serves as a block.', 'In the name of Robert of the House Baratheon, first of his name …', 'King of the Andals and the First Men …', 'Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and protector of the realm, I, Eddard of the House Stark, Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North, sentence you to die.', 'You understand why I did it?', 'But do you understand why I had to kill him?', 'The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword.', 'The White Walkers have been gone for thousands of years.', 'A madman sees what he sees.', 'There are no mountain lions in these woods.', "It's a direwolf.", 'Tough old beast.', "Better a quick death. They won't last without their mother.", "I'm sorry, Bran.", 'You will train them yourselves. You will feed them yourselves. And if they die, you will bury them yourselves.', "You have five northern children. You're not an outsider.", "It's your gods with all the rules.", 'Tell me.', 'Your sister. The boy …', "He's coming this far North, there's only one thing he's after.", "Hey,, hey, hey, hey. What are you doing with that on? [Pulls off ARYA's helm]", 'Your Grace.', 'Guarding the North for you, Your Grace. Winterfell is yours.', 'My queen.', 'Tell me about Jon Arryn.', 'We both did.', 'Aye.', "I'm not worthy of the honor.", 'She was my sister. This is where she belongs.', "It's done, Your Grace. The Targaryens are gone.", 'The boy I beheaded. Did you know him?', 'He was talking madness. Said the Walkers slaughtered his friends.', 'A wildling ambush.', 'Winter is coming.', 'Your pardon.', 'Yes, the king has honored me with his offer.', "I don't fight in tournaments.", "I don't fight in tournaments because when I fight a man for real, I don't want him to know what I can do.", "I'm a Northman. I belong here with you, not down south in that rat's nest they call a capital.", "The king takes what he wants. That's why he's king.", 'How did he get so fat?', 'Send him in.', 'Stay.', 'What news?', "She's fresh widowed, Cat. She doesn't know what she's saying.", "No, but I'm still better than you.", "I hope I'll serve you well.", 'I have no choice.', 'You can. You must.', "There's great honor serving in the Night's Watch. The Starks have manned the Wall for thousands of years. And you are a Stark. You might not have my name, but you have my blood.", "The next time we see each other, we'll talk about your mother. I promise.", "I've half a mind to go with you.", 'You should have asked me 20 years ago.', 'I recall a few chances.', 'Bessie. She was one of yours.', 'Wylla.', 'Nor will I.', "The worst thing about your coronation... I'll never get to hit you again.", 'Daenerys Targaryen has wed some Dothraki horselord. What of it? Should we send her a wedding gift?', "She's little more than a child.", "Tell me we're not speaking of this.", "But you can't get your hands on this one, can you?", 'Even a million Dothraki are no threat to the realm, as long as they remain on the other side of the Narrow Sea. They have no ships, Robert.', "He will not cross. And if by chance he does, we'll throw him back into the sea.", 'Where is she?', 'Who took her?', 'Right, get back.', 'Back! Back to the inn. All back!', 'Are you hurt?', "It's all right. What is the meaning of this? Why was my daughter not brought to me at once?", 'In bed asleep.', "Stop it! That's enough of that.", 'Stop! Arya!', 'Gladly, your Grace.', "You can't mean it.", 's this your command... your Grace?', "No. Jory... Take the girls to their rooms. If it must be done, then I'll do it myself.", 'The wolf is of the north. She deserves better than a butcher.', "The butcher's boy... You rode him down?", "Get the girls settled in. I'll be back in time for supper. And, Jory, you go with them.", "Glad to see you're protecting the throne.", 'Very handsome armor. Not a scratch on it.', "You've chosen your opponents wisely then.", 'But you just stood there and watched.', "Is that what you tell yourself at night? You're a servant of justice? That you were avenging my father when you shoved your sword in Aerys Targaryen's back?", 'You served him well, when serving was safe.', 'Lord Varys.', "A shame you didn't say a prayer for the butcher's son. Renly! You're looking well.", 'She has, Lord Baelish. I understand you knew my brother Brandon as well.', 'Perhaps you chose the wrong man to duel with.', 'Grand Maester.', 'And you served another King.', 'Without the King?', '40,000 gold dragons to the champion, 20,000 to the runner-up, 20,000 to the winning archer.', 'Are you telling me the Crown is three million in debt?', 'How could you let this happen?', 'I will not believe Jon Arryn allowed Robert to bankrupt the realm.', "I'll speak to him tomorrow. This tournament is an extravagance we cannot afford.", 'There will be no plans until I speak to Robert. Forgive me, my Lords. I had a long ride.', "What's happening here?", "Go to your room. We'll speak later. That's for you, love…", "The same dollmaker makes all of Princess Myrcella's toys. Don't you like it?", "It's all right. Go on.", 'War was easier than daughters.', 'Arya, open the door. May I come in? Whose sword is that?', "Give it to me. I know this maker's mark. This is Mikken's work. Where did you get this? This is no toy. Little ladies shouldn't play with swords.", 'Come here. Now what do you want with this?', 'A blade with a name. And who were you hoping to skewer with Needle? Your sister? Do you know the first thing about sword fighting?', "laughs] That's the essence of it.", "No, sweet girl. You didn't kill the butcher's boy.", 'Sansa was dragged before the King and Queen... And asked to call the Prince a liar.', "Darling, listen to me. Sansa will be married to Joffrey someday. She cannot betray him. She must take his side even when he's wrong.", "Well… Look at me. You're a Stark of Winterfell. You know our words.", "You were born in the long summer. You've never known anything else. But now winter is truly coming. And in the winter, we must protect ourselves, look after one another. Sansa is your sister.", "I don't want to frighten you, but I won't lie to you either. We've come to a dangerous place. We cannot fight a war amongst ourselves. All right? Go on. It's yours.", "Try not to stab your sister with it. If you're going to own a sword, you'd better know how to use it.", 'My wife is in Winterfell.', "You're a funny man. A very funny man.", "It's too dangerous.", 'Until we know who our enemies are...', "Littlefinger's right. I can't do anything without proof.", "Then I bring it to Robert... And hope he's still the man I once knew. You watch yourself on the road, huh? That temper of yours is a dangerous thing.", 'He still loves you.', 'Off with you.', "The King's tournament. I assure you the Hand wants no part of it.", "You'll get 50. Lord Baelish will see it paid for.", "You found money for a champion's purse, you can find money to keep the peace. I'll also give you 20 of my household guards till the crowds have left.", 'The sooner this is over, the better.', "I'm sure the tourney puts coins in many a pocket. Now... If there's nothing else, my Lords?", "I've been hoping to talk to you about Jon Arryn.", 'Why?', 'What did Jon want the night before he died?', 'A book? What book?', "I'd like to read it.", "Harkon Umber, first of his name, born to lord Hother Umber and lady Amaryllis Umber in the 183rd year after Aegon's landing, at the last hearth. Blue of eye, brown of hair and fair complected, died in his 14th year of a wound sustained", 'Did Jon Arryn tell you what he wanted with it?', "Jon's death...", 'Did he say anything to you during his final hours?', 'The seed is strong"? What does that mean?', "And you're quite certain he died of a natural illness?", 'Poison.', "I've heard it said that poison is a woman's weapon.", 'Everybody knows that.', "I've taken enough of your time.", "Thank you. I'll find my own way out.", "It's a hard fall down these steps.", 'Cats? Syrio says…', "He's right about that.", 'He needs to get his strength back first.', "No. But someday he could be Lord of a holdfast or sit on the King's Council. Or he might raise castles like Brandon the Builder.", 'You will marry a high Lord and rule his castle. And your sons shall be knights and princes and lords.', 'Pycelle talks too much.', 'Knighted for what? Why are you telling me this?', "Where is Ser Hugh? I'll speak to him.", 'Varys or the Queen?', 'Yes.', 'Lord Baelish, perhaps I was wrong to distrust you.', "A knight. They strut around like roosters down here. Even the ones who've never seen an arrow coming their way.", 'Let them look.', 'What did Lord Arryn want?', "I'd like to see him as well.", 'This is fine work.', "There's nothing to forgive. When Lord Arryn came to visit you, what would you talk about?", 'What kind of questions?', 'Your mother?', 'What did you tell him?', "Look at me. Get back to work, lad. If the day ever comes when that boy'd rather wield a sword than forge one, you send him to me.", "King Robert's bastard son.", 'Your Grace.', "Putting my name on it doesn't make it mine.", 'She likes it here.', 'What are you doing here?', "The King called on me to serve him and the realm, and that's what I'll do until he tells me otherwise.", "If that's my job, then so be it.", 'I was also trained to kill my enemies, Your Grace.', 'Does Ser Hugh have any family in the capital?', "He'd never worn this armor before.", 'Who determines the draw?', "Aye... But who holds the straws? You've done good work, Sisters.", "I'm glad we never met on the field, Ser Barristan... as is my wife. I don't think the widow's life would suit her.", "My father once told me you were the best he'd ever seen. I never knew the man to be wrong about matters of combat.", 'And that lad... He was a squire until a few months ago. How could he afford a new suit of armor?', 'Yes. That will never happen.', "If the King got what he wanted all the time, we'd still be fighting a damned rebellion.", "You're too fat for your armor.", "You're torturing the poor boy.", 'The breastplate stretcher?', 'Maybe you should have one invented.', 'You have no business jousting. Leave that for the young men.', "And who's going to hit you back?", "There's not a man in the Seven Kingdoms would risk hurting you.", 'Aye.', "I'm not thirsty.", 'Your squire... A Lannister boy?', 'Robert?', "Where's Arya", 'Hey.', 'Ser Loras rides well.', "He'll never walk again.", 'So they say.', "I've been in the capital a month. Why have you waited so long to tell me this?", 'So why do you trust me now?', 'What sort of doom does the King face?', 'Who gave it to him?', 'The squire, Ser Hugh?', 'If Ser Hugh poisoned him, who paid Ser Hugh?', 'Jon was a man of peace. He was Hand for 17 years -- 17 good years. Why kill him?', 'You know I had half my guard out searching for you? You promised me this would stop.', 'Who did?', 'Oh, Arya.', 'Where did you hear this?', 'What were you doing in the dungeons?', 'Your name, friend?', 'Did Benjen send you?', "Ah, we'll find recruits for you.", 'Know what?', "Go on. We'll talk more later.", 'Jory, take her safely to her room.', 'Well?', 'I need to see the King first -- alone.', 'Is it about my wife?', "You're speaking of murdering a child.", 'You will dishonor yourself forever if you do this.', "Then we're no better than the Mad King.", 'You want to assassinate a girl... Because the Spider heard a rumor?', 'Based on whose information?', 'Mormont? You bring us the whispers of a traitor half a world away and call it fact?', 'He broke the law, betrayed his family, fled our land. We commit murder on the word of this man?', "The Narrow Sea still lies between us. I'll fear the Dothraki the day they teach their horses to run on water.", "I followed you into war - twice, without doubts, without second thoughts. But I will not follow you now. The Robert I grew up with didn't tremble at the shadow of an unborn child.", 'I will have no part in it.', 'And good luck to him. I thought you were a better man.', "I'll go ahead with my daughters. Get them ready. Do it yourself. Don't ask anyone for help.", 'What can I do for you?', 'Why? What do you care?', "I don't have the time.", "Round up all the men we have and station them outside the girls' chambers. Who are your best two swords?", 'Find them and meet me at the stables.', 'I will.', 'When Jon Arryn came to visit you, what did he want?', 'She looks healthy enough to me. The girl shall want for nothing.', "What do you know of King Robert's bastards?", 'How many?', 'And Jon Arryn tracked them all down. Why?', 'Come.', 'Jory!', 'I remember him well.', 'He was taken at my command to answer for his crimes.', "You kill me, your brother's a dead man.", 'Your pardon, your Grace.', 'She did nothing I did not command.', "I am the King's Hand -", 'trying to keep the peace -', 'He butchered my men.', 'Jaime has fled the city. Give me leave to bring him back to justice.', "If we don't act… there will be a war.", 'And what about Jaime Lannister? What about Jaime?', 'As you command your Grace. With your leave, I will return to Winterfell and set matters straight.', 'The hunt?', 'The Targaryen girl -', 'These men, were they flying a sigil? … A banner.', "You're describing Ser Gregor Clegane.", 'I cannot give you back your homes or restore your dead to life. But perhaps I can give you justice in the name of our king, Robert. Lord Beric Dondarrion.', "You shall have the command. Assemble 100 men and ride to Ser Gregor's keep.", "In the name of Robert of the House Baratheon, the First of his Name, King of the Andals and the First Men, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm, I charge you to bring the king's justice to the false knight Gregor Clegane and all those who shared in his crimes. I denounce him and attaint him. I strip him of all ranks and titles of all lands and holdings, and sentence him to death.", 'Grand Maester Pycelle.', 'Send a raven to Casterly Rock. Inform Tywin Lannister that he has been summoned to court to answer for the crimes of his bannermen. He will arrive within the fortnight, or be branded an enemy of the crown and a traitor to the realm.', 'Then how come Robert is king and not Tywin Lannister?', "I'm sending you both back to Winterfell.", 'Listen -', 'What? No.', "This isn't a punishment. I want you back in Winterfell for your own safety.", "When you're old enough, I'll make you a match with someone who's worthy of you, someone who's brave and gentle and strong -", 'Go on, girls. Get your septa and start packing your things.', 'Lord Orys Baratheon, black of hair.” “Axel Baratheon, black of hair.” “Lyonel Baratheon, black of hair.” “Steffon Baratheon, black of hair.” “Robert Baratheon, black of hair.” “Joffrey Baratheon… golden-haired.”', "I've had worse, my lady.", "The South doesn't seem to agree with you.", 'I know the truth Jon Arryn died for.', 'Has he done this before?', 'Your brother Or your lover?', 'My son saw you with him.', 'With all my heart.', "And they are all Jaime's.", "You've always hated him.", "When the King returns from his hunt, I'll tell him the truth.", "I've made many mistakes in my life, but that wasn't one of them.", 'You damned fool.', 'I will.', "I'll, I'll do everything I can to honor your memory.", 'Give him milk of the poppy.', 'No man could have protected him from himself.', 'His squire? The Lannister boy?', 'His Grace has had a change of heart concerning Daenerys Targaryen.', 'And what should I do with a hundred swords?', 'What about Stannis?', 'Stannis is your older brother.', "Stannis is a commander. He's led men into war twice.", "I will not dishonor Robert's last hours by shedding blood in his halls and dragging frightened children from their beds.", 'You will sail to dragonstone tonight.', 'Now leave us.', 'The King has no true born sons.', 'The throne passes to his brother Lord Stannis.', 'There is no "unless".', 'Do you have a shred of honor?', 'We?', 'What you suggest is treason.', 'Make peace with the Lannisters, you say. With the people who tried to murder my boy..', "No. I won't do it.", 'There is no other choice. He is the heir.', 'You promised Catelyn you would help me.', 'Ser Barristan is a good man, a loyal man. Do him no harm.', 'Commander! Take the Queen and her children into custody.', 'I want no bloodshed.', 'Varys.', 'What about my daughters?', 'And Sansa?', 'You watched my men being slaughtered and did nothing.', 'The madness of mercy. That she might save her children.', "The Queen can't kill me. Cat holds her brother.", "If that's true, then slit my throat and be done with it.", 'Tell me something, Varys.', "Another visit? lt seems you're my last friend.", 'On her knees begging for me. Hm! Did you laugh with the others?', "l don't know what you want. l've given up trying to guess.", 'Huh. Can you free me from this pit?', 'What do you want? Tell me. No riddles, no stories. Tell me, what do you want?', "Robb? He's just a boy.", "Stannis Baratheon is Robert's true heir. The throne is his by rights.", 'You want me to serve the woman who murdered my king, who butchered my men, who crippled my son?', 'You think my life is some precious thing to me? That l would trade my honor for a few more years of... of what? You grew up with actors. You learned their craft and you learnt it well. But l grew up with soldiers. l learned how to die a long time ago.', 'And which one of you was a marksman at ten?', 'I looked for you on the Trident', "The Mad King is dead Rhaegar lies beneath the ground Why weren't you there to protect your prince?", "Where's my sister?", 'No Now it ends', 'Lyanna.', "No, I'm not a dream. I'm here. Right here.", "I've missed you, too.", 'Shh. You are.', "You're not going to die.", 'Get her some water!', 'Is there a maester?']

Name: robb stark
Sentence: ['Relax your bow arm.', 'Lad, go run back and get the rest.', 'There are no direwolves south of the Wall.', 'Put away your blade.', 'What is it?', 'I hear the prince is a right royal prick.', "Go on, Tommy, shave him good. He's never met a girl he likes better than his own hair.", 'Uncle Benjen.', "I'm good.", 'Time for bed.', "You've said goodbye to Bran? He's not going to die. I know it.", 'My mother?', "Good. Next time I see you, you'll be all in black.", 'Farewell, Snow.', "I'll make the appointments. We'll talk about it first thing in the morning.", 'When was the last time you left this room?', "He's not going to die, mother. Maester Luwin says the most dangerous time has passed.", "Rickon needs you. He's six. He doesn't know what's happening. He follows me around all day, clutching my leg, crying...", "Fire. You stay here. I'll come back.", "They come into our home and try to murder my brother? If it's war they want...", "I'll ride to King's Landing.", "Mother, you can't.", 'What about Bran?', 'What are you telling him now?', 'Get your supper. I want some time with him. One time she told me the sky is blue because we live inside the eye of a blue-eyed giant named Macumber.', "How do you feel? You still don't remember anything? I've seen you climb a thousand times. In the wind, in the rain... A thousand times. You never fall.", "Don't ever say that.", "Any man of the Night's Watch is welcome at Winterfell.", "I'm not your boy, Lannister. I'm Lord of Winterfell while my father is away.", 'Why are you here?', 'Is this some kind of trick? Why do you want to help him?', "You've done my brother a kindness. The hospitality of Winterfell is yours.", 'Not too fast.', 'Not now.', "You're talking about war.", 'Only the Lord of Winterfell can call in the bannermen and raise an army.', 'You want me to march on Casterly Rock?!', "And it's not your duty, because it's not your House.", "Where's Bran?", "Drop the knife. Let him go and I'll let you live.", 'Are you all right?', "Have you lost your mind? What if you'd missed?", "You don't have the right -", 'What about her?', "We'll keep her alive.", 'Treason? Sansa wrote this?', 'Joffrey puts my father in chains, now he wants his ass kissed?', "I won't refuse. His Grace summons me to King's Landing, I'll go to King's Landing.", 'To do either we need to cross the river and the only crossing is at The Twins.', 'Where did you find him?', 'How high did you get?', 'My father understands mercy, when there is room for it.', 'Tell Lord Tywin, Winter is coming for him.', 'You call me boy again.', 'Go on.', "lt's a birthday message to his grand-niece Walda.", "He's Grandfather's bannerman. We can't expect his support?", 'Father rots in a dungeon. How long before they take his head? We need to cross the Trident and we need to do it now.', 'Have my horse saddled and ready.', "My father would do whatever it took to secure our crossing. Whatever it took. lf l'm going to lead this army, l can't have other men doing my bargaining for me.", 'Well? What did he say?', 'Huh.', 'What does he want in return?', 'Fine, fine. And?', "She won't be happy about that. And?", 'l see. Did you get a look at his daughters?', 'And?', 'Can l refuse?', 'Then l consent.', 'By the time they knew what was happening, it had already happened.', "He's more use to us alive than dead.", "lf we do it your way, Kingslayer, you'd win. We're not doing it your way.", 'l sent 2,000 men to their graves today.', "Aye. But the dead won't hear them. One victory does not make us conquerors. Did we free my father? Did we rescue my sisters from the queen? Did we free the North from those who want us on our knees? This war is far from over.", "l'll kill them all. Every one of them. l will kill them all.", 'Renly is not the king.', "That doesn't make Renly king. He's Robert's youngest brother. lf Bran can't be Lord of Winterfell before me, Renly can't be king before Stannis.", 'Now and always.', 'If I left you with one of my bannermen, your father would know within a fortnight, and my bannerman would receive a raven with a message, "Release my son and you\'ll be rich beyond your dreams. Refuse and your house will be destroyed, root and stem.”', 'Oh, I trust them with my life. Just not with yours.', "You insult yourself, Kingslayer. You've been defeated by a boy.", "You're held captive by a boy. Perhaps you'll be killed by a boy. . Stannis Baratheon sent ravens to all the high lords of Westeros. King Joffrey Baratheon is neither a true king nor a true Baratheon. . He's your bastard son.", "My father learned the truth. That's why you had him executed.", "Your son killed him so the world wouldn't learn who fathered him. And you... you pushed my brother from a window because he saw you with the queen.", "I'm sending one of your cousins down to King's Landing with my peace terms.", "No, but he's starting to know me.", "It's better than three defeats.", "You're Ser Alton Lannister?", "I offer your cousins peace if they meet my terms. First, your family must release my sisters. Second, my father's bones must be returned to us so he may rest beside his brother and sister in the crypts beneath Winterfell. And the remains of all those who died in his service must also be returned. Their families can honor them with proper funerals.", 'Third... Joffrey and the Queen Regent must renounce all claim to dominion of the North. From this time, till the end of time, we are a free and independent kingdom.', "Neither Joffrey nor any of his men shall set foot in our lands again. If he disregards this command, he shall suffer the same fate as my father, only I don't need a servant to do my beheading for me.", "These are my terms. If the Queen Regent and her son meet them, I'll give them peace. If not, I will litter the south with Lannister dead.", "Oh, is he? You'll ride at daybreak, Ser Alton. That will be all for tonight.", "You don't have to call me ‘Your Grace' when no one's around.", "I'm glad someone's gotten used to it.", 'Of course they are.', 'Men who fought my father.', 'I need his ships. They say he has 200.', "I understand you don't trust Lord Greyjoy.", "Yes. And now I'm the one rebelling against the throne. Before me, it was father. You married one rebel and mothered another.", 'If I trade the Kingslayer for two girls, my bannermen will string me up by my feet.', "It's more complicated than that! You know it is.", "You can't go to Winterfell.", "I'll send Rodrik to watch over the boys, ‘cause tomorrow, you'll ride south to the Stormlands.", "Because I need you to negotiate with Renly Baratheon. He's rallied an army of 100,000. You know him. You know his family.", "Which of these lords do I trust more than you? If Renly sides with us, we'll outnumber them two to one. When they feel the jaws beginning to shut, they'll sue for peace. We'll get the girls back. Then we'll all go home for good.", 'We will all be together again soon, I promise.', 'Give Lord Renly my regards.', "I'm sending one of your cousins down to King's Landing with my peace terms.", 'Men who fought my father.', 'I need his ships.', "We're not executing prisoners, Lord Bolton.", 'I doubt it.', 'My father outlawed flaying in the North.', "We're not torturing them.", "The Lannisters hold prisoners of their own. I won't give them an excuse to abuse my sisters.", "You'll die if she doesn't.", "Put this in your mouth and lie down. You don't want to watch.", "Bite on it. It's better than biting your own tongue, believe me.", "What's your name?", 'Your last name?', 'You know my family name. You have me at a disadvantage.', 'They killed my father.', 'The family he fights for.', 'I have no hatred for the lad.', "You'd have us surrender, end all this bloodshed. I understand. The country would be at peace and life would be just under the righteous hand of good King Joffrey.", 'If the gods give me strength.', "I don't know. We'll go back to Winterfell. I have no desire to sit on the Iron Throne.", "I don't know.", 'First we have to win the war.', "You never told me where you're from.", "Volantis? You're far from home. The boy was lucky you were here.", 'Quent.', 'Lady Talisa.', "It's hard to keep all the rules straight. But if I remember my lessons, a woman of noble birth is always called a lady. Unless she's a queen or a princess. I could find someone who knows.", "Because it's obvious.", "I'd call you a liar.", "Better at amputations, I'm afraid.", 'Quite a pretty spot.', "I couldn't really discuss troop movements with you.", 'Of course, a spy would deny being a spy.', "Perhaps you'd join me... If you've got time, of course, for, well-", "Mother. Mother, this is Lady Talisa. She's been helping with the wounded. She's been very... helpful.", "I've missed you.", "You surprised me, that's all. I didn't think I'd see you today.", 'I know.', "I haven't forgotten.", 'This cannot be true.', 'Why? Why would Theon-', 'My brothers?', 'I must go north at once.', "How can I call myself king if I can't hold my own castle? How can I ask men to follow me if I can't-", 'There will be no talk. He will die for this.', "Tell your son Bran and Rickon's safety is paramount. And Theon, I want him brought to me alive. I want to look him in the eye and ask him why. And then I'll take his head myself.", 'And what did she say?', 'And what then?', "If every man were held accountable for the actions of every distant relative, Ser Alton, we'd all hang.", "You've acted with honor. I thank you for it. Lord Karstark, see that Ser Alton's pen is clean, and give him a hot supper.", 'Is there room for Ser Alton?', 'Have the men build him a new pen. Put him in with the Kingslayer for now. Have your boy watch over them.', 'That will be all.', 'And my enemies, as some of my bannermen are fond of mentioning.', "That's what I tell my bannermen.", 'But some are not.', 'If you need help finding these-', 'Continue, my lady.', 'Yes.', 'I expect he will.', 'Come with me to the Crag.', 'Let the maester show you his stores. I want the wounded men to be treated well, all the wounded men.', 'You know very well.', "I've never met her.", "Frey, I suppose. I don't know her first name.", 'An important bridge.', 'It was before they killed my father. I still thought I could march south and rescue him in time, but only if I crossed that bridge.', 'He was the best man I ever met. I know children always think that about their fathers, but', 'He once told me that being a lord is like being a father, except you have thousands of children and you worry about all of them. The farmers plowing the fields are yours to protect. The charwomen scrubbing the floors, yours to protect. The soldiers you order into battle. He told me he woke with fear in the morning and went to bed with fear in the night. I didn\'t believe him. I asked him, "How can a man be brave if he\'s afraid?" "That is the only time a man can be brave," he told me.', 'He would have liked you.', "He didn't care much about gold or glory.", "Because we'll never be safe until the Lannisters are defeated. And because I believe in justice.", 'That would be a start.', 'How? How?', "Tell me this isn't true.", 'Why?', 'You betrayed me.', 'No! You knew I would not allow it and you did it anyway.', "Jaime Lannister has played you for a fool. You've weakened our position. You've brought discord into our camp. And you did it all behind my back. Make sure she's guarded day and night.", 'Send another forty with our fastest horses.', 'Still no word?', 'Theon has my brothers. If we storm the castle', 'Send word to your son. Any Ironborn who surrender will be allowed to return safely to their homes.', 'Any Ironborn with the exception of Theon Greyjoy. He betrayed our cause. He betrayed me. And we will hunt him down no matter where he runs.', "How am I? I've had to arrest my mother. The Lannisters have my sisters. The man I considered my closest friend has seized my home and my brothers. I'm fighting a war and I don't know if I should march south or north.", "No. Forgive me. You're being kind. I have no right.", "That's not the kind of king I want to be.", "I don't know. The good kind. Most kings grew up as princes. They spend their whole lives preparing for the crown. I was raised to be Lord of Winterfell.", "I'd like to hear you play the harp.", "How did you go from reciting Valyrian poetry to sawing off men's feet?", "I don't want to marry the Frey girl.", 'I know that.', 'I love her.', 'It is important to me.', "And that is what would be in store for me with one of Walder Frey's daughters, what you and father had?", "Now you're arguing just to argue because you arranged it.", 'My father is dead. And the only parent I have left has no right to call anyone reckless.', 'Father, smith, warrior, mother ,maiden, crone, stranger.', 'I am hers and she is mine from this day until the end of my days.', "There won't be a siege. The Mountain can't defend a ruin.", "The Lannisters have been running from us since Oxcross. I'd love a fight. The men would love a fight. I don't think we're going to get one.", 'A Mallister?', 'Find her a chamber that will serve as a cell.', 'She freed Jaime Lannister. The Lannisters robbed them of their sons and she robbed them of their justice.', "What's your name, friend?", "Did you ever think you'd marry one?", 'Never?', 'Let me guess which one is the good news.', "We'll travel to the funeral together. Lord Bolton will garrison here until we return.", "By the time Bolton's bastard Ramsay got to Winterfell, the Ironborn were gone. They massacred everyone and put the castle to the torch. And Bran and Rickon have not been found. They may have escaped. Or Theon may have taken them back to the Iron Islands as hostages.", 'No.', "My grandfather's funeral is not a distraction.", 'My Uncle Edmure has his forces garrisoned there. We need his men.', 'Have you lost faith in our cause?', 'If you no longer believe-', "You don't think we can win?", 'Have you not been speaking your mind, Lord Karstark?', "It's not about glory. Your instructions were to wait for him to come to you.", 'What value was the mill?', 'Is he there now? Of course not.', 'I wanted to draw the Mountain into the west, into our country where we could surround him and kill him. I wanted him to chase us, which he would have done because he is a mad without a strategic thought in his head. I could have that head on a spike by now. Instead, I have a mill.', 'Willem and Martyn Lannister are fourteen years old.', 'Tywin Lannister has my sisters. Have I sued for peace?', "Do you think he'll sue for peace because we have his father's brother's great-grandsons?", 'How many men did you lose?', 'We need our men more than Tywin needs his!', 'You would have. Right here today at this gathering if you had been patient.', "You know who isn't? Tywin Lannister.", 'Bring them in.', 'Is that all of them? It took five of you to murder two unarmed squires?', "Vengeance? Those boys didn't kill your sons. I saw Harrion die on the battlefield and Torrhen-", 'They were boys! Look at them.', 'My mother had nothing to do with this. This was your treason.', 'Leave him.', 'Escort Lord Karstark to the dungeon. Hang the rest.', 'This one was only the watcher. Hang him last so he can watch the others die.', 'Would you make me a liar as well as a murderer?', "I'm not fighting for justice if I don't serve justice to murderers in my ranks, no matter how highborn. He has to die.", "You tended to their wounds. You brought them supper. Now they're dead.", "That didn't stop you from betraying me. And it won't save you now.", 'Kneel, my lord.', 'Rickard Karstark, Lord of Karhold, here in sight of gods and men, I sentence you to die. Would you speak a final word?', 'You were right.', 'The Karstarks are gone. Almost half our forces. Tywin Lannister knows what he needs to do to make us unravel. Nothing. Only wait.', "What can I do? Attack King's Landing? There's nothing he'd like better. He'd crush us in a day.", "Winter could last five years. Once my bannermen are home again, sitting by the fire, surrounded by their families, warm and safe, they'll never ride south again. When I gathered my lords together, we had a purpose, a mission. Now we're like a band of bickering children.", 'What?', "Here. And we're here. King's Landing-", "I can't force them to meet us in the field and I can't attack them where they're strongest, but I can attack them where they're not.", "And Casterly Rock can't run away. I'm going to take their home away from them.", "I need men to replace the Karstarks who marched home. There is only one person in this kingdom with that kind of army who hasn't already sided with the Lannisters. The man whose daughter I was supposed to marry- Walder Frey.", "Thank you for riding here so quickly. I know travel isn't easy in these times.", 'Of course. He deserves as much. I was in the wrong.', 'We are fighting for the North. Harrenhal is not in the North. It is his once the war is over and we have no further strategic need for it.', 'We will do whatever we can to give Lord Frey what he needs.', 'He has every right to be. Please excuse us while we discuss it.', "He's a proud man and we've wounded him.", "It's all right. You heard him. If you refuse, our alliance with the Freys is dead.", "I have a war to fight. We can't win it without them. I have no time to haggle. You said you wanted to make amends for the Stone Mill.", "I've won every battle, but I'm losing this war. If we don't do this and do it now, we're lost.", "You're paying for my sins, Uncle. It's not fair or right. I'll remember it.", "Frey will wait. He knows we're coming.", 'Edmure is the best match a Frey has had in the history of their house. We should all get some sleep.', "If you don't put some clothes on, I can't promise I won't attack you again.", 'Who are you writing?', 'Is that Valyrian?', 'Gaaa? Say hello for me.', 'Ritsas.', "Does she know her daughter's a queen?", 'That will be a surprise, I expect.', "How am I supposed to sit here planning a war when you're over there looking like that?", 'I will.', 'What, now? Are you certain?', "Angry? You're my queen.", 'Maybe one of each.', 'I love you. Do you hear me? I love you.', 'No.', "If we take Tywin's castle from him, the lords of Westeros will realize he's not invincible. Take his home, take his gold, take his power.", 'You begged me not to send Theon to negotiate with his father and I ignored your advice.', 'Now Winterfell is burned to the ground. The North is overrun with Ironborn and Bran and Rickon are gone.', "So, Casterly Rock? I'm asking your advice.", 'If Walder Frey cooperates.', "We'll lose the war and die the way father died. Or worse.", 'We thank you for your hospitality, my lord.', 'I have come to make my apologies, my lord, and to beg your forgiveness.', 'My ladies. All men should keep their word, kings most of all. I was pledged to marry one of you and I broke that vow. The fault is not with you. Any man would be lucky to have any one of you. I did what I did not to slight you, but because I loved another. I know these words cannot set right the wrong I have done to you and your house. I beg your forgiveness and pledge to do all I can to make amends so the Freys of the Crossing and the Starks of Winterfell may once again be friends.', 'Thank you, my lord.', "My mother's alone with Roose Bolton. I should rescue her.", "Be kind. She's finally starting to like you.", "Perhaps I've made a terrible mistake.", 'Striking your king is an act of treason.', 'If you think the time is right, Lord Walder, by all means, let us bed them.', "I suppose it does seem strange from a foreigner's perspective.", "It's tradition. Without the bedding ceremony, there's no real proof the lord and lady consummated their marriage.", 'Boy or girl?', "Oh, do you? It seems to me the father should have some say in his son's naming.", 'I do.', 'Mother.']

Name: stannis baratheon
Sentence: ['For the night is dark and full of terror.', "He wasn't my beloved brother. . I didn't love him, he didn't love me.", 'A lie. Take it out.', 'Jaime Lannister, the Kingslayer. Call him what he is.', "Make it Ser Jaime Lannister, the Kingslayer. Whatever else he is, the man's still a knight.", "When Eddard Stark learned the truth, he told only me. I'll not make the same mistake. Send copies of that letter to every corner of the Realm, from the Arbor to the Wall. The time has come to choose. Let no man claim ignorance as an excuse.", "I'll not make peace with Renly while he calls himself King.", "Who would steal the northern half of my kingdom. I've always served thieves according to their desserts, as you well know, Ser Davos. Joffrey, Renly, Robb Stark, they're all thieves. They'll bend the knee or I'll destroy them.", 'Send copies of that letter to every corner of the realm.', 'How did it fare with your pirate?', 'In my experience, pirates prefer fighting unarmed men.', "It won't be a choice this time. Do you trust him?", "Well if he does his job, he'll have his share. Leave us.", 'What did you say to him?', 'Why?', 'Yeah.', 'Tell your lord to burn them then.', 'My little brother has a hundred thousand men according to the scouts. Men whose allegiance rightly belongs to me.', 'Faith? In a real war, the side with the greater number wins nine times out of ten.', "I cannot defeat my brother in the field, and I can't take King's Landing without the men he stole.", "I've said the words, damn you! I burnt the idols.", 'I have a wife. I took a vow.', 'A son?', 'Lady Stark, I had not thought to find you in the Stormlands.', 'Who else might it be?', 'My own.', 'Watch yourself, Renly.', "That's twice I've warned you.", 'It is strange to find you beside my brother, Lady Stark. Your husband was a supporter of my claim. Lord Eddardo s integrity cost him his head. And you sit beside this pretender and chastise me.', 'The Iron Throne is mine by right. All those that deny that are my foes.', "For the sake of the mother who bore us, I will give you this one night to reconsider. Strike your banners, come to me before dawn, and I will grant you your old seat in the Council. I'll even name you my heir until a son is born to me. Otherwise I shall destroy you.", 'You think a few bolts of cloth will make you king?', 'We shall see, Renly. Come the dawn, we shall see.', 'Do your knuckle bones bring you luck?', 'Fewer.', 'Four fewer fingernails to clean. Never understood why you had to wear them.', 'You were a hero and a smuggler. A good act does not wash out the bad, nor a bad the good.', 'Does he listen?', "She has a name. I trust you've not forgotten your smuggler's tricks.", 'I want you to be a smuggler this time.', "The Red Woman. No one must know what you do and we'll not speak of this again.", "Cleaner ways don't win wars.", 'What is it?', 'Fools love a fool. I grieve for him as well, for the boy he was, not the man he grew to be.', "I thought I made it clear to you there'd be no need to speak to me on this matter.", "I've never known you to need to hear a thing twice.", "You've come to lecture me on truth?", "All my brother's bannermen have come to my side. Except the Tyrells, who fled like cowards. They won't be able to resist us now. Soon I shall be sitting on the Iron Throne.", "I'll hear no more about it.", "As soon as I've consolidated my troops. We'll make short work of the Lannisters' fleet. Once Blackwater Bay is cleared, we'll deliver our troops to their doorstep and take the city.", "That's not your concern.", "I never thought I'd have reason to doubt your loyalty. Was I wrong?", "Oh, truth again. All right, what's the truth? The hard truth?", 'What do you believe?', "We set out for King's Landing without Lady Melisandre. And you lead the fleet into Blackwater Bay.", "Most of those lords should consider themselves lucky I don't hang them for treason. Hard truths cut both ways, Ser Davos.", 'Will it hold?', 'I admire you, Ser Davos.', 'Pleased to hear it. Some highborn fools call you Onion Knight and think they insult you. So you take the onion for your sigil, sew it on your coat, fly the onion flag.', 'Do you? Why?', 'And?', "And where were those lords when Storm's End starved?", 'You defend these men who insult you behind your back.', "We were forgotten. Robert and Ned Stark, they were the heroes. The glorious rebels marching from battle to battle, liberating towns from the yoke of the Mad King, while I held Storm's End with five hundred men.", "No? Robert did. He gave Storm's End to Renly after the war. Renly never fought a day in his life.", "Then why'd he give him Storm's End?", "First, we ate the horses. We weren't riding anywhere, not with the castle surrounded. We couldn't feed them, so fine, the horses. Then the cats. Never liked cats. So fine. I do like dogs. Good animals. Loyal. But we ate them. Then the rats. The night before you slipped through, I thought my wife was dying. She couldn't speak anymore, she was so frail. And then you made it through the lines. Slipped right through in your little black sailboat with your onions.", "Every man in Storm's End wanted to kiss you that night.", "Robert told me to hold Storm's End, so I held it. Then he told me he was giving it to Renly, so I gave it up. Insult or no, I gave it up. Because Robert was my older brother, and he was the king and I've always done my duty. But now, I'm the rightful king by every law of Westeros. And when I sit the Iron Throne, you'll be my Hand.", "I expect you'll be the first crabber's son to wear the badge.", 'Prepare to land.', 'The dwarf has played his little trick.', 'He can only play it once.', 'Thousands.', 'Come with me and take this city!', 'To the Mud Gate, go now!', 'Get the ladders up!', 'Stand and fight! Stand and fight, damn you!', 'No!', 'You said you saw my victory in the flames.', "The flames lied. And I'm no better than a savage trusting in a fire god. I fought for your god in Blackwater Bay. I led my men to the gates of the seventh hell as their brothers burned alive, and for what? Attacked from behind by Tywin Lannister and the Tyrells. If you see so much in your flames, why didn't you warn me?", 'You claimed to speak for a god.', 'You talk about war as if you understand it.', 'Have you? Show me how you fight.', 'Show me.', "Where's your god now? Will he save you? Where is your god?", 'I murdered my brother.', "He wasn't your brother.", "You promise these things, but you don't know. None of us know.", 'I see fire.', 'Yes.', 'I heard you were dead.', 'I had hoped to speak to you alone, Your Grace.', 'We are alone.', 'I am fighting.', 'Take him to the dungeon and lock him in a cell.', "You refuse to tell me where you're going?", 'How long will you be gone?', "You're abandoning me.", 'Then serve me.', "My enemies think they've destroyed me. They're laughing at me the way Renly laughed at me. I want Joffrey dead. I want Robb Stark dead. Make me another son.", 'Why?', "I'm not so easily killed. Men have been trying for years.", 'I want you.', "You told me your magic requires a king's blood.", "I'm the one true king.", 'My lady.', 'I meant to come sooner. The battle-', 'Yes, of course.', 'I believed that once.', "Selyse. I've broken a sacred vow. I've sinned.", "I've wronged you. I have shamed you.", "You don't understand. The Red Woman- the Lady Melisandre-", "That's not true.", "She's my daughter. I want to see her.", 'Shireen.', "You've grown since I last saw you.", 'No.', 'He did. He fought bravely.', "He won't be visiting, child.", "Ser Davos is a traitor. He's rotting in a dungeon cell for his crime. Best forget him.", 'Half Robert, half lowborn.', 'What do you mean to do with him?', "Then why bathe him and dress him in fine clothes? If it needs to be done, do it. Don't torture the boy.", 'No.', "You've slaughtered many lambs?", 'They feeding you enough?', "You don't belong in a place like this.", 'Yeah.', "Melisandre's returned.", "Came back with a bastard boy. Robert's bastard boy.", "She says there's power in king's blood.", 'Sacrifice him.', "What of it? We're at war. Why should I spare the son of some tavern slut Robert bedded one drunken night?", 'So did Renly.', "How many boys live in Westeros? How many girls? How many men? How many women?The darkness will devour them all, she says. The night that never ends. Unless I triumph. I never asked for this. No more than I asked to be king. We do not choose our destiny, but we must do our duty, no? Great or small, we must do our duty. What's one bastard boy against a kingdom?", 'I came to free you. If you swear never to raise your hand to the Lady Melisandre again.', 'You have little regard for your own life.', "I saw a vision in the flames. A great battle in the snow. I saw it. And you saw whatever she gave birth to. I never believed, but when you see the truth, when it's right there in front of you as real as these iron bars, how can you deny her god is real?", 'The usurper Robb Stark. The usurper Balon Greyjoy. The usurper Joffrey Baratheon.', 'The usurper Robb Stark is dead. Betrayed by his bannerman.', 'Do you know who had this table carved and painted, Ser Davos?', 'And do you know how Aegon Targaryen conquered Westeros?', 'He had a smaller fleet than the kings he faced and a smaller army, but he had three dragons. Dragons are magic, Ser Davos. My enemies have made my kingdom bleed. I will not forget that. I will not forgive that. I will punish them with any arms at my disposal.', 'What is the life of one bastard boy against a kingdom?', 'The boy must die.', "You don't deny it?", 'What other way?! Tell us about this other way.', 'Very well, Ser Davos Seaworth. I, Stannis of the House Baratheon, First of My Name, Rightful King of the Andals and the First Men, sentence you to die.', 'Why am I gonna need you?', 'When did you learn to read?', "I've made my decision.", "You see, Ser Davos? You've been saved by that fire god you like to mock. You're in his army now.", 'He was an infidel.', 'I ordered him to tear down his idols. He disobeyed.', 'A good deal more than you.', "Meat's off.", "Serve fish, then. We're on an island.", 'I hate a good many things, but I suffer them all the same.', 'Of course I remember.', "She's a child.", "She's my daughter. You will not strike her.", "You're a literary man now. What do you make of that?", 'The usurper Joffrey Baratheon. I said those words when I tossed a leech into the fire. A leech filled with bastard blood. A bastard you set free. I am now faced with a great opportunity and I am powerless to take advantage of it.', 'What progress have you made?', 'House Peasebury.', 'House Musgood.', "House Haigh. They don't have enough men between them to raid a pantry.", 'The Golden Company?', "They're sellswords.", "We don't have any gold.", "If I do not press my claim, my claim will be forgotten. I will not become a page in someone else's history book. I'm running out of time, Ser Davos. Which means you're running out of time. -", "We've been here since midday.", 'He shares no blood with me. He is a bastard born of incest. As was his brother before him.', "It's not a story. It's the truth.", 'Gold you loaned him.', 'More than any man living.', '4,000.', 'None.', "67. And when he dies, who's in command? A half-grown boy, the product of incest? Cersei Lannister, a queen whose people despise her? Jaime Lannister, a man best known for killing the king he was sworn to protect? When Tywin's gone, who do you back?", "You're the king beyond the wall?", 'You know who I am?', 'It is customary to kneel when surrendering to a king.', "I'll have thousands of your men in chains by nightfall, I'll have nowhere to put them and nothing to feed them. I'm not here to slaughter beat dogs. Their fate depends on their king.", 'Take these men away.', 'Your father was an honorable man.', "What do you think he'd have done with him?", 'Very well. *to Davos* Take him.', 'You know who rules at Winterfell now?', "The traitor who plunged a dagger into Robb Stark's heart. Don't you want to avenge him?", "No matter. I shall take back the North from the thieves who stole it. Tywin Lannister is dead. He can't protect them now. I shall mount Roose Bolton's head on a spike. But if I'm to take Winterfell I'll need more men.", "I'm not talking about the damn Night's Watch. I'm talking about the wildlings.", "If they swear to follow me, I'll pardon them. We'll take Winterfell. Once the North is won, I'll declare them citizens of the realm. I'll give them land to live on.", "I'll offer them their lives and their freedom if Mance kneels before me and swears his loyalty.", "You admire him, don't you?", 'He likes you. Convince him to bend the knee...', 'or he burns.', 'Nightfall. The sun drops fast this time of year. Hurry, Jon Snow.', "Mance Rayder, you've been called the King Beyond the Wall. Westeros only has one king. Bend the knee, I promise you mercy.", 'Kneel and live.', "I ordered Mance Rayder burnt at the stake. You prevented that order from being carried out. You showed mercy to Mance Rayder. A king's word is law. Perhaps you should ask Ser Davos how much mercy I show to lawbreakers. Show too much kindness, people won't fear you. If people don't fear you, they don't follow you.", 'Who then? You?', 'Do you know this wretched girl Lyanna Mormont?', "Lady of Bear Island, and a child of 10. I asked her to commit her house to my cause, that's her response.", 'That amuses you?', "I know. My brother Robert went on often and loudly about how difficult it was to control them - even with your father's help.", "Your bravery made him look weak. He'll punish you for it. I don't punish men for bravery. I reward them.", 'You can give me the North.', "Kneel before me. Lay your sword at my feet. Pledge me your service and you'll rise again as Jon Stark, Lord of Winterfell.", 'Lord Commander.', "I'd like to speak alone.", 'Very well. . Have you considered my offer?', 'Say the word and you will be.', "I'm giving you a chance to avenge your family. To take back the castle where you grew up. To rule the North.", "You're as stubborn as your father. And as honorable.", "I didn't mean it as praise. Honor got your father killed. . But if your mindo s made up, I won't try to persuade you.", 'Are you bored of us already?', 'I know it. We march on Winterfell within the fortnight. Before the snows trap us here.', "They'd rather burn than fight for me, so be it. I leave their fate to you. You could execute them, that's the safest course. . Or you could see if this Tormund fellow is more willing to compromise than Mance ever was. I assume the brothers of the Night's Watch would rather see the wildlings dead.", "You're the Lord Commander. Your decision.", 'You have many enemies in Castle Black. Have you considered sending Alliser Thorne elsewhere? Give him command of Eastwatch-by-the-Sea.', "Whoever said that didn't have many enemies.", "Lord Commander of the Night's Watch.", "Perhaps, but that wasn't Ned Stark's way.", 'Not your fault.', 'We must. To beat the snows.', "I won't. I need you.", 'And you, my Lady, what do you need?', 'Are you lonely?', 'My father used to tell me that boredom indicates a lack of inner resources.', 'I know Castle Black is no place for a child, but I -', 'Why do you say that?', "She shouldn't have said that.", "When you were an infant, , the Dornish trailer landed on Dragonstone. His goods were junk except for one wooden doll. He'd even sewn a dress on it in the colors of our House. No doubt he'd heard of your birth, and assumed new fathers were easy targets. I still remember how you smiled when I put that doll in your cradle, , and you pressed it to your cheek. . By the time we burnt the doll, it was too late. . I was told you would die. Or worse, the grayscale would go slow. . Let you grow just enough to know the world before taking it away from you. Everyone advised me to send you to the ruins of Valyria to live out your short life with the Stone men, before the sickness spread to the castle. I told them all to go to hell. . I called in every maester on this side of the world. Every healer, every apothecary. They stopped the disease and saved your life. Because you did not belong across the world with the bloody Stone men. . You are the Princess Shireen of House Baratheon. And you are my daughter.", 'Fewer.', 'Nothing.', "You're Samwell Tarly?", "Your father is Randyll Tarly. He defeated my brother at the Battle of Ashford. Only battle Robert ever lost. I told him he shouldn't go so far west so soon, but he never listened. Fine soldier, your father. You don't look like a soldier. But I'm told you killed a white walker.", 'How?', 'Dragonglass?', 'I know what it is. We have it in Dragonstone. Why would obsidian kill a walker?', 'The Lady Melisandre told me that death marches on the Wall.', 'Seen what?', 'We have to know how to fight them. . Keep reading, Samwell Tarly.', "It's time.", "If Jon Snow returns with the wildlings. We can't wait that long. We have the advantage, more men, more horses, all fed and rested. But every day we wait, the odds shift in Bolton's favor. This could turn to winter at any moment. We have to act now. Give the order. We march at sunrise.", "No need, they're coming with us.", 'Here? Half these watchmen are killers and rapists. No, they march with us.', "I hope you know what you're doing with these wildlings. I need those ships.", 'What else?', '500 men.', 'Sell swords, loyal to nothing but gold.', 'And?', "I retreated from King's Landing, Ser Davos. If I retreat again, I become “The King Who Ran.”", "Winter is coming. Those arent just the Stark words, it's a fact. If we march back to Castle Black, we winter at Castle Black.
