And who can say how many years this winter will last.", "This is the right time, and I will risk everything. Because if I don't, we've lost. We march to victory or we march to defeat, but we go forward only forward,", "I've trusted in your visions, in your prophecies for years.", "I don't know what I saw.", 'And you, do you trust yourself?', 'Are you sure?', "We don't have Robert's bastard here.", 'Have you lost your mind?', 'There must be another way. Leeches or something.', "She's my daughter.", 'Get out.', 'Horses?', '20 men rode into our camp without a single guard sounding the alarm?', "Put last night's guards in chains, either they fell asleep or they were conspiring with the enemy. Find out the truth and then hang them.", "We're not returning to Castle Black.", 'Have the dead horses butchered for meat.', "Find you some healthy horses and a few good men to guard you, I'm sending you back to Castle Black. Tell the Lord Commander to send food, supplies, fresh horses, in return when I take the throne I'll make sure the Night's Watch has all the men it requires. He can guard all 19 castles if he so wishes.", 'Yes.', "You're not abandoning me, you're obeying a command.", "And if Jon Snow refuses a boy with a scroll, what does the boy say? I didn't name you hand for your expertise in military matters, ride for Castle Black, don't come back empty handed.", 'My family stays with me.', 'No. What are you reading?', "What's it about?", 'The dance of dragons”? Why is that a dance?', "Doesn't make much sense.", 'If you had to choose between Rhaenyra and Aegon, who would you have chosen?', 'Sometimes a person has to choose. Sometimes the world forces his hand. If a man knows what he is and remains true to himself, the choice is not choice at all. He must fulfill his destiny and become who he is meant to be. However much he may hate it.', "You don't even know what I'm talking about.", 'Yes there is.', 'Forgive me.', "There's no other way. She has King's blood.", 'We ride for Winterfell.', 'Prepare to form up.', 'Tell me.', 'How many?', "Speak up. It can't be worse than mutiny.", 'Cut her down.', 'Get the men into marching formation. On to Winterfell.', 'Trench here. Another one 300 yards from the castle wall. Hurry them along. And send out a foraging party immediately. The siege begins at sunrise.', 'Bolton has women fighting for him.', 'I did.', 'Go on, do your duty.']

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: ['Do you have to?', 'Ned. Ten is too young to see such things.', 'All these years and I still feel like an outsider when I come here.', 'I wonder if the old gods agree.', 'I am so sorry, my love.', 'There was a raven from Kings Landing. Jon Arryn is dead. A fever took him. I know he was like a father to you.', 'They both have their health. Gods be good. [pause] The raven brought more news. The king rides for Winterfell. With the queen and all the rest of them.', 'You can always say no, Ned.', "We need plenty of candles for Lord Tyrion's chamber. I'm told he reads all night.", 'How much could he possibly drink? A man of his … stature.', 'In any case, candles.', 'Gods, but they grow fast. [Seeing BRAN on the wall] Brandon!', 'How many times have I told you', 'I want you to promise me', "D'you know what?", 'You always look at your feet before you lie. Run and find your father. Tell him the king is close.', "Where's Arya? Sansa, where's your sister?", 'Your Grace.', 'My queen.', 'Then he is the stupidest prince that ever lived.', "Hush now. Your father hasn't even said yes.", "He'd have to leave home. He'd have to leave me. And so would you.", 'Sansa…', 'Is this your first time in the North, Your Grace?', "I'm sure it's very grim, after Kings Landing. I remember how scared I was when Ned brought me up here for the first time.", 'I hear the same.', "I won't let him take you.", "I'll say, ‘Listen, fat man, you are not taking my husband anywhere. He belongs to me now.'", "He only stops eating when it's time for a drink.", "This was sent from the Eyrie. What's she doing at the Eyrie? She hasn't been back there since her wedding.", "She's fled the capital. She says Jon Arryn was murdered. By the Lannisters. She says the king is in danger.", "Lysa's head would be on a spike right now if the wrong people had found that letter. Do you think she would risk her life, her son's life, if she wasn't certain her husband was murdered?", 'They murdered the last Hand. Now you want Ned to take the job.', "He spent half his life fighting Robert's wars. He owes him nothing. Your father and brother rode south once on a king's demand.", 'I would have dressed, your Grace.', 'I never knew.', 'I am grateful..', "You've said it.", 'I want you to leave.', "17 years ago you rode off with Robert Baratheon. You came back a year later with another woman's son. And now you're leaving again.", "That's what men always say when honor calls. That's what you tell your families, tell yourselves. You do have a choice. And you've made it. I can't do it, Ned. I really can't.", 'Talk to Poole about it.', "I don't care about appointments!", 'I have to take care of him.', "What if he's wrong? Bran needs me.", "Close the windows! I can't stand it! Please make them stop!", 'No!', "What I am about to tell you must remain between us. I don't think Bran fell from that tower. I think he was thrown.", "Someone tried to kill him twice. Why? Why murder an innocent child? Unless he saw something he wasn't meant to see.", "I don't know. But I would stake my life the Lannisters are involved. We already have reason to suspect their loyalty to the crown.", "I don't trust a raven to carry these words.", 'No. There must always be a Stark in Winterfell. I will go myself.', 'I must.', "Too large a party attracts unwanted attention. I don't want the Lannisters to know I'm coming.", "I have prayed to the Seven for more than a month. Bran's life is in their hands now.", "It's nine years since I've set foot in the capital. And no one knew who I was the last time I came either.", "I would. We've done nothing wrong.", "Instructed? I don't know who's providing your instructions, but...", 'You little worm! You take me for some back-alley Sally you can drag into a…', 'How dare you bring me here! Have you lost your mind?', "How did you know I was coming to King's Landing?", 'Lord Varys.', 'How did you know I was coming?', 'Do you know whose dagger this is?', 'Yours?', 'To whom?', 'Ned! [poking her head out of a window]', 'We have proof. We have the blade.', "Petyr has promised to help us find the truth. He's like a little brother to me. He would never betray my trust.", "I won't forget this. You're a true friend.", 'I wish I could see the girls.', 'Just for a moment.', 'I know they did it, Ned. The Lannisters. In my bones, I know it.', 'My temper? Gods be good, you nearly killed poor Littlefinger yesterday.', 'Does he?', 'And to you.', 'I was still Catelyn Tully the last time I stayed here. You, Ser... Is that the black bat of Harrenhal I see embroidered on your coat?', 'And is Lady Whent a true and honest friend to my father... Lord Hoster Tully of Riverrun?', 'The red stallion was always a welcome sight at Riverrun. My father counts Jonas Bracken amongst his oldest and most loyal bannermen.', 'Knight of House Frey', "This man... Came into my house as a guest and there conspired to murder my son, a boy of 10. In the name of King Robert and the good Lords you serve, I call upon you to seize him and help me return him to Winterfell to await the king's justice.", 'Remove his hood.', 'I did... often and loudly.', 'And why would I do that?', 'Shadowcats and hill tribes are the least of your concerns.', 'Five years ago.', 'I am not a murderer, Lannister.', 'The dagger found', 'Rodrik?', 'To whom do I speak?', 'There was no time to send word.', "That's why there was no time. He is my prisoner.", 'My sister will decide what he looks like.', 'Lysa, you wrote me about the Lannisters, warning me t-', 'This man is my prisoner. I will not have him harmed.', "Lord Tyrion, you are accused of hiring a man to slay my son Bran in his bed, and of conspiring to murder my sister's husband; Lord Jon Arryn, the Hand of the King.", 'You will not support us then? Do I understand you correctly?', 'That is what I ask.', 'If you fear for the safety of your son...', 'And that is why we have to stop them.', 'The late Lord Frey" my father calls him.', 'Robb.', "Keep shooting them down. We can't risk Lord Walder sending word of your movements to the Lannisters.", 'The Freys have held the crossing for 600 years, and for 600 years they have never failed to exact their toll.', "l agree. l'll go.", 'l have known Lord Walder since l was a girl. He would never harm me.', 'lt is a great pleasure to see you again after so many years, my lord.', 'ls there somewhere we can talk?', "l'm sure she will give you many sons.", 'He is quite ill, my lord.', 'My lord, l –', "l'm sure there were reasons –", 'To ask you to open your gates, my lord, so my son and his bannermen may cross the Trident and be on their way.', 'lf you could climb your own battlements, you would see that he has 20,000 men outside your walls.', 'You swore an oath to my father.', "Why don't you?", 'Lord Walder has granted your crossing. His men are yours, as well.', 'Less the 400 he will keep here to hold the crossing against any who would pursue you.', 'You will be taking on his son Olyvar as your personal squire. He expects a knighthood in good time.', 'And Arya will marry his son Waldron when they both come of age.', 'And when the fighting is done you will marry one of his daughters. Whichever you prefer. He has a number he thinks will be suitable.', 'l did.', 'One was – Do you consent?', 'Not if you want to cross.', 'No!', 'lt is not your sword l want. Give me my daughters back. Give me my husband.', 'Take him away and put him in irons.', "Robb. Robb! You've ruined your sword.", 'Shh! Shh! Shh!', 'My boy. They have your sisters. We have to get the girls back. And then we will kill them all.', 'l want to see him. Now! Leave us.', 'Leave us.', 'l will kill you tonight, Ser. Pack your head in a box and send it to your sister.', "That is what you want the world to believe, isn't it? That you don't fear death.", 'Because you are going to the deepest of the seven hells, if the gods are just.', 'Because of men like you.', 'My son Bran. How did he come to fall from that tower?', 'Why?', "You don't want Balon Greyjoy for an ally.", "They say a million rats live in the sewers of King's Landing. Shall we rally them to fight for us?", "I don't trust Lord Greyjoy because he is not trustworthy. Your father had to go to war to end his rebellion.", 'I mothered more than just rebels, a fact you seem to have forgotten.', "You want to leave Sansa in the Queen's hands? And Arya, I haven't heard a word about Arya. What are we fighting for if not for them?", "It's time for me to go home. I haven't seen Bran or Rickon in months.", 'I beg your pardon?', 'Why in the name of all the Gods -', "I haven't seen Renly Baratheon since he was a boy. You have a hundred other lords -", 'I will ride at first light.', "You've done so well. Your father would be proud.", "King Renly. There's a king in every corner now.", "You don't want Balon Greyjoy for an ally.", 'He is not trustworthy!', 'Lord of Winterfell and King in the North.', 'You are most kind.', 'It will be enough to know that justice was done, my lord.', "I do not sit on my son's war councils. And if I did, I would not share his strategies with you.", 'My son is fighting a war, not playing at one.', "And all of them young and bold like your Knight of Flowers? It's a game to you, isn't it? I pity them.", "Because it won't last. Because they are the knights of summer and winter is coming.", 'You fought bravely today, Lady Brienne.', 'How dare you?', 'You betrayed Ned.', 'I trusted you. My husband trusted you. And you repaid our faith with treachery.', 'Get out!', 'Have you lost your mind? Get out!', 'You have Arya, too?', 'What do you want?', 'Of course they will. Jaime Lannister for two girls? Robb will never agree to those terms.', 'You think I keep secrets from my son?', "I don't want your gifts. A token of Tyrion Lannister's goodwill. He wants you to understand that this exchange of prisoners is offered in good faith.", 'Good faith?', "What's this?", 'Get out.', 'I had not thought to be here, Lord Stannis.', 'Listen to yourselves. If you were sons of mine, I would knock your heads together and lock you in a bedchamber until you remembered that you were brothers.', 'We share a common enemy.', 'By the mother. My son has no interest in the Iron Throne.', 'And the wording of this oath?', "And in return for my son's loyalty?", 'Our two houses have always been close, which is why I am begging you to reconsider this battle. Negotiate a peace with your brother.', "No, wait, it wasn't her!", "We've got to leave. They'll hang you for this.", "You can't avenge him if you're dead.", 'To me it just looked like... A shadow in the shape of a man.', "We should reach my son's camp tomorrow.", "Only long enough to tell Robb what I have seen. After that, I will leave for Winterfell. My two youngest need me. I've been away from them for far too long.", "I'm sorry.", 'My own mother died on the birthing bed when I was very young.', 'What comes after is even harder.', 'You mean to kill Stannis.', 'But Stannis has a great army around him. His own guards are sworn to keep him safe.', "I'm as good as any of them. I should never have fled.", "Renly's death was no fault of yours. You served him bravely.", "He's gone, Brienne. You serve nothing and no one by following him into the earth. Renly's enemies are Robb's enemies as well.", 'When the time comes, I will not hold you back.', 'I vow that you shall always have a place in my home and at my table and that I shall ask no service of you that might bring you dishonor. I swear it by the Old Gods and the new.', 'Robb.', 'Lady Talisa.', 'Lady Talisa...?', 'Maegyr? Forgive me, I do not know this name.', 'Yes, you look positively forlorn.', 'I wish that you were free to follow your heart.', "You have inherited your father's responsibilities. I'm afraid they come at a cost. You are promised to another.", 'A debt that must be paid.', 'I told you, never trust a Greyjoy!', 'Let me go and talk to Theon.', 'What is it?', 'Lord Karstark, this man is our prisoner.', 'And crippled mine. He will answer for his crimes, I promise you, but not here.', 'You will strike me down? Have you forgotten me, ser? I am the widow of your liege, Lord Eddard Stark. I am the mother of your king!', 'How dare you!', 'I understand your grief, my lord, better than most, I understand it. But in the name of my son, the King in the North, stand down.', 'Wise men do not make demands of kings.', 'Take him to the stockades. Bind him with every chain you can find!', 'And gag him!', 'So they say.', 'Come.', 'I need to be alone with him.', 'Your orders, which I just gave you, are to leave me alone with him.', 'Do you hear them out there? They want your head.', 'You strangled his son with your chains.', 'You are no knight. You have forsaken every vow you ever took.', 'She is a truer knight than you will ever be, Kingslayer.', 'You are a man without honor.', 'Brienne.', 'Your sword.', 'For the girls.', 'Robb-', "Bran and Rickon are captives in Winterfell. Sansa and Arya are captives in King's Landing. I have five children, and only one of them is free.", 'I grieve for your sons, my lord.', "Killing Jaime Lannister would not buy life for your children, but returning him to King's Landing may buy life for mine.", 'Robb. How many men did we send in pursuit of the Kingslayer?', 'Robb.', 'Walder Frey is a dangerous man to cross.', 'And you mean to do it anyway?', 'I know that seems important to you.', "Your father didn't love me when we married. He hardly knew me or I him. Love didn't just happen to us. We built it slowly over the years, stone by stone, for you, for your brothers and sisters, for all of us. It's not as exciting as secret passion in the woods, but it is stronger. It lasts longer.", "Why not? Because she's not beautiful? Because she's not exotic and exciting?", 'And you agreed to it. You gave him your word. Treat your oaths recklessly, and your people will do the same. If your father lived his life for one thing', "Ser Jeremy. My father's bannerman.", "I hadn't seen him in years. I don't even know how many.", 'Will I be wearing manacles when I lay my father to rest?', 'Something else?', 'Have you received any demands?', 'Have you heard anything from Theon at all?', "You're afraid of her. And she knows it.", 'No.', "You can't help because a mother makes one for her children to protect them. Only a mother can make them.", 'Twice.', 'After a fashion. I prayed for my son Bran to survive his fall.', "Many years before that, one of the boys came down with the pox. Maester Luwin said if he made it through the night, he'd live. But it would be a very long night. So I sat with him all through the darkness. Listened to his ragged little breaths, his coughing, his whimpering.", "Jon Snow. When my husband brought that baby home from the war, I couldn't bear to look at him. I didn't want to see those brown stranger's eyes staring up at me. So I prayed to the gods, take him away. Make him die. He got the pox. And I knew I was the worst woman who ever lived. A murderer. I'd condemned this poor, innocent child to a horrible death all because I was jealous of his mother. A woman he didn't even know. So I prayed to all seven gods, let the boy live. Let him live and I'll love him. I'll be a mother to him. I'll beg my husband to give him a true name, to call him Stark and be done with it, to make him one of us.", "And he lived. And I couldn't keep my promise. And everything that's happened since then all this horror that's come to my family it's all because I couldn't love a motherless child.", "A person could almost be forgiven for forgetting we're at war.", "I've missed you, Uncle. Father missed you, too, from the day you left. Maybe he never said it in so many words-", "I'm glad you were with him. I wish to the gods I had been. Did you make peace in the end?", "Every time he would leave for the capital or fight in a campaign, I'd see him off. 'Wait for me, little Cat,' he'd say. 'Wait for me and I'll come back to you.' And I would sit at this window every day when the sun came up, waiting. I wonder how many times did Bran or Rickon stare across the moors of Winterfell waiting for me to return. I will never see them again.", 'Brandon.', 'How many times have I told you? No climbing.', 'I want you to promise me. No more climbing.', 'Promise me. Promise me! Promise me!', 'Promise me! Promise me, Bran! Promise me!', "The Karstarks are Northmen. They won't forgive the killing of their lord.", 'Spare his life. Keep him as a hostage.', "You're willing to risk our freedom and our lives for a chance at a prettier wife?", 'Lord Walder is prickly by nature.', 'Yes, and that is why-', 'Lord Frey will take this delay as a slight.', "He's getting a wedding. It was a king he wanted.", 'Are you sure about this?', "It's dangerous.", 'Why are you telling me?', 'We have enough men?', "If reinforcements arrive from King's Landing, before we take the castle, we'll be caught between Tywin's army and the sea.", 'Show them how it feels to lose what they love.', 'He complained about this marriage the entire ride from Riverrun and now look at him.', 'Uncle.', "Don't you drink, Lord Bolton?", 'I hope she makes you very happy.', 'Poor girl.', "Oh, Ned forbade it. He said it wouldn't be right if he broke a man's jaw on our wedding night.", 'Robb!', 'Lord Walder! Lord Walder, enough! Let it end! Please! He is my son! My first son! Let him go and I swear that we will forget this! I swear it by the Old Gods and New! We will take no vengeance.', 'Take me for a hostage but let Robb go! Robb, get up! Get up and walk out! Please! Please!', "On my honor as a Tully, on my honor as a Stark, let him go or I will cut your wife's throat!"]

Name: ramsay bolton
Sentence: ['Your sister sent me.', "I'll come for you tonight when the castle sleeps.", 'Keep quiet.', "If you can't ride, we don't stand a chance.", "You're sure?", "Ride east. Follow the rising sun. Your sister's waiting for you.", "We're not in the Iron Islands. Go.", 'Come, my lord.', "You're a long way from home and winter is coming.", 'Sorry. Were you sleeping?', 'Wa-? Wa-? Water? You want some water. I wish I had some for you.', "So let's play a game. Which body part do you need the least?", 'Please is not a body part.', "But you've already told me everything. Remember? Your daddy was mean to you. The Starks didn't appreciate you. One good bit, though. The Stark boys, they're still alive. Wouldn't that be a hunt to remember? You failed, but I'm a better hunter than you.", "Now how about your little finger? You don't use that for much, do you? No? Good. Let's start with that.", "You've been wondering why you're here. Haven't you? Where you are. Who I am. Why I'm doing this to you. So guess. If you guess right, I'll tell you. By the old gods and the new, I swear it. You win the game if you can figure out who I am and why I'm torturing you and I win the game if you beg me to cut off your finger.", "If you think this has a happy ending, you haven't been paying attention.", "You say please again and you'll wish you hadn't. You first. Where are we?", 'Too vague.', 'Terrible guess.', 'Now, where?', 'Do I look like a fucking Umber to you?', 'Karhold? How did you know that? Did you see any banners flying when we came in?', 'Very good, Lord Theon. And who am I?', "He's dead. Strangled by the Kingslayer.", "You're right.", 'Yes. You win.', "Of course, you forgot to ask one question. You forgot to ask if I'm a liar.", "I'm afraid I am.", 'Everything I told you is a lie.', "This isn't happening to you for a reason. Well, one reason- I enjoy it.", 'I win.', "I'm sorry. I'm sorry. Terrible timing.", 'But I was getting jealous.', "Well? Should we see this cock everyone's always going on about?", 'Everyone knows you love girls. I bet you always thought they loved you back.', "Your famous cock must be very precious to you. Would you say it's your most precious part?", "This is mercy. I'm not killing you. Just making a few alterations.", "Well, the girls weren't lying. You had a good-sized cock.", "What? No. Pork sausage. You think I'm some sort of savage?", "People talk about phantom limbs. An amputee might have an itch where his foot used to be. So I've always wondered do eunuchs have a phantom cock?", 'Next time you think about naked girls, would you feel an itch?', "Sorry. I shouldn't make jokes. My mother taught me not to throw stones at cripples.", 'But my father taught me to aim for their head.', 'Sorry, what?', 'A little louder.', "You're no good to me dead. We need you.", "You don't look like a Theon Greyjoy anymore. That's a name for a lord. But you're not a lord, are you? You're just meat.", 'Stinking meat.', "You reek. Reek! That's a good name for you. What's your name?", "What's your name?", 'What is your name?!', 'Tansy! Tansy! Tansy!', 'Tansy! Tansy!', 'There you are.', 'Tansy!', 'If you make it out of the woods, you win! Run, Tansy, run!', 'Tansy.', 'Tansy, Tansy, Tansy!', 'Good girls. Down, girls. Down. Well done. You, too.', "You brought her down. That's what matters. A fine shot. Wasn't it, Reek?", "Oh, sweet. Don't cry. It will be over soon.", 'We have to reward the hounds, love. They did all the hard work.', 'But you made Myranda feel jealous.', 'You can see that your presence has become a bit of a problem.', 'Rip her! Rip her! Rip her!', 'Not so pretty now.', 'Father. Welcome home.', 'A pleasure, Mother.', "With the hounds. I'll have a look at him.", 'I hear you took a hand from the Kingslayer.', 'Father.', 'I trained him. He was a slow learner, but he learned.', 'Peeled a few bits. Removed a few others.', "We've been flaying our enemies for a thousand years. The flayed man is on our banners.", 'I already asked. Lord Greyjoy refused. Savages have no-', 'You made me acting Lord of the Dreadfort. I acted.', 'Theon was our enemy. But Reek, Reek will never betray us.', "Reek, how could you let me stand before my father unshaven? It's disrespectful.", 'Give him the razor.', "If I'm not a Bolton, Father, what does it matter?", 'Go on, Reek. A nice close shave.', 'Reek, tell Father where are Bran and Rickon Stark?', 'Reek, did you murder the Stark boys?', 'And crisped them so no one would know.', 'The Starks have always ruled the North. If Bran and Rickon are alive, the country will rally to their side now that Robb Stark is gone.', "Oh, that's right, Reek. Robb Stark is dead. Sorry. I know he was like a brother to you. But my father put a knife through his heart. How do you feel about that?", "Even if he doesn't, he's half Stark himself. Could be a threat.", 'This is turning into a lovely evening.', "You've got bigger balls than he ever did. But with those big balls of yours...", 'how fast can you run?', 'I have a treat for you. A reward.', "Yes, Reek. Those creatures who came in the night, they wanted to take you away. And you didn't let them. You remained loyal.", "Yes, yes, Reek. It's a bath. For you. Remove those rags. Now.", 'The britches, too, Reek. Take them off.', 'Do you love me, Reek?', "Good. Because I need you to do something for me. Something very important. There's a castle, you see. Some bad men hold this castle. I need your help to take this castle back.", "I need you to play a role. To pretend to be someone you're not.", 'Theon Greyjoy.', "Bracken. Mmm, strong. As long as they're in the see. But when you take them out of the water, no bones. They collapse under their proud weight and slum into a heap of nothing. You'd think they'd know that. Unfortunately they're not very bright. What do you tell them?", 'And what are you really?', 'Are you sure? You do look very much like a lord. Formidable, proud.', 'Until when?', "That's right. Until you're rotting in the ground. Remember what you are and what you're not. Bring me Lord Kenning.", "You didn't really think I'd let them go did you? It's falling out of fashion. Fileting. Sad, but true. Traditions are important. Where are we without our history, eh?", 'I believe we will. To our new home.', 'Moat Cailin is yours, Father.', 'No.', 'Unimportant. A cripple, a young boy. None of the northern lords have seen them. Dead most likely. Most of the Ironborn have fled the North. Now more will follow, thanks to you. Tell me what you see.', 'Moors, fields, hills.', 'Tell me what you see.', 'Nothing.', 'Ramsay Snow.', 'You honor me. I swear I will uphold your name and your tradition. I will be worthy of you, Father, I promise.', "Come, Reek, I'll be needing a bath.", "You can't hold the North if you let these lesser lords insult us.", "Lord Cerwyn refused to pay. Said the Warden of the North would always be a Stark, and he'd be damned if he kissed a traitor's boot.", 'I flayed him living, along with his wife and brother. Made his son watch.', 'The new Lord Cerwyn paid his taxes.', 'Our pact with the Lannisters protects -', "It's an honor to meet you, my Lady.", 'She really is lovely. I hope I can make her happy.', "I'll never hurt her. You have my word.", "I haven't been a lord very long. I was a bastard.", "Yes, father. And thank you, Lord Baelish. I'm forever in your debt. .", 'Come back here. Myranda.', "I'm going to marry her. That will involve looking at her from time to time.", "And I meant it. When I was a bastard named Snow. But I'm a Bolton now. What I want is no longer the primary consideration. I'm furthering a dynasty.", "Of course I do. I'm not blind.", "You think she's pretty, too. I'm looking forward to our wedding night. But don't worry, I'll have plenty of time for you.", "You're the kennel master's daughter. Who are you going to marry, the stable keeper's son? . You're mine. You're not going anywhere. Unless I have to listen to more of your jealousy. Jealousy bores me. You remember what happens to people who bore me. You're not going to bore me, are you, Myranda?", 'You smell particularly ripe this evening. Pour me some wine.', 'Do you have something to tell me?', 'Reek.', 'Who?', 'She saw you?', 'Come here.', "You mustn't keep secrets from me, Reek. Get on your knees.", 'Give me your hand.', 'I forgive you.', 'Allow me.', 'Mother.', "My lady, we are all a family, we northerners. Our blood ties go back thousands of years. So I'd like to drink to our wedding. May our happiness spread from Moat Cailin to the Last Hearth.", "You're right. Very strange. More wine, please.", "I heard you two had reunited. A fitting place for it. . I like to imagine that the last time you spoke was in this very room. Are you still angry with him after he - what he did? Don't worry. The North remembers. I punished him for it. He's not ironborn anymore. Not Theon Greyjoy anymore. He's a new man. A new person, anyway. Aren't you, Reek?", "That's his new name, Reek.", "Because Reek has something to say to you. Don't you, Reek? . An apology. Apologize to Lady Sansa for what you did. Apologize for murdering her two brothers.", "Look at her, Reek. An apology doesn't mean anything if you're not looking the person in the eye.", 'Sorry about what?', "There, over and done with. Doesn't everyone feel better? I do. That was getting very tense. Whew. . You know what, my lady? What with him having murdered your brothers and the rest of your family gone Reek here is the nearest thing to living kin that you have left. Reek. You will give away the bride. Someone has to. What better person? Good? Good?", 'Wonderful. .', 'How can you be sure?', "That she's pregnant. I mean how can you tell?", 'So how did you manage it?', 'Getting her pregnant.', 'Of course, but how did you find it?', "And if it's a boy?", "My position is quite clear. I'm your son until a better alternative comes along.", 'Why would I? She had me, she died. And here we are.', 'Yes.', 'Ramsay of House Bolton. Heir to the Dreadfort and Winterfell. Who gives her?', 'Are you pleased my lady?', "Good. I want you to be happy. My father said you're still a virgin.", 'Why? Why are you still a virgin? Afraid of dwarves?', "You're not lying to me?", "Lying to your husband on his wedding night, that would be a very bad way to start a marriage. We are man and wife now, we should be honest with each other, don't you think?", 'Good. Now take off your clothes.', 'Oh, no no no. You stay here Reek. You watch. Do I need to ask a second time? I hate asking a second time.', 'Reek? I told you to watch.', "You've known Sansa since she was a girl. Now watch her become a woman.", 'Yes, Reek?', 'My beautiful wife.', "When my father told me we were marrying I half expected a fat, bearded beast. Do you know how pleased I was when I saw you? You've made me very happy.", "Our scouts report that Stannis Baratheon rides for Winterfell. He's a respected commander. His troops are loyal and battle tested. He's hired thousands of foreign sell swords to bolster his army. But this storm was a stroke of luck for us northerners. Our people are used to fighting in frost. His army's out there now, suffering in the snow. One day I'll be Lord of Winterfell, and Warden of the North. You'll be my Lady and Wardeness.", 'What of it?', "Then I'll have a baby brother.", "I'm Lord Bolton's eldest son.", "I've been naturalized by a royal decree of--", "Bastards can rise high in the world. Like your half-brother Jon Snow. Born The Bastard of Winterfell, now the Lord Commander of the Night's Watch.", "You didn't know? Yes, he's done very well for himself. Ah. I near forgot why I asked you to join me. Come, my lady.", 'Your Northern friend. Reek told me you wanted to leave.', 'Why? Winterfell is your home and I am your husband.', "Tough old bird. Everyone talks when I start beating them. But this one. Her heart gave out before I got to her face. We do breed them tough in the North. Bring my wife back to her chamber. It's far too cold out here for a lady. You should hold on to your candles. The nights are so long now.", "Stannis isn't from the North. You are, father. I think you're missing an opportunity to show the people of the North how House Bolton treats southern invaders.", 'That we not sit and wait to let Stannis to decide what type of fight this is going to be. That we hit first, and hit hard, and leave a feast for the crows.', "I don't need an army. I need 20 good men.", "Looks like we're done here.", 'And I accept your surrender.', "Let's head back. My wife must be lonely.", 'She was 11 the first time I saw her', "The kennelmaster's daughter She smelled of dog I wasn't much older, but everybody was already afraid of me You certainly were", "Myranda wasn't, though What could I do to her that those hounds couldn't? She was fearless There was nothing she wouldn't do.", 'Your pain will be paid for a thousand times over. I wish you could be here to watch.', 'Buried, burned?', 'This is good meat Feed it to the hounds', 'No', "I have a team of men after them with some of my best hounds They won't get far", 'They obviously had help', "We know where she's going Her brother's at Castle Black", 'So was I, Father', "Castle Black isn't defended on the southern side And the few men left are barely men at all. Farm boys and thieves With a small force we could storm the castle, kill Jon Snow --", "We don't need every house in the North. The Umbers, the Manderlys, and the Karstarks command more soldiers than all the other houses combined With their support, none could challenge us", 'Congratulations, Father I look forward to meeting my new brother', 'Thank you for saying that It means a great deal to me', 'Maester Wolkan, send ravens to all the Northern houses Roose Bolton is dead Poisoned by our enemies', 'How did he die', 'Send for Lady Walda and the baby', 'There he is', 'May I hold him', 'Little brother', 'Of course Follow me, Mother', 'Down', 'I am Lord Bolton', 'I prefer being an only child', 'The Umbers are a famously loyal house', 'When my father became Warden of the North, your house refused to pledge their banners', 'My beloved father, the Warden --', 'My father was poisoned by our enemies', 'Why have you come to Winterfell, Lord Umber?', "So now you've come seeking help?", 'Pledge your banners to House Bolton Swear loyalty to me as Warden of the North and we will fight together to destroy the bastard and all his wildling friends', 'Traditionally a bannerman kneels before his lord', "Why would I trust a man who won't honor tradition?", "Then it appears we're at a bit of an impasse", 'A girl, I hope I prefer redheads', 'I like them wild', "Who's this?", "How do I know that's Rickon Stark?", 'Welcome home, Lord Stark', 'peels an apple with a knife. The door opens. A guard ushers OSHA into the room. RAMSAY nods. The guard leaves and closes the door.', "They've cleaned you up nicely. You know who I am?", "Yes. A lord. You've seen my banners?", 'Does that worry you at all?', 'No.', 'peels the skin of the apple and puts it on the table with the knife. OSHA looks at the knife. RAMSAY waves for OSHA to come to him. She walks towards him.', 'You served the Starks?', 'The Starks have been gone for a long time, but you kept protecting Rickon.', "Be that as it may, Rickon's not yours to sell anymore. He's mine. So what use could I possibly have for you?", 'Are you sure you know what that is?', "You're a good talker.", 'I like that.', "You're a much better talker than Theon Greyjoy.", 'I had to work hard to get him talking. But he talked. They all do.', 'He told me everything. All about the Stark boys. Who helped them escape, and how she did it.', "My beloved wife. I've missed you terribly.", "Thank you for returning Lady Bolton safely. Now, dismount and kneel before me, surrender your army and proclaim me the true Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North. I will pardon you for deserting the Night's Watch. I will pardon these treasonous lords for betraying my house. Come, bastard, you don't have the men, you don't have the horses, and you don't have Winterfell. Why lead those pour souls into slaughter? There's no need for a battle. Get off your hose and kneel. I'm a man of mercy.", "I keep hearing stories about you, bastard. The way people in the North talk about you, you're the greatest swordsman who ever walked. Maybe you are that good. Maybe not. I don't know if I'd beat you. But I know that my army will beat yours. I have 6,000 men. You have, what, half that? Not even?", "He's good. Very good. Tell me, will you let your little brother die because you're too proud to surrender?", 'Now, if you want to save —', "She's a fine woman, your sister. I look forward to having her back in my bed. And you're all fine-looking men. My dogs are desperate to meet you. I haven't fed them for seven days. They're ravenous. I wonder which parts they'll try first. Your eyes? Your balls? We'll find out soon enough. In the morning, then, bastard.", "Do you like games, little man? Let's play a game. Run to your brother. The sooner you make it to him, the sooner you get to see him. That's it. That's the game. Easy. Ready? Go.", 'No, you have to run, remember? Those are the rules.', 'Now.', 'Loose!', "It's time, go.", "Their army's gone.", "We have Winterfell. They don't have the men for a siege. All we have to do is wait.", "You suggested one on one combat, didn't you?", "I've reconsidered. I think that sounds like a wonderful idea.", "Ah. Sansa. Hello, Sansa. Is this where I'll be staying now? No. Our time together is about to come to an end. That's all right. You can't kill me. I'm part of you now.", 'My hounds will never harm me.', "They're loyal beasts.", 'Sit. Down! Down! Down! Down! Down!']

Name: margaery tyrell
Sentence: ['Loras! Highgarden!', 'Now, now, my love. My brother fought valiantly for you.', "You are very welcome here, Lady Stark. I'm so sorry for your loss.", 'As is your right. You are a king.', 'Thank you, Your Grace.', "You think so? I can't decide how I like it better. This way, or this way.", 'Here, let me.', 'Do you want my brother to come in and help?', "He could get you started. I know he wouldn't mind. Or I can turn over and you can pretend I'm him.", "There's no need for us to play games. Save your lies for court. You're going to need a lot of them.", "Your enemies aren't happy about us. They want to tear us apart. And the best way to stop them is to put your baby in my belly. We can try again later. You decide how you want to do it, with me, with me and Loras, however else you like.", 'Whatever you need to do. You are a king.', 'Lord Baelish.', "It would be my pleasure. It took me weeks to learn my way around the camp. Twice I walked in on officers in stages of undress. And the moment I learn which tent is mine, we're on the move again.", 'I am not tutored in warfare, but basic arithmetic favors the side with the greater numbers.', "The place of a Kingsguard is by the king's side.", 'You seem quite interested in our marriage.', "You've never married, have you?", "That is sad. Though perhaps it's for the best. The whole notion of marriage seems to confuse you, so allow me to explain. My husband is my king, and my king is my husband. Here is your tent, Lord Baelish. Good night.", 'We need to go home. Loras.', "There's no time for this.", 'Brienne of Tarth murdered Renly.', "You can't stay here.", "You can't avenge him from the grave. Bring the horses. Please.", 'He was very handsome.', 'Your Grace." Calling yourself king doesn\'t make you one. And if Renly wasn\'t a king, I wasn\'t a queen.', 'No. I want to be the queen.', 'With all my heart, Your Grace. I have come to love you from afar. Tales of your courage and wisdom have never been far from my ears. And those tales have taken root deep inside of me.', 'Why?', 'Pardon me.', 'I have others.', 'And your mother?', 'Bad men wanted to come into this city and do terrible things, but your father stopped them.', 'Whenever you look at this knight, I want you to remember your father.', 'And what do knights swear to do? Protect the weak and uphold the good. Your father did that. Be proud of him.', 'Was your father a soldier, too?', "You should be proud, too. Under King Joffrey's leadership, your fathers saved the city. They saved us all. From now on, we're going to take care of you. All of you.", 'Come to me for whatever you need to feed them, clothe them, or house them. Directly to me.', 'Your Grace.', 'The climate is a bit more forgiving back in Highgarden, Your Grace.', "I am touched by your concern, Your Grace. Luckily for us Tyrells, our blood runs quite warm. Doesn't it, Loras?", "Loras, isn't the queen's gown magnificent? The fabric, the embroidery, the metalwork. I've never seen anything like it.", 'Yes. I paid a visit to an orphanage the High Septon told me about.', 'The lowest among us are no different from the highest if you give them a chance and approach them with an open heart.', "Hunger turns men into beasts. I'm glad House Tyrell has been able to help in this regard. They tell me 100 wagons arrive daily now from the Reach. Wheat, barley, apples. We've had a blessed harvest. And, of course, it's our duty to assist the capital in time of need.", "It's more your color. You take it.", "You're such a dear.", 'Come. Lady Sansa, it is my honor to present my grandmother the Lady Olenna of House Tyrell.', 'Renly was brave and gentle, Grandmother. Father liked him and so did Loras.', 'Grandmother! What will Sansa think of us?', "I'm to be his wife. I only want to know what that means.", "She's terrified, Grandmother. Just look at her.", 'You wanted to see me, Your Grace?', "That's very thoughtful, Your Grace. I have everything I could want.", 'A welcome one. A military encampment is no place for a lady.', 'Your Grace, I tried to do my duty as a wife, that is all.', 'The duty of any wife to any husband-to provide him with children.', 'Why? I-I would not speak ill of the dead, Your Grace.', "No. I do beg your pardon. The subtleties of politics are often lost on me. Renly I don't believe he was interested in the company of women.", "Whenever I wanted to make a child with him, he-he had so many excuses, so many late-night war councils. He never wanted to try. Except one evening, after he'd had far too much wine to drink, he suggested something-something that sounded very painful and couldn't possibly result in children. Maybe the fault was with me.", "It's such a relief to hear you say so, Your Grace.", 'As is your right. You must do whatever you need to do.', 'You are the king.', "It's beautiful. Will you show me how it works?", 'Would you take me hunting sometime? Forgive me, Your Grace. I know a hunt is no place for a woman.', 'My father would never let me before-', 'May I? Please.', 'I imagine it must be so exciting to squeeze your finger here and watch something die over there.', "I don't know, Your Grace Do you think I could?", 'Would you like to watch me?', "I'll plant the seed as soon as Joffrey and I are married. It should grow quickly.", 'And only one to let you go. Because it will please me.', 'Come on. Come walk with me.', "I remember the first time I saw you in the throne room. I'd never seen anyone who looked so unhappy. I want very much for you to be happy, Sansa, and so does my grandmother.", 'You would have been happy at Highgarden. But women in our position must make the best of our circumstances.', 'Has Lord Tyrion mistreated you?', 'Has he been kind to you?', "You don't want him, though.", "Far from the worst Lannister, wouldn't you say?", "My son will be king Sons learn from their mothers. I plan to teach mine a great deal. And your son, if I'm not mistaken, your son might be the Lord of Casterly Rock and the North someday. What?", "If it's the pain you're worried about-", "What is it, then? He's rather good-looking even with the scar. Especially with the scar.", "Some women like tall men. Some like short men. Some like hairy men. Some like bald men. Gentle men, rough men, ugly men, pretty men, pretty girls. Most women don't know what they like until they've tried it. And, sadly, so many of us get to try so little before we're old and gray. Tyrion may surprise you. From what I've heard, he's quite experienced.", "It can be. We're very complicated, you know. Pleasing us takes practice.", 'Yes, sweet girl. My mother taught me.', 'You look radiant, Your Grace.', "It's the word that came to mind.", "We're going to be sisters soon. We should be friends.", "A better dancer than a singer, I'm afraid.", 'Of course. They play it so often here at court.', "Not as well as you, I'm sure.", 'Gone.', "The wedding is in a fortnight, Grandmother. You can't say no to everything.", 'Perhaps I should just let Joffrey choose it for me. End up with a string of dead sparrow heads around my neck.', 'A shadow?', 'Joffrey is our king now.', "And you've given none.", "My love, why don't we make the announcement?", 'We are so fortunate to enjoy this marvelous food and drink. Not all among us are so lucky. To thank the gods for bringing the recent war to a just end, King Joffrey has decreed that the leftovers from our feast be given to the poorest in his city.', 'Lady Brienne. So good of you to come.', "That's not true, my love. Brienne had nothing to do with it.", 'Thank you. I hope we see more of you.', "My love, come back to me. It's time for my father's toast.", 'Look, the pie.', 'Wonderful. Wonderful. My hero.', "He's choking!", 'So am I the queen?', 'Clawing at his own throat, looking to his mother to make stop... it was horrible.', 'What was it like?', 'One of my husbands preferred the company of men and was stabbed through the heart. Another was happiest torturing animals and was poisoned at our wedding feast... I must be cursed.', 'But I would have been the queen.', "I can't believe you're going. Leaving me alone here with these people.", 'No. Have they even agreed to the match? No one tells me anything.', 'Mm-hmm.', 'Well, he could have done.', "You don't know, Grandmother.", "What? I don't understand.", 'Kingsguard.', "I'm not a visitor, Your Grace. Word has itI'm to be your bride.", "Did you know that people in arranged marriages often never meet until their wedding day? Before we decide to spend our lives together, we ought to get to know one another. Don't you think?", "It can be our secret. Hmm? If we're going to be man and wife, we'll have a few secrets from her, I hope. So, Your Grace...", "Hello. Aren't you a proper fellow?", 'Very handsome.', "That's very cruel. You don't strike me as cruel.", "That's a relief. Because you know what happens when we marry?", "When we marry, I become yours. Forever. It's getting late. I should go. May I come and visit you again? All right, then.", 'Remember, our little secret.', 'Your Grace.', 'Long may he reign.', 'He sits the throne like he was born to it.', "No, he wasn't.", 'He was my husband. My king.', 'Your Grace, I feel...', 'No.', "It would be some consolation, wouldn't it? For all the horror that put him there.", 'He has you.', "Oh. After all that's happened... It sounds strange, I know, but I am... I haven't even given any thought to it, what comes next. It would be a great honor, of course. But I will have to speak to my father about it.", 'We may be faced with an alarming number of weddings soon.', "I won't even know what to call you. Sister? Or Mother? Hmm.", "We're late for dinner as it is.", "I'm very hungry.", "What's your name?", "I'm afraid my brother is keeping the king waiting, Olyvar.", 'Perhaps you might consider being a bit more discreet?', "In any event… you shouldn't keep your intended waiting.", 'Lucky you.', 'You think I want that woman married to my brother?', 'Perhaps.', 'Perhaps?', 'I am his/hers, and she/he is mine. From this day, until the end of my days.', 'No. You were lovely.', 'Yes. .', "No, no, no. You're very sweet. The sweetest king who ever lived.", "Wouldn't that be glorious? . Shouldn't we rest a little while? Just to catch our breath, there's no rush, is there?", "No, I'm fine. I just want you all to myself. I want to know everything there is to know about King Tommen First of His Name.", 'So strange… Husband.', "I understand. But it's not your fault, you know that, don't you? You mustn't feel guilty.", 'I love to sail.', "I think we're going to be very happy, you and I.", "Living in a tower so high, it touches the clouds. Of course my grandmother couldn't wait to go home. The capital is not for everyone, I suppose. Does your mother like it here?", "It's so wonderful to have her watching over you. A lioness guiding her cub. .", "You are. And the king. . But you'll always be her baby-boy.", "I adore how she has always been so generous with me, so kind. And the horror she's had to injure. . Losing her husband, her eldest child and her father. It's no wonder she's so protective of you. She'll never let you out of her sight.", 'I said, "Darling, surely 4 times is enough, are you trying to set a new record?" . And he said, "Well, what is the record? I\'m sure we can break it."', 'Mother! . Welcome.', "Can we bring you anything to eat or drink? I wish we had some wine for you. It's a bit early in the day for us.", 'You are very sweet.', "I absolutely adore him. You raised a gallant young man. I'm forever grateful.", 'Ecstatic. I really am. Exhausted, to be honest, but what can I expect, he is half lion, half stag. .', "Oh, forgive me, I haven't been at Court for long, I get so confused. What's the proper way to address you now? Queen Mother or Dowager Queen?", "In any event, judging from the King's enthusiasm, the Queen Mother will be a Queen Grandmother soon.", "Can you imagine the celebrations? They'll ring the bells all day and night.", 'Why is my brother in a cell?', 'We both know who did. . You told me she was returning to Casterly Rock.', "She's jealous you're not hers anymore. Arresting my brother is her revenge.", 'Oh, my sweet, sweet King. . Do you have any affection for me at all?', "I can't bear to think of my brother locked away in some grimy cell.", 'Do you promise?', "You're the King of the Andals, the Lord of the Seven Kingdoms, the Protector of the Realm. And you let a band of fanatics imprison your brother by law.", 'Are you? When?', "You don't know?", 'I have to send word to Grandmother.', 'I need to be with my family, Your Grace. .', 'Everyone knew about him and Renly.', "But he was the king's brother.", 'Cersei is behind this.', 'You call me forward?', 'I am the queen.', 'They are lies.', 'All of them.', 'Yes, I swear it.', 'What?', 'Tommen! Tommen!', "You can't do this, I am the queen! Tommen, Tommen! I am your queen, how dare you!", 'I know you did this.', "Lies come easily to you. Everyone knows that. But innocence, decency, concern? You're not very good at those, I'm afraid. Perhaps that's why your son was so eager to cast you aside for me.", "I don't want to see you again.", 'Leave.', 'Get out you hateful bitch!', "I'd like to see my brother", 'Please How is he? At least tell me that', 'I am the queen and I demand to see my brother', 'My brother, can you tell me how he is?', 'I have nothing to confess', 'None of us are', "I'd go to my brother, my husband, my family", 'Quality takes time', 'And one day you walked through a graveyard and realized it was all for nothing and set out on the path to righteousness Book of the Stranger, verse 25', 'Septa Unella reads it to me At me', 'So what did you do?', 'Who?', "enters her brother's cell. The door closes and locks behind her. Loras is lying on the floor.", 'Loras. Loras.', 'helps LORAS to his knees. He cries.', 'Listen to me. You need to stay strong.', 'You are strong. You are the future of our house, the future of our family.', "Shh. Have you -- have you told them that? That you don't care?", "They want me to help you. They want me told help tear you down. That's why he's letting me see you, I know it is. And if either of us give in to what they want, then they win.", 'All right.', 'No, Your Grace.', "We'll be together again soon and everything will be better than it was before.", 'Have you spoken to him at all, the High Sparrow?', "Yes, I have. He's not quite what we thought he was, is he?", "You think I'm mad. I sound mad.", "He is. There's something about him. His way of looking at the world. It's not an easy thing admitting to yourself what you really are. It's taken me a while. He's helped me.", "Ah, yes, I visited their hovels and I fed them soup and I made sure I was seen doing it. I never gave them what they really needed, though. I've had lots of time to think about how good I was at seeming good. All those stories I told myself about who I was and why I did the things I did. There were so many lies in those stories.", "It's all right. It really is. It's such a relief to let go of those lies.", "I love my brother. I will always love my brother. His soul is pure and perfect. His sins don't erase that purity, they only obscure it. He just needs to atone for them. We all do. Sooner or later, one way or another. The gods have a plan for us all.", 'The Book of the Mother, Your Holiness. Chapter three, verse 12.', "Smoothing what was jagged, so does a woman's love calm a man's brute nature. A wife salves her husbando s wounds, a mother sings her son to sleep.”", 'For year I pretended to love the poor, the afflicted. I had pity for them, but I never loved them. They disgusted me.', 'Of course.', 'No.', "It's just...the desires that once drove me no longer do.", 'Forgive me. Sometimes the truth path is hard to find.', 'My grandmother?', 'Septa Unella has been my true friend and counselor.', 'Grandmother.', 'Grandmother, please.', 'You marched against the High Sparrow, against the Faith.', "The gods could have punished you and Father, but they didn't. They showed mercy.", "Loras's only hope is to confess his crimes and repent. If he does, the Faith will allow him to return to Highgarden. He'll have to renounce his name and title...", 'and live his life as a penitent.', 'He can begin again.', 'As a free man.', 'I am the queen. It is my duty to serve my husband the king.', 'But you should leave, Grandmother. Your place is at home.', 'You must.', 'Go home. Find comfort in prayer and good works.', 'The Mother watches over us all.', 'Seven blessings to you, Grandmother.', 'Shall we pray?', 'Faith is the way, Father.', 'You mutilated him. You gave me your word.', 'And where is the queen mother?', "There's something wrong.", 'Cersei is not here. Tommen is not here. Why do you think they are not here?', "Forget about the bloody gods and listen to what I'm telling you. Cersei understands the consequences of her absence and she is absent anyway, which means she does not intend to suffer those consequences. The trial can wait. We all need to leave.", 'We all need to leave now!', 'Loras. Stay with me.', 'Let me through. Let me through. Get out of my way.', 'Let us through!']

Name: joffrey lannister
Sentence: ["Better-looking bitches than you're used to, Uncle. My mother's been looking for you. We ride for King's Landing today.", 'What good will my sympathies do them?', "The boy means nothing to me. And I can't stand the wailing of women.", "I'm telling mother!", "You can't...", "He speaks damn well with his sword though. Ser Ilyn Payne, the King's justice. The royal executioner. What is it, sweet lady? Does the hound frighten you? Away with you, dog. You're scaring my lady. I don't like to see you upset. The sun is finally shining. Come walk with me.", "My princess can drink as much as she wants. Don't worry... You're safe with me.", 'Your sister? And who are you, boy?', "A butcher's boy who wants to be a Knight, eh? Pick up your sword, butcher's boy. Let's see how good you are.", "I'm your prince, not your lord, and I said pick up your sword.", "And you're not a Knight. Only a butcher's boy. That was my lady's sister you were hitting, do you know that?", "I won't hurt him... Much. Filthy little bitch!", "I'll gut you, you little cunt!", "Please don't.", "Then go! Don't touch me.", 'Yes it is! They all attacked me and she threw my sword in the river.', 'Shut up!', "It's ugly.", "I'm not like him. I didn't fight off anything. It bit me and all I did was scream. And the two Stark girls saw it, both of them.", 'Do I have to marry her?', "I don't want to.", 'We allow the northerners too much power. They consider themselves our equals.', "I'd double their taxes and command them to supply 10,000 men to the royal army.", "Why should every lord command his own men? It's primitive, no better than the hill tribes. We should have a standing army of men loyal to the Crown, trained by experienced soldiers... Instead of a mob of peasants who've never held pikes in their lives.", "I'd crush them. Seize Winterfell and install someone loyal to the realm as Warden of the North. Uncle Kevan, maybe.", "For me. I'm their King.", "I'm not asking.", 'So you agree... The Starks are enemies?', 'My lady. I fear I have behaved monstrously the past few weeks. With your permission?', "You'll be queen one day, it's only fitting that you should look the part. Will you forgive me for my rudeness?", "You're my lady. One day we'll be married in the throne room. Lords and ladies from all over the Seven Kingdoms will come, from the last hearth in the North, to the salt shore of the south. And you will be queen over all of them. I'll never disrespect you again. I'll never be cruel to you again. Do you understand me? You're my lady now, from this day, until my last day.", "My mother wishes me to let Lord Eddard join The Night's Watch. Stripped of all titles and powers, he would serve the realm in permanent exile. And My Lady Sansa has begged mercy for her father. But they have the soft hearts of women. So long as I am your King, treason shall never go unpunished. Ser Ilyn, bring me his head!", "Very amusing. lsn't it a funny song? Thank you for your rendition. l imagine it was even better received at that tavern.", 'Tell me, which do you favor - your fingers or your tongue?', 'Fingers or your tongue? lf you got to keep one, which would it be? Or l could just cut your throat.', 'Good. Tongue it is.', 'Ser llyn, who better than you to carry out the sentence?', "l'm done for the day. l'll leave the rest of the matters to you, Mother.", 'You look quite nice.', "Your Grace. l'm King now.", 'Walk with me. l want to show you something.', "And as soon as you've had your blood, l'll put a son in you. Mother says that shouldn't be long.", "This one's your father. This one here. Look at it and see what happens to traitors.", 'l was. l gave him a clean death. Look at him.', "Mother says l'm still to marry you. So you'll stay here, and obey. Look at him!", 'Well?', 'As long as it pleases me. Do you want to see the rest?', "That's your Septa there. l'll tell you what, l'm going to give you a present. After l raise my armies and kill your traitor brother, l'm going to give you his head as well.", "Will you obey now? Or do you need another lesson? l'll look for you in court.", 'My lords. Shall we begin?', 'Well struck… Well struck, Dog.', 'Did you like that?', 'I already said it was well struck.', "Who's next?", 'Are you drunk?', "Two cups? . That's not much at all. . Please, have another cup.", 'Yes, to celebrate my name day. Have two, have as much as you like.', 'Ser Meryn, help Ser Dontos celebrate my name day. See that he drinks his fill.', "What did you say? Did you say I can't?", "What kind of stupid peasant's superstition...", "Take him away. I'll have him killed tomorrow, the fool.", "Did you hear My Lady, Ser Dontos? . From this day, , you'll be my new fool.", "I've been here, ruling the kingdoms.", 'We heard you were dead.', 'Her loss? Her father was a confessed traitor!', 'What work? . Why are you here?', 'Returning this room to its proper appearance. Say what you will about the Targaryens, they were conquerors. That is a seat for a conqueror. It needs a room to match it, not vines and flowers.', "With luck, she's dead in a ditch somewhere.", "I think they might. They're weak. They put too much value on their women. .", "The King does not ask; He commands. And my grandfather's stupidity in the field of battle is the reason Robb Stark has Uncle Jaime in the first place.", "We're at war. All our lives are in danger. I heard a disgusting lie about Uncle Jaime. And you.", "It's not a claim. The throne is mine.", 'Someone believes it. Father had other children? Besides me and Tommen and Myrcella?', "I'm asking if he fucked other women when he grew tired of you. How many bastards does he have running -", 'What you just did is punishable by death. You will never do it again. Never. . That will be all, Mother.', 'I heard a disgusting lie about uncle Jaime… and you. Father had other children?', 'How many bastards does he have running around?', "You're here to answer for your brother's latest treasons.", 'Ser Lancel, tell her of this outrage.', 'Killing you would send your brother a message.', "But my mother insists on keeping you alive. Stand. So we'll have to send your brother a message some other way. Meryn.", 'Leave her face. I like her pretty.', 'Meryn, my lady is overdressed. Unburden her.', "If you want Robb Stark to hear us, we're going to have to speak louder.", "I'm punishing her.", "You can't talk to me like that. The king can do as he likes!", 'What are you doing here, dog?', 'And? What is it?', 'My nameday has passed.', 'No. Her. Touch her.', 'Could you hit her?', 'My uncle sent you?', 'Use this.', 'Harder.', "I said harder. He'd want me to get his money's worth.", "Oh, I want him to find out. You will bring her to his chambers when you're finished and show him what you've done, or the same thing will happen to you.", 'Begin.', 'Harder!', "You sound like a little cat mewling for his mother. Princes don't cry.", 'Did you say something, my lady?', 'So?', 'Is your little brother a prince?', 'Not really relevant then, is it? Come, dog.', 'Who threw that? I want the man who threw that. Find who did that and bring him to me!', 'Just kill them! Kill them all!', 'What are you doing? I want these people executed!', "Traitors! I'll have all their heads.", "You can't insult me.", "You can't-", 'They attacked me!', "You're talking to a king!", 'Let them have her!', "You're the Master of Whisperers. You're supposed to know everything.", 'The Stark forces are distracted. Now is the time to strike.', "If my Uncle Stannis lands on the shores of King's Landing, I'll ride out to greet him.", "They say Stannis never smiles. I'll give him a red smile from ear to ear.", 'Sansa.', 'Sansa, come here.', 'Your king rides forth to battle. You should see him off with a kiss.', "My new blade. Hearteater, I've named it. Kiss it.", "You'll kiss it again when I return and taste my uncle's blood.", 'If Stannis is fool enough to come near me.', "A king doesn't discuss battle plans with stupid girls.", "Your brother's turn will come. Then you can lick his blood off Hearteater, too.", "Why isn't it here now? They're coming.", 'Hound, tell the Hand that his king has asked him a question.', "If I tell the Hound to cut you in half, he'll do it without a second thought.", 'There they are.', 'What are you doing? We need to attack them.', "There's only one ship. Where are the rest of them? Where are the rest of them?", "They're coming. They're coming ashore.", 'There are too many.', 'Dog, I command you to go back out there and fight!', 'What would you have me do?', 'What did my mother say exactly? Did she have urgent business with me?', 'Ser Boros, Ser Mandon, stay with my uncle and represent the king on the field of battle.', 'I, Joffrey of the House Baratheon, first of my name, the rightful King of the Andals and the First Men, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm, do hereby proclaim my grandfather, Tywin Lannister, the savior of the city and the Hand of the King.', 'Lord Petyr Baelish, step forward.', 'For your good service and ingenuity in uniting the Houses of Lannister and Tyrell, I declare that you shall be granted the castle of Harrenhal with all its attendant lands and incomes to be held by your sons and grandsons from this day until the end of time.', 'Ser Loras Tyrell.', 'Your house has come to our aid. The whole realm is in your debt, none more so than I. If your family would ask anything of me, ask it, and it shall be yours.', 'Is this what you want, Lady Margaery?', 'I, too, have heard tales of your beauty and grace, but the tales do not do you justice, my lady. It would be an honor to return your love, but I am promised to another. A king must keep his word.', 'I would like to heed your wishes and the wishes of my people, but I took a holy vow.', 'The gods are good. I am free to heed my heart. Ser Loras, I will gladly wed your sweet sister. You will be my queen and I will love you from this day until my last day.', 'Why have we stopped?', 'What is she doing? Who gave her permission?', 'No.', "Please, sit. Sit. I do apologize, my lady. Small council meetings. At what point does it become treason to waste the king's time?", "That's a lovely gown, my lady.", 'Shall I have them bring you a shawl, my lady?', "My mother's always had a penchant for drama. Facts become less and less important to her as she grows older. Our lives were never truly in danger.", "Well, as Ser Loras said, Lady Margaery has done this sort of... charitable work before. I'm sure she knows what she's doing.", 'Make it tighter here.', 'No flowers. I said no flowers. All these are wrong. Bring others.', 'Bloody flowers. On the king.', 'Who?', "She's an ideal match. With the Tyrells beside us, we'll crush the Northerners. Hang their lords, burn their strongholds, sow their fields with salt, and no one will think of rebelling for another century.", 'Yes, she is.', 'Not to me.', "This is becoming one of the most boring conversations I've ever had.", "She married Renly Baratheon because she was told to. That's what intelligent women do-what they're told.", "I don't need to do anything.", 'Better. Much better.', 'Send her in.', "I'm leaving on a hunting trip. I just wanted to make sure you had everything you need before I left.", "Good. Good. How are you finding life in the capital? It must be quite a change after Renly's camp.", 'And the bedside of a traitor? Is that a place for a lady?', 'What was your duty to this traitor as you saw it?', 'You failed to do this.', "You think one ought to speak kindly of a traitor merely because he's had a sword put through his heart?", 'What makes you say this?', 'No, he was a known degenerate.', "Mmm. I've considered making his perversion punishable by death.", 'Yes. I am.', 'Do you like it? I just had it made. Probably one of the finest weapons in the Seven Kingdoms.', "It's a new design. Much easier to load. There's no crank. You use this lever to draw the string.", 'The bolt goes here.', 'And then you just aim and-', "It's not unheard of.", 'You no longer belong to him. Do you want to hold it?', 'Could you do it? Could you kill something?.', 'Yes.', 'Grandfather.', "Yes. I'd like a report on the meetings of my small council.", "I've been very busy. Many important matters require a king's attention.", "You've been holding the council meetings in the Tower of the Hand instead of the small council chamber.", 'May I ask why?', 'So if I wanted to attend a council meeting, I would now have to climb all the stairs in the Tower of the Hand?', 'Tell me about the Targaryen girl in the east and her dragons.', 'Is it true?', "Don't you think we ought to do something about it?", 'And the biggest was the size of a carriage.', 'But how do we know these dragons are just curiosities and not the beasts that brought the whole world to heel?', "But I haven't been counseled.", 'I should be consulted about such things.', "Your father's gone. As the father of the realm, it is my duty to give you away to your husband.", "I've got a lifetime for that.", 'Congratulations, my lady.', "Well, you've done it. You've married a Lannister. Soon you'll have a Lannister baby. It's a dream come true for you, isn't it? What a glorious day.", "I suppose it doesn't really matter which Lannister puts the baby into you. Maybe I'll pay you a visit tonight after my uncle passes out. How'd you like that?", "You wouldn't? That's all right. Ser Meryn and Ser Boros will hold you down.", 'Time for the bedding ceremony.', "Where's your respect for tradition, Uncle? Come, everyone. Pick her up and carry her to her wedding bed. Get rid of her gown. She won't be needing it any longer. Ladies, attend to my uncle. He's not heavy.", 'There will be if I command it.', 'What did you say? What did you say?', 'Show him. Come on, show him.', "Robb Stark is dead. And his bitch mother. Write back to Lord Frey. Thank him for his service and command him to send Robb Stark's head. I'm going to serve it to Sansa at my wedding feast.", "Yes, I did. I'm going to have it served to Sansa at my wedding feast.", "Everyone is mine to torment. You'd do well to remember that, you little monster.", 'I could have your tongue out for saying that.', 'I am the king! I will punish you.', 'My father won the real war. He killed Prince Rhaegar. He took the crown while you hid under Casterly Rock!', "I'm not tired.", "I'm not tired!", 'Yes, yes, one guard at the... the thing. Go on.', 'By my leave. They know I saved the city. They know I won the war.', "I broke Stannis on the Blackwater. Pity you weren't there to help, Uncle.", 'Busy getting captured.', 'Ser Jaime Lannister.', 'Someone forgot to write down all your great deeds.', 'Is there? For a 40-year-old knight with one hand? How can you protect me with that?', 'A handsome goblet, my lord. Or shall I call you Father?', 'A book?', 'Now that the war is won, we should all find time for wisdom. Thank you, Uncle.', 'So they say.', 'Such a great sword should have a name. What shall I call her?', "Widow's Wail. I like that. Every time I use it, it'll be like cutting off Ned Stark's head all over again.", 'With this kiss, I pledge my love.', 'Very good. Very good. Off you go.', 'Everyone. The queen would like to say a few words.', "You're the one who put a sword through Renly Baratheon.", "A shame. I'd knight the man that put an end to that deviant's life.", 'Yes, yes.', "A gold dragon to whoever knocks my fool's hat off.", "Everyone, silence! Clear the floor. There's been too much amusement here today. A royal wedding is not an amusement. A royal wedding is history. The time has come for all of us to contemplate our history. My lords... my ladies...", 'I give you. King Joffrey... Renly, Stannis, Robb Stark, Balon Greyjoy. The War of the Five Kings.', "Well fought. Well fought. Here you are. Champion's purse. Though you're not the champion yet, are you? A true champion defeats all the challengers. Surely there are others out there who still dare to challenge my reign. Uncle. How about you? I'm sure they have a spare costume.", 'It did not spill.', "Well, how does he expect me to toast without wine? Uncle, you can be my cup-bearer seeing as you're too cowardly to fight.", "It's not meant as an honor.", 'Bring me my goblet.', 'What good is an empty cup? Fill it.', 'Kneel. Kneel before your king.', 'Kneel. I said... kneel!', 'My queen.', "Uncle. Where are you going? You're my cup-bearer, remember?", "No, no, no. No, you're perfect the way you are. Serve me my wine.", 'Well, hurry up. This pie is dry.', 'Mm, good. Needs washing down.', "No. No, you'll wait here... un...", "It's nothing."]

Name: melisandre
Sentence: ['Lord of Light, come to us in our darkness. We offer you these false Gods.', 'Take them and cast your light upon us. For the night is dark and full of terrors.', 'After the long summer, darkness will fall heavy on the world. Stars will bleed.', 'The cold breath of winter will freeze the seas.', 'And the dead shall rise in the North.', 'You smell of fear, fear and piss and old bones. Do you want to stop me? Stop me.', "In the ancient books, it's written that a warrior will draw a burning sword from the fire. And that sword shall be Lightbringer. Stannis Baratheon, warrior of light, your sword awaits you.", 'For the night is dark and full of terrors.', 'Stannis does not need to beg this lord or that lord for support. The Lord of Light stands behind him.', 'He has no need for ships.', 'The night is dark and full of terrors, old man, but the fire burns them all away. Your Grace.', 'The Lord of Light shines through you, young warrior.', 'I told him death by fire is the purest death.', "Because it is true. You're troubled my king.", 'These armies are but toys for the Lord of Light.', 'I tell him nothing! I pray for his commands and I obey.', 'You must have faith.', 'Then we must be the ten.', 'I have seen the path to victory in the flames. At first, you must give yourself to the Lord of Light.', 'You must give... all of yourself.', "She's sick. Weak. Shut away in the tower. And she disgusts you. And she's given you nothing. No sons. Only stillborns. Only death. . I will give you a son, my King.", 'The king has taken for his sigil the fiery heart of the Lord of Light.', "You should kneel before your brother. He's the Lordo s chosen, born amidst salt and smoke.", 'Look to your sins, Lord Renly. The night is dark and full of terrors.', 'Are you afraid, Onion Knight?', "You've carried more unpleasant cargo in your time. Are you a good man, Ser Davos Seaworth?", "If half an onion is black with rot, it's a rotten onion. A man is good or he is evil.", "Oh, good. I'm a knight myself, of sorts, a champion of light and life.", 'Do you love your wife?', 'Yet you have known other women.', "I'm not. I'm talking about other women. Like me, Ser Davos. You want me. You want to see what's beneath this robe.", 'And you will.', 'Shadows cannot live in the dark, Ser Davos. They are servants of light, the children of fire. And the brighter the flame, the darker they are.', "They can't bar our passage.", "There's only one god, Ser Davos, and he only protects those who serve him.", 'l I did. I still see it.', 'The Lord of Light only allows me glimpses.', "Will you quit the war just because you've lost a battle?", "I've been fighting far longer than you.", 'Inside you.', 'We murdered him. Share the weight with me.', 'This war has just begun. It will last for years. Thousands will die at your command. You will betray the men serving you. You will betray your family. You will betray everything you once held dear. And it will all be worth it because you are the Son of Fire. You are the Warrior of Light. You will sweep aside this pretender and that one. You will be king.', 'Let me show you.', 'Look into the fire, my king. Look.', 'Keep looking. Do you see? Do you see, my king?', 'How would you punish the infidels, Ser Davos?', "I'm not your enemy.", "Was it me you fought on Blackwater Bay? Did I set your ships ablaze? I wasn't there when the wildfire killed our men by the thousands. I could have saved those men. You would have taken the city, Stannis would now sit upon his rightful throne, and you would stand beside him. But I wasn't there because you convinced your king to leave me behind. Do you hear them screaming? All those burning men in the water crying for their mothers, for their gods for help? Until the moment the Blackwater swallowed them.", "Don't despair, Ser Davos. What I told your son is true.", 'Death by fire is the purest death.', "You've chosen the darkness, Ser Davos.", 'I will pray for you.', "I don't know yet. The fires will show me.", "I don't know.", 'I will never abandon you. You are the Son of Fire. I am sworn to serve you.', 'When I return, you will understand.', 'I cannot.', "You don't have the strength. It would kill you.", 'Your fires burn low, my king.', 'There is another way. A better way.', 'Yes.', 'You are. But there are others with your blood in their veins. You will sit on the Iron Throne, but first there must be sacrifices. The Lord of Light demands it.', 'We come as friends.', 'Valar morghulis.', 'You are Thoros of Myr.', 'The High Priest gave you a mission. Turn King Robert away from his idols and towards the Lord of Light. What happened?', 'You quit, you mean. The heathen continue to slaughter each other and you continue to get drunk.', 'How many times has the Lord brought him back?', "That's not possible.", 'You should not have this power.', "You've been to the other side.", 'You have someone He needs.', "You are more than they can ever be. They're just foot soldiers in the great war. You will make kings rise and fall.", "I see a darkness in you. And in that darkness, eyes staring back at me- brown eyes, blue eyes, green eyes. Eyes you'll shut forever. We will meet again.", 'Wildfire. I should have been here.', 'Do you miss it?', "Your father's house.", "Haven't you ever wondered where your strength came from? Your talent for fighting?", 'Mine was a slave. So was I. Bought and sold, scourged and branded, until the Lord of Light reached down, took me in his hand and raised me up.', 'Your blood is noble.', "There. Your father's house.", "The bastard of Robert of the House Baratheon, First of His Name, King of the Andals and the First Men. Why do you think the gold cloaks wanted you? There is power in a king's blood.", "Show the boy to his chambers. Have the maids draw him a bath and find him some decent clothes. I'll come visit you soon.", 'You know what I mean to do with him.', 'Have you ever slaughtered a lamb, my king?', 'If the lamb sees the knife, she panics. Her panic seeps into her meat, darkens it, fouls the flavor.', 'And none have seen the blade.', 'Have you ever seen one like it?', "It's shocking, isn't it, the first time you encounter real wealth? When I was your age, I lived on one bowl of stew a day. And stew is a kind word for it.", 'Here, taste this.', "You think I'm trying to poison you?", "Where do you think it's from?", "Doesn't matter, does it? It's the real thing or it's not. You only need a tongue to tell the difference. Go on, have some more. You still don't trust it. You think this is all a mistake and that you'll have to pay somehow for every bite you take.", 'There are no mistakes. Not for us.', "Your father chose your mother because the Lord of Light willed it. He willed it so you could be here right now with a power inside you you can't even begin to understand. And He brought me here to draw it from you and birth it into the world. We're both a part of His plan. He wants this for us. No, He demands this of us.", "According to whom? The Silent Sisters? With their stern looks, muzzled mouths, and dried-up cunts? What have their gods done for you? Hmm? When you pray to them, what's their answer? A god is real or he's not. You only need eyes to see.", 'Death is coming for everyone and everything. A darkness that will swallow the dawn. And we can stop it, you and I.', 'Let me show you what you have inside you. Come fight death with me.', 'You have to trust me.', "Don't fight, don't fight. They won't take much.", "I told you there's power in the blood of kings. And you have so much blood.", "You can blame Ser Davos. He didn't believe in the power of king's blood. He wanted a demonstration.", 'I take no credit. I have faith and my faith has been rewarded.', 'And our king is still no closer to the Iron Throne. A great gift requires a great sacrifice.', "Your mercy saved the boy's life. You feel good about that?", 'You saved one innocent. How many tens of thousands have you doomed?', 'Take him away.', 'My king.', 'This War of Five Kings means nothing.
