The true war lies to the north, my king. Death marches on the Wall. Only you can stop him.', "He's right. You need him. He has a part to play in the war to come.", 'Hear us now. Accept these tokens of our faith, my lord, and lead us from the darkness.', 'Lord of Light, show us the way...', 'Lord of Light, protect us, for the night is dark and full of terrors.', "It's all I knew when I was a child.", 'Until he found me.', 'Every mother should fear for her childo s soul.', 'Were you sleeping, Princess?', 'Did you watch the ceremony on the beach?', 'And it frightened you?', "They're in a better place now, Princess. The fire cleansed them of the sins of the world.", 'Women scream when they give birth. Afterward they are filled with joy.', "You have so many questions, don't you? So did I when I was a child. I was much like you. Only I wasn't a princess.", 'No. But I suffered in other ways, sweet girl, believe me. What do you know of the gods?', 'Lies and fables. Septons speak of seven gods. There are but two... a god of light and love and joy and a god of darkness, evil, and fear. Eternally at war.', "There's only one hell, Princess. The one we live in now.", 'Come in, my queen. Please.', 'You could never disturb me.', 'Could you bring me that vial over there? The blue one.', "No, no, no. Not that one. You don't even want to touch that one. Next to it. That's the one.", 'When I looked into the flames this morning, the Lord spoke to me. He said, "Tonight, you will have your last good bath in a long while. Make it count." A joke. Not a very good one, I\'m afraid.', "That's because most jokes are lies and you're devoted to the truth.", 'Not always.', "Most of these powders and potions are lies. Deceptions to make men think they witnessed our Lordo s power. Once they step into his light, they will see the lie for what it was-- a trick that lead them to the truth. A pinch of this powder in a bonfire will send a flaming column screaming towards the sky. And this one creates a black smoke that will make the bravest man piss himself with fear. And a drop of this in any man's wine will drive him wild with lust.", "No. Don't be upset. Men never crave what they already have.", "It's only flesh. It needs what it needs.", 'I understand how you feel.', 'But that is impossible.', "You don't need powders and potions, my queen. You don't need lies. You are strong enough to look into the Lordo s light and see his truth for yourself.", "However harsh it is. However hard for us to understand. You don't need my help, but I will need yours soon. When we set sail, your daughter must be with us. The Lord needs her.", 'The king wants a word.', 'Never. The Lordo s fire lives within me, Jon Snow.', 'Feel.', 'Are you a virgin?', 'Good.', 'Your grace. The bastard of Winterfell.', 'Man or woman, young or old, lord or peasant, our choices are the same. We choose light, or we choose darkness. We choose good, or we choose evil. We choose the true god or the false.', 'Free folk, there is only one true king, and his name is Stannis. Here stands the king of lies. Behold the fate of those who choose the darkness.', 'Those scars mean nothing to the Lord of Light.', "Her father is the Lordo s chosen King. And her father's blood runs through her veins.", 'You march on Winterfell soon?', "Once before you put your faith in Ser Davos and left me behind. I hope you won't make that mistake again.", 'You only need faith, my King.', 'To serve my Lord.', 'Lord Commander.', "Come with us when we ride south. . None of us know the castle as well as you do. Its hidden tunnels, its weaknesses, its people. Winterfell was your home once. Don't you want to chase the rats out of it? .", "There's only one war. Life against death. Come. Let me show what you're fighting for. .", 'No visions. No magic. Just life.', "Do you feel my heart beating? This power in you, you resist it, and that's your mistake. Embrace it.", 'The Lord of Light made us male and female. Two parts of a greater whole. We are joining this power. Power to make life, power to make light, and power to cast shadows.', "Then we shouldn't tell him. .", 'Why?', "The dead don't need lovers. Only the living.", 'You know nothing, Jon Snow.', 'You saw it yourself, my king, when you stared into the flames. A great battle in the snow.', 'You do know. Trust yourself.', 'I trust in the Lord.', 'I have seen myself walk along the battlements of Wintefell. I have seen the flayed men banners lowered to the ground.', "But sometimes sacrifices must be made to ensure victory. I have shown you the power of king's blood. The Usurper Robb Stark. The Usurper Joffrey Baratheon.", 'No, we have someone better, and your blood runs through her veins.', "Do you doubt me still? After all that you've seen?", 'There is only one way. You must become king before the Long Night begins. Only you can lead the living against the dead. All your life has led us to this moment. To this decision.', 'It will all be over soon, Princess.', 'The year is now, my Lord. For you we offer up this girl, that you may cleanse her with your fire and that its light may lead our way.', 'Accept this token of our faith, my lord and lead us from the darkness. Lord of Light show us the way!', 'Lord of Light protect us, for the night is dark and full of terrors!', 'The Lord of Light has made good on his promise, my king. His fires have melted the snows away. The way ahead is clear.', 'And you will take it. The Lord has shown me Bolton banners burning. You will receive what is yours by right.', 'Ser Davos', 'I saw him in the flames, fighting at Winterfell', 'Come in', 'You interrupt nothing', 'I will after you tell me', 'The former Lord Commander', 'What are you asking', 'If you want to help him, leave him be', 'There are some with his power', "I don't know", "I met a man who came back from the dead, but the priest who did it -- It shouldn't have been possible", 'Not for me', 'Everything I believed, the great victory I saw in the flames, all of it was a lie', 'You were right all along The Lord never spoke to me', 'I never had this gift', 'Please', 'Afterwards, after they stabbed you, after you died, where did you go? What did you see?', 'The Lord let you come back for a reason Stannis was not the prince who was promised, but someone has to be', 'Ser Davos', 'I will do as Jon Snow commands', "He's the prince that was promised", 'There was a battle Stannis was defeated', "I'm not a soldier.", "Don't lose.", "I'll have to try.", 'I am not your servant, Jon Snow.', 'I serve the Lord of Light. I do what he commands.', "I interpret his signs as well as I can. If the Lord didn't want me to bring you back, how did I bring you back? I have no power. Only what he gives me and he gave me you.", "I don't know. Maybe you're only needed for this small part of his plan and nothing else. Maybe he brought you here to die again.", "The one we've got.", 'Could have been worse, Jon Snow. You had a family. You had feasts.', 'The Princess Shireen.', 'We burned her at the stake.', 'The army was trapped. The horses were dying. It was the only way.', 'I only do what my Lord commands!', 'We are standing here because of him. Jon Snow is alive because the Lord willed it.', 'So did her father. So did her mother. Her own blood knew it was the only way.', "I didn't lie. I was wrong.", "I've been ready to die for many years. If the Lord was done with me, so be it, but he's not. You've seen the Night King, Jon Snow. You know the great war is still to come. You know the army of the dead will be upon us soon. And you know I can help you win that war.", 'Queen Daeneys, I was a slave once, bought and sold, scourged and branded. It is an honor to meet the Breaker of Chains.', 'I am called Melisandre.', "No, it didn't.", "Not yet. But even those who don't worship the Lord can serve his cause.", 'The Long Night is coming. Only the prince who was promised can bring the dawn.', 'Prophecies are dangerous things. I believe you have a role to play, as does another. The King in the North, Jon Snow.', "As Lord Commander of the Night's Watch he allowed the Wildlings south of the Wall to protect them from great danger. As King in the North he has united those Wildlings with the northern houses so together they may face their common enemy.", 'Summon Jon Snow. Let him stand before you and tell you things that have happened to him, the things that he has seen with his own eyes.', "I've done my part. I've brought ice and fire together.", 'My time whispering in the ears of kings has come to an end.', 'Neither of us is common folk anymore. I did not part on good terms with the King in the North, or his advisor.', 'Because of mistakes I made. Terrible mistakes. I would only be a distraction if I stayed.', 'Volantis.', 'I will return, dear spider. One last time.', 'I have to die in this strange country, just like you.', 'Do you speak their tongue?', 'Tell them to lift their swords.', 'Valar morghulis.', "There's no need to execute me, Ser Davos. I'll be dead before the dawn.", 'Lord of Light, cast your light upon us. Lord of Light, defend us. For the night is dark and full of terrors!', 'Lord of Light, cast your light upon us! Lord of Light, defend us! For the night is dark and full of terrors!', 'The Lord brought him back for a purpose. Now that purpose has been served.', 'And I know you.', 'And here we are. At the end of the world.', 'Brown eyes... green eyes... and blue eyes.', 'What do we say to the God of Death?']

Name: sandor clegane
Sentence: ['Rough night, Imp?', "I didn't pick you for a hunter.", "It's not hunting if you pay for it.", 'The Prince will remember that, little lord.', 'Do I frighten you so much, girl? Or is it him there making you shake? He frightens me too. Look at that face.', "He hasn't been very talkative these last 20 years. Since the mad King had his tongue ripped out with hot pincers.", 'He ran... Not very fast.', "I'm no Ser.", 'Who do you think sent me?', "Do as you're bid, child.", 'Here, girl.', 'Save yourself some pain, girl. Give him what he wants.', "You'll be needing that again.", 'The girl is right. What a man sows on his name day, he reaps all year.', 'Your uncle left your nameday present and asked me to see that you got it.', 'Look inside, Your Grace.', 'And they want the same for you.', "You're all right now, little bird. You're all right.", 'The little birdo s bleeding. Someone take her back to her cage. See to that cut.', "I didn't do it for you.", "Brave? A dog doesn't need courage to chase off rats.", 'No, it gives me joy to kill people.', "Spare me. You can't tell me Lord Eddard Stark of Winterfell never killed a man.", 'Is that what he told you? He lied. Killing is the sweetest thing there is.', "You'll be glad of the hateful things I do someday when you're queen and I'm all that stands between you and your beloved king.", "You think you're a hard man?", "Oh, there's women in the ground. I put some there myself. So have you. You like fucking and drinking and singing. But killing, killing's the thing you love. You're just like me.", 'Only smaller.', "Your Lord Imp's going to miss you.", 'The king has asked you a question.', "Let's go. Stannis is sending us fresh meat. You, too.", "Any of these flaming fucking arrows come near me, I'll strangle you with your own guts.", "Any man dies with a clean sword, I'll rape his fucking corpse.", 'Someone bring me a drink.', 'Fuck the water. Bring me wine.', 'Eat shit, dwarf.', "I lost half my men. The Blackwater's on fire.", 'Fuck the Kingsguard. Fuck the city. Fuck the king.', 'The lady is starting to panic.', "Not here for long. I'm going.", "Someplace that isn't burning. North, might be. Could be.", 'He can die just fine on his own.', 'I can take you with me. Take you to Winterfell.', "I'll keep you safe. Do you want to go home?", "Look at me. Stannis is a killer. The Lannisters are killers. Your father was a killer. Your brother is a killer. Your sons will be killers someday. The world is built by killers. So you'd better get used to looking at them.", "No, little bird, I won't hurt you.", 'Thoros? The fuck you doing here?', 'Girl.', 'What in seven hells are you doing with the Stark bitch?', "You think you're good with that bow, you little twat?", "A cowardo s weapon. I like to fight up close. I like to see a man's face when I put the steel in him.", 'Looks like every other shit inn on the road.', 'You look like a bunch of swineherds.', "You're still swineherds and tanners and masons. You think carrying a crooked spear makes you a soldier?", "Beric Dondarrion? You've seen better days.", "Stark deserters. Baratheon deserters. You lot aren't fighting in a war. You're running from it.", "Untie these ropes and we'll find out. What are you doing leading a mob of peasants?", "Ned Stark is dead. King Robert is dead. My brother's alive.", "You're fighting for ghosts.", 'You found god? Is that it?', 'If you mean to murder me, then bloody well get on with it.', "I wasn't at the Mummer's Ford. Dump your dead children at some other door.", 'Do you take me for my brother? Is being born Clegane a crime?', "I never touched the Targaryen babes. I never saw them, never smelled them, never heard them bawling. You want to cut my throat, get on with it! But don't call me murderer and pretend that you're not.", 'Aye, he was a bleeder.', "I was Joffrey's sworn shield. The boy attacked the prince.", 'Then I should have killed you. Not my place to question princes.', 'So, who will it be? Should we find out if your fire god really loves you, priest? Or you, archer? What are you worth with a sword in your hand? Or is the little girl the bravest one here?', "Looks like their god likes me more than your butcher's boy.", 'I want my gold.', "Piss on that! You're nothing but thieves.", "Come try it, archer. I'll shove those arrows up your ass.", "Kick all you like, wolf girl. Won't do you no good.", "I'll give you one try, girl.", "Kill me and you're free. But if I live, I'll break both your hands. Go on, hit me. Hit me hard.", "Sulk all you want. The truth is, you're lucky. You don't want to be alone out here, girl. Someone worse than me would find you.", "Ha, you never knew my brother. He once killed a man for snoring. There's plenty worse than me. There's men who like to beat little girls, men who like to rape them. I saved your sister from some of them.", 'Ask her, if you ever see her again. Ask her who came back for her when the mob had her on her back. They would have taken her every which way and left her there with her throat cut open.', "The Blackwater? Where do you think I'm taking you?", "Fuck Joffrey. Fuck the queen. That's the Red Fork. I'm taking you to the Twins.", "Because your mother and brother will be there and they'll pay me for you.", 'Those outlaws you love so much never told you? The whole countryside is yapping about it. Your uncle is marrying one of the Frey girls. So quit trying to bash my skull in and we might just make it there in time for the wedding.', "Remember what happens to children who run. I'm your father and I'll do the talking.", 'Need a hand?', "Dead rats don't squeak.", 'More than anyone you know.', 'That so?', 'That him?', 'Good.', "You're very kind. Someday it'll get you killed.", 'Best part of the animal.', "Don't worry, they're still there.", "You check every five minutes like you're afraid they're gonna move.", "Of course you are. You're almost there and you're afraid you won't make it. The closer you get, the worse the fear gets. No point in trying to hide behind that face. I know fear when I see it. Seen it a lot.", 'That give you some ideas?', "Go ahead then. You might get away. Might even make it there on your own. They're just over the river. The closest you've been to family since Ilyn Payne snipped your daddy's neck.", 'Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa.', 'Got salt pork for the feast.', "It doesn't sound like it's over.", "Got pig's feet, too .", "It's too late.", 'Where did you get the knife?', "Is that the first man you've killed?", "Next time you're going to do something like that, tell me first.", 'The little lady wants a pony.', "Horses aren't easy to come by. Even if they were, you think I'm gonna put you on your own horse? Watch the only thing of value I've got in the world ride away?", 'No.', "I'm not a thief.", "A man's got to have a code.", "You've got an aunt in the Vale. Your rich Aunt Lysa. After I sell you to her, maybe she'll have enough left over to buy you that pony you want so much.", 'Five horses, five men. More than I feel like killing on an empty stomach.', "What the fuck's a Lommy?", 'Got what?', 'Needle? Of course you named your sword.', 'Lots of cunts.', 'What are you... get back here.', 'Get back here.', "I don't care if he ate your friend. We're not going in there.", 'I could ask the same of you. What are you doing up here?', "No need. The war's over.", 'None taken.', "She's all right. I've had better.", "I'm not going to King's Landing.", 'Fuck the king.', 'Here I am. Bring me one of those chickens.', 'You paid for it?', 'Not a penny.', "I'll still take that chicken.", "You're a talker. Listening to talkers makes me thirsty.", "Ah. And hungry. Think I'll take two chickens.", "I understand that if any more words come pouring out of your cunt mouth, I'm gonna have to eat every fucking chicken in this room.", 'Someone is.', 'Near Fairmarket, I think.', "No, I don't have a map.", "Just point out the next map shop you see and I'll buy you one.", 'Far.', 'Believe me, girl, I want you there as soon as I can. Get my gold, be on my way.', 'Why do you care? Might book passage across the Narrow Sea. Fight as a sellsword. Second Sons, could be. Seems like a good fit for me.', 'Why Braavos?', 'I doubt it.', 'What do you want?', "If I'm standing on it, it's my land.", 'You got to do all seven of the fuckers?', 'And we ask the Stranger not to kill us in our beds tonight for no damn reason at all.', 'Call that a fight? Slaughtering livestock more like.', "Guest right don't mean much anymore.", 'You got any ale?', 'How can a man not keep ale in his home?', "What'll you pay? I don't have much. But I have hidden a bit of silver from the bandits. Fair wages for fair work?", 'Fair wages for fair work.', 'Get your horse saddled.', "I wasn't.", "Aye, he took us in. He's a good man and his daughter makes a nice stew. And they'll both be dead come winter.", "I do know it. He's weak. He can't protect himself. They'll both be dead come winter. Dead men don't need silver.", "There's plenty worse than me. I just understand the way things are. How many Starks they got to behead before you figure it out?", 'Would you shut up?', 'The names of every fucking person in Westeros?', "Hate's as good a thing as any to keep a person going. Better than most. We come across my brother, maybe we can both cross a name off our list.", "I'd tell him to shut the fuck up so I can get some sleep. Go on, get it over with, your list of doomed men.", 'Go on.', 'The hell you doing?', 'What, ways to die?', "They will if you nance around like that. That's no way to fight.", 'Dancing? Maybe you ought to put on a dress. Who taught you that shite?', 'Braavos. Greasy-haired little bastard, I bet. They all are.', "I bet his hair is greasier than Joffrey's cunt.", 'Was? He dead?', 'How?', 'Who by?', 'Meryn Trant? The greatest swordsman who ever lived killed by Meryn fucking Trant?', 'Any boy whore with a sword could beat three Meryn Trants.', "The greatest swordsman who ever lived didn't have a sword? All right. You have a sword. Let's see what he taught you. Go on, do it for your Braavosi friend. Dead like all the rest of your friends.", "Your friendo s dead and Meryn Trant's not 'cause Trant had armor and a big fucking sword.", 'Could be food.', 'Who were "they"?', "That's not gonna get better.", "A bad way to go. Haven't you had enough?", 'Her captor. Bringing her to her aunt for ransom.', 'So do I.', "That's where the heart is. That's how you kill a man.", 'The fuck you doing?', "Guess that's what the king does when you tell him to fuck off.", "And you thought you were going to collect it? Didn't think very hard, did you?", "This day's really not working out the way you planned. He on your little list?", "What's your name?", "You're learning.", 'Rat cunts. Fucking whore.', 'No fire.', 'No fire!', "Shut up about it. Shut up about everything. Thanks to you, I'm a walking bag of silver anywhere the Lannisters hold sway. Which is everywhere between where we are now and where we're going.", "I'm as stupid as that hog you stuck back in the village, getting myself cut and stabbed and bitten. No reward is worth this much trouble. Wish I'd never laid eyes on you. You say your brother gave you that sword.", 'My brother gave me this. It was just like you said a while back. Pressed me to the fire like I was a nice juicy mutton chop.', "Thought I stole one of his toys. I didn't steal it. I was just playing with it. The pain was bad. The smell was worse. But the worst thing was that it was my brother who did it. My father, who protected him... told everyone my bedding caught fire. You think you're on your own?", "I thought it'd make me happy, but it doesn't. Not really. Nothing makes you happy.", 'Like what?', "So you're sad because you didn't get to kill Joffrey yourself. Is that it?", 'Aye, nothing in the world beats that look.', "I wasn't the damn wine taster. Little shit deserved to die, but poison...poison's a woman's weapon. Men kill with steel.", "laughs* I'd pay good money to see that. *grunts and rubs his neck*", "It's a fleabite.", "Well, we won't have to walk too much further.", "Aye, she'll pay.", "Doesn't matter. You're her blood. Family, honor, all that horseshit. It's all you lords and ladies ever talk about.", 'The bloody Hound, Sandor Clegane. And his...traveling companion Arya Stark, niece of your lady Lysa Arryn.', 'You want something?', 'I asked if you wanted something.', "You're paid by the Lannisters. You're here for the bounty on me.", "No? Fancy sword you've got there. Where'd you get it? I've been looking at Lannister gold all my life. Go on, Brienne of fucking Tarth, tell me that's not Lannister gold.", "You heard the girl! She's not coming with you.", "You're not a good listener. Valyrian steel-- I've always wanted some Valyrian steel.", "Safety?! Where the fuck's that? Her aunt in the Eyrie's dead. Her mother's dead, her father's dead, her brother's dead. Winterfell's a pile of rubble. There's no safety, you dumb bitch. If you don't know that by now, you're the wrong one to watch over her.", "Aye, that's what I'm doing.", "I'm not a knight.", "You're still here? [Coughs] Big bitch saved you.", "No, not you. You're a real killer. With your water dancing, and your needle.", "Unless there's a Maester hiding behind that rock, aye, I'm done. I'd skin you alive for wine. [Arya offers water.] Fuck water! Killed by a woman. I bet you liked that. Go on, go after her. She'll help you. Going out alone, you won't last a day out there.", "You remember where the heart is? Fuck it. I'm ready. Go on, girl. Another name off your list. You kept promising me. I cut down your butcher's boy, the ginger. He was begging for mercy. Please sir, please don't kill me, please, please. Bled all over my horse. Saddle stunk of butcher's boy for weeks. And your sister, your pretty sister. I shouldo ve taken her. That night the Blackwater burned, I shouldo ve fucked her bloody. At least I'd have one happy memory! Do I have to beg you? Do it. Do it.", 'Kill me. Kill me! Kill me! Kill me!', 'Fall back!', "Fuck off! We can't beat them. Don't you see that, you stupid whore? We're fighting Death! They can't beat Death.", 'Come on!', "We've gotta go!", "You can still smell the burning bodies, and that's where your head is at.", "I'm sure you do.", "Of course it's about that, you twat. Why shouldn't it be? The dead are dead. You're not.", "Think about it. She kills Cersei, the war's over. There won't be a siege. You might not even die tomorrow.", 'Go ahead, talk to him.', 'Move.', 'Go home, girl. The fire will get her, or one of the Dothraki.', "Or maybe that dragon will eat her. It doesn't matter. She's dead. And you'll be dead too if you don't get out of here.", "You think you wanted revenge a long time? I've been after it all my life.", "It's all I care about. And look at me.", 'Look at me! You wanna be like me?', 'You come with me, you die here.', 'Your Grace.', 'Hello, big brother.', "Yeah, that's you. That's what you've always been.", 'Oh.', 'Fucking die!']
